
1a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/ /
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tA ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal
1b2(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /'khor ba'i sems can thams cad kyi/ /sdug bsngal thams cad spangs nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa rab ster ba/ /
1b3(rgyud 'grel): chu las skam sar 'don pa bzhin/ /rje btsun ma la phyag 'tshal nas/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni bri bar bya/ /sgrub pa'i thabs
1b4(rgyud 'grel): ni gzhan rnams las/ /'di ni mchog tu gyur pa yin/ /yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su khrus byas la stan
2a1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba la 'dug ste/ skad cig gis bdag nyid rje btsun mar bskyed la/ de'i thugs kar sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla
2a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i steng du tAM ljang gu bsam/ tAM las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/
2a3(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dang rje btsun ma spyan drangs la phyag 'tshal ba dang/ oM badzra puShpe A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ zhes bya ba la sogs pas mchod pa dbul ba
2a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang/
2b1(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bzhugs su gsol ba dang/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ sems bskyed pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya'o/ /
2b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms tshad med pa bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma
2b3(rgyud 'grel): ko haM zhes brjod la stong pa'i ngang las paM dmar po cig bsam/ de yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs pad+ma/ de'i steng du a dkar po yongs su gyur
2b4(rgyud 'grel): pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du tAM ljang gu cig bsam/ de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
2b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' thams cad spyan drangs nas tAM la tshur thim pas thig le dkar po cig tu gyur/ thig le de gyur pa las utpa la sngon po'o/ /de'i steng du a
3a1(rgyud 'grel): dkar po cig bsam/ de yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cig bsam/ de'i steng du tAM ljang gu cig bsam/ tAM las 'od 'phros pas
3a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi don byas sems can thams cad sgrol ma'i rang bzhin du gyur te/ /'od zer tshur 'dus te tAM la thim pas utpal dang/ pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dang/
3a3(rgyud 'grel): tAM yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid rje btsun sgrol ma sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin g.yon pa utpa la bsnams pa/ zhabs g.yas
3a4(rgyud 'grel): brkyang g.yon bskum du bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lo bcu drug lon pa lta bur bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas phyogs bzhi'i pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la a
3a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po bzhi yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bsam/ de nas bdag nyid kyi lte ba nas 'od zer bzhi 'phros pa las shar du dkar po/ lhor ser po nub
3b1(rgyud 'grel): tu dmar po/ byang du nag po/ de bzhi yongs su gyur pa las yi ge bzhi ru gyur te/ shar du oM dkar po/ lho ru tA ser po/ nub tu re dmar po/ byang du tu nag po/ de rnams yongs su gyur pa las
3b2(rgyud 'grel): shar du pad+ma dkar po/ lho ru mya ngan med pa'i shing ser po/ nub tu pad+ma dmar po/ byang du gri gug nag po/ phyag mtshan de bzhi'i steng du a dkar po bzhi yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
3b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i steng du shar du oM dkar po/ lho ru tA ser po/ nub tu re dmar po/ byang du tu nag po/ phyag mtshan dang zla ba'i sa bon yongs su gyur ba las/ shar du so sor 'brang ma sku mdog dkar mo zhal gcig
3b4(rgyud 'grel): ma phyag gnyis ma/ spyan gsum ma/ skyil krungs dang bcas pa/ phyag g.yas nor bu rin po che/ g.yon pa na pad+ma dkar po'i steng na rin po che'i bum pa ser po bsnams pa'o/ /lho phyogs su 'od zer can
3b5(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma spyan gsum ma skyil krungs dang bcas pa phyag g.yas na rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yon pa na mya ngan med pa'i shing ser po'o/ /nub phyogs su phag mo sku mdog
3b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ phag gi gdong pa can/ spyan gsum pa skyil krung dang bcas pa/ phyag g.yas na pad+ma dmar po/ g.yon mnyam par gzhag pa'o/ /byang phyogs su ral pa
4a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig ma sku mdog nag mo khro mo'i zhal can/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ spyan gsum ma/ phyag g.yas pa na gri gug bsnams pa/ g.yon pan thod pa khrag gi bkang ba bsnams pa/ stag
4a2(rgyud 'grel): gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ skyil krung du bzhugs pa'o/ /de nas gtso mo'i thugs ka nas sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng na tAM ljang gu de las 'od zer 'phros pas ye shes kyi lha lnga'i
4a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid spyan drangs nas mdun du byon pa la mchod pa dbul bar bya ste arg+haM dbul ba ni/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM arg+haM pratI ts+tsha swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM bu ShpaM pratI ts+tsha swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM d+hU paM pratI ts+tsha swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM dI paM pra tA ts+tsha swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gaM d+haM pratI ts+tsha
4a4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ne we dye pra tI ts+tsha swAhA/ zhes mchod pa byas la snying gar utpa la'i phyag rgya byas la dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dgyes pa byas so/ /de nas bdag gi thugs ka nas sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil
4a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi hUM ljang gu las 'od zer 'phros te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyan drangs nas/ de rnams kyi phyag na rin po che'i bum pa bdud rtsis bkang ba thogs nas byon pa la snga ma ltar mchod par dbul bar bya'o/ a b+hi Shi ny+tsa tu mAM sarba ta thA ga tA zhes brjod pas bdud rtsi'i bum pa chus bkang bas dbang bskur bar bsams la rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan pa ni gtso mo'i spyi bor don yong grub pa'o/ /so sor 'brang ma la ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /
4b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer can ma la ni rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /phag mo la snang ba mdza' yas so/ /ral gcig ma la mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan no/ /de nas sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa ni spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du oM dkar po mgrin par pad+ma dmar po'i steng du A(rgyud 'grel): dmar po thugs
4b2(rgyud 'grel): kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM nag po/ de nas gtso mo nyid la byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /'khor la ni mi dgos so/ /de nas gnas rnam pa brgyad du phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste/ gnas brgyad na zla pa'i dkyil 'khor brgyad yod pa'o/ /de'i steng na yi ge brgyad yod pa ni kha
4b3(rgyud 'grel): dog dkar po lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcings te/ mthe bo gnyis mdzub mo'i steng du gzhag la spyi bor te oM swAhA zhes brjod pa ni spyi bo'i phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur gnyis bcings te mdzub mo gnyis rang bzhin du bkug ste rtse mo gnyis phrad mthe bong gnyis gung mo'i rgyab du brkyang la dpral
4b4(rgyud 'grel): bar gtugs te tA swAhA zhes brjod pa ni dpral ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo khong stong du byas la mthe bong gnyis nang du bkug ste mig gnyis su gtug cing re swAhA/ zhes brjod pa ni mig gi phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur gnyis bcangs te mdzub mo gnyis rang bzhin du bkug ste rtse mo gnyis
4b5(rgyud 'grel): sprad mthe bong gung mo'i steng du brkyang la mgrin par gtugs te tu swAhA zhes brjod pa ni mgin? pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur bcings te mthe bong gnyis dang mdzub mo gnyis bskyed la dpung pa gnyis kyi steng du gtugs te tA swAhA zhes bya ba ni dpung pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo spyar
4b6(rgyud 'grel): la mthe bong gnyis bslang ste bskyed la snying kar gtuT te re swAhA zhes bya ba ni snying ga'i phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur gnyis bcings te mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ste gung mo gnyis rtse sprad pa bkug ste lte bar gtugs te tu swAhA/ zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /
4b7(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur gnyis bcings te mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i steng du brkyang la gung mo gnyis rang sor brkyang ste rtse mo gnyis sprad la bag cem bskum ste/ gsang ba'i gnas su gtugs la re swAhA/ zhes bya ba ni gsang pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya bcings pa'i dgos pa ni dam tshig
5a1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang/ lus ngag yid gsum dge ba la brtan par 'gyur ba dang/ kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i chos thams cad sems la brten pa nyid du 'dzin pa'o/ /yang dgongs pa gnyis te 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
5a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ bdag la bdud la sogs pa'i bar chad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba'i dgos pa'o/ /de nas bdag gis snying gar sna tshogs pang zla'i steng du tAM ljang gu las 'od zer 'phros pas sems can thams cad la phog ste
5a3(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad rje btsun ma'i gzugs su byas pas sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa lnga dag par byas so/ /de nas tshur 'dus te tAM la thim par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar spro pa dang bsdu bar bya'o/ /skyon bzlas pa bya ste thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na tAM ljang gu la
5a4(rgyud 'grel): yi ge bcu yis g.yas bskor du bskor te mar me'i phreng ba lta bur bzlas par bya'o/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /der yang mgyogs pa ma yin/ bul ba ma yin par te sngags bzlas pa'i lugs gsum ste rang gis thos la gzhan gyis mi thos pa
5a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rang gzhan gnyis kas thos pa dang/ ngag ma yin pa'i sems kyis bzlas pa dang gsum mo/ /dang po'i dgos pa ni zhi ba dang rkas pa dang dgug pa 'grub bar 'gyur ro/ /gnyis pas ni mngon sbyod 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gsum pas ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob
5a6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen pa'i grangs ni bye ba phrag gcig go /las la sbyor ba'i dus su gtso mo'i sku mdog sgyur gyi 'khor gyi ma sgyur ro/ /de yang zhi bal oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ ma mA shAM tI ku ru swA hA/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /rgyas pa yin oM tA re tut+tA re tu re gaaur?Ta mam
5a7(rgyud 'grel): pu'i ku ru brjod par bya'o/ /dgra gogs por bya ba la ni/ oM tA re tu t+tA re tu re ba ShaT a mu ki pa shiM ku ru ba ShaT zhes de cod par bya'o/ /dgug pa la ni oM tA re tu t+tA re tu re dz+nyo na a mu ka A karSha ya dza/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /bskad pa la ni oM tA re tut+tA re tu re phu a
5b1(rgyud 'grel): mu ka u ca Ta ya phu zhes brjod par bya'o/ /bcings la dgra lus bcing ba ni/ oM tA re tu t+tA ra tu re a mu ka staM b+ha ya laM/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /ngag bcing ba ni oM tA re tu t+tA re tu re swAhA laM a mu ka sha wA tsa staM b+ha ya laM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /dgra rang gi gnas su bcing ba ni/ oM
5b2(rgyud 'grel): tA re tu t+tA re tu re swAhA loM A karSha a ka ma ma staM b+ha ya loM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /bsad pa la ni oM tA re tut+tA re tuM re swAhA hUM phaT a mu kaM mA nga ya hUM phaT ces brjod par bya'o/ /de nas gtor ma gtang bar bya ste mdun du a dkar po yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil
5b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi steng du gtor ma'i snong dngul las byas par mas par bya'o/ /de'i nang du a dkar po yongs su gyud pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du oM dkar po las 'od zer 'phros pas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bkug ste oM dang zla ba la babs pas de
5b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams zhu bas 'o ma lta bur gyur to/ /de nas oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes lan gsum brjod la/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ zhes brjod de/ gtso 'khro thams cad kyi lce rdo rje'i spu gu dang ldan pas gsol bar bsam par bya'o/ /chos skyong ba rnams la ni oM A kA rom?
5b5(rgyud 'grel): lam sarba d+ha rmA trAM A dya nu tpa n+na twA ta oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA zhes lan gsum brjod de lce rdo rje'i spu gu dang ldan pas gsol bar bsam par bya'o/ /thun tha ma la ni ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol lo/ /dam tshig sogs dpa' bdag la bsdu bar bya'o/ /ni
5b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa bshed par bya'o/ /gtso mo'i zhal gcig tu bya ba ni chos thams cad ye shes gcig tu rtogs pa'o/ /sku mdog ljang gu byung ba ni las sna tshogs la dbang ba'o/ /phyag gnyis su byung ba ni g.yas pa kun rdzob g.yon pa don dam bden/
5b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis rtogs pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas brkyang ba ni bdud la sogs pa'i skyon thams cad spangs pa'o/ /g.yon bskum pa ni yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ni tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ gtso 'khor mthun pa'o/ /
6a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /g.yon pa skyabs sbyin pa ni sems can thams cad 'jigs pa las skyob ba'o/ /utpa la bsnams pa ni sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa'o/ /lo
6a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug lon pa lta bu ni sems can thams cad kyi don bsgrub pa'i nus pa'i dang ldan pa'o/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan ni snying rje'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'o/ /rigs ni don yod grub pa'i rigs so/ /phung po ni rnam par
6a3(rgyud 'grel): shes pa'i phung po'o/ /ye shes ni chos kyis rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so/ /so sor 'brang ma'i sku mdog dkar mo ni chos thams cad dri ma med pa dang ldan pa'o/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis su byung ba gtso mo dang mthun no/ /spyan gsum ni dus gsum mkhyen pa'o/ /phyag g.yas
6a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rin po che ni sems can thams cad kyi dgos 'dod kyi re ba skong ba'o/ /phyag g.yon pI pad+ma dkar po ni chos thams cad skyon dang bral ba'i rtags so/ /de'i steng na rin po che'i bum pa ser po yod pa ni chos thams cad la rin po cher 'dzin pa'o/ /phung po ni gzugs kyi phung po'o/ /ye shes
6a5(rgyud 'grel): ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so/ /rigs ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs so/ /'od zer gyi sku mdog ser mo ni sems can thams cad kyi don rgyas par byed pa'o/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis ni gtso mo dang mthun no/ /phyag g.yas kyi rdo rje'i ra 'og ma lnga ni yud po lnga dag pa'o/ /
6a6(rgyud 'grel): steng gi ra lnga ni rgyal ba rigs lnga dang ldan no/ /g.yon pa'i mya ngan med pa'i shing ni sems can thams cad du(rgyud 'grel): kha spongs par byed pa'o/ /phung po ni tshor ba'i phung po rnam par dag pa'o/ /ye shes ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so/ /rigs ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs so/ /
6a7(rgyud 'grel): phag mo/ /nal gcig phyag gnyis ni gtso mo dang mthun/ /sku mdog dmar mo sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa'o/ /phag gi gdong pa ni bdud thams cad 'dul pa'o/ /phyag g.yas kyi pad+ma dmar po ni chos thams cad rin po che pad+ma rA ga lta bur
6b1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa'o/ /g.yon mnyam gzhag ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'o/ /phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung po rnam par dag pa'o/ /ye shes ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so/ /rigs ni snang ba mdza' yas kyi rigs so/ /ral pa gcig ma'i zhal gcig phyag
6b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni gtso mo dang mthun pa'o/ /khro mo'i zhal ni bdud 'dul pa'i rtags so/ /phyag g.yas kyi gri gug ni nyon mongs pa gcod pa'i rtags so/ /phyag g.yon pa'i thod pa ni rnam rtog thams cad spangs pa'i rtags so/ /sku mdog nag mo ni byams pa chen po'i
6b3(rgyud 'grel): rtags so/ /stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs ni 'khor ba khrug chol gyi rang bzhin kun rdzob kyi bden pa rtogs pa'o/ /phung po ni 'du byed kyi phung po rnam par dag pa'o/ /ye shes ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so/ /rigs ni mi bskyong ba'i rigs so/ /'khor bzhi ka skyil
6b4(rgyud 'grel): krung du byung ba ni gzhan gyi don la shin tu brtan pa'o/ /mtshams kyi pad+ma bzhi la utpal bzhi byung ba ne spyan ma/ mA ma kI gos dkar mo/ /sgrol ma ste lha mo bzhi'o/ /'byung ba bzhi rnam par dag pa'o/ /tshad med pa bzhi'i ngo po'o/ /lha'i bdag nyid ni rgyal ba
6b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs lnga'i sprul pa nyon mongs pa lnga spangs pa ste gtso mo phrag dog spangs pa'o/ /so sor 'brang ma gti mug spangs pa'o/ /'od zer can nga rgyal sdangs pa'o/ /phag mo chags pa spangs pa'o/ /ral gcig ma zhe sdang spangs pa'o/ /de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa ste
6b6(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa'o/ /stong pa nyi du mos nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku de yang ni bdag gi snying kar sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng gi tAM ljang gu las 'od zer dkar po rnam snang gi rang bzhin du gtso bo'i lte ba ras
6b7(rgyud 'grel): byung bas so sor 'brang ma spyan brangs nas bdag gis dbral bar thim mo/ /yang lte ba nas 'od zer dmar po 'od dang dpag med kyi rang bzhin du byung bas phag mo spyan drangs nas gtso bo'i mgrin par thim mo/ /yang lte ba nas 'od zer nag po mi bskyod
7a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin du byung bas ral gcig ma gtso bo'i thugs kar thim mo/ /yang lte ba nas 'od zer rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rang bzhin du byung bas 'od zer can gtso bo'i lte bar thim mo/ /de nas gtso mo nying pad+ma dang zla ba dang tAM gyi ngo bor gyur to/ /pad+ma
7a2(rgyud 'grel): yang zla ba la thim/ zla ba tAM la thim/ zla tshes thig le la thim/ thig le bin du la thim/ /bin du dmar po khab kyi rtse mo lta bur gyur to/ /de ni chos kyi sku'o/ /nge nas rnam par rtog pa med par nyal par bya'o/ /de nas nang par sngar ldang ba'i dus su/ nA da nge thig ler song/ de tAM du song/ de
7a3(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid gtso bo nyid kyis skad cig gis bskyed nas/ de'i thugs ka nas sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tOM las 'ong 'phros pas ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs la bsod nams kyi tshogs sog pa la sogs pa snga ma ltar bya'o/ /rje btsun sgrol mi
7a4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ sgrol ma rgya mtsho'i rgyud nas phyung ba 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po d+ha rmA badzra dang/ bod kyi rdo lo tsa ba dge slong dar ma rin chen gyis bsgyur pa'o/ //chos 'khor 'jo 'jo'i
7a5(rgyud 'grel): gtsug lag khang du dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po chos kyi blo gros kyis yon bdag mdzad pa'o// //rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrol ma las kyi sbyor ba'i yis/ /bsrung ba'i cho ga bya ba ni/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /rang gi
7a6(rgyud 'grel): snying khar sa bon bsam/ /de las spros pa'i 'od zer gyis/ /bla ma dang bcas sangs rgyas ni/ /bdag gi mdun du gsal byas la/ /'od zer de las byung ba yi/ /me tog sogs kyis mchod par bya/ /de nas sdig bshags la sogs bya/ /de nas lha ru bsgom bya ste/ /dang por chos
7a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams stod par bsgom/ /de 'og pad+ma 'dab brgyad dang/ /zla ba'i dbus su yi ge hAM/ /sa bon de las ud+pal/ /lte bar tAM gis mtshan par bsgom/ /utpal tAM bcas gyur pa las/ /bdag nyid sgrol ma'i gzugs su bsgom/ /phyag g.yas mi 'jigs ster ba'o/ /g.yon pa u dpal
7b1(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa ni/ /'dab ma rna ba ma deg pa'o/ /sku mdog ljang sngon dag tu bsgom/ /de ltar bdag nyid bskyed pa'i mthar/ /yan lag drug tu dgod pa ni/ /a'oM tA re swAhA/ oM tung tA re swAhA/ a'oM tu swAhU/ a'oM re swAhA/ a'oM tA re ni srAhA/ zhes bya ba rnams mig
7b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ snying kha dang/ spyi bor go rim bzhin dgong do/ /de nas snying khar pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad kyi lte ba la a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ /de'i steng dus bon taM ljang khu bsams la oM tA re tung tA re tu re swAhA/ /zhes sngags sum 'bum yan
7b3(rgyud 'grel): chod du ci nus su bzlas so/ /de nas 'khor lo bsam pa ni/ /lte ba dang bcas rtsibs brgyad la/ /mu khyud bskor ba snying khar bsam/ /'khor lo kha dog ljang sngon ni/ /'khor lo'i dbus kyi lte ba la/ /thog ma'i a'oM dang tha ma'i hA/ /ming dang spel te bskom par bya/ /bsrung
7b4(rgyud 'grel): ba a'oM lha sbyin la rak+Sha hwA zhes pa bsgom/ /tA re tud tU re tu re swa zhes pa rmams ni/ /shar sogs rtsibs la rim bzhin dgod/ /rang gi lus la 'khor lo ni/ /yig 'bru rnams kyang ljang sngon no/ /de ltar bsgom pa goms byas nas/ /bdag nyid sgrol ma'i sku dang ni/ /
7b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo las/ /spros pa'i 'od zer dag gis ni/ /bsgrub? bya'i lus la dgang bar bya/ /bsrung ba'i skabs su phreng sngags/ /oM tA re tung tA re tu re lha spy9i la rak+Sha rak+Sha swAhA/ /zhes pas bsrung ba'i las la ni/ /khyad par du bya ba'i gsungs
7b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba de'i rgyal po yis/ /btsor ra la sogs bsrung bar bya/ /sgrol ma las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /las rnams yang dag bsgrub byas te/ /nad sogs zhi ba'i las dang ni/ /dbang du bya ba'i sphyi bo la'ang/ /cho ga gar ma de nyid las/ /'khor lo la sogs kha dog dang
7b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi spel pa bstan par bya/ /rang gi las dang mthun par bya/ /sgrol ma yi ni ting 'dzin gyis/ /las gzhan dag kyang bya bar? nus/ bsgrub ba shes rab gzhan pa dang/ /le lo can sogs rnams la ni/ /gong ma'i cho ga de nyid las/ /gzhan du bya
8a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bstan pa ste/ /'khor lo lnga ma de nyid las/ /sngags rnams g.yon skor dag tu dgod/ /mu khyud la yang a sogs dgod/ /de ltar bsgom dang bzlas byas na/ /blo dman rnams ni blo ldan 'gyur/ /gzhan yang sbyor ba bya ba ni/ /'di lta bur
8a2(rgyud 'grel): yang bstan pa yin/ /grog la sogs gzhi la ni/ /'khor lo gong ma ltar bris nas/ /lus la bcang bar byas na yang/ /de tsam gyis kyang bsrung bar 'gyur/ /thugs rje chen po 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs spyi'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon
8a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rjog sto// /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ tA re de bi ste traM e ka bI sha ti ka sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ lha mo sgrol ma'i bstong pa nyi shur tsa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rje btsun 'phags ma
8a4(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal sgrol ma myur ma dpa' mo/ /spyan ni skad cig glog dang 'dra ma/ /'jig rten gsum mgon chu skyes zhal gyi/ /ge sar phye ba las ni byung ma/ /nge la dang por re zhig bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma nam mkha' i dkyil na pad+ma ser po'i steng
8a5(rgyud 'grel): na bzhugs pa sku mdog dmar mo me lta bu'i 'od 'phro ba can/ /zhal gcig la spyan gnyis ma phyag brgyad pa'o/ /phyag dang po gnyis sgrog bar bzhengs pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o/ /de'i 'og ma gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu gzhan la 'phen pa ni thugs
8a6(rgyud 'grel): khar bkang ba/ g.yas kyi gsum pa 'khor lo/ /bzhi pa na ral gri/ g.yon gyi gsum pa na mdung/ /bzhi pa na zhags pa bsnams pa/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma myur zhing rab tu dpa' ba zhes bya ba'i sgrubs thabs le'u dang po
8a7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal ston ga'i zla ba kun tu/ /gang ba brgya ni brtsegs pa'i zhal ma/ /skar ma stong phrag tshogs pa rnams kyis/ /rab tu phye ba'i 'od rab 'bar ma/ /de la dang por re shig ston kha'i zla ba ltar dkar pa'i sgrol ma dkar mo
8b1(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum/ /phyag bcu gnyis ma/ /zhal gsum ni g.yas sngo zhing g.yon ser pa'o/ /phyag dang po gnyis mnyam par gzhag pa g.yas gnyis kha tAM ga /gsum pa na 'khor lo/ /bzhi pa na rin po che/ /lnga pa na rdo rje/ drug pa na me tog gi phreng ba'o/ /g.yon gyi gnyis pa
8b2(rgyud 'grel): na ril ba spyi blugs gsum ba na ud+pa la/ bzhi pa na dril bu/ lnga pa na bum pa/ drug pa na po ti bsnams pa'i/ /'phags ma sgrol ma ston kha'i zla ba ltar dkar ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal ser sngo chu nas
8b3(rgyud 'grel): skyes kyi/ /pad+mas phyag ni rnam par brgyan ma/ /sbyin pa brtson 'grus dka' thub zhi ba/ /bzod pa bsam gtan spyod yul nying ma/ /rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma gser gyi mdog can/ /zhal gcig /phyag bcu ma/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng gi nyi ma la gnas
8b4(rgyud 'grel): ma/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po na phreng ba thugs khar 'dzin pa/ gnyis pa na ral gri/ gsum pa na mnga' 'phen par gzas pa/ bzhi pa na rdo rje/ lnga pa na dpyug gu'o/ /g.yon gyi dang po na dar spyangs/ /gnyis pa na zhags pa/ gsum pa na pad+ma/
8b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa na dril bu/ lnga pa na gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /de yang rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma gser mdog can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba'i le'u gsum pa rdzogs// //phyag 'tshal de bzhin gshegs pa'i
8b6(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor/ mdza' yas rnam par rgyal bar sbyong ma/ /ma lus pha rol phyin pa thob pa'i/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis shin tu bsten b
8b7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma ser po dang zla ba'i dkyil na sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis brtan par bzhugs pa'i/ rje btsun ma gser gyi mdog
8b8(rgyud 'grel): can/ /gzhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ /g.yas dang po mchog sbyin pa/ /gnyis pa na phreng ba/ g.yon dang po na ril ba spyi blugs/ gnyis pa na dbyug gu bsnams pa'o/ /'phags mo sgrol ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor rnams par rgyal ma/ /zhes bya
9a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal tu ta re hUM yi ges/ /'dod dang phyogs dang nam mkha' gang ma/ 'jig rten bdun bo zhabs kyis mnan te/ /lus pa med par 'gugs par nus me/ /rje
9a2(rgyud 'grel): btsun ma sku mdog ser mo/ /zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ /zhal gcig /phyag gnyis ma g.yas skyabs sbyin pa/ g.yon pad+ma ser po bsnams pa'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma hUM gi sgra rab tu sgrogs ma zhes bya ba'i sgrubs thabs kyi le'u ste
9a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal brgya phyin me lha tshangs pa/ /rlung lha sna tshogs dbang phyug mchod ma/ /'byung bo ro langs dri za rnams dang/ /gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mdun nas bstod ma/ /rje btsun ma dmar mo/ /pad+ma dmar po dang/ nyis ma'i gdan la
9a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ zhal gcig /phyag bzhi ma/ g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje/ gnyis pa ral gri g.yon gyi dang po'i sdigs mdzub/ /gnyis pa zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i
9a5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste drug pa rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal tud? ces bya dang phaT gyis/ /pha rol 'phrul 'khor rab tu 'joms ma/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang zhabs kyis mnan te/ /me 'bar 'khrugs ma shin tu 'bar ma/ /rje btsun ma nag mo/ /pad+ma ser po/ /nyi ma'i dkyil
9a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la g.yon rkyang pas bzhugs pa/ na bza' ser mo man bas pa/ rin po che'i cod pan can/ rkang gdub la sogs pa dang ldan pa/ zhal gcig /phyag bzhi ma/ dbu ska gyen du brdzes shing sprul gyis brgyan pa/ g.yas dang po na 'khor lo/ /gnyis pa na ral gri/ g.yon dang
9a7(rgyud 'grel): po skyes gnas kyi steng na zhags pa bsnams pa/ /gnyis pa brkyang ste sdigs mdzud mdzad pa'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma gzhan 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u sto bdun ba rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal tu re 'jigs pa chen po/ /bdud kyi dpa' bo rnam par
9b1(rgyud 'grel): 'joms ma/ /chu skyes zhal ni khro gnyer ldan mdzad/ /dgra bo thams cad ma lus gsod ma/ /rje btsun gser gyi mdog can zhal gcig /phyag bzhi ma/ pad+ma dmar po dang/ zla ba'i steng du chu srin la skyil mo krung byed pas bzhugs pa/ g.yas dang po na shing mya ngan med pa'i yal ga bzung / gnyis
9b2(rgyud 'grel): phan rin po che bsnams shing mchog gsol ba/ g.yon dang po na pad+ma/ gnyis pa na bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma bdung thams cad 'joms shing dbang mchog ster bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum
9b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshon phyag rgya'o/ /so mos thugs khar rnam par brgyan ma/ /ma lus phyogs kyi 'khor los brgyan pa'i/ /rang gi 'od kyis tshogs rnams 'khrug ma/ rje btsun ma pad+ma sA ga'i mdog can pad+ma dmar po dang zla ba'i steng na bzhugs pa/ /zhal gcig/ phyag bzhi ma/ rgyan thams cad kyis
9b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan ma/ /phyag dang po gnyis rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ dang po'i phyag rgya lta bu'o/ /g.yas gnyis pas gar byed pa/ g.yon gnyis pa shing mya ngan med pa'i ya ga 'dzin pa'i phyag gis sems can thams cad la rin po che'i char rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa'o/ /'phags
9b5(rgyud 'grel): ma sgol ma mchog gsol ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal rab tu dga' bas brjid pa'i dbu rgyan 'od kyi phreng bas sbel ma/ /bzhad pa rab bzhad tu ta ra yis/ /bdud dang 'jig rten dbang du mdzad ma/ /rje btsun ma dmar
9b6(rgyud 'grel): mo/ /pad+ma dmar po dang zla ba'i gdan la rol pas bzhugs pa/ /zhal gcig/ phyag bzhi ma/ phyag dang pa gnyis spyi bor rab tu dga' pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa/ /g.yas gnyis pa na ral gri'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa/ g.yon gnyis pa na shing mya ngan med pa'i yal ga gzung
9b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma mya ngan thams cad sel bar byed bzhes bya ba'i/ /sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu ba rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal sa gzhi skyong ba'i tshogs rnams/ /thams cad 'grub par nus ma nyid ma/ /kro gnyer g.yo ba'i yi ge hUM gis/
10a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phongs pa thams cad rnam par sgrol ma/ /rje btsun ma mun pa'i mdog can nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na pad+ma la zhabs g.yas pa'i rol pas bzhugs/ /zhal gcig /phyag gnyis ma/ phyogs mtshams brgyad nas gza' brgyad
10a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na bsnams pa'i lcags kyus 'gugs pa/ phyag g.yon pas rol pa'i lcags kyu snams pa'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs shing phongs pa thams cad sel pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u lte bcu gcig pa rdzogs//
10a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal zla ba'i dum bus dbu brgyan/ /brgyan pa thams cad shin tu 'bar ma/ /ral pa'i khrod na 'od dpag med las/ /rtag par shin du 'ong ni mdzad ma/ /rje btsun ma gser gyi mdog can/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs
10a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ zhag gcig /phyag brgyad ma/ g.yas dang po na rtse gsum pa/ gnyis pa na lcags kyu/ gsum pa na rdo rje/ bzhi pa na ral gri/ g.yon dang po na rin po che thugs khar bsnams pa/ gnyis pas lcags kyu/ gsum pas dbyug gu /bzhi pas bum pa bsnams
10a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma bkra shes thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal skal pa'i tha ma'i me ltar/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba'i dbus na gnas ma/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum
10a6(rgyud 'grel): bas kun bskor dga' / /dgra yi dpung ni rnam par 'joms ma/ /rje btsun ma dmar mo/ /pad+ma dmar po'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer dang bcas pa la g.yas brkyang pas gnas pa/ zhag gcig/ phyag bzhi ma/ smin ma dang mchu gyen du rtsos
10a7(rgyud 'grel): bas ba lta ba/ g.yas dang po na ral gri/ gnyis pa nam par/ g.yon dang po na 'khor ro/ /gnyis pa na gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /'phags pa ma sgrol ma yongs su smin pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs so//
10b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal sa gzhi'i ngos la phyag gi /mthil gyis bsnun cing zhabs kyis brdung ma/ /khro gnyer can mdzad yi ge hUM gis/ /rim pa bdun po rnams ni 'gems ma/ /rje btsun ma sku mdog nag mo/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng na pad+ma dmar ser la g.yas brkyang
10b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gar gyis yi dag mnan cing bzhugs pa/ zhal gsum la spyan gsum mnga' ba'i rtsa ba'i zhal nag mo/ g.yas dkar pa g.yon dmar ba/ phyag drug pa khro gnyer dang ldan zhing zhal dang smin ma bsdus pa can/ mi'i rgyu ma zhal du gsol zhing mgo bo'i cod pan
10b3(rgyud 'grel): can/ thod pa'i ngo shal dang ldan pa/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs man bas pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ phyogs dang mtshams bzhir myu gu 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yas dang po ral gri/ gnyis pa lcags kyu/ gsum pa dbyug gu / g.yon dang po khrag
10b4(rgyud 'grel): gis bkang ba'i thod pa/ gnyis pa zhags pa/ gsum pa na mgo bo bsnams pa'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma 'gugs pa'i khro bo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs le'u bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal bde ma dge ma zhi ma/ /mya ngan 'das zhing
10b5(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul nyid ma/ /swAhA oM dang yang dag ldan pas/ /sdig pa chen po 'joms pa nyid ma/ /rje btsun ma dkar mo/ zhal gcig /phyag drug ma/ pad+ma dkar pa'i steng na zla ba la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ g.yas dang pos phreng ba thugs
10b6(rgyud 'grel): khar bsnyams pa/ gnyis pa mchog sbyin/ gsum pa dbyug gu/ g.yon dang po na pad+ma/ gnyis pa na ril pa spyi blugs/ gsum pa po ti Å’bsnams pa'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma zhi ba chen po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs le'u ste bcwa lnga pa
10b7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal kun nas bskor rab dga' ba'i/ /dgra'i lus ni rab tu 'gems ma/ /yi ge bcu pa'i sngags ni bskong pas/ /rig pa'i hUM las sgrol ma nyid ma/ /rje btsun ma dmar mo/ /zhal gcig spyan
11a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum ma/ phyag gnyis ma/ pad+ma dmar ser gyi steng na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ g.yas thugs khar rtse gsum pa bsnams pa g.yon snying po dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o/ /'phags ma sgrol
11a2(rgyud 'grel): mchags pa 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs le'u bcu drug pa rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal tu re zhabs ni brdabs pas/ /hUM gi rnam pa'i sa bon nyid ma/ /ri rab man d+ha ra dang 'bigs byed/ /'jig rten gsum rnams g.yo ba nying ma/ /rje btsun ma
11a3(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dmar ser/ zhal gcig /phyag gnyis ma/ pad+ma dkar po'i steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ /phyag gnyis kyis thugs khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba thams cad sgrub pa zhes
11a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i sgrub thabs le'u bcu bdun ba rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal lha yi 'tsho yi rnam pa'i/ /ri dags rtags can phyag na bsnams ma/ /tar gnyis brjod phaT kyis yi ges/ /dug rnams ma lus par ni sel ma/ /rje btsun ma dkar mo/ /zhal gcig /phyag
11a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ma/ pad+ma dkar po dang zla ba'i gdan la dang pa'i steng na sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag dang po gnyis dga' ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa/ g.yas gnyis pas mchog sbyin pa/ g.yon gnyis pa snying po dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o/ /'phags
11a6(rgyud 'grel): ma sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs le'u bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal lha yi tshogs rnams rgyal po/ /lha dang mi 'am ci yis bsten ma/ /kun nas go cha dga' ba'i brjid kyis/ /rtsod dang rmi lam ngan pa sel ma/ rje
11a7(rgyud 'grel): btsun ma dkar mo/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ pad+ma dkar po dang nye ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na/ sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ 'od zer gyi phreng bas brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis kyis thugs khar me'i snod bsnams pa'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma sdug bsngal
11b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs le'u bcu dgu pa rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal nyi ma zla ba rgyas pa'i/ /spyan gnyis po las 'od rab gsal ma/ /ha ra gnyis brjod tu tA ra yis/ /shin tu drag po'i rims ni sel ma/ /rje btsun ma dmar ser/ zhal gcig /phyag gnyis ma/ /pad+ma dmar po dang
11b2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na/ sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag gnyis kyis gser gyi mdog can gyi dum pa bsnams pa'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs le'u nyi shu brdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal de nyid gsum rnams
11b3(rgyud 'grel): bkod pas/ /zhi ba'i mthu dang yang dag ldan ma/ /gdon dang ro langs gnod sbyin tshogs rnams/ /'jems pa tu re rab mchog nyid ma/ /rje btsun ma dkar mo/ zhal gcig spyan gsum pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ khyu mchog gi steng na pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs
11b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ stag gi sham thabs bnoms? pa/ /g.yas phreng ba/ g.yon mdung rtse gsum pa bsnams pa'o/ /'phags ma yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// //'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs
11b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ kha che'i paN Di ta slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN Di many+dzau sh+rI dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba mal gyo blo gros grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te/ btan la phab pa'o// // */ /sgrol ma nyi bu rtsa gcig pa'i yan 'gad?  bcas da mdor bsdus
11b6(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhugs so/ /rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin che/ /mi rtog gzhan don mthar phyin ma/ /gdul bya'i dbang gis lha mo yi/ /tshul 'chang de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig sgrub thabs kyi/ /spyi dang so so'i chi la brten/ /las kyi yan lag
11b7(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub rim/ /mdor bsdus bdag gis bstan par bya/ /rtsod ldan dus kyi rnal 'byor pas/ /gzhan gyis byas pa gshig pa'i phyir/ bsgrub bya'i yul gyi lta rten nam/ /gdug cing gnag pa'i rang bzhin la/ /dkyil 'khor nag mo mda' gang tshad/ /de dbus drag po'i ho ma khung du
12a1(rgyud 'grel): dug dang khrag dang nag pos byug /de la bskyed shi dar bas bskor/ /de yi dbus su bsgrub bya'i gzugs/ /de nyid las byung rdzas rnams dang/ /gzhan yang dgra po'i rdzas rnams las/ /nying lag brgyad pa skye mched rdzogs/ /de yi snying khar zhing chen nam/ /dur khrod
12a2(rgyud 'grel): ras la drag po yi/ /rdzas dang snyu gus 'khor lo bri/ /rtsibs brgyad gsang sngags spel chig can/ /kha sbyar legs dril gzhug par bya/ /rgyus chen dag gam drag po yi/ /gzugs kyi thag pas snying khar drang/ /lcags sam rnal 'byor gling bu yis/ /spu gus snying khar gtang byas
12a3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ bdag nyid lta yi sbyor ldan pas/ /sbod dang sbong byed rten phral nas/ /sngar gyi gzugs la legs par gzhug /de yi steng du la gsum dang/ /lung gsum sa dang chus sprus pa'i/ /mchod rten nag po khru gang tshad/ /khri 'phang bzhi ba puM rten bcas/ /bum pa drag po'i dbyibs can de/ /
12a4(rgyud 'grel): rgod dang srung dang rna ba yi/ /mgul dang thod dang sgom pa yi/ /sdul byed rnams ni go rim bzhin/ /ngos gsum po la byug byas pa'i/ /bum pa phyogs skyong snying por bcas/ /gdugs la yi ge bcu pa ni/ /spel tshig dang bcas kyis brgyan pa/ /ji srid ma thod bar du mnan/ /spyi dang khyad par?
12a5(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams la/ /mchod dang bstan pa skyong ba la/ /gtor mas mnyes byas bden tshig can/ /lha yi sbyor ba rgyun mi gcad/ /dgug dang gzhug dang bstim rtsogs kyis/ /sbyor ba rab tu brtsams byas na/ me tog la ni rdo chang bzhin/ /cig shos myur du 'pham 'gyur te/ /pha rol nus pa chen po rdung
12a6(rgyud 'grel): nang gi mtshan ma rnyed gyur nas/ /snga ma'i gzugs de bsreg byas la/ /bdag bcas sar gzhug de yi steng/ /tse de nag pos mnan par bya/ oM tA re tu da tA re che ge mo a mu ka mA ra ya phaT/ /oM tA re tung tA re tu re adma rak+Sha rak+Sha swAhA/ /oM tA re tung tA re tu re che ge mo d+hi rna g+hi rnam/ b+hand+ha
12a7(rgyud 'grel): b+hand+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha d+ha rad+ha pa bid+h+ra na sa ya bi d+hwa na sa ya/ A ma mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ /oM tA re tung tA re tu re ma hA pa na tsa yak+Sha/ sta pa stam pa thaM/ h+rI baM ril mA ra ya phar ku ru ku l+le b+hyo/ /'phags ma sgrol ma myu zhing rab tu dga' mo zhes bya pa'i las kyi yan lag
12b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir bzlog pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po rdzogs so// /rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yams sogs 'jig rten ma rungs rnams/ /rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ dkar po'i phyogs kyi zla ba la/ /khru do khor yug maN+Dal steng/ /pad+ma mdab brgyad dbus su ni/ 'od
12b2(rgyud 'grel): dpag med dang 'phags ma ste/ phyogs bzhir rigs bzhi mtshams bzhi la/ /yum bzhi'i mtshan ma dgod par bya /de yi phyi rol phyogs skyong dgod/ /grwa bzhir mda' bzhi me long ba ni/ /ral gri bzhi dang rma bya bzhi/ /tshon skud lnga yis bri bar bya/ /bkra shis shing ngam zangs ma las/
12b3(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'i phung pa phyogs bzhir gzugs/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs dang/ /me tog phreng ba la sogs pa'i/ /mchod pa'i khyad par rgya chen bsham/ /dar ram ras sam gro ga la/ /bkra shis dar spyangs bris byas nas/ /dbus su yi ge bcu pa ste/ /g.yas dang g.yon du rigs lnga
12b4(rgyud 'grel): yi/ yab dang yum du bcas pa yi/ /gsham du phyogs skyong bod po rnams/ /gur kum gyis ni bri bar bya/ /'phags ma la sogs rten bzhugs la/ /ci 'byor pa yi mchod bya ste/ /bstan skyong rnams la gtong ma sbyin/ /de nas dge slong dge 'dun nam/ /gso sbyong ldan pas bsnyen par bya/ khri
12b5(rgyud 'grel): phrag re la mchod pa dang/ /gtor ma re ste gsol ba gang/ /cha lang la sogs sngags bkod la/ /shin tu bsgrims pas bsgrag par bya de ltang 'bum phrag gcig tu bya/ /de yang lha yi sbyor ldan pas/ /zhi bar bya bar 'dod pa dang/ /kun tu gtsang sbrang gnas pa yis/ /las ni 'grub par 'gyur
12b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ster yams bdag mo la bskang pa yang/ /'di la shin tu bsngags pa yin/ /de nas dkyil 'khor mtshon cha sogs/ /phyogs mtshams rnams su dgram byas te/ /mchod rten sngags bcas nang du bzhug /des ni de nyid 'grub 'gyur bar/ /rje btsun nyid kyis gsungs pa yin/ /oM
12b7(rgyud 'grel): tA re tu nga tA re tu re/ sarba b+hya d+hi pra sha ma ni shin tir ku ru swAhA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba zhes bya ba'i las kyi yams nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so/ //rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /cho yi snyigs mar gyur pa yi
13a1(rgyud 'grel): mi rnams tshe ni bsring pa'i phyir/ /shin tu nyams dga' i gnas dag tu/ /phyi nang khrus ni sngon 'gro bas/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'phags ma yi/ /bskyod pa'i rim pa rdzogs byas nas/ /sa bon las byung 'od zer gyis/ /'phags ma tshe dpag med gsol ma/ /phyag na tshe yi bum pa bsnams/ /
13a2(rgyud 'grel): de bkug mdun du bang sdeng la/ /bzhugs byas yan lag bdun pa dang/ gsol ba btab nas bsten pa bya/ /oM tA re tut+ta re tu re a yu dz+nyA na/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi d+ha ra bi d+ha ra/ sa mA pra b+hA d+ha ya d+he hi d+he hi swAhA/ /de nas mar la mar blugs bzhin/ /de dang bdag nyid tha dang med/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes kyi/ /bdag nyid tshe
13a3(rgyud 'grel): yi dbang phyug mchog /bdag la stsal nas rgya mtsho ltar/ tshe yis rgyas par gyur bsams nas/ /lan grangs bdun la sogs par bstod/ /de nas rnam shes bskyed pa'i rta/ /'dod pa'i phyogs su gyur pa na/ /tha ma la gsum gcig sbyor ba yis/ /ring por drangs la mthar gyis bskyil/ /'gyed pa shin tu zhi par
13a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ de la yang ma 'phos par du'o/ /de ltar na ni zla re la/ /zhag res tshe ni 'phel 'gyur na/ /dus min 'chi sog smos ci dgos/ /rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrol ma gser mdog can gyi las kyi yan lag tshe'i 'phel ba'i mchog rgyas par phye ma zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum brdzogs so// //rje btsun 'phags ma
13a5(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi stobs kyis srog g.yo ba/ /'bar ba'i me la chu rgyun bzhin/ /de dag bsang phyir ka dka' dang/ rgyal ba'i spyan dang a k+Sho b+hya/ /rin chen snying po rtsa ba mchog /gcig bur skyes dang sprul gyi dug /tshes ma tho gis rnam snang la/ /bskyed dang brgya stong bzlas rim gyis/ /de yi khor du gtang
13a6(rgyud 'grel): par byas? gnas lnga rnams su 'pha gar ba bya ste/ /dmigs pa rtse gcig sbyor ba yis/ /ha la yis 'dzo? sgro yis bya bas/ rang bzhin dang ni bcos pa dang/ /gyur pa'i stobs dang dri bzod dka' / /gang yang 'di'i yis the tshom med/ /oM tA re tud re tu re na ma/ sha re sha re/ bi sha re bi sha re/ sarba bi sha g+ha Ta ni swAhA/ /'phags
13a7(rgyud 'grel): bla sgrol ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug gtor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag dug bsang pa'i tshe ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa rdzogs so// //rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la gang zhig rag las pa/ /de nyid dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ /gro ga'i ni gos gzhan la/ /bcu drug
13b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsings can 'khor lo bskor/ /pho dang mo yi snag tshal/ /dkar po gcig rgyug sogs bslang pas/ /dbus su gzugs dang ming yig bcas/ /rtsibs la yi ge bzhis brten pa'i/ /bsgrub bya'i mi ni bri bar bya/ /phyi rol oM yig gsum gyi dbus/ /srad du dmar bcings spra tshil gyi/ /gzugs brnyan snying khar bcug byas
13b2(rgyud 'grel): 'ang se bldeng me la dus gsum bsro/ /pho dang mo yi bye brag gis/ /nang pa 'am ni 'jug sgo ru/ /zangs ma'i thur mas bru bar bya/ /sa bon 'od kyis drang ba ni/ /bsgrub bya rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus/ /skra g.yengs gcer bu'i snying khar ram/ /mgrin dang mtshan mar lcags kyu 'am/ /zhabs pa lta bus rab drangs nas/ /
13b3(rgyud 'grel): chung gi shugs ldan sngags kyi mthus/ /rkang pa'i drung du lhags byas nas/ /ci dang ci bgyi zhes pa brjod bsam/ /chu dang rdul khrod las byung sbyar/ /dus gsum dag tu brten bya zhing/ /de nyid rdo rje'i chus spangs la/ /de la sbyin par bya ba yin/ /de nyid pa ni skye cho dag /ming dang bcas par sbyin sreg bya/ /yang na rdul khrod
13b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi'o/ rdo rje bskyong dang bde bcas dang/ /mthar phyin pa dang byang chub sems/ /rgyu bzhen rdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /las 'di rag tu 'grub 'gyur te/ /nyi ma mdun gyis pho dang mo/ /bdun phrag gsum gyis skyes bu che/ /bdun phrag bdun gyis lha mo sogs/ /sa bla rnaMs kyang 'dod pa yi/ /mda' yis myos nas
13b5(rgyud 'grel): da'i mdu na du/ /rang dbang med par ltung par 'gyur/ /oM tA re tur tA re la ba na A ba so a te ssho si u du kro si ba shaM ka ra a nu ka sya da ha gaT ni/ dang rnga caM na kha bya si/ da hA a s+thi ni/ a s+thi b+hyaM/ ma dzdza kaM da ha la b+ha NaM/ bin da taM ba la naM ba ca ti ba la naM pa tsa ti sho ni te/ pa la ne da rgya ma nI haM/ kru tra nI tra/
13b6(rgyud 'grel): ku tro re tri ya tI ba sa ti yo de na sha de na dri naM/ tsa sha tan ta re/ na ga re lo ha pra ka ra/ gri k+Sh+Na sarba kri taM g+ga te dur dre pa pa sa mA nE hI/ pa la na b+ha na d+ha/ pu ras kri ta(rgyud 'grel): oM caM taM caM taM baM blo laM baM glo li swAhA/ a mu kaM sa d+ha naM sa ri ba raM/ me ba sa ma na swAhA/ oM ku ru ku l+le swA hA/ 'bum phrag drug gi
13b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ldan pas/ /me tog bdug pa la sogs pa/ /gang la byin pa de dbang 'gyur/ /bza' btung gis kyang de bzhin te/ me tog dmar po'i sbyin sreg gis/ /gang dag 'dod pa dbang du byed/ /skyes bu mchog la yungs kar sngags/ /'khar ba'i snong du sbreng rtsi mar/ /sngags dang
14a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas bcug dus gsum du/ /mchod dang bzlas pas don rnams 'grub/ /kham por du bar bcas pa la/ /brgya dang brgyad bzlas mig la byug /gsod par 'dod pa'i dgra bos kyang/ /phu sdug bzhin du sems par 'gyur/ /dur khrod gnas su snod chen
14a2(rgyud 'grel): du/ pad+ma dkar dang chen po'i snum/ /brgyad dang bcu bzhi bsgrub byas pa'i/ mig sman gyis ni gzhan dgar 'gyur/ /'phags ma sgrol ma hUM gi sgra rab tu sgrogs ma zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag dbang du byed pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so// /rje
14a3(rgyud 'grel): btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog ma med dus nas bsags pa'i/ nyes pa'i tshogs rnams sbyang ba'i phyir/ /rab tu shes pa'i dus nyid du/ /dam tshig 'di la mi bsngags pa'i/ /longs spyod dag ni rab tu spang/ /dge na pa'i gnas su dkyil 'khor bya/ /
14a4(rgyud 'grel): rten dang mchod pa sna tshogs bsham/ /bar chang bsrung phyir bstan skyong la/ /rab tu shis pa'i gtor mas mchod/ /rten la rje btsun bzhugs byas nas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub ba sems/ /thugs rje can gyis bdag la ni/ /ming ga'i las
14a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams sbyang ba'i phyir/ /gso sbyong dam pa gsal bar mdzod/ /rgyal sras rnams kyis ji lta bar/ /bdag kyang de bzhin bsgrub par bgyi/ /gsum la drug tu rnal 'byor pas/ /rdo rje lta bu'i tshul gyis su/ sdig pam lus zang ged? pa/ /brgya dang brgyad
14a6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas gsol ba gdab/ /gnas gsum dag tu sdig pa'i gzugs/ /bris sam bsams la bya ba bya/ /yang na til gyis sreg pa'am/ /dag byed chu yi sbyor bas kyang/ /de yi nyes pa bkru bar bya/ /de ltar na ni myur nyid du/ dkar gyi mtsho dang ngan sgyubs
14a7(rgyud 'grel): zag /mkha' la rgyu zhing chu skyes stung/ /rtsod las rgyal ba la sogs pa'i/ /mtshan mas de yid dga' byas nas/ /dpal ldan gnas su 'gro bar 'byung/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ /na ma a ryA ba lo ki te shA rA ya/ bo d+hi sa tA ya ma hA sa tA ya/
14b1(rgyud 'grel): ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ ta dyA thA/ oM tA re tu dwa tA re tu re ma mA sarba pa pAM/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ sarba b+ha ba sa mu d+h+ro ts+tsho sha na kar ya swAhA/ /sarba bar pAM shan tir ku ru ye swAhA/ /'phags ma sgrol ma 'jig rten gsum las rnam
14b2(rgyud 'grel): par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag sgrib pa yongs su sbyong ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste drug ba rdzogs so// //rje btsun ma 'phags ma le phyag 'tshal/ /rnal 'byor srog ni g.ye ba yi/ /mtshan ma byung bar 'gyur pa na/ 'chi bdag
14b3(rgyud 'grel): bdud na gzhom pa'i phyir/ /'gro ba rnams la srog sbyin zhing/ /phyi rol dngos pos bsod nams bsags/ /bde gshegs mched rten mdzes pas brgyan/ /phyi nang chos rnams nam mkha' ltar/ /dmigs pa med par rab tu bsgom/ /des ni rkyen
14b4(rgyud 'grel): skyes zhi bar gsungs/ /'phen pa'i nus pa zad pa'o phyir/ /des kyang rab tu mi spongs na/ /bdag gi lus dang longs spyod dang/ /bshes rnams nam mkha' i glog bzhin du/ /'gyur ba'i rang bzhin shes byas nas/ /tha ma'i dus su gyur pa na/ /
14b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i lha yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /dkar bsil lus la phan byed pa/ /rlung la dmigs bya gnyis su drang/ /sgo rnams bsdams la rab tu mnan/ /ldog pa'i tshe na bsrid par bya/ /spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga dpe/ /gnas gsum dag tu
14b6(rgyud 'grel): yi ge gsum/ /rten dad rten pa byang chub sems/ /chu la chu bzhin tha dad med/ /thig le la ni thig le bzhin/ /gyen du gcig la gcig bsdus te/ /hi ka zhes pa'i 'bru gnyis po/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya/ /gyen du phyin pas
14b7(rgyud 'grel): 'og min te/ /thung du phyin pas brtson ngar ro/ /yi ge dang bas 'pho bya ba/ /shing la zhon bzhin khyab pa dag /snying khar 'dod lha'i gzugs gyur te/ /mnan dang bsdam dang sbyar bzlog cing/ /nam mkha' i mthongs te rab gsol la/ /yi
15a1(rgyud 'grel): ge gnyis kyis rab drangs nas/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdzu 'phrul shugs kyis phyin par bya/ /'di ni thun mongs ma yin pa/ /skal ldan rnams kyi lam yin te/ /bla med gsang sngags khyad
15a2(rgyud 'grel): par thabs/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis gsungs/ /de nas sgrub ldan rnal 'byor pas/ /'di la ma yengs 'bad pa che/ /goms pa'i yn lag sdon 'gro bas/ /byas na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'phags ma sgrol ma gzhan
15a3(rgyud 'grel): 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag gong du 'pho ba zhes bya ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bdun pa rdzogs so// //rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal/ /ji ltar dug la dug sbyar bzhin/ /'khor ba'i rtsa ba nyon mongs te/ /
15a4(rgyud 'grel): de la de nyid kyis dbyung ba'i/ /thabs kyi cho ga gang gsungs pa/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa brten pa yis/ /pad+ma can rnams dung can sogs/ /rigs gsum las skyes sher rab ma/ /bcu gnyis pa dang bcu drug pa/ /nyi shu bzhi yi lo lon pa/ /
15a5(rgyud 'grel): mig dkyus ring zhing dkar mdangs ldan/ /'jam mnyen 'khril ldem gzhon nu'i tshul/ /lus la ga bur dad ldan zhing/ /dag 'jam mdzes 'gro yon tan phyag/ /skyabs 'gro nas ni smin pa'i bar/ /ci rigs pa la de bkod nas/ /lus
15a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs gsum po dag byas nas/ /byang gi phyogs su de bsrungs nas/ /gru bzhi lham pa khru gang chad/ /byi dor legs bas me tog dgram/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang mchod gzhan gcas/ /rdo rje'i h+ri stengs de bzhag nas/ /bkru dang bkru ba'i cho ga
15a7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rigs kyi bdag po'i rnam pa yis/ /sa bon lcags kyu'i spro bsdu las/ /thabs dang shes rab bkug byas nas/ /gnyis ka'i tshangs pa'i bu ga gshegs/ /rab smin rdo rje pad+ma ste/ /de brtag pad mar snying po btsal/ /de nas
15b1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba mnyam sbyor phyir/ /pad+ma'i bre 'bru rgyas pa dang/ /ye shes rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /lag sbyar gnyis su med par bya/ /bsdams dang glod pa'i sbyor pa yis/ /rnam lnga rnam lngas khyab par bya/ /spu gus snying po bzung byas nas/ /nyams kyi stobs kyis
15b2(rgyud 'grel): drang bar bya/ /dga' ba bzhi yi bdag nyid kyis/ /gsal la mi rtog bde ba'i mchog /gzung dang 'dzin dang dmigs bral ba/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes na/ /go rim bzhin du nyams su blang/ /mi 'bral cung zhig bsten par bya/ /gsal ba'i
15b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes ma zin na/ /jol ba'i sgra la sems gtad nas/ /cung zhig bsgom par bya ba yin/ /yang dag yang du nyams su blang/ /de las mi rtog ye shes skyes/ /rlung la goms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje'i chu ni mthung ba'am/ /yang na kun da byang
15b4(rgyud 'grel): chub sems/ /rang gis rab tu bzhibs byas te/ /gsal bar bya ba'i yan lag dang/ /goms par brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /byang chub sems ni dbab bya yi/ /de las gzhan pas bde ba ni/ /rab tu gzung phyir bsrung bya ste/ /ji srid kun
15b5(rgyud 'grel): da ma shor ba/ /de srid snyoms 'jug de nas ni/ /mdun bzhag pa la dmigs pa 'am/ /yang na yid kyis spyad par bya/ /shes rab ma 'ang lhag pa yi/ /lha bzhin rab tu mnyes par bya/ /'di ni gsang ba bla med lam/ /tha mal rnam rtog las
15b6(rgyud 'grel): grol ba'i/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'di spyad pas/ /gnyis med ye shes phyag rgya che/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog bde ba'i sku/ /ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur/ /'phags ma sgrol ma bdud thams cad 'joms zhing dbang mchog ster ba
15b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i las kyis yan lag rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i le'u ste brgyad po rdzogs so/ /rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku gsum rang bzhin gzugs brnyan gang/ /thams cad spros dang bral yin pas/ /gang gis gang la rang
16a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas byas/ /ci zhig 'dir ni mchod par bya/ /sbyin bdag bsod nams spel ba dang/ /sngags pas dge ba rnyed pa'i phyir/ /rab gnas bstan bcos las bshad pa/ /tha snyad tsam du byas pa yin/ /ji ltar sku gzuT
16a2(rgyud 'grel): yongs sdogs? nas/ /byin ma rlabs par ring gnas na/ /de la bkra mi shis 'byung zhing/ /de la bgegs kyang 'jug par 'gyur/ /de srid mchod par de mi 'os/ /de bas byin rlabs bshad par bya/ /sku gsum gzugs brnyan gang yin
16a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /bzo bos byas pa yongs rdzogs te/ /gzugs kyi gsum pa'i cha mnyam pa'i/ /stegs bu'i steng du bzhugs su gsol/ /gza' dang nyi ma zla sogs la/ /mchod dang gtor sogs legs byas nas/ /bdag gi rnal 'byor yongs
16a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pas/ /bum pa la ni bzlas pa bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta A bi She ka sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM/ /bum pa la bzlas pa'i sngags so/ /dri ma bkrus rjes stong par bsam/ /bruM/ aM(rgyud 'grel): khaM(rgyud 'grel): dzaM(rgyud 'grel): hUM rnams las/ /sku gzugs rigs lnga'i
16a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bskyed/ /sku gsung ye shes dpang yang bskur/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka ya bi sho d+ha ni hUM swAhA/ /sku phyi ba'i sngags so/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa dang/ ye shes pa spyan drangs pa'i sngags so/ /
16a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas rab tu mchod nas ni/ /gsang sngags zlos shing spyan phye nas/ /slar yang rab tu rgyas pa yis/ /mtshad cing rab tu gnas par bya/ /oM badzra puShpe A hUM/ oM badzra du Shpa hUM/ oM badzra a lo ke A hUM/ a'oM badzra gand+he A hUM/ oM
16a7(rgyud 'grel): badzra na we dye A hUM/ mchod pa'i sngags so/ /oM tsak+Shu tsak+Shu sa man ta tsak+Sha bi d+ho d+ha ya swAhA/ thur mar sbyan dbye ba'i sngags so/ /oM su pra ta Sh+Ti? badzra ya swAhA/ oM hUM h+ri bruM khaM badzra b+ha ba sh+rI du d+hi sti nu khaM/ rab tu gnas pa ste me tog la bzlas
16b1(rgyud 'grel): la gtor zhing maN+Dal dbul pa'i sngags so/ /'byung po che la gtor ma sbyin/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas nas kyang/ /bsod nams 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ /yon gyis bla ma mnyes par bya/ /de ltar rab tu gnas bya na/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/
16b2(rgyud 'grel): sems la gang ci 'dod pa yi/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung/ /'phags ma sgrol ma mchog gsol ba zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so// //rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol
16b3(rgyud 'grel): ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub che dang dngos grub gzhan/ /ma smin pa las mi 'byung bas/ /de'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa/ /snod dang ldan pa'i slob ma yis/ /maN Dal dang sbyor gzhan dag gis/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma la/ /rdo rje slob
16b4(rgyud 'grel): dpon dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ni dus 'di nas bzung nas/ /snying po byang chub ma thob par/ /bla ma dam par gsol 'debs kyis/ /bdag gi bla ma mdzad du gsol/ /ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang/ /ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang
16b5(rgyud 'grel): dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung dang/ /mya ngan ma 'das bzla pa'i phyir/ /bla mar zhugs par khyod spro 'am/ /de nas maN Dal sngon 'gro bas/ /bla ma sangs rgyas byang chub sems/ /'dod pa'i lha la bdun rnam dag /lam la gnas
16b6(rgyud 'grel): pa byas nas su/ /bgegs mthar byed kyi yang snying ni/ /de yis de la dbog par bya/ /bla ma lha yis sbyor ldan pas/ /mchod pa dang ni gtor ma yis/ /sa yi bdag po mnyes phyas nas/ /snang dang mi snang sa bdag la/ /gsol
16b7(rgyud 'grel): ba gdab sogs rgyas par bya/ /me long dbyibs can dkyil 'khor ni/ /'dab ma bzhi ldan pad+ma ste/ /kha dog gzhan dang 'dra ba'o/ /sa 'am rin chen las byas pa'i/ /bum pa nyes pas ma gos pa bsrung ba'i cho ga sngon
17a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro bas/ /de dag steng du bkod byas nas/ /'bru dang/ spos dang/ snying sman dang/ rin chen lnga dang/ /a rga dang/ mgul chings kha rgyan rdzogs par bya/ /de dag mi dmigs stong pa las/ /
17a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang dbus ri rab steng/ /de dbus pad+ma'i gdan khri la/ /dam tshig 'khor lo bskyed pa nas/ /dbang gi bar du rdzogs byas nas/ /mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba yis/ /mchod pas mchod nas rtsa ba'i sngags/ /
17a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bum phrag gcig gi bsnyen pa byas/ /gsang sngags ye shes chu rgyun gyis/ /bum pa chos nyid gang byas nas/ /mchod dang gtor ma ci rigs bya/ /skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /mig tu ma dang Ta las ni/ /nyi ma zla ba
17a4(rgyud 'grel): gsal byas te/ /bsnyen pa'i 'khor lo mkha' la 'degs/ /sngags 'di bzlas shing gsal bar bsgom/ /oM badzra u Da hUM phaT/ /de nas khro rgyal bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /bdag bskyed nas ni bgegs bskad de/ /hUM lus
17a5(rgyud 'grel): ngag sems la gnas pa'i bgegs/ /'dir nyon nga ni dpal dang ldan/ /bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/ /nga yi ?? bka' yi dam tshig las/ /u 'das brlag gyur the tshom med/ /mi dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs/ /
17a6(rgyud 'grel): gdon gyi rigs su gtogs pa rnams/ /'di ru ma gnas gzhan du deng/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags brjod cing/ /khro bo'i gom stabs brgyad pa'i gar/ /rkang lag smin bskyod 'degs pa dang/ /zur mig nyi ma'i dbus gnas
17a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'dzub bcas mche gtsigs phreng ba'i gang/ /bskor nas ra ba gur sogs bya/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par las/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/ /skyob pa
17b1(rgyud 'grel): shAkya seng+ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom ltar/ /de bzhin du ni bdud kyi sde/ /pham par byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /lha yi nga rgyal ldan pa yis/ /thig le byas nas rdzas dgram dang/ /byin brlabs byas nas rab bskor te/ /spas dril thoT
17b2(rgyud 'grel): nas 'di skad du/ /ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor bri/ /deng 'dir thams cad kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub 'di ni
17b3(rgyud 'grel): stsal du gsol/ /stegs bu'i stengs na gnas pa yis/ /phyogs bzhi nas ni gsol ba gdab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi dngos/ /dkyil 'khor dam
17b4(rgyud 'grel): pa bshad du gsol/ /mtshen rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad rnam par spangs/ /kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung/ /ye
17b5(rgyud 'grel): shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba/ /kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med/ /kun bzang thugs mcho ga kha lo sgyur/ /dkyil
17b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /thig le byas nas dkyil 'khor stengs/ /ye shes 'khor lo gzhugs byas nas/ dbang bskur bar gyi cho ga yang/ /byas la mchod pa dbul byas nas/ /byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa'i/ /
17b7(rgyud 'grel): bum pa'i cho ga rdzogs par bya/ /thig le ra la re re ste/ /rdzas la bsang zhing gsol ba gdab/ /yol bas de bcad bdag nyid nang/ /khrus byas spyod lam mdzes pa yis/ /dga' chen khyad la bdag dga' o/ /slob dpon khyod
18a1(rgyud 'grel): ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pas/ /mgon po chen po bdag la gsol/ /dam tshig de ni bdag la gsol/ /byang chub sems ni bdag la gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang
18a2(rgyud 'grel): skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog du/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags tshul bzhin spyod ba dag /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /khyod ni tshul
18a3(rgyud 'grel): chen snod yin te/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /rdo rje gsang sngags 'di bsgoms pas/ /dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan ma bsnyes/ /gsang sngags spyod pa mnyam
18a4(rgyud 'grel): med de/ /shAkya sang+ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung dang bcas pa rab bcom ste/ /'jig rten rjes 'jug rtogs pa yis/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis
18a5(rgyud 'grel): shig /de yi mdun du maN+Dal bya/ /slob ma mi dmigs stong pa las/ /'dod lha'i gnas gsum thig le bya/ /rang gi gsum spros phyag mtshan no/ /slob ma'i mdun du maN+Dal bsten/ /bsang gtor bya zhing mchod pa dbul/ /deng nas bzung nas bu khyod
18a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ 'khor ba'i nyes pa ma phog par/ /mchod pa kun dang ldan par ni/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de la maN+Dal dbul bar bya/ /de yis so shing sor brgyad pa/ /yi ge bcu bzlas de la sbyin/ /bcad nas de dor rtags zhes bya/ /'jig
18a7(rgyud 'grel): rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams/ /u dum 'bar ba'i me tog bzhin/ /rgya lam nas ni re 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung srid/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung pa/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /gang gis mnyam med sems can
18b1(rgyud 'grel): don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /skal ba bye ba du ma ru/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ /'gro don mnyam med byed par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang theg pa chen po yi/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyed rnams der ni 'dod par nus/ /thams
18b2(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras bu 'thob/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/ /des na bu yis brtson par gyis/ /sngags sam bsrung skud 'khor lo yis/ /ku sha'i stan la byang shar du/ /yi ge drug bzlas nyal bar bya/ /skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin
18b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /cho ga sngar bzhin 'khor lo gdeg /bzang po'i dris sngags thig skud la/ /'od kyis ye shes der bstims nas/ /lha mo mdzes ldan slob mas drang/ /dza dza gsum brjod thig skud bskur/ /des kyang lan gsum brjod la blang/ /snying po lnga
18b4(rgyud 'grel): yis gdab par bya/ /chos nyid rgyas btab tshon rtsil/ /yi ge lnga pa'o sa bon las/ /'ong 'phros ye shes gzhug par bya/ /gzhal yas lte ba ser bo la/ /gtso bo'i phyag mtshan dgod par bya/ /zer 'bru dmar po las skyes pa'i/ /sna tshogs pad+ma
18b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzhi dang/ mtshams bzhir rigs kyi yab yum mo/ /mu khyud dmar la ral gri'i phreng/ /lha rnam gru chad sgro rnams ni/ /phyogs tshon dag tu shes par bya/ /sgo bzhir sgo ma dgod par bya/ /rgyan las stsogs pa gzhan dang 'dra/ /phyogs
18b6(rgyud 'grel): skyong rnams dang bkra shis kyi/ /rtags kyang rab tu dgod par bya/ /de nas rdo rje me ri ste/ /kun gyi phyir ro rgya mtsho'o/ /lha yi sbyor ldan bla ma yis/ /yi ge gnyis dang bsnol ma las/ /g.yo sdud sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /lte bar gzhal yas rgyan gyis
18b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzes/ /dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma bskyed/ /rang nyid 'dod lha'i thig le can/ /lan gsum du bskor bcu pa brjod/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dbye ste/ /gsang sngags 'di yang brjod par bya/ /oM badzra d+ha rod? badzra sa ma ya swAhA/ steng dang phyogs bzhir legs
19a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan nas/ /mchod pa la sogs dgong par bya/ /'dod yon bdud rtsir skad cig mas/ /ye shes byin gyis brlab par bya/ /de nas sgrub thabs las gsung ltar/ /bskyed pa'i rim brdzogs byas nas/ /mcho dang rnaMs kyis mchod pa dpya/ bstan skyong rnams
19a2(rgyud 'grel): la gtor ma ste/ /phyi rol 'byung po rnams la sbyin/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes/ /bden pa de yis
19a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du/ /gzugs brnyan gsal ba'i slob ma ni/ /kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog /de nas sbyod mdzes khrus byas la/ /de la de yis 'di skad du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ /ma mthong snod dang mi ldan
19a4(rgyud 'grel): las su la'ang ston par ma byed cig /bdung rtsi lnga la byin brlabs pa/ /yi ge gsum brjod de la sbyin/ /'di ni rdo rje dam tshig chu/ /srungs shig ma bsrungs sreg par byed/ /bsrungs na dngos grub ster bar byed/ /bdud rtsi 'di ni myang bar gyis/ /oM pan tsa a mri ta u
19a5(rgyud 'grel): ta ka tha tha/ /des ni de ltar byin gyis brlab/ /gdong g.yog rdo rje dril bu gtang/ /rdo rje nas bzung ha ha hI'i/ /sngags brjod bskor nas yol ba'i nang/ /phyag 'tshal lha ma me tog gtor/ /gang la phog pa lta bar bya/ /dud gtang thugs kha'i yi ge a/ /snying khar
19a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhug bya bde ba bsgom/ /rtags ldan bstan pa'i yan lag bya/ /de nas yum nyid de'i spyi bor/ /spyan drangs sa bon yi ge ste/ /de las phyag mtshan bu gar zhugs/ /snying kha'i dbus su rje btsun no/ /oM tA re tur tA re tu re ci ta maM Da la badzra sa ma ya staM/ /sangs rgyas kun
19a7(rgyud 'grel): dngos rje btsun ma/ /khyod kyi snying du yang dag zhugs/ /rtag tu yi dam lha gyis shig /tshul 'di smra bar ma byed cig /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /nga ni 'phags ma sgrol ma ste/ nga yis sgo ba'i las nyon cig /me mos brnyas par
19b1(rgyud 'grel): ma byed cig /gal te khyod kyis smras na ni/ /dam tshig 'di yis sreg par byed/ /tsha ba chen po'i gnas su sreg/ rang bzhin rnam dag bdag nyid lus/ /dpa' bo dang ni dpa' mo'i gnas/ /dri med rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni/ /bu khyod kyis ni lta bar gyis/ /gdong g.yogs dkrol nas de bstan bya khaMs
19b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi bya ba dam chos snod/ /dbang bskur dam pa mdzad du gsol/ /rnam rgyal du ni bsdus pa'i chu/ /dam tshig ye shes las byung ba'i/ /rigs bdag cho ga rdzogs pa las/ /snga ma'i rang bzhin bsgyur byas nas/ /slob ma la ni dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra a dang sha dz+nyA na A b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ /de
19b3(rgyud 'grel): ni mi bskyod par byas nas/ /mchod pa rnam lnga dbul bar bya/ /'di ni chu yi dbang yin par/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis gsungs/ /cod pan rdo rje dril bu dang/ /ming gi dbang ste bzhi bo dang/ /gom ma gsum dang slob ma nyid/ /mi dmigs pa las de dag ni/ /oM dang dzi
19b4(rgyud 'grel): dang khaM dang A/ /de las phyag mtshan yi ger bcas/ /de las sangs rgyas bzhi bdag nyid/ /cho ga'i yan lag rdzogs par bya/ mchod nas snga mar gyur pa yis/ /slob ma la ni dbang bskur nas/ /sangs rgyas tshul gyis de mchod bya/ /oM badzra sa ma na ta dz+nyA na rang na hUM
19b5(rgyud 'grel): A bti Shi na tsa maM/ /oM badzra pra hya bi shin tsa maM/ /oM kri tya a nu shtha na th+rA? na pa te badzra A bi shin tsa ma/ /oM tsakra a mo g+ha dz+nyA na badzra swAb+hA ba A b+hi shin tsa maM/ /bla mas spos dril sbyor pa yis/ /mchod bya yi ge bcu pa bzlas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
19b6(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs pas/ /'di la bsgo bar mdzad du gsol/ /sngags kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/ /me tog gtad la sngags zlong gzhug /de nas de yis de dag la/ /me tog phul la 'di skad ces/ /bcom ldan bdag gis bzung lags kyis/ /bdag la bsgob?
19b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol/ /de yis de la rdo rje sbyin/ /oM badzra sa ma ya stoM A bi sha ni tsa maM/ /rgyan dang cha lugs kyis bskon to/ /lha yi nga rgyal ldan par bya/ /oM tA re tud tA re tud re he he/ /slob dpon nyid kyi cha lugs kyang/ /de la bskon la bsrung bar bya/ /oM badzra
20a1(rgyud 'grel): rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM a bi shin tsaM/ /bu khyod 'khor lo'i dbang bskur gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/ /srid gsum ma lus sgrol mdzad dam/ /bde bar gshegs pa lung stan no/ /khams gsum bdag por rgyal srid che/ /dang la ldan yon tan
20a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i gnas/ /bdud kyi sde rnams bcom zin gyis/ /khyod ni grong khyer mchog tu zhugs/ /oM ta re tud tA re tu re sid d+ha sa ma ya stwaM swa b+ha ba A bi shin tsa maM/ mtshan ma med par 'gro ba'i don/ /gang dag bdag gis byed nus pas/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i
20a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur che/ /dpa' bo chen pos bdag la gsol/ /dkyil 'khor mchog nas khri'i/ /slob ma bzhag la dbang bskur bya/ /oM badzra A b+hi Shiny+tsa? maM/ /sgrar bcas glegs bam lag gtad de/ chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur bya/ /de yis
20a4(rgyud 'grel): de yi snying kha ru/ /'khor lo bcug la ye shes bstim/ /dbang gi par du rdzogs par bya/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni shes pa yi/ /mi bya ba ni gang yang med/ /dpa' bo chen po nga yi bka' / /'dod yon lnga la spyod par bya/ /oM su pra ti ti Sh+Tha swA hA/ /rjes su gnang ba'i
20a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur phyir/ /'di nas bcung nas bu khyod kyis/ /lus dang smog la mi 'phangs par/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ /'gro ba'i don ni dpag med byos/ /sems can gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ rten cing 'brel ba'i chos dang ldan/ /khams gsum de
20a6(rgyud 'grel): ltar shes nas ni/ /sems can don ni mtshangs med byos/ /de dag slob ma'i dbang bcu ste/ /phal cher bum pa la brtan pas/ /bum pa'i dbang zhes brjod pa yin/ /phyir mi ldog dang rjes su gnang/ /rdo rje slob dpon dbang yin no/ /nyon mongs dri ma 'khrub dang
20a7(rgyud 'grel): sa ni dang po thob par byed/ /de nas ... gsang bar dbang bskur phyir/ /tshogs dang dpa' po'i sbyor byas nas/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i shes rab ma/ /sta gon gnas byas bla ma'i mdun/ /dkyil 'khor mchod pas mnyes byas nas/ /slob dpon khyod ni
20b1(rgyud 'grel): dgongs su gsol/ /gsang spyod thabs dang ldan pa yi/ /shes rab chen po'i snod 'gyur phyir/ /dbang bskur chen po mdzad du gsol/ /gsang spyod thabs dang ldan pa yi/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med/ /bdud rtsi chen po myang bar gyis/ /dbang bskur 'di la khyod spro 'am/ /slob
20b2(rgyud 'grel): dngo na khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /lha mo 'di ni khyad par can/ /yon tan mdza' yas ldan pa ste/ /gsang spyod thabs kyi sbyar ba las/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur mdzad du gsol/ /gzhal yas nang du de bzhag nas/ /'od kyis 'phags rnams spyi bor drangs/ /bu gar zhugs
20b3(rgyud 'grel): nas pad+mar zhugs/ /slob dpon nying 'bang? de bzhin no/ /mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba bya/ /yab yum 'khril ba'i rang bzhin las/ /ye shes gsal ba byang chub sems/ /phab nas mtshan ldan blugs par bya/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor
20b4(rgyud 'grel): ma kun gyi/ /dam tshig 'di ni ngo mtshar che/ khams lnga yi ni ro yis gang/ bde ba chen po myang bar gyis/ /slob ma'i lce la de gzhag nas/ /a ho su ka skal chen po/ dngos grub daMs pa gsal bar gsol/ /'das pa'i rdo rje 'chang sogs kyis/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas
20b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur/ /byang chub sems ni yid 'ong pas/ /de bzhin bu khyod dbang skur ro/ /'di ni gsang ba'i dbang yin te/ /sa bcu'i ye shes thob par byed// //de nas shes rab ye shes dbang/ /shes rab ma yi lus brgyan nas/
20b6(rgyud 'grel): lha mo 'di ni khyad par che/ /bde tha ma thang? yas sbyar byod ma/ /blangs nas rnam pa thams cad du/ /bu yis ba med mchod par gyis/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /bu yis de ring za nus sam/ phyag rgya lnga las byung ba yi/ /rig ma dad pas mchod nus sam/ /
20b7(rgyud 'grel): bshad gci khu bdag ta sogs?/ 'di nyid dun tha nus sam/ nga la gsang ba'i pad+ma yis/ khang pa'i myu skyad par byed/ /khyod kyis rtag tu mchod sdu? ma sam/ /ji skad bshad pa'i dam tshig rnams/ /lha mo tse phyir bdag mi nus/ /lha mo'i pad+ma mchod par bgyi
21a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab g.yas dang g.yon/ /de yis dar gyi mdul bya/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rang khri las bskyod/ /g.yon pas g.yon pa'i mkhal ma nas/ /g.yas bas gsang ba'i pad+ma ru/ /snying po btsal la rdo rje gzhug/ shes rab bum pa'i
21a2(rgyud 'grel): mgul chengs kyis/ /slob ma bum pa'i mgul pa bcings/ /bde ba kha sbyor bsgom par bya/ /bde gsal mi rtog ye shes skyes/ /rim gyis nyams su de blangs nas/ /dal bar ldang bya byang chub sems/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rang bzhin phyir/ /lce yis bzhi ba cing sems la bsting
21a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med ye shes gsal bar 'gyur/ /shes rab ma yi rkang pa g.yon slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag nas ni/ /de dang rdo rje slob dpon dang/ /mched dang lcam gral thams cad dang/ /khams gsum sems can ma lus la/ /ma mos brnyas par ma byed cig /gzhan yang dam tshig bshad pa
21a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung par gyis/ /deng nas bzung nas bu khyod kyis/ /ji srid byang chub mthob par/ /sems can kun gyi don rnams ni/ /rtag tu rmi lam bzhin du byos/ /'di ni shes rab ye shes kyi/ /dbang yin mi shes kun sel cing/ /bde gshegs sku gsum
21a5(rgyud 'grel): thob? par byed/ /rdo rje 'chad gis yongs su gsungs// //bzhi pa de nyid tshig gi dbang/ /bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya/ /rjes la bya ba'i cho ga ni/ /mchod sogs byas nas dkyil 'khor bsdu/ /yi ge brgya bas bskang bar bya/ /tshogs dang dpa' bo'i
21a6(rgyud 'grel): ston mo yis/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs gnyes par bya/ /de nas gzhan du gsungs pa yi/ /dam tshig rnams la bslab par bya/ /'phags ma sgrol ma mya ngan thams cad sel bar byed ma zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste dgu pa
21a7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rlan dang mi ldan pad+ma bzhin/ /gang gi dbang gis rgyud pa yi/ /nyes pa bsal phyir pad+ma'am/ /bil ba'i 'bras bu de bzhin du/ /ka ra bi ra'i me tog la/ /me ya las ni rgyas par bya/
21b1(rgyud 'grel): yang na pa la sha yis so/ /gzhong bu gnyis sam bzhi yis ni/ /bum pa bzang po lta bu yi/ /snod chen nang du lnga mtshan lnga/ /rin chen gyis bris snying po bzhug /longs spyod phyir ni gter gzung ste/ /'bru dang rin chen phyugs longs spyod/ /zhing dang mdzod dang phyugs lhas su/ /go
21b2(rgyud 'grel): rim bzhin du shes par bya/ /des ni rnam thos bu bzhin 'gyur/ /oM tA re tu da tA re tu re dzha ma b+he mo he swAhA/ /'phags ma sgrol ma 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs shing phongs pa thams cad sel ba zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag longs spyod spel ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste
21b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu pa rdzogs so// //rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos grub kun gyi rtsa ba ni/ /mnyes las yin phyir de yi thabs/ /dus dang sa phyogs shis rnams su/ /sa yi cho ga legs byas par/ /bru gang phyed dang bzhi dpangs brtsi/ dri zhim
21b4(rgyud 'grel): dkar po byug byas te/ /kha khyer ud+pala phreng bas bskor/ /dbus su sa bon yi ge'o/ /g.yas dang g.yon du bsreg rdzas dang/ /mchod pa'i rdzas rnams rim gyis dgod/ /ba glang gi 'am 'o ma can/ /srog chags med pa'i bud shing ni/ /mar dang spra tshil sogs ba'i
21b5(rgyud 'grel): yam shing rnams ni sta gon bya/ /rin chen las byas khru gang ba/ /bzhi dang gnyis dang re re dang/ /gcig dang phyed dang rdo rjes mtshan/ /dgang bzar blugs bzang rdo rje dril/ /rnal 'byor mdun du gzhag bar bya/ /rdzas rnams byin gyis brlab byas la/ /thab brtsig
21b6(rgyud 'grel): bsrung phyir ku ?? gram?/ /rgyun? zhags? pa'am bra ma ze'i me/ /bsangs la rlung yab gyis sbar bya/ /'bar ba'i ched du gsum gsum mo/ /thab khung bdag med chus skyes ste/ /byin za zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar/ /dbyug pa skyabs sbyin phreng gun d+he/ /tshangs sku dang
21b7(rgyud 'grel): skyes gdan tsan? no/ /me'i mtshams nas rang bzhin dgug/ bsang gtor dang ni zhal bsal dang/ /mchod pa rnams kyis mchod nas bstim/ /bsang gtor byas nas pad+ma yi/ /'dug stangs nang du lag gnyis so/ /bdun dang bdun gsum la gsum bdun
22a1(rgyud 'grel): mar gyi dgang blugs byin par bya/ /oM a ga ne ye a d+hi b+hya/ a b+hi sa ma ya/ ma hA sh+rI ye hya b+hya ka b+hya ba ha nA ya swAhA/ /me yi mtshan ma legs brtags te/ /ngan na bgegs skrad bzlog par bya/ /oM A big nan ta krita hUM
22a2(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ /zhal dang phyag dang me 'od la/ /yam shing mang dang 'o ma zho/ /til la sogs pa rim pa bzhin/ /bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig dbul/ /oM a b+ha ba ga ag ne yem ma shan ting ku ru swAhA/ /de rjes dgang blugs byas nas ni/ /zhal bsil byin la bstod pa
22a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'dod pa'i don ni bslab par bya/ /'bar ba'i rnam par gyur ba'am/ /de yi snying khar sa bon las/ /'dod pa'i lha ni bskyed par bya/ /ye shes bkug la bsang gtor bya/ /zhal bsil ba dang mchod byas nas/ /gnyis su med par bstims pa yi/ /dag gi lam
22a4(rgyud 'grel): la hUM yig stong/ /me yi sa bon gyis mtshan pa/ /de la dgang blugs dbul bar bya/ /de nas rdzas rnams rim gyis dbul/ /na mo rang na tra yA ya/ /nam aryA ba lo ki te shwar ya/ bod+hi sata twa ya/ ma hA ka ru nikA ya/ tad ya thA/ oM tA re tu da ta re tu re ma ma shan ting ku ru swAhA/ /
22a5(rgyud 'grel): dgang blugs phul la bstod pa dang/ /bzod par gsol la 'dod pa bslang/ /ye shes gshegs la dam tshig sdu/ /thabs kyi sa la me lha bskyed/ /dgang blugs sngon du 'gro ba yis/ /bsreg rdzas lhag ma dbul bar bya/ /dgang blugs byin nas stod pa byas/ /bzod
22a6(rgyud 'grel): par gsol zhing 'dod pa bslang/ /ye shes me lha gshegs byas la/ /dam tshig thab tu mi dmigs so/ /yi ge brgya bas bskang byas nas/ /thab khung bsdus te dben par 'dod/ /'di ni zhi ba'i cho ga ste/ /rgyas dang dgug dang mngon spyod kyang/ /shugs kyis gnas par shes
22a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ 'dis ni mnyes par byed pa ste/ /sdig dang log 'dren zhi ba dang/ /dngos grub ma lus kun 'byung ba'i/ /'phrin las thams cad mdzad par 'gyur/ 'phags ma sgrol ma bkra shis thams cad sbyin ma zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i le'u
22b1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ bcu gcig brdzogs so// //rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'bar ba'i me la sbang ma ltar/ /gang gi stobs kyis gang ldog pa gser mdog nor bu in+d+ra dang/ /sbur long 'phags pa rnams kyi gdung/ /sa dang 'khris pa chu mu zi/ /'bras bu gsum
22b2(rgyud 'grel): dang g+hi ha ra/ /sbrang rtsi mar dang bdud rtsi lnga/ /dri lnga gu gu la sogs sbyar spos/ /shin tu yun ring skyur dang mngar/ /mkhas pas re lu legs byas la/ /rnal 'byor lha yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /sbos des rab tu 'dugs byas na/ /rang bzhin gyis sam spang pa yi/ /gang dag dbang du byas rnams kyang
22b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'jig cing ltung 'gyur te/ /bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad bcu po/ /glang pa rnams ni rab 'gas shing/ /lus kyang dum bu dum bu ste/ /mig ldong yan lag nyams pa dang/ /rlung gis nags bzhin g.yo bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa la sogs srog chags dang/ /rims nad la sogs
22b4(rgyud 'grel): gnod gzhan yang/ /gang d+ha dri 'di yong gyur der/ /nam yang gnas pa ma yin no/ /'di ni zhi bsrung skod pa ste/ gal te gsad par 'dod gyur na/ /drag po'i rdzas las byas pa ni/ /gzugs brnyan lan 'dug pa dang/ /rtsub mo'i shing las byung ba'i mes/ /shes pa brten dang phral nas ni
22b5(rgyud 'grel): ling+ga gtugs nas bsreg bya ste/ /gang yin ming smos de 'og tu/ /de la byed ces bya ba yi/ /yi ge bris nas rab tu brtsam/ /bsten pa gsang sngags brgyad stong ste/ /las la brgya dang brgyad du gsungs/ /oM ta re tu da ta re tu re badzra d+harmA d+harmA d+ha hUM/ /sbo ta ya ba smi ku ru hUM phaT// //
22b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrol ma yongs su smin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag 'byung po bzlog pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// //rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor byang chub sgrub pa la/ /'khor los bsrung ba'i thabs gsungs
22b7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ shin du dkar zhing 'jam pa yi/ /dar la dri zhim byug par bya/ /dbus su pad+ma'i ze 'bru la/ /oM dang swAhAs mdza' brten pa/ /'dab brgyad la ni lhag ma'o/ /de yi mdza' yig rten 'brel can/ /de nas sna tshogs rdo rje ni/ /rigs lnga'i snying pos brgyan pa'o/ /A li kA li rim pa
23a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /mu khyud gnyis la dgod par bya/ /mthar byed sngags dang ral gri yi/ /rab phyi rol gnyis la dgod/ /de nas 'bar ba'i ra bste/ rab tu shis pa'i snag tshas byas/ /de nas ye shes 'khor lo dgug /mtshad cing cho ga'i yan lag rnams/ /rdzogs
23a2(rgyud 'grel): par byas la snyen pa bskyal/ /me dmigs 'khor lo'i rang bzhin te/ /bar chad bsrung phyir dgong par bya/ /gangs la bsrung ba 'dis brgyan pa/ /rdo rje rin chen lta bu ste/ /de la bar chad gang gis kyang/ /nam yang tshugs pa ma yin no// //'phags ma sgrol ma 'gugs beng?
23a3(rgyud 'grel): khro mo zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag bsrung ba'i 'khor lo zhes pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gsum brdzogs so// //rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bgegs dang yams nad zhi ba dang/ /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel ba'i phyir/ /chu 'gram shing drung bzhi
23a4(rgyud 'grel): mdo'am/ /khang stong la sogs dben bar bsdad/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya/ /sna tshogs pad+ma lnga yi dbus/ /nyes pas ma gos bum pa bzang/ /cho ga ldan pas bcud brgyan bcas/ /phyi rol rdo rje'i ra bas mdzes/ /phyogs skyong 'jig rten dbang byed dang/ /bkra shis
23a5(rgyud 'grel): rtags kyis mdzes par bya/ /sgo ni lho'am nub tu gdong/ /mnga' dang me long ral gri dang/ /rma bya tshon skud dag kyang ste/ /gdugs dang bla re ba dan dang/ /me tog phreng ba sogs dgram bya/ /mchod dang gtor ma rgya cher bsham/ /rje btsun ma yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /de las rin chen khang
23a6(rgyud 'grel): brtsegs te/ /nang du bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i stod/ /sa bon las ni bcom ldan ma/ /chog gsum gyis bskyed par bya/ /de la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug/ mchod dang bstod pa byas nas ni/ /'dod pa'i don yang gsol ba bdab/ /de nas lan drangs brgya stong snyed/ /bsnyen pa
23a7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs byas g.yas skor bya bde nyid de la thim gyur te/ /de yi yid du mi 'ong ba/ /ba spu khong sogs las 'thon par/ /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis khrus byas te/ /rma byas bya bcing bkra shis gdon/ /nad pa la ni log su ste/ /gos bcas bkrus nas dor bar bya/ /lhag bab
23b1(rgyud 'grel): ni lhar bskyed de/ /mchod dang bstod dang 'dod pa'i don/ /gsol ba btab la bzod par gsol/ /de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya/ /'jig rten skyong sogs de bzhin no/ /de nas dkyil 'khor legs par bsdu/ /dben par dor la bskor bar bya/ /'dis ni bkra shis thams cad sbyin/ /yid du mi
23b2(rgyud 'grel): 'ong sel bar byed/ /gang yang mi 'byung med pa'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu bya/ /na mo rang na tra yA ya/ /nam aryA ba lo ki ti shwa ra ya/ bo ti swAtwa ya/ /mA hA satwA ya/ mahA ka ru Ni ka ya/ oM tA re tu ra tA re tu re/ sarba gra he/ sarba b+hya d+hi/ sarba tso ra/ sarba bi dya/ /sarba dur sa ma ni b+hya
23b3(rgyud 'grel): tha/ sarba pA pI bra sham na ya swAhA// //'phags ma sgrol ma zhi ba chen mo zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag khrus kyi cho ga'i le'u ste/ bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so// //rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba'i rtsa ba rmongs pas te/ /de?
23b4(rgyud 'grel): bsal bya phyir shes rab bskyed/ /thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin sku/ /gcig tu phan mdzad dngos grub ster/ /ngag gi dbyang phyug zhi pwa? ma/ /bdag bsam g.yas g.yon mdun rgyab tu/ /yid gzhungs dran pa shes rab dang/ /blo yi rang bzhin lha mo bzhi/ /snga ma lta bur bsgom par bya/ /
23b5(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i 'khor lo zla ba'i 'dus so/ /rnam? snang las byung ngag rab bzhin rgyun mi 'chad 'byung de dbus gnas/ /mi smra'i sbyor bas gsang sngags bzla/ /'o ma gser mdog tsa ba gsum/ /pad shu dag rgyam tshwa la/ /lan bdun bzlas pas bcom ldan 'grub/ /'o ma bra bzhi sang gcig sman/ /mang bre gang
