23b6(rgyud 'grel): spyad me la bsdu/ /zla ba gcig gis phan med cing/ /drug gis mngon sum mthong bar 'gyur/ /shu dag shing mdang? sen d+ha ba/ /gser mdog dong gra la la bud/ /zir du d+ha pi pi ling/ /lan bdun bzlas nas zos gyur na/ /zla ba drug dang gsum dang gcig /go rim bzhin du thos 'dzin
23b7(rgyud 'grel): dang ?/ sa bdag nyid dang blo lnga ?? zhing/ /tshams pa'i ?? ?? pa dang dbyur/? /gangs las skyas pa'i gser mdog dang/ /shu dag thongs lan bdun bzlas/ /zla ba gcig brten de nyid du/ /tshig bdag yid gzhungs dbyangs lhan cig/ /shes rab ldan de zla drug gis/ /ngag gis
24a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug rang bzhin thob/ /oM tA re tu da tA re tu re/ h+ri ma hA ma yaM ge ma hA swa ra swa da tyai nA ma bra kri ta ba ri shud+d+ha sarba d+harma pri kri ti pa ri shud d+ho haM/ sa pa sbya a pa yan ta ra swAhA// /'phags ma sgrol ma chogs pa thams cad 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i las
24a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi yan lag blo 'phel bar byed ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste/ bco lnga pa rdzogs so// //rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir/ /dben pa'i phyogs su chag chag dang/ /maN+Dal gnyis dang mchod sogs gnyis/ /bsham bya rje btsun rten
24a3(rgyud 'grel): yang bsham/ /stan bde la gnas sems can la/ /snying rje che bskyed 'di rnams ni/ /rje btsun gnas dgod dam bcas nas/ /de yis gtor ma btang bar bya/ /de nas snying kha'i 'ong zer gyis/ /thun mo khyad par spyan drangs te/ /mchod pa cha res mchod par bya/ /de nas bdag gi spyi bor a/ /de
24a4(rgyud 'grel): las zla ba de stengs taM/ /gsum po yongs su gyur pa las/ /rje btsun zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /mi 'jigs u dpal g.yas dang g.yon/ /sna tshogs rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/ /mgul changs gdub bu do shal can/ /sku? gsung thugs mtshan ye shes sems/ /skye mched rnams
24a5(rgyud 'grel): dag dbu rgyan mdzes/ /phyag gi bdud rtsi bdag rgyas par/ /bsam zhing gsang sngags gdon par bya/ /phyi yi phyag rgya rdzas kyis bsdu/ /nang gi nang du bsdu? bya'i tshe/ /bsgrub bya bsdus shing bcing bar bsam/ /de nas gter ma gcig shos btang/ /'gro ba yi phyogs bcom ldan
24a6(rgyud 'grel): ma/ zhal bzangs bdag la gzigs par bsam/ /de nas bstod dang bzlas pa bya/ /des ni 'jigs pa kun skyor 'gyur/ /a'oM na ma ya ryA ba lo ki ta shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi swAhA ya/ ma hA swa twa ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ /tad ya thA/ a'oM ha re tu da tA re tu re sarba duSh+TA na/ pra du Sh+TAn ma ma
24a7(rgyud 'grel): kri te/ bDhaM b+ha/ /staM b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+Tan staM b+ha ni twA re swAhA// //'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba thams cad sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag chom rkun bcing ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so// //
24b1(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bag med la sogs rnams la/ /gdug pa'i yid ldan dud 'gro'i rigs/ /yid dang bltas dang mche ba dang/ /rig pa'i sgo nas 'tshe bar byed/ /grog po ri phug dog mo'i sgor/ /lha khang 'dam rdzab mi sdug gzugs/ /ra bzar 'dzeg dang dud 'gros 'tshe/ /
24b2(rgyud 'grel): mtsho 'gram 'dug sogs gnod pa'i rtegs/ /glu la dga' dang nub mon/ /yan lag mi bde lus lci zhing/ /shu ba g.yan pa bas ldags dang/ /'brum bu la sogs thebs laMs? 'byung/ /mi dga' ba dang za 'phrug dang/ /sha mdog nyams dang me ras dang/ /res 'ga' chu grang blugs bzhin
24b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bas lngags sha bkra 'byung ba yin/ /sha 'phrig sprid dang bems por 'dug /mig ni tsha zhing zlum pa dang/ /smin ma la sogs kyi 'gyur te/ /lag sor skams par gyur pa'o/ /lus la dri nga 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /chu bur dang ni nya lgangs can/ /rnag dang chu ser rul dri man ma/ /ro stong
24b4(rgyud 'grel): ngag kyang zug par 'gyur/ /phyi yi sha skam mdog 'chor zhing/ /sha yi mdangs med zug dang bcas/ /gos kyang mdangs dang bral 'gyur te/ /glog pa char lag ma bzhin no/ /de dag bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/ /lha yi sbyor bar gnas pa yis/ /gu gul gla rtsi shu dag dang/ /ru rta
24b5(rgyud 'grel): btsan dug shing kun dang/ /da lis rnams la gsang sngags che/ /'bum phrag gsum bsnyen byas pa yi/ /de bsrung gla rtsi mi bskyod sbyar/ /gnas lngar byug cing bkru bar bya/ /'di ni sbyor ba zab mo ste/ /mi la ri dags ji bzhin du/ /gang la bsrung ba 'dis brgyan ba/ /de la
24b6(rgyud 'grel): sngang ldan 'bros par 'gyur/ /gnyis pa la ni shu dag dang/ /gla rtsi ru rta gu gul dang/ /mu zi ro ras rgya chil? dang/ /shi ba'i dri chen phag ba'i bcud/ /sgog skya dang ni ma du dang/ /mi yi bcud dang rus pa'i phye/ /mi bcud kyis bsdus ri lu ste/ /snga ma gnyis 'gyur bsnyen pa
24b7(rgyud 'grel): yis/ dbang po'i sgo rnams bdug bya ste/ /nyi ma'i 'od la mun pa bzhin/ /dug can rnams ni nam duAng/ /'od bar nus pa ma yin no/ /gsum pa la ni gsum 'gyur te/ /god ma'i rdzas kyis sbyor ba dang/ /klu yi dug dad bdung rtsi bsten/ /'bar ba'i me yis nags tshal bzhin/ /
25a1(rgyud 'grel): des bzhan nad rnams tshig pa 'gyur/ /bzhi pa la ni bye ba ste/ /go ma'i rdzas kyis sbyor ba dang/ /klu'i dug dang rnam rgyal brten/ /rtsa mig dag kyang bsal bar bya/ /nyi mas gangs bzhin de 'joms so/ /lnga pa la yang de bzhin te/ /khyad par du ni a ru ra/ /dri chu gla rtsi
25a2(rgyud 'grel): brtan par bya/ /rdo rje yis ni rin chen bzhin/ /thogs pa med par 'jigs par 'gyur/ /a'oM tA re tu da tA re tu re ku le ku l+le/ sarba shadrud? bak+Shal bak+Shal hUM hUM na ga stam b+ha ya/ /mo ha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ yaM raM suM ne ra ba ne hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA// //rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol rnam
25a3(rgyud 'grel): par rgyal ma shes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag klu nad gso ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// //rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi yi dbang po la sogs pas/ /shin tu dam par bsdams pa rnams/ /rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir/ /ba
25a4(rgyud 'grel): glang lci bas dkyil 'khor bya/ /dbus su phyag mtshan sa bon bcas/ /de la de nyid spyan drangs la/ /mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba yis/ /dang po snyen pa rdzogs par bya/ /de nas sbyor gzhan rab spangs te/ /bcom ldan mchod nas brgya phrag brgyad/ /gsol ba'i mchod pa dang bcas pas/ /legs
25a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bzlas na grol bar 'gyur/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ /na ma aryA ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ /bo d+hI swa tA ya/ ma hA swa tA ya/ /ma ha ka ru Ni ka ya/ tad yA thA ri dzu ka d+harmI/ nir ya te/ tA re tA ra yA b+ha ga bA ti tud ta re/ b+h+ra ma b+ha la/ mo tsa ne tu re swAhA// //'phags ma sgrol ma
25a6(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal thams cad bsreg pa'i las kyi yan lag khri mon las thar par byed pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcwo brgyad pa rdzogs so// //rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis gang la rab bsngags pa/ /dngos grub de nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /
25a7(rgyud 'grel): mig dang lce dang mkhris pa rnams/ /rin chen gdu'i? nang du gzhug /bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsrung byas nas/ /'grub par byed pa'i bsnyen pa brtsam/ /chog par shes nas pad rtsar sA?/ /dag pa'i mig las dben par 'gyur/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na ma aryA ba lo ki
25b1(rgyud 'grel): te sha rA ya/ bo d+hi swa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad ya thA/ oM tA re tA re tA ra dza ya/ dza ye dza ye/ tud tA re dza ya b+ha he tu re swAhA// //'phags ma sgrol ma dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed ma zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag mi snang ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa
25b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mthong ba'i chos la 'og min du/ /'phags rnams spyod yul dang gcig cing/ /yid kyi shugs kyis bskyod byed pa/ /zangs dang lcags dang gser dag las/ /'bar ba'i ral gri byas nas su/ /yu ba gzhung dang so rim bzhin
25b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang bcu gcig sor du ldan/ /a li ka li g.yas g.yon te/ /yi ge bcu pa dbus su'o/ /gnas skabs gsum du sku sogs gsum/ /sgra dang me stag 'od 'phro ba/ /rab 'bring rtag dang ldan pa las/ /chags med yid kyis bskyod byas te/ /'dab gshog rgyas pa'i bya bzhin
25b4(rgyud 'grel): du/ gang dang gang du bsams pa yi/ /zhing khams dag tu 'dod ba'i don/ /thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /a'oM tA re tu da tA re tu re a mo g+ha sid d+hi/ khad g+he bri sid d+hi/ lo ka a lo ka/ tiSh+Ta rad na tsa la tsa la/ hUM hUM baM baM a ti s+thA swAhA// //'phags ma sgrol ma
25b5(rgyud 'grel): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i las kyi yan lag mchog sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa rdzogs so// //rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gser sogs rab mdzes snod dag tu/ /'o ma mar dang sran chan dang/ /la phug mngar dang me tog spos/ /
25b6(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i chu dang chad la sogs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge yis/ /spangs nas 'byung po rnams la sbyin/ /a'oM a ka ro mu khaM sarba d+harma naM/ A dya nud pan nad twad/ /a'oM A hUM phaT swAhA// //gtor ma'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// //
25b7(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtsho 'am khron pa 'bab chu gtsang/ /bcom ldan mchog sbyin bdud rtsi yis/ a/bdung bral 'phags pa'i rang bzhin du/ /bsgyur nas gsang sngags rgyal po ni/ /bdun phrag gsum gyis yi dags rnams/ /rab tu tshim pa'i cho ga bya/ /oM tA
26a1(rgyud 'grel): re tud tA re tu re sarba pre te b+hya(rgyud 'grel): swAhA// //chu sbyin pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs// //rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri zhim dkar ba'i sa rnams la/ /rigs lngar sbyangs nas de'i rang
26a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /de la mchod rten gdab byas la/ /de dag gnas su dam tshig ste/ /de la ye shes de dbang bskur/ /de la byin brlab de nas mchod/ /rab tu gnas byas de nas ni/ /dag pa'i gnas su bzhugs par bya/ /a'oM tA re tud tA re tu re sarba tA thA ga ta hI da ya a d+hi Sh+Thi te swAhA// //
26a3(rgyud 'grel): tsha tsha gdab pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so// //rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gso sbyongs dag la gnas pa yis/ /ka ti ka yi thal ba la/ /stong phrag bcu yi bsnyen pa bya/ /chu shes spyod yul yang ngo la/ /dri dbang
26a4(rgyud 'grel): byed g.yas seng+ge'i tshul/ /rtse gcig 'dod pa'i don brnags te/ 'dod pa'i lha dang dus gsum gyi/ /skye ba'i gnas rnams ston par mdzad/ /oM tA re tud tA re tu re ta dya thA/ oM mug shi ri pra ma dan de kha rgo ya sha/ sho ma d+ha ra rtsa ra phye/ mo ha ni swAhA/ /nga na ti la swAhA// //
26a5(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum brtag pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so// //rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbrum ma dang ni mgo 'jug log /mo skam bu ni skyed byed dang/ /srin bu bsrung dang 'byung po bzlod/ /las gang bya nga pa'i lhag gyur bya/ /dang po go ro tsa
26a6(rgyud 'grel): na dang/ zung? ba ba bla'i ril lu la/ /snag tsha byas la sngags bris la/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang sman sna lnga/ /rin chen lnga dang 'bru sna lnga/ /bum par bcug la gsang sngags 'di/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas byin brlab/ /sngags chus nam byed yol ba'i dus/ /mchod pa byas la sbrum ma de/ /khrus
26a7(rgyud 'grel): byas bde bar btsa' zhing 'byung/ /gnyis pa mang dag lag 'thil du/ /gzhan la gsang sngags nyi shu gcig /bzlas la mgo lus ba ga byug/ de ltar byas na bde bar skye/ /gsum po de tse yi 'brum/ /phye ma dag dang ba dmar ser/ /'o ma bsres la bum par blugs/ /gsang sngaT
26b1(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ /zla mtshan byung dus tha ma'i che/ /blud na myur du bu dag skye/ /bzhi pa 'phral skyes byis pa de/ /khrus byas bde bar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /lnga pa gsang sngags de nyid kyis/ /yungs dkar nyi shu gcig bsngags nas/ /gdong bu brabs na 'byung po ldog/ /a'oM tA ra ni ta
26b2(rgyud 'grel): ra ya/ /oM mo tsa ni mo ca ni ya/ /a'oM ma ka sha ni mo ka sha ya/ dzi ba bar d+hi swAhA// //bskyod cing bsrid pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa rdzogs so// //bde gshegs skyed mdzad rje btsun gyi/ /rnal 'byor byang chub yan lag bzang/ /
26b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi khyad par mdor bsdus pa/ /zhi ba la sogs las bzhi'i tshul/ /bdag gzhan don kun sgrub byed pa/ /thugs rje chu skyes las byung ba'i/ /sbrang rtsi 'di ni bdag gis bzhis/ /'gro la phan phyir 'dir bkod do/ /de las byung ba'i dge ba yis/ /'gro ba ma lus byang chub che/ /sku
26b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum rang bzhin mthar phyin pa/ /myur ba nyid du thob par shog/ //rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i las kyi yan lag dang bcas pa mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ kha che'i slob dpon nyi ma sbas pa zhes bya bas mdzad
26b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu sh+rI dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba mal gyo blo gros grags pas bkri ma shI la'i gtsug lag khang chen po de nyid du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga ba ti ta ra de bI e ka
26b6(rgyud 'grel): baM sha ti stod rnga no byi ki/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs/ /'phags ma sgrol ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum rgyal ba skyed mdzad yum/ /shes rab pha rol phyin bdag nyid/ /sna tshogs sprul pas kun skyob ma/ /
26b7(rgyud 'grel): lha mo cho ga de'i zhabs btud bshad// //de nyid skyabs song sems bzang pos/ /sras bcas rgyal bas yongs bskor ba'i/ /'phags ma nyid mdun mkhar bzhugs mchod/ /sdig bsal bsod nams yongs rdzogs byas/ /rnam dag sngags kyis dri
27a1(rgyud 'grel): bsal la/ /sku gsung thugs dngos bskyed dang rdzogs/ /cho ga thi bzhin ji snyed par/ /ma 'khrugs 'khrul pa med par bsgom/ /'phags ma sgrol ma che nyid sku// /'dod sbyin sna tshogs gzugs sna tshogs/ /tya nor bu'i tshul bzhin du/ /gdul
27a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbang can yongs gyur lta/ /ye shes gzhug cing byin brlabs la/ /dbang bskur mchod cing rgyas gdab bya/ /'od zer 'byor pas 'gro skyes dang/ /dngos grub blangs te bzlas par bya// //phyag 'tshal sgrol ma myur ma dpa' mo/ /spyan ni skad cig glog dang 'dra
27a3(rgyud 'grel): ma/ 'jig rten gsum mgon chu skyes zhal gyi/ /ge sar phye ba las ni byung ma/ /spyan ras gzigs mgon thugs rje ma chu skyes zhal gyi ge sar las/ /chu 'dzin las skyes glog 'gyu bzhin/ /byung bas rab dga' i sgrol ma bsgom/ /mkha' dkyil gser mdog chu skyes gdan/ /
27a4(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag brgyad chos sgrogs dang/ /mda' gzhu 'khor lo ral gri dung/ /rdo rje zhags bcas me tog brgyan/ /de'i 'phrin las gzhan gyi mthu/ /phyir bzlog bstan phyir lha mo bsnyen/ /bsgrub bya'i rdzas la dkyil 'khor bya/ /de dbus hoM khung drag gzugs dgod/ /snying
27a5(rgyud 'grel): khar rtsibs brgyad spel tshig sngags/ /man ngag bzhi bkod the gus drang/ /spu gu snying gtad lta sbyor gyis/ /sbod byed rten phral yang yang gzhug /lha mo 'khros pas mchod rten ni/ /nag po khri 'phang bzhi ldan brtsig /rgod gsung sna dang mgrul dang thos/ /snom pa'i sdud
27a6(rgyud 'grel): byed shes par bya/ /rgyun mi 'chad pa'i lha sbyor gyis/ /dgug gzhug bstims nas mnan bya ste/ /mtshan ma rnyed nas sngar gzugs bsreg /rab gnas slar yang ngo rtse tis mnan/ /nus ldan stong gis gcig pa rnags kyang/ /mtshon cha'i sbyor ba slar nyes bzhin/ /bdag nyid
27a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis phung par byed/ /mchod bstod snying rjes mi btang ces/ /oM tA be tud tA re tu re ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swAhA/ a'oM tA re tu re tA re che ge mo g+h+ri h+na g+h+ri h+na/ /ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ bi d+ha na sa ya/ bi d+ha na sa ya/ a ma kaM ma ra ya phaT ma ra ya tu re hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ /
27b1(rgyud 'grel): oM tA re tud tA re mahA pany+tsa yak+Sha sta ma b+ha ya h+ri boM h+ril ma ra ya phaT/ kur kul+la b+hyo:// //rje btsun ma sgrol ma myur ma dpa' mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal ston ka'i zla ba kun du/ /gang ba brgya ni brtsegs pa'i zhal ma/ /
27b2(rgyud 'grel): skar ma stong phrag tshogs pa rnams kyi/ /rab tu phye ba'i 'od rab 'bar ma/ /ston zla ba rgya'i zhal mdangs mjal/ /stong phrag skar mas rab phye ba'i/ /bkrag 'dzin gzi mdangs yid 'ong ma/ /mi shes mun sel bsgom par bya/ /ji bzhin cho gas rab sprul yum/ /zhal gsum dkar sngo gser
27b3(rgyud 'grel): mdog can/ /bcu gnyis phyag mnga' mnyam gzhag dang/ /kha TwaM 'khor lo rin chen nyid/ /rdo rje me tog phreng 'dzin g.yas/ til? ba ud+pal dril bu dang/ /bum pa dang ni po te g.yon/ /sna tshogs lha mo rgyan gyis spras/ /sku spros gsung bzlas phyag mtshan thugs/ /rang rang rjes 'thun
27b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phrin las sgrub gzun? mo chun mang ma yin pas/ /mnyam gzhag rjes 'gro rtse gcig bya/ /'phrin las yams? nad zhi bya'i phyir/ /dkar phyogs maN+Dal dgod/ /dbus su yum bcas 'od dpag med/ /phyogs mtshams rigs bzhi yum bzhi dgod/ /khor yug phyogs skyong bcas dkyil 'khor
27b5(rgyud 'grel): ma lus rgyan gyis mdzes par bya/ /mchod dang gtor ma sngon song bas/ /gso sbyong ldan pas gsang sngags bzlas/ /khri phrag mchod gtor ldan pas 'bum/ /bzlas te lha yi sbyor ldan pas/ nad sogs zhi bya gtsang spras so/ /yams bdag mang po tshim par bya/ /oM tA re tud tA re tu nge sarba
27b6(rgyud 'grel): b+hya d+hya bra sha ma ni shan ti ku ru swAhA// //rje btsun ma sgrol ma ston zla lta bu zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs// //rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal ser sngo chu nas skyes kyi/ /pad+ma'i phyag ni rnam par brgyan ma/ /sbyin pa brtson 'grus dka' thub zhi ba/ /bzod
27b7(rgyud 'grel): pa bsam gtan spyod yul nyi ma/ /shes rab bdag nyid phar phyin lnga/ /yongs rdzogs 'phags ma cho ga bzhin/ /rim gnyis bsgom zhing bzlas byas te/ /brgya cher mchod bstod bsngags par bya/ pad nyi bskyil krung gser mdog zhal/ /gcig mnga' phreng ba ral gri mdal/
28a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dbyig gu dar spyangs zhags/ /pad+ma dril bu gzhu 'dzin bcu'o/ /rjes mthun cho ga sngon song bas/ /tshe srings 'phrin las dogs med bsgrub/ /gzhan srog tshe yang bsrungs nas ni/ /tshe dpag med bkug mchod bstod gsol/ /oM tA re tud tA re a yu dz+nyA
28a2(rgyud 'grel): na/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ b+hi d+ha ra b+hi d+ha ra/ ma mA pra hma d+ha ra de d+hi swAhA/ /rang lo'i grangs kyis brgya rtsa brgyad/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos cho yi dpal/ /grangs te nyi shu rtsa gcig bstod/ /zhag re zla ri las tshe 'phel/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //
28a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor/ /mdza' yas rnam par rgyal pa spyod ma/ /ma lus pha rol phyin pa thob pa'i/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis shin tu bsten ma/ /gtsug tor yid bzhin nor bus mtshan/ /bdud dgra 'tshe ba kun las rgyal/ /pha rol phyin kun yangs rdzogs pas/ /bdag
28a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid che rnams kyis mchod bsgom/ /gser mdog chu skyes ri mo can/ /zag med chags med rnam gnon zhing/ /gser ri ltar brjid phyag bzhi mdzes/ /mchog sbyin phreng ba ril ba dbyig de las srog g.yo rnam 'jil ba/ /khar rga ne tra a k+Sho phya/ /gar sba su kha gcig po skyes/ /ma g+hi bai
28a5(rgyud 'grel): de tsa na sbyar/ /lha mor yid brtan mang bzlas nas/ /gnas lngar gdab cing khong du sbyin/ /rtsa gcig lha la mtsho sgras khyab/ /rang bzhin bcos sogs sel? don med/ /a'oM tA re tud tA re tu re na ma(rgyud 'grel): sha re sha re bi sha re sarba b+hi dma g+ha Ta swAhA/ /rje btsun skrol ma gtsug tor rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i
28a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal tud tA ra hUM yi ges/ /'dod dang phyogs dang nam mkha' gang ma/ /'jig rten gsum po zhabs kyis mnan te/ /lus pa med par 'gugs par nus ma/ /mthu chen sngags kyi hUM sgra yis/ /khams gsum rgyas 'gengs
28a7(rgyud 'grel): srid gsum gnon/ /kun bdag bkug nas dbang sdud ma/ /dbang bsgyur che nyid rnam par bsgom/ /zla steng rdo rje'i zhabs gnon zhing/ /skyabs sbyin gser gyi pad lcug 'dzin/ /ting 'dzin mchog bzhugs 'gro skyobs mas/ /ma chags gdul bya kun skyod mdzad/ /
28b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phrin las bsgrub phyir lhar bsnyen pa/ /ras la rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo bri/ /bsgrub bya'i gzugs srog ming dang ldan/ /wa shi ku ru khrag gis bri/ /a'oM gsum rim pa'i rgyal mo'i dbus/ /skye mched gsal rdzogs spra tshil gzugs/ /lha mos bsdus te snying khar gzhug /dus gsum dus drug
28b2(rgyud 'grel): seng ldeng bsreg /sgo gnyis zangs ma'i thur mas bri/ /sa bon 'od dmar shugs drag gi /lcags kyus bkug ste zhags pas bcings/ /sgra g.yengs gceng bu rkang 'dud bsam/ /dur khrod rdzas gsum rdo rje'i chus/ /sbyar te sbyags bcas sbyin par bya/ /de rdzas ke tshe ming dang
28b3(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ /dbang sdud yid kyis sbyin sreg bya/ /bdun phrag zhag ni gcig dang gnyis/ /de bzhin bdun gyis mi mo dang/ /mi pho lha mo sogs dbang bskur/ /a'oM tA re tud tA re tu re laM b+ha laM b+ha so sA ti k+Shi si u kro si phaM sha ka ra ya a mu ka sya d+ha ma g+ha Ta ni ra ha tra tsa ma na kha b+hya(rgyud 'grel): si da ha da ha/
28b4(rgyud 'grel): s+thi ni a s+thi d+hya ma/ ma rdza ga/ d+ha hA laM ba na/ bi ru ti ba la Na pa tsa ti/ rad ni taM ba la ne/ da d+hya me ne hi/ ku to ni/ ku ku tro ri tri/ ya ti pa sa ne hi/ ba lan ba d+ha phu ra sa kri taM/ a'oM tsi tri tsi tri/ bi lo li ba lo li swAhA/ a mu kaM sa d+ha nAM pa ri ba tAM mme nga sa ma ya swAhA/ a'oM ku ru ku l+le
28b5(rgyud 'grel): h+ri(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /'bum phrag rnal 'byor rtsa gcig gis/ /me tog bdug ba bza' btung dag /byin na brgya byin yang dbang byed/ /me tog dmang po'i sbyin sreg gces/ /yungs gar skyes bu mchog la bsngags/ /'khar ba'i snod du sbrang rtsi mar/ /sngags dang bcas gus dus gsum du/
28b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod dang bcas pas don rnams 'grub/ /kham phor ram ni dung por du/ /sbrang rtsi sogs la brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bzlas so mig byug dgra bo yang/ /bu sdug bzhin du sems par 'gyur/ /dur khrod gnas su snod chen ni/ /pad+ma dkar dang chan po'i snum/ /brgyad dang bcu bzhi
28b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub byas pa'i/ /mig sman gyis ni gzhan dga' byed/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma srid gsum 'gugs pa'i sgrub thabs/ rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal brgya byin me lha tshangs pa/ /rlung lha sna tshogs dbang phyug mchod ma/ /'byung po ro langs dri za rnams
29a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gnod sbyin tshogs gyis mdun nas bstod ma/ /'jig rten las 'das 'jig rten gyi/ /che rnams dbang phyug dpal ldan ma/ /'jigs chen sdig sbyong srid zhi'i/ /dngos grub ster mdzad mkhas pas bsgom/ /pad+ma nyi ma la gnas dmar/ /zhal gcig phyag
29a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi rdo rje gri/ /sdigs mdzub zhags rnams rjes mthun sgrub/ /lha tshogs kun la skyon sel ma/ /las sgrub 'gro la phan yid kyis/ /dben par dkyil 'khar bzang bya ste/ /bgegs bsal 'phrin las gtor ma sbyin/ /lha mo spyan drangs mchod bstod gsol/ /brgya rtsa brgya
29a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas bsgom par bcas/ /gnas gsum lus ngag yid sdig skyon/ /sdig gzugs bsam la bya ba bar bya/ /de rjes dkyil krung bsreg par bya/ /lus bkru 'dam skyes sdud dang skyes/ /mkha' la rgyu dang rtsod las rgyal/ /ngan skyugs rgal sogs ltas mthong nas/ /sdig
29a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan gzhan yang sbyang bar bya/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ /na ma arya ba lo ki shwa ra ya/ b+ho d+hi swa twa ya/ ma hA sa tA ya/ ma hA ka ru ni ka kA ya/ a'oM tA re tud tA re tu re ma ma sa tya pA pa/ sho d+ha ya/ sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ sarba b+ha ba sa mun d+ho ts+tsho sha ra ya swAhA/ /dngos sam gzugs sam
29a5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan la/ /mi dge kun bsdus stobs bzhing bcas/ /'phags pa'i sku gsung thugs bden pas/ /bdag dang 'gro kun sdig bsal bya/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma sdig pa las rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrub thabs/ rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal trad ces bya
29a6(rgyud 'grel): dang phaT? kyis/ /pha rol 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'joms ma/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang zhabs kyis mnan te/ /me 'bar 'khrugs ma shin tu 'bar ma/ /me lus rgos 'joms lha mo che/ /trad phaT sgra yis pha rol gnon/ /pad+ma gser dang nyi ma la/ /g.yas bskum g.yon
29a7(rgyud 'grel): brkyang sdam? stabs mdzes/ /tsham rngam gnag cing khros pa'i bzhin/ /na bza' ser mnabs lto 'gros brgyan/ /phyag bzhi 'khor lo ral gri dang/ /skye gnas steng zhags sdigs mdzub mdzad/ /rjes mthun las kyi chi bslus la/ /de las gong mar 'pho bar bya/ /phyi nang
29b1(rgyud 'grel): gsang bas 'gro ba la/ /srog sbyin tshogs bsag mchod rten bsgrubs lha mo 'dod sbyin yid kyi lhas/ /sgo gnyis 'jug ldog rlung sbyangs la/ /gnyug mar gnas pa'i yi ge gsum/ /gcig tu sdus te steng du 'bang/ /hig kas lam phye taM gyis drangs/ /'og min longs spyod rdzogs skur
29b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur/ dri med chos sku las ma g.yos/ /sna tshogs gnas su sprul sku 'phro/ /rje btsun sgrol ma gzhan 'joms 'pho ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum mtshon phyag rgya/ /sor mos thugs khar rnam par brgyan ma/ /ma lus
29b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi 'khor los brgyan pa'i/ /rang gi 'od kyi tshogs rnams la brug ma/ /sangs rgyas chos las legs skyes shing/ /dge 'dun kun skyong brtse chen ma/ /phyogs dang phyogs bral 'khor lo'i bdag /rang skyes 'od kyis kun skyes bsgom/ /pad+ma dmar dang zla steng du/ /
29b4(rgyud 'grel): ban d+hu lta ra dmar phyag bzhi ma/ /gnyis dang gnyis pas rab dga' yi/ /rang bzhin mya ngan med shing 'dzin/ /rjes mthun las kyi don grub cing/ /de las mchod tshogs sngon 'gro bA/ /bsnyen cing bsgrubs nas tshogs bsags te/ /de nyid gsum gyi byin gyis brlab/ /byin
29b5(rgyud 'grel): brlabs ma brlabs yon tan skyon/ /shes gsal mi gsal bsrung byas te/ /yongs rdzogs maN+Dal gsum pa'i tshad/ maN+Dal stegs pa zhugs dus bzang brtag /mchod bstod gsol gdab gtor ma sbyin/ /lha'i rnal 'byor rdzogs ldan pas/ /dkyil 'khor bris te bum
29b6(rgyud 'grel): par ni/ /dbang bskur phir ni lha rnams bsgrub/ /a'oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi shi ka sam ya sh+ri ye hUM/ bum pa las bzlas pa'o/ /b+huM aM dzI kha hUM bskyed la/ /smar yang phyag mtshan lha sbyor bas/ /rigs lnga bsgoms te dbang mchog bskur/ /khrus byas dris byug kun rdzogs spyar/ /a'oM
29b7(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha na hUM/ swA hA/ /sku phyi ba'i sngags so/ /a'oM A hUM dzA hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa dang/ /ye shes pa spyan drang pa'i sngags so/ /de nas man ngag ldan pa yis/ /mchod gnas sngags bzlas spyan phye la/ /slar yang rab tu rgyas pa'i las/ /
30a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod cing sbyin sreg bcas mnga' gsol/ /oM a tA re puShpe d+hu pe d+hi pa g+ha na d+he ni pe d+he badzra hUM mchod pa'i sngags so/ /a'oM tsak+Shu tsak+Shu sa man ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ya swAhA/ /thur mas sbyan dbye ba'i sngags so/ /a'oM su pra ti Sh+Tha badzra ya swAhA/ /me tog
30a2(rgyud 'grel): la bzlas pa dang/ gtor ma'i sngags so/ /a'oM hUM h+ri su khaM badzra b+ha ba sh+ri du d+hi Sh+Ta bu/ baM/ bzhugs nas maN+Dal dbul ba'i sngags so/ /zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg las kun byed/ /bstan skyong mchod pas srung bar byed/ /gsungs 'khor ldan byas gnod med byed/ /gtor ma rgyas
30a3(rgyud 'grel): byin rgyas par byed/ /mchog gi mnga' gsol rab gnas gyis/ /byin brlabs 'bar dang rgyun rings gnas/ /gang 'dod dpal ster mthu stobs 'phel/ /gang bsgrubs de 'drang sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /rje btsun sgrol ma mchog stsol ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thangs
30a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal tu re 'jigs pa chen mo/ /bdud kyi dpa' bo rnam par 'joms ma/ /chu skyes zhal ni khro gnyer ldan mdzab?/ /dgra bo thams cad rab tu gsod ma/ /'jigs chen las skyob 'jigs chen mo/ /dpa' bo las kyang ches dpa' mo/ /khros
30a5(rgyud 'grel): bas dgra gsong dgra chen dgra/ /dbang skur kun sbyin dbang bdag bsgom/ /pad+mar zla steng chu srin gdan/ /gser mdog skyil krung phyeng zhal gcig /a sho ka dang rin chen mchog /pad+mar bum pas dbang mchog ster/ /rjes mthun las byas nyon mongs kun
30a6(rgyud 'grel): sel dbang bsgrub bya/ /rigs gsum las skyes smon bas te/ /cho gas sbu gung snyid po drang/ /nyi zla nam mkha' sbrang rtsi bcung/ /lhan cig skyes zhes mi 'bral bsgom/ /zag dang bcas las zag pa med/ /zhi ba 'od gsal dmigs bral dag /mkhas pas lus dang
30a7(rgyud 'grel): lus med las/ /me tog rtsi 'am til mar ltar/ /thabs ldan thabs legs legs blangs brten/ /mthar ni yongs dag mkha' mnyam nyid/ /rje btsun sgrol ma bdud 'joms dbang ster ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// /phyag 'tshal
30b1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu dga' bas brjid pa'i/ /dbu rgyad 'od kyi phreng ba spel ma/ /bzhad ba rab bzhad du tA ra yis/ /bdud dang 'jig rten dbang du mdzad ma/ /ting 'dzin dam pas thugs bltam ste/ /dges shing dges pas rol pa'i stangs/ /dbu rgyan lnga yi lha 'od kyis/ /bzhad cing rab bzhad
30b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya/ /pad dmar zla steng byi ru'i mdog /zhal gcig phyag bzhi dang po gnyis/ /spyi por bcings dang ral gri 'phyar/ /a sho ka yi yal ga 'dzin/ /rjes mthun las rnams sgrub mdzad ma/ /mnyes byas du mas gsol ba btab/ /bgegs bsal gtor ma sden byin la/ /sa
30b3(rgyud 'grel): bslang stegs bu bzang po bya/ /ri rab steng nas gzhal yas khang/ /bum pa lnga ldan mchod bstod gsol/ /dam tshig bskyed la rdzogs par bsgrub/ /'bum phrag gsum du bzlas pa bya/ /mig gnyis nyi ma zla ba yis/ /phyogs kun bsregs nas lha mo yi/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa
30b4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la blta/ /badzra uts+tsha Ta hUM brjod la/ /'khyil pa'i sngags brjod gom par brgyad/ /rngam par byas te dra gur bya/ /'byung chen lha mo dbang bzhag nas/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni rgyas par bri/ phyogs bzhi nas gus tshig bzhi yis/ /gsol btab dam tshig ye shes kyi/ /dkyil
30b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bskyed dang gzhug sogs bya/ /bu dang bla ma'i dris lan brjod/ /maN+Dal sngon song so shing sbyin/ /sngags bcas nyal bas rmi brtags la/ /lha yid kun ldan rdul tshon dgod/ /mchod bstod bsgom zhing bzlas sogs bya/ /oM d+hA rong badzra sa ma ye swAhA/ /gsang bar gdams te
30b6(rgyud 'grel): mna' dor la/ /byin brlabs chu sbyin gdongs g.yogs nas/ /me tog dong te dkyil 'khor gzhug /rtags ldan brtan pa phyag rgya gdab/ /oM ta re tung tA re tu tsa ti maN+Dal badzra sa ya Sh+ToM ? dkyil 'khor brtan cing gsol btab la/ /sangs rgyas kun bzhugs lha mo yi/ /
30b7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor kun ldan ye shes lnga'o/ /dbang bskur slob ma mchog la sbyin/ /a'oM a:/ badzra a d+har sha dz+nyA na a b+hi shiny+tsa? maM/ /oM badzra sa ma d+hi dzmA na rad na a b+hi sh+ny+tsa maM/ /a'oM badzra pra ti be k+Sha dz+nyA ma a b+hi shany+tsa maM/ /a'oM ki ra? a nu(rgyud 'grel): Sh+Tha na dz+nyA na ha badzra a b+hi sha ny+tsa maM/ a'oM tsa kr
31a1(rgyud 'grel): a mo g+ha dz+nya na a b+hi shinyu maM/ de nas rdo rje sbyin te/ /oM badzra sa ma yaSh+Ta A b+hi shiny+tsa maM/ de nas rgyan dang bsrung ba byin la/ a'oM badzra rak+Sha(rgyud 'grel): rakA hUM a b+hi shiny+tsa maM/ lung brtan cing dbugs phyung la/ /a'oM tA re tud tA re tu re sid+d+ha sa ma ya Sh+ToM swa b+ha
31a2(rgyud 'grel): ba A b+hi shiny+tsa maM/ rdo rje slob dpon nyid du dbang bskur la/ a'oM tA re tud tA re tu re he he A b+hi shiny+tsa maM/ phyir mi ldog par dbang bskur la/ a'oM badzra be war ti A b+hi she ka b+hi shiny+tsa maM/ chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur la/ /oM d+ha rma rA dza pra ti swAhA/ rjes su snang ba'i
31a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur la/ a'oM badzra A nu dz+nyA A b+hi shiny+tsa hUM/ /'di dag slob ma'i dbang bcu ste/ /phal cher bum pa la gnas phyir/ /bum pa'i dbang du brjod pa yin/ /dang pos ni thob par byed/ /de bzhin gsang ba shes rab kyi/ /dbang bskur sa bcu ye shes dang/ /sku
31a4(rgyud 'grel): gsung thob byed bla ma'i zhal/ /bdud rtsi bzhi pas rdo rje 'dzin/ /rje btsun sgrol ma mya ngan sel byed kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i yan lag ces bye ba rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal sa bzhi skyong ba'i tshogs rnams/ /thams cad 'gugs par nus
31a5(rgyud 'grel): ma nyid ma/ /khro nyer g.yo pa'i yi ge hUM gis/ /phongs pa thams cad rab tu sgrol ma/ /dpal ldan sa skyong phyogs rnams dang/ /phyogs bral ma lus 'gugs byed ma/ /de nyid snying po rab g.yos pas/ /phongs pa mdza' dag sel mdzad bsgom/ /rjes
31a6(rgyud 'grel): mthun tshogs las bsgrubs nas/ /pad nyi la bzhugs g.yas brkyang rol/ /man mdog zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas/ /lcags kyus gza''gugs zhags rnams 'ching/ /dpal mo bsnyen pas 'gro phan yid/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni gus bsgom la/ /pad+ma
31a7(rgyud 'grel): 'am ?? 'bras de bzhin du/ /ka ra bi ra'i mes mchod bya/ /bum bzang snod du lnga phrag lnga/ /rin chen gzugs spras snying po gzhug /gang 'dod gzhir ni bgegs bsal la/ /lha mo nor gyi dbang phyug bsten/ /a'oM tA re tud tA re za b+he mo he swAhA/ /rje
31b1(rgyud 'grel): btsun sgrol ma 'gro ba 'gugs shing phongs pa sel ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal zla ba'i dum bus dbu rgyan/ /brgyan pa thams cad rab tu 'bar ma/ /ral pa'i khrod nas 'od dpag med las/ /rtag par shin tu 'od ni
31b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad ma/ /gang gis gsol btab bkra shis dang/ /dge legs rgyas mdzad zla tshes brgyan/ /'od dpag med las 'od mdzegs pas/ /bsod nams 'od dpung 'bar mdzad bsgom/ /mtshan mas rjes mthun las bsgrubs nas/ /slar yang chu
31b3(rgyud 'grel): skyes ri bong can/ /rdo rje'i gyis krung gis gnon dpal/ /gser mdog zhal gcig phyag brgyad blta/ /rtse gsum lcags kyu rdo rje gri/ /rin chen lcags kyu dbyug gu gril ba/ /thugs rjes tshar gcod rjes 'dzin ma/ /rgyun mi 'chad par 'dod
31b4(rgyud 'grel): star ma'o/ /shis pa'i phyogs su thab brtsigs te/ /dbus su taM ldan ud dpal bskor/ /bsreg rdzas g.yas dang mchod rtsas g.yon/ /'o ma can shing sbrang rtsi mar/ /bsangs te so sor byin gyis brlab/ /rin chen las byas ched ldan gyi/ /dgang gzar
31b5(rgyud 'grel): blugs gzar rdo rje dril/ /bsangs te ku shas bcal bkram bya/ /rgyun bzhags bram ze'i mes sbar la/ /bang zhing rlung yab kyis bskyod bya/ /'bar ba'i ched du lan gsum gsum/ /bdag mer byin za mchod gnas bstim/ /pad+ma'i 'du ga stangs lan gnyis
31b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ /gsum gsum kyis ni lan bdun du/ /mar gyi dkar blugs gus pas sbyin/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas rtse gcig go /a'oM a ga ne ye a di bya/ /A bi sa ma ya ra sh+ri ye hya d+hya ka b+hya ma hA ka na swAhA/ /me ltas ngan na bgegs dgra bzlog /bzang na gsol btab
31b7(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub blang/ /sdig ldan spangs nas gso sbyong can/ /gus shing snying rje ldan pas mchod/ /a'oM a b+hi b+ha k+Sha ag ne yem ma shan ti ku ru swAhA/ /rdo rje dgang blugs zhal bsil bya/ /mchod bstod 'dod don gsol ba gdab/ /de rjes lha bskyed sogs
32a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod nas/ /dgang blugs phul la rdzas rnams mchod/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na mo a rya pa lo ki te shwar ya/ /bo d+hi sa tA ya/ ma hA swa twa/ ma hA ka ru ki k+Sha ya/ oM tA re tu da tA re ma ma sha ti ku ru swAhA/ /dgang blugs dbul zhing mchod stod la
32a2(rgyud 'grel): slar yang me lha skyes rdzas dbul/ /mchod bstod gshegs shing byang chub bsngo/ /kun don 'phrin las thams cad 'grub/ /rje btsun sgrol ma bkra shis thams cad sbyin ma sbyin sreg bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal skal pa tha ma'i me
32a3(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'bar ba'i phreng ba dbus na gnas ma/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum kun 'khor dga' i/ /dgra'i dpung ni rnam par 'joms ma/ /smin byed brlag byed dpa' mo ni/ /mi bzang me dpung dbus na brjid/ /brten byed sdang byed dga' mdzad cing/ /'joms byed drag gzugs
32a4(rgyud 'grel): can de bsgom/ /pad+ma dmar dang nyi ma la/ /bzhengs pa'i dor stabs brkyang bskum ma/ /mi bzad ra ga ltar dmar mdog /kun du 'phro zhing kun sreg mdzad/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi mchu smin g.yo/ /ral gri mnga' dang 'khro lo gzhu/ /gcod 'bigs gshog
32a5(rgyud 'grel): cing bsnun byed las/ /bgegs dgra phra rab rdul mi gnas/ /gser mdog nor bu in+t+ra dang/ /sbur long 'phags pa'i gdung thal dang/ /b+h+ri ha ta dang gu gul dang/ /bdud rtsi lnga sogs sbyar ba'i spos/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas bdug byas na/ /stong phrag brgya
32a6(rgyud 'grel): cu'i ma lus bgegs/ /nags mes shing skam ji bzhin 'joms/ /rim sogs dug sogs de bzhin no/ /bsgrub bya'i gzugs la lha mo yi/ /nga rgyal gyis bkug tsub mo'i shing/ /rten phral ling ga btubs nas bsreg /bsnyen bsgrub las las go rim
32a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /'bum phrag stong phrag rgya rtsa brgyad/ /bzlas te phro mo haM lung zhal/ /phul na gsum bdun nyi shu gcig /zhag gis tshangs par gyur kyang gsod/ /oM tA re tud tA re tu re d+ha rma d+ha re hUM/ /slo Da b+ha smi ku ru hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swAhA/ /rje btsun sgrol ma yongs su smin pas dgra
32b1(rgyud 'grel): bgegs gzhom pa'i bsgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal sa gzhi'i ngos la phyag gi /'thil gyis bsnun cing zhabs kyis rdung ma/ /khro gnyer g.yo ba'i yi ge hUM gis/ /rim pa bdun po rnams ni 'gems ma/ /'gugs byed bsnun byed rdung byed ma/ /yig
32b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'dzin rim gnyis bdun 'gems/ /lha mo nyid bsnyen gus pa yi/ /zhe sdang dang bral khro bas bsgrub/ /stang zil gnag mdog zhal gsum ma/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar khros pa'i zhal/ /thos pa'i ngo shal rgyu ma gsol/ /sbrul brgyad kyis brgyan stag lpags gsol/ /phyag
32b3(rgyud 'grel): drug ral gri lcags kyu dang/ /dbyug gu de bzhin thong khrag bkang/ /zhags pa'i tshangs pa'i mgo 'dzin ma/ /khams gsum rim bdun gcig char 'gems/ /rjes mthun las rnams sdod song pas/ /dar dkar dris byug lha sbyong gyis/ /chu skyes ge sar a'oM dang a'i/ /mdza' rten 'dab brgyad
32b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bru brgyad bli/ /bden bzhi'i rten 'brel mdza' bskor dang/ /rigs lnga'i snying pos brgyan pa yi/ /sna tshogs rdo rje mdzes pa dang/ /a li ka li mu khyud skor/ /mthar byed sngags dang ral gri yi/ /ra ba phyi rol rim gnyis dgod/ /de nas 'bar ba'i ra bste/ /shis pa'i snag chos mnyam
32b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhag bri/ /mchod cing ye shes 'khor lo gzhug /nga rgyal ldan pas rgyas btab la/ /bdug pas bdug cing mgul du gdags/ /'di yis mi bsrung gang yang med/ /rje btsun sgrol ma 'gugs byed mas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal
32b6(rgyud 'grel): bde ma dge ma zhi ma/ /mya ngan 'das zhi spyod yul nyid ma/ /swAhA oM dang yang dag ldan ma/ /sdig pa chen po 'joms pa nyid ma/ /lha mo bde mas mtho ris sbyin/ /dge mas thang pa sbyin pa ste/ /de bzhin zhi mas rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sbyin mdzad sdig 'joms bsgom par bya/ /
32b7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dkar dang zla ba la/ /rdo rje skyil krung kun nga'i mdog /phreng ba mchod sbyin dbyi gu dang/ /pad+ma spyi blugs po ti 'dzin/ /tsa ba'i bsnyen ldan khrus byas te/ /bgegs bsal bsod nams spel phyir ro/ /lha sbyor ldan dang rdzas tshang dang/ /dad dang snying rjes brtson pas yid/ /nyams
33a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' i phyogs su stegs bu bca' / /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab bzhi ldan/ /rdo rje phreng bas mdzes bskor zhing/ /phyogs skyong bkra shis rtags ldan dri/ /ral gri me long mnga' dang dar/ /rma bya tshon skud du dkar sogs/ /ba dan bla bre rgyal mtshan gdugs/ /me tog
33a2(rgyud 'grel): phreng sogs mchod gtor bsham/ /lha ma'i ting 'dzin las sprul pa/ rin chen khang brtsegs rgya che dang/ /dngos grub mtsho skyes bcom ldan ma/ /cho ga gsum gyis bskyed gzhug mchod/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): a ryA pa lo ki te shwa ra ya bo d+haM swa twa ya/ /ma hA swa twa ya
33a3(rgyud 'grel): ma hA ka ru ni kA ya/ a'oM ta re tu da t+ta re tu re sarba gra he de sarba bya d+he/ /sarba dur swa pa ni d+hya/ /sarba pa paM pra sha ma na ya swAhA/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo'i mdza' skor du/ /gzugs mdzes kyis ni brgya stong grangs/ /bskor zhing 'khro 'du'i 'ong 'bar bas/ /bzhu ste bdud rtsi'i rdzid bur byas/ /
33a4(rgyud 'grel): dug sel sgros bya ba sdig gdon sogs/ /mi sdug gzugs su phyug byas khrus/ /rigs sngags bkra shis bcas te gdon/ /rjes la mchod bstod bzod par gsol/ /lan gcig lan gsum lnga dang bdun/ /khrus byas nad sel gdon zhi byed/ /sdig 'dzems don
33a5(rgyud 'grel): kun sgrub 'gyur te/ /rtag tu byas nas dngos grub thob/ /rje btsun sgrol ma zhi ba chen mo phyi khrus kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal kun nas bskor rab dga' ba'i/ /dgra'i dpung ni rab tu 'gems ma/ /yi ge bcu pa'i sngags ni bkod
33a6(rgyud 'grel): pa phis/ /rig pa hUM las sgrol ba nyid ma/ /yid gzhungs dran sogs kun nas bskor/ /mi shes dgra dpung rab 'joms ma/ /blo gros yis ge bcu po kad pas/ /hUM las srid zhi'i mun sgrol bsgom/ /pa'i ge sar nyi ma la/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung phyi ru'i mdog
33a7(rgyud 'grel): dgra 'joms rtse gsum thugs khar 'dzin/ /'bras bcas shing rnams sdig mdzub 'phyar/ /thugs kyi snying po rig pa mchog /yi ge bcus bskor 'dod pa yi/ /dngos grub kun ster blo gros sbel/ /thams cad snying gi dbus gnas ma'o/ /thugs rje'i rang bzhin
33b1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab mchog /gcig tu ban mdzad dngos grub sbyin/ /ji ltar gzhan blo spel de ltar/ /bdag gis blo mchog rgyas par mdzad/ /dag gi dbang phyug zhi phra dmar/ /bdag gyur g.yas g.yon mdun rgyab tu/ /yid gzhungs dran dang shes rab dang/ /blo 'phel lta mo bzhi bsgom bya/ /srid
33b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'khor lo zla ba'i dbus/ /rnam snang sgrol ma las byung dngos/ /rtsa rig 'od kyis mun sel byed/ /mi smra'i sbyor bas gsar sngags bzlas/ /oM ta re tud tA re tu re h+ri(rgyud 'grel): ma hA ma yaM ga pra dz+nyO b+hi d+hi ma hA sa ra sa tye naM ma pra ti ta ba ri shud sad(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+ha rma pra ti ta pa ri shud d+ho hM/ sarba ma hA b+ha ya a b+ha yan
33b3(rgyud 'grel): ta ra swAhA/ /sman rnams sbyor pas bzlas nas ni/ /zla ba drug dang gsum mam gcig /zos nas thos mang 'dzin pa dang/ /tshe ldan tshangs pa'i nga ro thob/ /de bzhin gser mdog dri ldan sngags/ /zla gcig zla gsum zla drug /bsnyen pas yid zhugs dran ldan zhing/ /blo 'phel ngag gi dbang
33b4(rgyud 'grel): phyug 'gyur/ /rje btsun sgrol ma dgra 'joms mas blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal tu re zhabs kyis brdabs pas/ /hUM gi rnam pa'i sa bon nyid ma/ /ri rab man d+ha ra dang 'bigs byed/ /'jigs rten gsuM rnaM g.yo ba nyid ma/ /bde
33b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan lha mos zhabs brdabs pas/ 'jigs rten gsum g.yo 'jigs par byed/ /hUM yig sa bon las skyes mgon/ ri rab kun spyod dbang sdud bsdon/ rab dkar par dbus nyi ma la/ /hUM yig las skyes kun bde ster/ /sems dpa' i dkyil krung dmar ser mjos/ /phyag gnyis ri
33b6(rgyud 'grel): bod 'dzin bsnams pa'o/ /de bsnyen dpen par gtsang khang ba shaM/ /zhi mdzad lha ma me tog gi/ /maN+Dal mchod bcas gtor mar bcas/ /de bzhin gtuM mo ma mchod bcas/ /chom rkun la sogs snying brtseg bas/ /lha mo gtor 'dod byin la/ /yan lag dgu ldan mchod
33b7(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /zhi dag gnyis kar gsol ba gdab/ /snying kha'i 'od kyis sems can khams/ /kun bskyabs slar yang thugs rje yi/ /oM las bsil ther de ster staM/ /yongs gyur smar gzugs lta mo yi/ /g.yas g.yon mi 'jig ma ud+pal can/ /sna tshogs rgyan
34a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes lha rdzas kyi/ /mchod sprin dbus gzhugs che gus mchod/ /mgul rgyan gdub bu do shal 'dzin/ /'bras bu gsum gyis nam mkha' yi/ /tshon gzugs dang bltas gsal bar bya/ /phyag gi bdud rtsis bdag skyong bar/ /bsams la
34a2(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags lo grangs gdon/ /na mo aryA ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi swa twa ya/ ma hA swa twa ya/ ma hA ka ru ni ka ya/ tadya thA/ oM tA re tud tA re tu re sarba du(rgyud 'grel): Sh+Ta na pra duSh+Ta na ma ma kri ta na/ dzam b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ /ban d+ha ban d+he ya/ /hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT
34a3(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ sarba staM g+ha ni tA re swAhA/ phyi'i phyag rgya zhabs 'og mnan/ /nang gi dbugs kyis drangs te bsreg /sgrub bya'i 'khro lo bcings te dril/ /de skyong lha ni gtor mas bskrad/ /gang 'gro'i phyogs su dpal chen mo/ /zhal bzangs bdag la gzigs par bsam/
34a4(rgyud 'grel): de la bstod dang bzlas gsol bya/ /des ni 'jigs pa kun skyabs 'gyur/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma bde ldan mas chom rkun bcing ba'i sgrubs thabs rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal lha'i mtsho'i rnam pa yi/ /ri dags rtags can phyag na
34a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnams ma/ /ta ra gnyis brjod phaT kyi yi ges/ /dug rnams ma lus par ni sel ma/ /'phags ma lha'i dang pa 'dzin ma/ /zag med bde rgyas dug sel ma/ /mnyes par byas deng sngags sbyang bas/ /dug rnams las rgyal bsgom par bya/ /pad+ma dkar steng zla dbu
34a6(rgyud 'grel): su/ 'dab bzang khri steng skyil krung bzhugs/ /gnyis kyis spyi bor lcags kyu 'dzin/ /gzhan gnyis mchod sbyin po ti bsnams/ /lha mnyes rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /gdon rigs lnga yi dug brtags la/ /rdzas rigs lnga la gsang sngags lnga/ /'bum
34a7(rgyud 'grel): phrag gsum bzlas gnas lngar byug /a'oM tA re dud tA re tu re ku ru ku l+laM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): sarba sha truM b+han k+Sha ya hUM hUM na ga sta pa ya b+ha nd+ha ya b+hanrha ya raM yaM kha sun ne ra na re pa ne hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ /dam tshig rdzas ni dang po la/ /gu gu la gla rtsi shu dag dang/ rtsa nu? tsa na dug
34b1(rgyud 'grel): shing kun nyid/ /gla bzhin bskyod bcas sbyar ba'o/ /gnyis pa nyid 'gyur shu thag gla/ /ru rta gu gul mu zi nyid/ /ro ras rgya tshil gshin dri chen/ /phag bcud sgog skya ma hU ra/ /mi yi bcud dang rus pa'i phye/ /mi yi bcud sdus ril bu'o/ /snga ma'i nyis 'gyur bsnyen pa yis/ /rig pa
34b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang lha sbyor nyid/ /gsum pa la ni sum 'gyur nyid/ /gzhan yang klu dug bdud rtsi bsten/ /bzhi pa yang na bzhi 'gyur nyid/ /klu dug rnams rgyal brten par bya/ /lnga pa lnga 'gyur a ru ra/ /mi bskyod gla rtsi khyad pa da brtan/ /nyid 'od mun pa mi yis rdul/ /ji bzhin du dug rnams
34b3(rgyud 'grel): 'joms par byed/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma rnam par rgyal mas glu nad gso ba'i bsgrub thabs rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal lha'i tshogs rgyal po dang/ /lha dang mi 'am ci yis bsten ma/ /kun nas go cha dga' ba'i brjid kyis/ /rtsod dang rmi lam ngan pa sel ma/ /sa
34b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum dpang pos rab mchod cing /kun nas dga' bskyod 'bar ba yis/ /gzi yis ltas na sdug bsngal sel/ /brtson pas dus drug bsgom par bya/ /pad+ma dkar dang nyi steng du/ /g.yas brkyang bskyil krung kun da'i mdog /sna tshogs 'od phreng sku brgyan nas/ /me thab
34b5(rgyud 'grel): bsnams shin? sdug bsngal bsreg /ltas mthong bsnyen pas 'phags mnyid/ /skyabs sbyor gzhan spangs nas ni/ /pha lang lci byugs dkyil 'khor bya/ /dbus su gsung thugs sku bskyed bya/ /de nyid spyan drangs mchod sngo 'gro/ gsol btab snying brtses bsnyen ba gso/ /khro brtson lo gangs
34b6(rgyud 'grel): brgya rtsa brgyad/ /mchod bstod gsol ba ma yengs byas/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ /na mo aryA ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi swa twa ya/ /ma hA swa twa ya/ /ma hA ka ru ni kA ya/ /ta dya thA/ ra dzu g+ha d+ha rmi/ ning yi tE/ ta re ta ra ya/ b+ha ga ba te tud tA re phra ma b+ha ya/ mo rtsi tu re swAhA/ /rje btsun
34b7(rgyud 'grel): ma sgrol ma sdud gu bsngal bsreg pas khri mun las thang pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal nyi ma zla pa rgyas pa'i/ /spyan gnyis po las 'od rab gsal ma/ /hA ra gnyis brjod tu hA ra yis/ /shin tu drag po'i rims ni sel ma/ /ye shes lha
35a1(rgyud 'grel): mo ye shes spyan/ /rab gsal bsgribs dang ma bsgribs gzigs/ /ngan 'gro dang ni srid pa'i nad/ /nyon mongs bcas 'joms bsgom par bya/ /'dam skyes dmar steng zla pa la/ /sems dpa' i dkyil krung gser zangs mdog /phyag gnyis
35a2(rgyud 'grel): thugs khar gser bum 'dzin/ /nang 'joms dngos grub kun ster mdzad/ /'dab bzangs mig lce ma / bris pa rnams/ /ri rab kyis bcas ga bur gzhug /lha mo nyid sku gsung dang thugs/ /yi ge gsum bskyed bsrung ba'i mchog /rig pa'i rgyal me tog yig
35a3(rgyud 'grel): gis /mig smin bsdus nas kun mthong zhing/ /gzhan mthong mi mthong sbyin par byed/ /spang byed bzungs ni 'bum phrag bzlas/ /na mo rang na tra yA ya/ na mo arya ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ /b+ho b+hi swa tA ya/ ma hA swa twa ya/ ma hA ka ru ni kA ya/ /ta dya thA/ a'oM tA re tA ra tAr
35a4(rgyud 'grel): ya/ dza ya dza ya/ tung tA ra dza ya/ b+ho he tu re swAhA/ /rje btsun sgrol ma dngos grub 'byung bas mi snang bar byed pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //phyag 'tshal de nyid gsum rnams bkod pas/ /zhi pa'i mthu dang yang dag ldan ma/ /gdon dang ro
35a5(rgyud 'grel): langs gnod sbyin tshogs rnams/ /'joms pa tu re rab mchog nyid ma/ /lha dang sngags dang ting 'dzin gyis/ /de nyid gsum bkod mthun tshan mo/ /gnas gsum gnod pa'i tshogs 'joms ma/ /yi ge gnyis ldan bsgom par bya/ /cho ga kun ldan rjes
35a6(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa'i/ /lha bsnyen mchod bzlas goms pa yis/ /de nyid gsum ni rtag tu dran/ /yongs rdzogs mkhas spyod 'grub par 'gyur/ /ha skyes khyu mchog par zla la/ /skyil krung phyed bzhugs stag sham can/ /zhal gcig rnams thar spyan gsum phyag /mu
35a7(rgyud 'grel): tig phreng dang mdung rtse gsum/ /skar mngos rab dkar mun sel byed/ /gsang sngags dgra yis srid gsum 'gongs/ /dus gsum mdung rtse gsum gyis bsnun/ /bslub la dngos grub kun rdzogs mdzad/ /de yis mkhas spyod mthong ster ma/ /
35b1(rgyud 'grel): lha bsnyen yid kyi shugs goms pas/ /zangs lcags gser la ral gri bya/ /tshad ldan A ka bcu phreng brgyan/ /sngags bzlas rab 'bring tha ma'i rtags/ /sgra dang me stag 'od 'phro par/ /mthong nas chags med yid kyis bskyong/ /de bzang 'dab bshog bya bzhin 'gro/ /a'oM tA re tud
35b2(rgyud 'grel): tA re tu re a mo g+ha sing d+hi la rga pra sing d+hi/ lo ka la lo ki ta tha' rang na ce la tsa la hUM hUM baM baM s+thAM swAhA/ /rje btsun sgrol ma yongs su rdzogs byed mas ma lang spyod kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //'phags mch+go lta mo yid bzhin dbang gi rgyal po 'di/ /nyi su
35b3(rgyud 'grel): gcig bcas bstong pa'i rgyal po rjes sgrub thabs/ /sgrol ma mngon 'byung le'u lnga brgya bdun cu bar/ /gang gsungs gsal byas de dgos 'gro yid mun sel shog/ //bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la
35b4(rgyud 'grel): bstong pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun lha mo mchog nyid kyi skus rjes su bzung ba'i slong dpon chen po nyi ma'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal chos kyi rje ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gsum par grags pa'i paN+Di ta chen po bsod
35b5(rgyud 'grel): snyoms pa kha che shAkya sh+rI b+ha dra dang/ lo tsa ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bod yul dgus kyi gtsug lag khang chen po sol nag thang po che dang/ pho brang dam pa khra 'brug gi gtsug lag khang bsgyur ba'o// // */ /sgrol ma'i bstod pa rnam ngag btsug nor yang
35b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrol mdzad ma rnams slob dpon nyi ma spas pas mdzod pa dang/ / */ /rgya gar skad du/ aya rya pi tA re e ka bi shang sto tra bi shu d+ha tsu bA ma Ni na ma/ /bod skad du/ 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa rnam dag gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba mgon po thugs
35b7(rgyud 'grel): rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal rab tu dpal ba'i sgrol ma/ /spos med rnam dag nam mkha' i dkyil na/ /pad+ma gser mdog gang na la bzhugs pa'i/ /sku mdog dmar mo me'i 'ong can/ /phyag
36a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal zhal cig phyag brgyad spyan rgyas/ /dga' ba'i phyag rgya dang po gnyis ni/ /rdo rje dril bu spyi bor bsnol nas/ /de log mda' gzhu thugs kar 'dzin ma/ /phyag 'tshal gsum pas 'khor lo snams te/ /bzhi pa shes rab ral gri 'debs
36a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul/ /g.yon gyi gsum pas thugs kar dung 'dzin/ /bzhi pa la ni zhags pas brgyan ma/ /phyag 'tshal dkar mo zla mdangs sgrol ma /sku gsum rdzogs pa'i zhal gsum g.yas sngo/ /g.yon zhal 'dzam+bu chu bo'i gser mdog /rten 'brel dag pa'i phyag ni bcu
36a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ /phyag 'tshal dang po mnyam pa'i phyag rgya/ /gnyis pa na ni kha TwAM ga snams/ /'bar ba'i 'khor lo gsum pas legs 'dzin/ /bzhi pas yid bzhin nor bsnams ma/ /phyag 'tshal lnga pas rdo rje rab 'chang/ /drug pa na ni me tog phreng 'dzin/ g.yon gyi gnyis pa ril
36a4(rgyud 'grel): ba spyi blugs/ /nyon mongs dri ma ma lus 'khrud ma/ /phyag 'tshal gsum pas ud pa la legs 'dzin/ /stong pa'i sgra sgrog bzhi pa dril bu/ /lnga pas gter gyi bum pa thogs ma/ /drug pa po ti 'gro la chos ston/ /phyag 'tshal gser mdog can gyi sgrol ma/ /sna tshogs
36a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan la/ /rdo rje skyil krung shin tu brjid mdzes/ /phyag bcu pha rol phyin bcu dag ma/ /phyag 'tshal dang po thugs kar 'phreng 'dzin/ /gnyis pa na ni shes rab ral gri/ /gsum pa mda''phen nyon mongs 'phigs ma/ /bzhi pa rdo rje lnga pa dbyug gu /phyag
36a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal g.yon gyi dang po dar dbyangs/ /gnyis pa zhags pa gsum pa pad+ma/ /bzhi pa'i phyag gis dril bu dkrol ma/ /lnga pa na ni snying rje'i gzhu thogs/ /phyag 'tshal gtsug tor rgyal ba'i sgrol ma/ /chu skyes ser po dag gi steng na/ /zag med bde rgyas zla ba'i
36a7(rgyud 'grel): gdan steng/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung brtan par bzhugs ma/ /phyag 'tshal dge ma gser gyis mdog can/ /thugs rje'i rang bzhin 'gro la rab ster/ /zhal cig phyag bzhi bdud rnams 'joms ma/ /g.yas kyi dang po dngos grub mchog stsol/ /phyag 'tshal rgyun
36b1(rgyud 'grel): mi 'chad pa'i bsam gtan/ /'og ma yis ni phreng pa 'dzin ma/ /g.yon gyi dang po phyag mtshan g+ha na d+he/ /gnyis pa rin chen dang dbyug gu snams ma/ /phyag mtsho hUM sgra ?? sgrogs pa'i sgrol ma/ /dri med zla ba'i gdan gyi steng na/ /nyon mongs skyon bral dag pa'i sku mdog /btso ma g.yas
36b2(rgyud 'grel): bral gser gyi mdangs ldan/ /phyag 'tshal dpal mo shes rab bdag nyid/ /thugs rje'i 'khor ba zhed mnan nas/ /ma rungs 'dul phyir hUM gi sgra sgrogs/ /dus gsum srid pa'i g.yul las rgyal ma/ /phyag 'tshal bden pa dag pa'i phyag rgya/ /'gro rnams thugs rjes rab tu gzung phyir
36b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa'i phyag gis skyab sbyin mdzad cing/ /g.yon pas pad+ma ser po 'dzin ma/ /phyag 'tshal rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrol ma/ /chu skyes dmar po rgyas pa'i steng na/ /gti mug dag phyir nyi ma'i gdan bting/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung 'gro la gzigs ma/ /phyag 'tshal lha dang drang srong rnams kyis/ /khyod
36b4(rgyud 'grel): zhabs pad+ma spyi bor blangs nas/ /thugs rje che mnga' khyod la rab stod/ /'gro ba kun gyi re ba nas gyur ma/ /phyag 'tshal pad+ma ra ga'i mdangs ldan/ /phyag bzhi g.yas gyi dang yon ni/ /rdo rje 'phyar zhing de 'og ral gri/ /g.yon pas sdigs mdzub zhag pa bsnams ma/ /phyag 'tshal rgol ba 'joms pa'i
36b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma/ /pad+ma gser dang nyi ma'i gdan la/ /dpa' ba' i stang stabs 'gying thag g.yon rkyang/ /tshas rdam nag mo khros pa'i bzhin 'phyar/ /phyag 'tshal na bza' gser mdog gyon nas/ /dbu skra gyen pa rjes ltos 'gros rgyan te/ /rin chen cod paN mkha' la rab 'phyar/ /phyag zhabs rin chen gdu
36b6(rgyud 'grel): bus rgyan ma/ /phyag 'tshal phyag bzhi g.yas kyi dang po/ /'khor lo 'dzin cing gnyis pa ral gri/ skye nas steng du zhags pa bsnams nas/ /g.yon gyi tha ma sbig mdzub rab sdengs/ /phyag 'tshal dbang mchog gter pa'i sgrol ma/ /pad+ma dmar dang zla ba'i steng na/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir
36b7(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i gdan steng/ /skyil krung phyed ma gser gyi mdog can/ /phyag 'tshal khro bo'i gnyer ma dang ldan/ /brjid pa'i sku mchog zhal cig phyag bzhi/ /g.yas na mya ngan med pa'i yal ga /gnyis pa rin chen bsnams shing mchog stsol/ /phyag 'tshal g.yon gyi dang por na?
37a1(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs skyon gyis ma gos phyir rnams/ /g.yon gyi tham bum pa legs thogs/ /'gro ba kun la dbang mchog steng ma/ /phyag 'tshal seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma/ /ye ge taM las 'khrungs pa'i lha mo/ /zhal cig phyag gnyis zhi ba'i gzugs can/ /chos kyi
37a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi yi ges mtshan pas/ /phyag 'tshal skad dkyil me tog gis rgyan/ /mdzes ma g.yas rkyang zhabs la g.yon pas/ /thabs dang shes rab mi 'bral rab 'khril/ /pad+ma zla ba'i steng na bzhugs ma/ /phyag 'tshal g.yas pas 'gro la mchog stsol/ /phyag g.yon ud+pal rgyan
37a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams yongs rdzogs/ /sngon ljang 'gyir bag ra smi'i mdog can/ /gzhan nu sbyan drang nu ma rgyas ma/ /phyag 'tshal 'khor lo bsgyur zhing 'dod pa/ /thams cad rab tu steng ba'i sgrol ma/ /yi ges las khrungs pa'i lha mo/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa yi gzugs can/ /sku/
37a4(rgyud 'grel): mdog pad+ma ra ga ltar dmar/ /pad+ma dmar dang zla ba'i gdan la/ /rin chen la sogs rgyan gyis brgyan te/ /zhabs gnyis 'grad pa'i gyad kyis bzhugs na/ /thabs dang shes rab mi 'bral phyag gnyis/ /dang pos rdo rje'i dril bu bsnams te/ /rab tu 'ga' bar spyi bor bsnol ma
37a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas 'og gar gyi phyag rgya dang ldan/ /g.yon gyi gnyis pa a sho ka yi/ /yal ga 'bras bur bcas pa bzung nas/ /'gro ba kun gyi rin che char rgyu/ /mchog spyin phyag gis rab tu 'beb ma/ /las kun bsgrub phyir rta mchog dbu rgyan/ /sangs rgya skun gyi rang bzhin nyid ma/ /phyag
37a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal mya ngan sel ba'i sgrol ma/ /ma chags pad+ma dmar po'i steng na/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhabs kyis mnan nas/ /rol ba'i 'dug stang 'gying bag mdzes ma/ /phyag 'tshal 'jig rten dbang du mdzad ma/ /sku mdog pad+ma ra ga ltar dmar/ /bzhad pa'i gdab rgyad tud tA re
37a7(rgyud 'grel): ye 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus sel ma/ /phyag 'tshal zhag gci phyag bzhi bdud 'dul/ /dang po gnyis ni spyi bor thal sbyar/ /g.yas 'og ral gri'i phyag rgya dang ldan/ /g.yon na mya ngan med pa'i yal ga/ phyag 'tshal 'gro ba 'gugs pa'i sgrol ma/ /gzi brjid phung po?
37b1(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i ster na/ /pad+ma'i? gdan la rol pas g.yan brkyang/ /'gying bag nag mo dbang gi las mdzad/ /phyag 'tshal dpa' mo gyad kyi cha byad/ /mtshan mo'i sprin dum mun pa'i mdog can/ /shin tu 'jigs rung bdud dpung zil mnon/ /nor gyi char 'bebs 'phongs pa sel na/ /phyag
37b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal yi ge h+rUM gi sbyor bas/ /phyogs mtshams rnams nas gza' chen 'gugs ma/ zhal cig phyag gnyis g.yas na lcags kyu/ /g.yon na rol pas zhags pas bsnams ma/ /phyag 'tshal bkra shis snang ba'i sgrol ma/ /sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba'i gdan la/ /rdo rje sbyin krung
37b3(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi mdangs ldan/ /zhal cig phyag brgyad zla tshes brgyan ma/ /phyag 'tshal g.yas kyis dang po rtso gsum/ /gnyis pa na ni thugs rje'i lcags kyu/ /gsum pa'i rdo rjes bdud kyis dbungs 'joms/ /bzhi pas shes rab ral gri bsnams ma/ /phyag 'tshal g.yon gyis nor
37b4(rgyud 'grel): bu thugs khar/ /longs bskyong sbel phyir 'gro la gter ma/ /gnyis pa lcags kyu gsum pa dbyug gu/ bzhi pas nor gyi bus pa thogs ma/ /phyag 'tshal smin par byed pa'i sgral ma/ /bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i dbus na/ /pad+ma mar dang nyi ma'i gdan la/ /bzhengs pa'i
37b5(rgyud 'grel): dor thabs g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum/ /phyag 'tshal sku mdog shin tu mi zad/ /pad+ma rag lta bur dmar zhing/ dpa' ba' i cha byad zhal gcig phyag bzhi/ /dag mo chen po dgra dbung 'joms ma/ /phyag 'tshal g.yas kyi dang po ral gri/ /gnyis pa mda' yis nyon mongs
37b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bigs ma/ /g.yon pas 'khor lo gnyis pas bzhu thogs/ /mchu dang smin? ma khros pas gyen bzlog /phyag 'tshal khro gnyer g.yo ba'i sgrol ma/ /pad+ma dmar dang nyi ma'i gdan la/ /g.yas brkyang gar gyi mi yi ro mnan/ /sku mdog stang zil 'jigs pa'i gzugs can/ /phyag 'tshal
37b7(rgyud 'grel): zhal dang sbyin ma rab bdud/ /bsam? dkar g.yon dmar khro gnyer dang ldan/ /dmar ba'i sbyan gsum sdang mig rab bslad/ /mi'i rgyu ma zhal dru gsol ma/ /phyag 'tshal sgrul dang stag gi pags pa/ /thod pa'i con pa Na mgo bo'i do shal/ /ral gri lcags kyu dbyu gung snams
38a1(rgyud 'grel): ma/ g.yon pa thod khrag zhags pa mgo po/ /phyag 'tshal dge legs zhi ba'i sgrol ma/ /pad+ma dkar dang zla ba'i gdan la/ /rdo rje skyil krung kun d+ha'i mdog can/ /zhal gcig phyag drug sdig pa 'joms ma/ /phyag 'tshal don rtags g.yas kyi dang po/ /rgyal
38a2(rgyud 'grel): pha'i spyod yul thugs kar phreng 'dzin/ /gnyis pa legs pa'i phyag rgyas mchog sbyin/ /gsum pa'i phyag gis dbyug gu 'dzin ma/ /phyag 'tshal g.yon gyi dang po pad+ma/ /gnyis pa yis ni ril pa spyi blugs/ /gsum pa mdab rgyas utpal steng na/ /'gro pa'i
38a3(rgyud 'grel): lam ston po ti bsnams ma/ /phyag 'tshal chags pa 'joms pa sgrol ma/ /pad+ma dmar ser nyi ma'i gdan la/ /sgros med sems dpa' i skyil krung brjid mdzes/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum phyi ru'i mdog can/ /phyag 'tshal hUM gis rigs pa dang ldan/ /thabs dang shes
38a4(rgyud 'grel): rab 'brel ba'i phyag gnyis/ /g.yas na rtse gsum thugs khar bsnams nas/ /dgra bo'i lus la rab tu bsnums ma/ /phyag 'tshal g.yon pas sdig mdzub rab 'phyar/ /snying por bcas pa'i 'bras bu'i shing 'dzin/ /thugs kyi snying po yi ge bcu pas/ /dgos pa'i
38a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub rab tu 'byung ma/ /phyag 'tshal bde ba bsgrub pa'i sgrol ma/ /pad+ma dkar po 'bar ba'i steng na/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gdal ba'i gdan la/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung dpa' bang bzhugs ma/ /phyag 'tshal bde ba'i sku mdog dmar ser/ /zhal
38a6(rgyud 'grel): cig phyag gnyis hUM gi 'phrin las/ /'jig rten bdun po dbang du bsdus nas/ /bde ba thams cad bsgrub par mdzad ma/ /phyag 'tshal thobs med nam mkha' i lus can/ /phyag gnyis thugs khang 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bsnams te/ /
38a7(rgyud 'grel): rin chen du ma'i rgyan gyis mdzes ma/ /phyag 'tshal rnam par rgyal pa'i sgrol ma/ /pad+ma dkar po'i steng du zla ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor dbus na 'dab bzang dang pa'i/ /steng du sems dpa' i skyil krung bzhugs ma/ /phyag 'tshal zag med bde chen rab rgyas/ /sku
38b1(rgyud 'grel): mdog dkar mo dung gi mdog can/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ha ra gnyis brjod/ /phaT gyi yi ges dug rnams sel ma/ /phyag 'tshal dga' ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan/ /zhal gcig spyi bor lcags kyu rab 'dzin/ /g.yas 'og mchog sbyin g.yon gyi gnyis pa/ /utpal steng na po ti
38b2(rgyud 'grel): bsnams ma/ /phyag 'tshal sdug bsngal bsreg byed sgrol ma/ /pad dkar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng na/ /bde ba'i 'dug stangs sems dpa' i skyil krung/ /cung zad g.yas brkyang bar bzhugs ma/ /phyag 'tshal dkar mo kun d+ha'i mdangs ldan/ /sna tshogs dkar dmar
38b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer phreng bas/ /'gyid bag skul rab tu brgyan nas/ /'gro ba'i nyon mongs rab tu sel ma/ /phyag 'tshal bden pa gnyis dag phyag rgya/ /phyag gnyis thugs khar 'bar thab bsnams nas/ /sdug bsngal ma lus sreg par mdzad cing/ /'gro rnams thar pa'i lam
38b4(rgyud 'grel): la 'god mdzad/ /phyag 'tshal dngos grub 'byung gnas sgrol ma/ /sku mdog dmar ser las kyi rig mtshon/ /pad+ma dmar po'i steng du zla ba'i/ /dbus su sems dpa' i skyil krung bzhugs ma/ /phyag 'tshal dpa' mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis/ /thabs dang shes rab dag
38b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag rgya/ /thugs khar gser gyi Tam pa bsnams te/ /dngos grub ma lus pa ni ster ma/ /phyag 'tshal bum pa bzang dang nor bu/ /'dod 'jo'i ba dang dpag bsam shing chen/ /khyod zhabs dran pas 'dod kun 'byung 'gyur/ /gang la ci 'dod re ba bsgor ma/ /phyag
38b6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal yongs su rdzogs byed sgrol ma/ /taM las skyes pa'i khyu mchog steng na/ /pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gdan la/ /phyed skyil rol pa'i 'dug stangs brjid 'dzes/ /phyag 'tshal dkar mo zhal gcig spyan gsum/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgrol gzigs ma/ /zhe sdad ma sgrangs
38b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas su dag phyir/ /zur khro stag gi sham thabs bcings ma/ /phyag 'tshal g.yas na mu tig phreng 'dzin/ /thugs rje mi zang rab tu khro bas/ /phyag ni g.yon na rtse gsum mdung thogs/ /dug gsum 'khor ba'i rgyun la bsnun ma/ /zla ba yar ngo'i tshe brgyad dag la
39a1(rgyud 'grel): gang gis rnam dag gtsug gi nor bu/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po gus pas blo yis/ /lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na/ /rgyal po sbrul dang srin po mi rgod/ /me dang chu dang stag dang seng+ge/ /'jigs pa chen po brgyad las thar 'gyur/ /sbrul dang nad
39a2(rgyud 'grel): dang 'byung pos 'tshe pa/ /sdug bsngal yid mi bde las grol 'gyur/ /sdig pa chen po rnams dang skal ngan/ /'khrug dang 'thab rtsod nyes pa mi 'byung/ /nyon mongs mya ngan gdung ba rnams sel/ /sa 'og gter dang mig sman ri lu/ /rkang mgyogs la sogs dngos grub
39a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyad thob/ /sku dang gsung dad thugs kyi dbang phyug /rdzu 'phrul kun 'gro gnas la sogs pa'i/ /dbang phyug las la dka' bam yin/ /bdag por byed dang dga' 'gur sgrub pa/ /'dod dgu 'byung ba'i dngos grub dam pa/ /de bzhin yon tan brgya kyang thob 'gyur
39a4(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing dang/ dpal ldan 'dod 'jo'i ba dang bum mchog /bde ba dang bcas nor rnams grub 'gyur/ /mtshan mo rgyu dang lho 'phye 'byung po/ /sha sa'i chogs kyi glags rnyed mi 'gyur/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po/ /'jig rten
39a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi bdag po rnams kyi/ /'dod pa'i don rnams bsgrub par byed cing/ /bar du gcod pa rnams ni sel 'gyur/ /mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhing/ /gang du tshe yi 'du byed btang dus/ /bde ba can gyi zhing du skye 'gyur/ /dngos grub 'gyur nas snga
39a6(rgyud 'grel): btsun sgrol ma/ /lha mchog rnams la bdag gis bstod pas/ /dge ba dri med zla ba rgyas 'dra'i/ /'od ltar dkar ba thob pa de ni/ /'jig rten brtsod pa'i skyon dang bral nas/ /myur bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob ste/ /sems can ma lus pa ni kun la/ /bde
39a7(rgyud 'grel): chen char pa 'bebs par shog shig /sgrol ma mngon par byung ba'i rgyud le'u lnga brgya bdun cu rtsa gnyis las rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud gyi nang nas btus pa rnam dag gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba/ /sa chen po la gnas pa'i slob dpon chen po nyi ma sbas
39b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zhal sda nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //*/ /'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa bzhugs// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ /arya ta re stong tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo
39b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrol mdzad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mdza' yas pa/ /stong ba las sgrol thugs rje'i rgyan yangs ma/ /bde gshegs yum gyur lha mo sgrol ma la/ /lus ngag yid gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyi mdzad pa'i phrin las rgya che ba/ /ma lus brjod par sus kyang mi
39b3(rgyud 'grel): spa bos te/ /che long rags pa rnam brgyad mang po sogs/ /po mtshar legs spyad gtam snyan 'di skad thos/ /shin tu rmad byung yon tan rgya mtsho'i gter/ /dge tshogs nor bu dam pa rin chen gling/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i tshel na dri bsung can/ /phreng mdzod tshig gi me tog mchod par
39b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhes/ /skal ldan rigs can lam mtshon med pa zhig/ rang yul ma slab ri dags rgyal pos bdas/ /khom lan skyes bu gsum pa skyabs 'gro bya/ /sgrol mas rjes bzung seng+ges gus phyag 'tshal/ /don gnyer mgron la gdong dmar gangs ri'i mdog /rdul
39b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzag rab khros khro gnyer mche ba gcigs/ /phyin brlabs mthar thug gzungs sngags bstod pa'i mthus/ /de ma thag tu glang chen 'jigs las skyabs/ /shing skam khri la tshe zad brgya bzhag ste/ /log lha'i rgyal pos drang srong me lha mchod/ /thams cad mkhyen pas
39b6(rgyud 'grel): me tog phreng 'dzin mdzad/ /dngos su zhal bstan bdud rtsi'i char rgyun phab/ /tshong dpon nor ldan shul rings lam du zhugs/ /'jigs pa'i thang la mi rgod chom rkun byung/ /yi dam lha mos 'jigs med bde sar bskyal/ /drin lan ma brjed rten la mchod pa 
39b7(rgyud 'grel): phul pa?  gzugs mdzos bu mos phyi rol nags su phyin /dug sbrul gdug pa'i kha rlangs sprin ltar 'thibs/ /'bras ldan ljon pa'i shing gi bsil grib la/ /spyi bor phyag gzhag mi bzad nad las thar/ /sbyin pa'i 'bras med dbul phongs rkun po'i mis/ /
40a1(rgyud 'grel): dkor mdzod blangs pas btson khang ra phar bcug /dang ldan slob mas thugs dam rgyud bskul pas/ /thugs rje'i phyag gis lcags sgrog mdung pa bkrol/ /tan po? go mi dge bsnyen 'phags pa mchog /rgyal po'i chad pas gang+gA'i chu la skyur/
40a2(rgyud 'grel): gus ldan zhes bcas pa'i sdeb sbyor gyis/ /'dzum zhal dge mas sing+ga'i gling la bzhag/ rgyal brgyud lam 'khrul dur khrong gnas su 'khyams/ log 'dren 'byung ba'i gdon gyis zin gyur tshe/ /rigs pa'i rgyal po rig sngags bcu bzlas pas/ /bar char bdud
40a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshogs las rgyal bar gyur/ /seng+ge glang chen me dang chom rkun dang/ /dug sbrul btson khang chu dang 'byung po'i gdon/ /'dus byas rgya mtsho las 'bras 'jug dogs can/ /byang sems klu dbang bden gnyis gtsug gi nor/ /pha rol phyin drug rin chen rgyan
40a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis spras/ /lnga bcu lhun grub phrin las gzi brjid can/ /'jigs brgyad sgrol ma gzhan yang sems can gyi/ /phyi rol grub mdza' ngan pa log lta'i ri/ /lung rigs rdo rje'i mtshon gyis bcom nas kyang/ /lus ngag yid gsum sku gsum dkon mchog gsum
40a5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag mdza' bral lta ba ma rtogs na/ /tshig gi bsnyems pas don la mi snyogs te/ /sems kyi gnas lugs nam mkha' i chos nyid la/ /ma rig 'khrul pa'i dra ba bsal du gsol/ /bsod nams chung bas dge ba'i sems med cing/ /mi dge mun
40a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgribs yang ngag lam ma rnyed/ /bdag 'dzin bdud kyi sring mtsho 'dir 'khyams rnams/ /bshes gnyen thabs mkhas grub gzings ded dpon can/ /chu bzhi'i pha rol yid 'ong po ta la/ /bde mchog gnas chen lha yi pho rbrang du/ /'gro kun yan lag bdun
40a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan chos spyod cing/ /nyer mkho'i yo byed dkar babs brgyad gnas nas/ /phrin las lda mos zhal bzhes ma pa snyel bar/ /bshes gnyen ngan pa'i bdud dang mjal ba rnams/ /ngal 'byor chud zos mi che stong zad cing/ /zas nor don med gsus su bzlag
40b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa/ /lus sems sdug bsngal chu yi rba rlabs kyis/ /nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i sems can ma lus dang/ /bka' 'bangs tha ma bdag cag thams cad la/ /rnam dag thos bsam sgom gsum bstan du gsol/ /rnam dag thos bsam sgom gsum bstan nas kyang/ /
40b2(rgyud 'grel): phan bde'i dge ba byang chub mchog tu bsngo/ /khyod kyi phrin las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de/ /chags sdang gti mug sprin gyi dri ba ma yis/ /bsgribs par ma gyur dpal ldan 'phags ma'i sku/ /dge tshogs sprin chen lhun po'i rtser bzhugs la/ /sa 'dzin spo
40b3(rgyud 'grel): la rta bdun rgyal po ltar/ /lham me lhar nge gsal ba'i bkra shis shog /gcang bdag bde dang rtag pa nyid thob pa/ /skye rgan chi med pa chos kyi sku/ /brnyes gyur lhus gyis grub cing 'dus ma byas/ /bsam zhing brjod pa'i yul las 'das gyur kyang/ /chu nang zla ba nam mkha' i
40b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jam bzhin du/ /sprul skus 'gro don bzang par smon lam 'debs/ /klu sgrub pad+ma'i ge sar la/ /nyi ma spas pa bung ba yi/ /lang ying bdud rtsi'i dga' ston gyis/ /bu slob sbrang bu'i lus rgyas shog/ /kha che'i slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas rje btsun
40b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma la bstod pa rdzogs so// /rgya gar gyi baN+Di ta mA d+hU kIrta ding/ bod kyi lo tsA ba 'ang rnga ma tshul khrims seng+ges bsgyur ba las/ /phyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du ngag par byas so// //phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa bzhugs/ /
40b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ /sra ga d+ha ra sto tra/ ngo nga skad da/ phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i snang ba ltar dmar lha mcho ga rnams kyi mgo yi gtsug gi nor bu'i dpal/ /phun sum tshogs pas
40b7(rgyud 'grel): dmar ba smugs gsal po dngar? bkor? shin tu yun rings ma lon 'dra'i/ /'phags ma khyod zhabs dag la thal sbyar cod pan gyis mnan yan lag mchog hud? bdag gis ni/ /gus pas sgrol ma phongs skyabs bstod pa gser gyi me tog phreng ba rnams kyies
41a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod par bgyid/ /skal ngan du ba'i bzhin ldan rgal bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal me la lus dag rnam ltung ba/ /ci dang ci bya zhes rmongs lan cig min pa'i rtsom pa byas kyang 'bras dang bral bas skyo/ /mkha' la nyi zla'i dpal ni
41a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan las mang du thos nas blta ba re ba bcas gyur pa'i/ /mig nyams gzhan gyi 'gro blta bur bdag ni sdig 'joms khyed la gus pas brten par bgyid/ /khyed kyi thugs rje sems can las rnams kun la bye brag med par 'jug ram lags sam/ /de dag
41a3(rgyud 'grel): bzung bas bdag 'dra yang ni de dag nang du bzung bar 'gyur la gdon mi za/ /mdza' dag 'gro ba'i sdig pa'i mun par tsha zer can gzugs nus pa la do zla med/ /de lta mod kyi kye ma bdag smad nyes byas ngan pas brjid cing sdug bsngal ldan ba nyid/ /skal ba
41a4(rgyud 'grel): zhan pa bdag smad smad pa zhig ste nyin byed 'od zer gyis kyang mun ma sel/ /gangs can las byung 'jug ngogs chus dkris kha ba'i dum bu 'khyags shing bsil ba dag tu skom/ /rin chen gling gi lam srad dang ni nor bu'i phug yangs khang pa dag gi nang du dbul/ /
41a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten kun gyi yum gcig ma khyod mgon du byas kyang mgon ma mchis so bcom ldan ma/ /nu ma'i rgyu las lan mang dag tu rnam par du ba'i bu la ma yang skyo bar 'gyur/ /nyi ma so sor dam pa ma yin don gnyer rnams la rab bskul pha yang khro ba 'dzin/ 'jig rten
41a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi re 'dod 'bras bus yangs ldan dpag bsam shing chen 'khri shing mchog ni khyod/ /mngon par don gnyer ngon rnams kun la stsol gyi nam yang rnam gyur de dag ci yang med/ /gang la nyon mongs tshogs kyis me 'bar lus can de dang de yi sgrol mang nyid ces
41a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid zhal bzhes dam bcas sdug bsngal 'og tu byed ba bdag la 'bras bu ldan par mdzod/ /srog chags rnams kyi sdug bsngal shugs ni rtsub cing zil gnon 'di dag ji snyed 'phel gyur pa/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg par smon lam blo
41b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad rnams kyi brtse ba'ang de snyed nyid/ /de ltar bstod pa'i tshig gi zol gyis cho de'i sgra dag gsang 'thon sgrogs cid lag bsgreng la/ /gzhan dag gis kyang btang snyoms bya bar 'os pa min na yum gcig khyod kyis lta yang ci/ /gzhan dag rnams kyi mngon 'dod 'byor par don
41b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyer 'dod pa khyed las thob ba rnams mthong bzhin/ /mi dge las byung nang gi gdung ba rgyun chags bzod blags med pas shin tu yang yang sreg /gal te kho bo sdig can lags na khyod la gus pa chen po 'di ni ci phyir 'phel/ /khyod nyid gcig pu'i mtshan gyis kyang ni thos
41b3(rgyud 'grel): dang dran pas 'phral la sdig pa sel dang byed/ /de lta na yang bdag gi bya ba'i?/ dur dag dor ba ji ltar lags zhes bden gsungs pa/ /nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur yang sman pa'i snying rje rgya chen phan pa 'khon par bgyid dam cid/ /sgyu dang ser sna nga rgyal phrag do rang skyon
41b4(rgyud 'grel): tha chad rnams kyis dus mnyam rim par yang/ /du ma dag gi thun mong char gyur tshogs khang rnga mo bzhin du bskor bar gyur pas na/ /khyed kyi zhabs pad mchod pa skad cig cem yang ma rnyed gang de'i gon du khyad par las/ /phongs pas yi ge dman par tshig 'di
41b5(rgyud 'grel): bkod do bdag? gi 'dod pa don med? ma gyur cig /dus mdza' i rlung rab? 'khrugs pas dkrugs pa'i chu ni g.yo zhing 'gul ba'i rlung 'khor ral pa can/ /rab 'khrugs kun tu bskyod cing rba rlabs ngos brdabs sgra grags gad brgyangs chen po sgrogs pa las/ /
41b6(rgyud 'grel): gru chag chu du ra'i rji du ba'i cho de dang ldan g.yo ba med cing zhan gyur pa/ /lha mo khyod la bstod pa rnams kyis 'bral la chu gnyer 'gram du rang dga' thar bar 'gyur/ /dub 'tshubs pa sprin 'dra khongs nas rab byung me stag mkhar khyim nang du rnam par rgyu/ /'phro zhing rab
41b7(rgyud 'grel): 'ba' i drag po'i 'bar byed shugs dag 'jug pa'i khod par mal stan la 'khod pa/ /thal sbyun? rtsod pan ldan pas khyed la btung byas ldab ldib dag tu gsol ba 'debs pa rnams/ /glog rab 'gyur ba'i brtse dga' rab 'bar chu 'jin shugs kyis skad cig nyid
42a1(rgyud 'grel): la sgrib par byed/ /myos pa'i chu rgyas 'gram pa gnyis ka'i ngos la babs pas bung ba dag gi phred ba can/ /hUM zhes bya bas bos par gyur pa'i glang chen zla bos zhe sdang me sbar gnyis 'thung gi/ so rtse rab tu mtho ba'i khyogs la blangs pa'i
42a2(rgyud 'grel): lus can dag gis khyod rjes dran pa na/ /rtse mo che ldan mgo rtse'i rdzod la 'dug cing rab tu dga' bas 'chi bdag phyir zlog byed/ /mdung rings drag po bsnun gsad mi ye mgo dang gsal shing dag gi khri shing dga' ston can/ /nags tshal steng par chom rkun lag
42a3(rgyud 'grel): gces ral gri g.yo shing brdeg par bzas pas dregs rgyas pa/ /khro gnyer dang bcas smin khyog zur mig gis bltas mig can rnams ni khyed mtshan dpal gyi gzhi/ /gsal bar 'dri ba'i gnas la bsam pa'i smyu gu skyon med rnams kyis bran du sgol bar byed/ /
42a4(rgyud 'grel): rab rno sder mo'i rtse ni rdo rje lta bu bsnun pas glang chen myos pa'i klang 'gems nas/ /khrag mad rab tu zags pas bkras pa'i ral la gsal po 'jigs rung yangs phrag pa khebs/ /khros te rgyang nas steng du mchod 'dod mche brnon po gcigs pa'i kha can ri
42a5(rgyud 'grel): dags dgra/ /khyod la 'os pa'i bstod pa don ldan tshig dag bkod pas skrag ste log nas 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gdangs can rnam 'gyur du pa 'khyil dang mun mun pa'i dbyibs can gsal bar phud sgra dag gi tshogs/ /byed pa dang ldan kha gangs do 'dzin thag
42a6(rgyud 'grel): pa gshin rje'i zhags 'dra che zhing g.yo ba dag/ sdig pa las byung slar yang khyod skyong bdag nyid khyod kyi yon tan bgrang ba ltur len pas/ /ud+pal phreng ba'i rgyan gyis 'byor ba bung ba myos pa'i phreng bas dkris ltar 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rje bo'i smin ma bskyod
42a7(rgyud 'grel): bas 'jigs pa dgra gis rgod cing 'phyar bas drangs lo cad gzings/ /g.yo zhing sgra sgrogs bran khol rnams kyis rtsub mor smra byed zhags ba'i mdud pa dam pos bcings/ /bkres skom dag gis kha dang mgrin skams gang zhig 'phags ma sgrol
42b1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i zhabs la skyabs 'gro ba/ /de ni byams pa'i gnyen gyis sngags kyang mdza' med rgud pa de dag 'phral du gtong par 'gyur/ /sgyu ma sprul pa'i las kyi rim pas rnam par 'gyur ba dag gi chas byas shing/ /log pa'i gzugs tsam rjes su 'tsham pa'i mchon
42b2(rgyud 'grel): cha'i 'od zer tshogs ni rab tu mi bzad ldan/ /mi ro las bton rgyu ma'i thag pa'i tshogs kyi phreng bas rnam par sbras pa'i srin po rnams/ /khyed rgyud las btus gsang sngags dran pas sdig pa phrogs ba'i srung ma gzhon med byed par 'gyur/ /glang chen sgra sgrogs
42b3(rgyud 'grel): char sprin lus can myos byed chu bo'i rgyun dang ldan pas mun gtibs shing/ /mtshon cha 'od zer rnams ni glog rab 'gyu ltar rab gsal mda' yi char 'bab g.yul do 'gyed ba'i tshe/ /rnam par sngag pa'i dgra bo dpung ba'i stobs ni rab mchog ldan pa rnams
42b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bkag gyur pa/ /khyod kyis dgra bo gsod pa'i dpa' bo gcig gis 'phral du dgra yi sa gzhi phyi mar rlog /sdig spyod dag gis rjes 'brel pol mig tshabs can dag las rnag khrag rul pa rab 'dzag cing/ /sha lpags myags pa la chags rtsa slo'i? bu gar
42b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gul ba'i srog chags kyis zos lus zad rnams/ /khyod zhabs nye bar brten pa'i sman mchog ri lu goms par byed la gus shing chags pa yis/ /sa le sbram dang mtshungs pa'i lus dang padmo dkar po ltar yangs mig dang ldan par 'gyur/ /gang gi rna
42b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i snod na bla ma rnams kyis gnang ba'i man ngag slongs ma mi gnas shing/ /rdos? pa'i nor dang bral bas mkhas ba'i tshogs rnams dag tu lkugs pa nyid du kha bu? len gang/ /de yang khyed la gus pa'i nus pas rgyan rnams thams cad mdzes byed 'byor
42b7(rgyud 'grel): par bcas pa yi/ /ngag gi dbang phyug thob nas mi bdag 'dun sar rgol ba'i seng+ge'i khri dag 'phrog par byed/ /sa gzhi ma la stan rdul gyi lus bsgos skyed dos ras ral yan lag dag ni rnam par mngon/ /shig gis tshe dag rab gcor gzhan gyis grong
43a1(rgyud 'grel): khyer mdun du gyo mor zas ni don gnyer ba/ /khyod brnyes bgyid la brtson pas na chung mchog gis bzung ba'i rnga yab mdzub gyis rab mdzes shing/ myos pas long ba'i gnyis 'thung sos gtams gdugs gcig gyen du bteg
43a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sa gzhi 'dzin par 'gyur/ /g.yog dang las mdza' bzo dang dbang po gso ba'i thabs kyi rnam grangs dag gis rab skyo zhing/ /skye ba snga mar rab bsgrubs bsod nams bsags pa'i dge 'bras nor ni thob par ma gyur pa'i/ /nor med rnams
43a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis skye bo bkren pa'i yum gyur phongs las 'da' bar mdzad pa khyod las don/ /don du gnyer na slar yang gser gyi tshogs kyi gter dag sa las 'thon pa thob par 'gyur/ /'cho ba chad las do tshar gyur cing gos zad chung ma dag gis rab tu sbyong bar byed
43a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid gso phyir rang gi skye bo bu dang grogs po gnyen gyis ring du spyangs pa yis/ /khyed la rang gi sdug bsngal zhus pas rang gi khyim thab bud med gdu bu'i sil sil sgras/ /gnyir log sad par 'gyur zhing rta rmig rtse mos mtshams bsgos
43a5(rgyud 'grel): khang khyim rnams kyi bdag po byod/ /'khor lo phyogs kyi 'khor lo la sbyor bud med mtshan brgyan 'od gzer g.yo zhing che ba dang/ /glang chen gtso bo mche ba drug ldan rta mchog spu kha sngo sangs rma bya'i mgrin ltar 'tsher/ /nor bu nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar
43a6(rgyud 'grel): gsal dri med yon tan mdzad 'dzin mdzod khengs dang/ /dmag ngo bo na dpal snge ldan par bcom ldan 'das ma khyod kyi bka' drin cha shas phra las 'gyur/ /tsan dan rgyu yis dri zhim nor bu'i rdo la mdzes mas dus btab rtse dga' la chags pas
43a7(rgyud 'grel): sdu gu ma yi bde ba'i nyer spyad mgron du bya ba ba mngon par gsal ba rab bsgrubs shing/ /ral gri 'od zer gyis snge spom mtho dpung pa gtun shing dang 'dra dpung rgyan rol pa can/ /khyod kyi rigs drug rig 'dzin dbang po ma la ya yi me tog tshal du rang
43b1(rgyud 'grel): dgar 'gro/ /nu ma'i thon 'khor do shal gyis brgyan mig dkyus ring po rna ba'i utpala la 'gran cing/ /lha mo yid 'od mand+ha rab dang ldan ze 'bru gsar ba'i dris myos bud ba can/ /dil chung sgra yis rjes 'bral rab tu gsal bar rkang rdub yid 'od sgra snyan sgrogs
43b2(rgyud 'grel): par byed/ /'dod pas myos dga' gzhon nu ma rnams gus dang bcas par khyed mgon ldan pa gon du gnyer/ /rdzing bu'i nang logs rin po ches spras gser gyi pad ldan ze 'bru rdo rje phreng ba can/ /yongs 'du'i ljon pa las 'phro dri bzangs dang ldan me tog rdul gyi
43b3(rgyud 'grel): bla bre mthor bres te/ /pi wang glong bu sgrogs mkhas lha yi grod gis dga' ma rnams kyis snyan par rab bsgrags pa'i/ /dga' ba'i skyed tshal bgrod pa khyod la mchod pa bgyid pas yun rings nyams su myod par 'gyur/ /nang gi byed pa khyod la gtad pa'i bsod
43b4(rgyud 'grel): nams mthu ni rab 'bar yongs su smin pa yis/ /ga bur e la li shi shun pa a ka ru dang na la da phye'i dri ldan chu/ /'dod pa'i dregs bas rab 'bur bud med nu ma'i skyibs su rba rlabs 'khyil gnas dal 'bab pa/ /sman min chu yis zer ma ldan chu rtse
43b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzes ma dag dang lhan cig rtse bar 'gyur/ /tshig mdza' i gtso bo dul ba'i khur gyis cod pan dud pa rnams kyis bka' la phyag byas shing/ /tho ris steng du lha yi glang chen khror bol rgyan gyis spung ba'i lus can la zhon te/ /spu long rab rgyas lus can
43b6(rgyud 'grel): bde sogs lag pa'i thag pa khyogs kyis rgyun tu bskyil gyur pa/ /khyod kyi spyan ras phog pas dag byas lag pa rdo rje ldan pas lha yi sa skyod byed/ /gtsug gi rin chen rgyan gyis mnan bzhugs bde bar gshegs pa nam mkha' i dpal 'byor ba bre
43b7(rgyud 'grel): can nyi ma 'chang? ka bye blta bur rab gsal 'od zer rgyas pas 'jig rten gsum 'gengs shing/ /brtan par g.yas brkyang zhabs gcig gis mnan khur gyis tshangs dbang drag po khyab 'jug rnams dud pa'i/ /khyed sku bsgoms pa skye bal brten rnams
44a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis srid pa'i 'jigs pa gcod pa'i slad du 'gyur/ /khro ba dang bcas mtshon cha'i 'od zer rab 'bar phyag dbyug tshe yis nam mkha' i khongs dag khyab/ /gdu bu'i gdengs can dag gis gdengs ka mi zad mi 'phrogs spyod ldan sdang
44a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams skrag mdzad bzhad/ /cang te'u drag po tshabs cher brdungs pa'i tshe na ro langs rnams ni drag por pheg rdo ba cing/ /bag med rgyugs bas ca co chen po sgrogs par byed pa'i drag mor lal dag gis mthong/ /la las ba spu re re las byung nam mkha' i khyon
44a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas sa dang sa 'og dag na gnas/ /mthe ris la gnas tshangs dbang drag po la sogs mi dang lha dang grub pa dri za kru?/ /phyogs tshogs khyab pa'i 'od zer la bzhugs bde gshegs brgya phrag sprul pa mdza' yas dag gi sku/ /ngo mtshar 'jig
44a4(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum gyi phyag 'os brtan g.yo bkod pa'i dngos po ma lus ngo bor ro/ /la las rgya skyegs li khri'i tshon dang nyi zhon dmar ba nyid ltar shin tu dmar ba dang/ /de bzhin gzhan gyis snum zhing 'od ldan mthon mthing rdo bcags btags pa'i phye ma ltar
