44a5(rgyud 'grel): sngo dang/ /la las 'o ma'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa'i 'od ltar ches so lhag dkar dang gser 'od lta bu ste/ /khyed sku sna tshogs ngo bo nye bar bzhag pa dang 'brel dbye bas tha dad shel bzhin no/ /kun mkhyen ye shes sgron mas shes bya mdza' dag gsal
44a6(rgyud 'grel): byas de nyid dag gi dbang gcig pu/ /kun rig nyid dam de yi sras kyis khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi grangs ni mngon sum mkhyen/ /bdag 'dra gtor ma spyod pa sgrogs pa lta bur kha gdangs ku co che bar 'don pa gang/ /de ni mi bzad sdug bsngal
44a7(rgyud 'grel): gdung bas nad bskyed sems kyi rgung pa gzhang gang dag gi rgyu/ /bdag gi zhu ba gang lags de ni nangs kyis dang por khyad kyis khyad par du mkhyen te/ /'on kyang lhag par de brjod ngal ba'i sgrub byed mi mkhas pa dag rang sems tshim pa'i rgyu/
44b1(rgyud 'grel): don shes zin yang mnyen 'dun byams pa'i mdun du sdug bsngal lngan pas tshigs gis sdug bsngal ni/ /dug bzhin skyabs par gyur na snying yang seng zhes byed cing rnam par gnas par tshor ba bzhin/ /dge legs kun dga' i rgya mtshor zla ba'i cha shas gsal po
44b2(rgyud 'grel): bsil ba'i gzigs par stsal du gsol/ /ye shes nyer bstan dag gis rgyas par mdzad cig thugs rdzes sdig ldan nang gi mun pa sol/ /gang phyir 'gro ba dgon khyod bstod chu yis yid ni dag par byas pa kho bo la/ /skye dgu rnams kyi dge legs gnas
44b3(rgyud 'grel): ni don yong khyod kyi yon tan bstod tsam gcig pu mthob/ /khyod kyi yon tan mogs kyi cha tsam bstod nus bdag gis 'di tsam zhes par mi nges pa'i/ /bsod nams bkra shis 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ro myang grol ba'i bar du spyad bya ba/ /gang thob de yis
44b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'di ni 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs mthil bkra shis kyi/ /bde legs rtags can bde gshegs sras po'i sa gzhi bde ba can zhes bya de myur bgrod shog /phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa paN+Di ta chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes
44b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ sra? ga d+ha ra stro traM/ bod skad du/ me tog phreng 'dzin gyi bstod pa/ /rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phongs skyabs 'phags ma sgrol ma khyed zhabs lha mchog
44b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi mgo bo'i gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i snang ba lta bur dmar pa'i phun sum tshogs pa phog bas dmar ba ni/ /smug rtsi dmar ba gsal po bkod nas shin tu yun ring ma lon pa dang 'dra dag la/ /mgo btud spyi bor thal sbyar bgod pa
44b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bstod gsar me tog phreng bas gus mchod bgyi/ /brgal bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal me nang lus lhung skal ngan phyogs gang zhig la brten snyam pa/ /blun zhing ci ci bgyi snyam lan cig ma lags rtsom bgyi don ma mchis bas dub pa
45a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag/ mig nyams gzhan gyi 'gros kyis 'gro ba snang ba re bar bcas pas nam mkha' i nyi zla yi/ /'od ltar gzhan dag rnams las khums te sdig pa 'joms par mdzad pa khyod la brten par bgyid/ /khyod kyi thugs rje nges
45a2(rgyud 'grel): par sems can lam rnams kun la bye brag med par rab bzhugs shing/ /de dag bzung bas bdag 'dra'ang de dag rnams kyi nang du gdon mi 'tshal bar gzung 'gyur ba/ /nus mthu 'gro ba mdza' dag sdig mun nyi ma'i gzugs la'ang do zla mchis pa
45a3(rgyud 'grel): ma lags mod/ /de ltar na yang kho bo sdug pa kye ma'o nyes byas ngan mkhas ngan pa rab tu brjid/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis kyang mun pa rab tu gsal ri bo gangs can klung ngogs kyi/ /shang shong kha ba'i dum grugs dkrigs pas bsil bar dbyar skom
45a4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen gling gi tshor khang gi /nor bu'i phug yangs khang ba'i nang na dbul zhing 'jig rten kun gyi yum gcig bcom ldan 'das/ /khyod kyis mgon du bgyis kyang mgon ma mchis pas skal nyams bdag ni smad cing smad pa'i gnas/ /ma yang nu ma'i
45a5(rgyud 'grel): phyed du rnam pa mang du du ba'i bu la skyo bar 'gyur ba lags/ /nyi ma re re dam pa ma yin ngon du gnyer la bskos pa'i pha yang khros sel na/ /khyod ni 'jig rten gsum 'dod 'bras bu yangs pa dpag bsam ljon shing yal ga mchog chen te/ /kun
45a6(rgyud 'grel): la mngon par 'dod don stsol yang khyod la nam yang rnam 'gyur 'ga' yang yon mi mda'/ /gang dang gang zhig sdug bsngal tshogs mes lus bsregs de dang de ni nga yis bsgral lo zhes/ /nyid kyi dam bca' zhal bzhes sdug bsngal sa 'og byid pa
45a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag la 'bras bu bcas par mdzod/ /ji srid srog chags rnams kyi zil gnon rtsub ldan sdug bsngal shugs de 'phel ba de srid du/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg par smon lam blo mnga' rnams la rjes brtse mnga' ba lags/ /yum
45b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig de ltar lag bsgred bstod pa'i tshig zil cho de'i pa ro dpangs mthor 'don pa la/ /gzhan gyis kyang ni btad snyoms bya bar 'os pa min na khyed 'dras lta zhig blos ci 'tshal/ /khyod las gzhan dag rnams kyis mngon 'dod 'byor pa don gnyer 'dod
45b2(rgyud 'grel): brnyed pa ma khums na/ /nang gi gdud ba rgyun chags mi dga' i sa gzhi sran du med pas shin tu yang yang bsre/ gal te kho bo sdig can lags na kho bo'i khyod bus chen po 'di dag ci phyir 'phel/ /bden gsung mtshan tsam khums shing dran
45b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yis kyang khyod gcig kho nas nan gyis sdig sel ba/ /de yi phyir na khyod kyis kho bo'i bgyi ba'i khur bu bor ba ji ltar lags pa gsungs/ /nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur na'ang sman pa snying rje rgya chen sman 'phrog gcod par bgyid dam ci/ /
45b4(rgyud 'grel): gang gi phyir na 'gron gnas rda mo cha shas du ma'i thun mod bltang rgyu dang ni/ /ser sna nga rgyal la sogs rang skyon tha chad rnams kyis rim dang dus gcig bskul bas na/ /nyin cig zhabs kyi pad+ma mchod bskad cig tsam yang ma rnyed de phyir khyad par du
45b5(rgyud 'grel): bkren zhing phongs ba'i tshig dang yi ge bkod 'dis bdag la 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mchis bar mdzod/ /lha mo gru chag chur bying snying rje dang bcas du ba'i cho de g.yo med zhan pa rnams/ /khyod la mngon bstod lhur blangs pa yis 'phral du rgya mtsho dus
45b6(rgyud 'grel): mdza' i rlung gyen 'tshungs pas chu/ /gtsubs pa'i chu rlabs g.yo zhing mgul pa rol pas dkrugs pas bteg pa'i rba rlabs 'gram dogs la/ /brdabs pa'i sgra grags gad rgyangs can gyi pha rol 'gram du rang dga' nyams kyis brgal bar 'gyur/ /
45b7(rgyud 'grel): du ba'i 'khyil ba'i sprin nang 'thon zhing nam mkha' i khyim du 'phro ba'i mi stag can gyi me/ /me lce 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i shugs kyis nang du zhugs pa'i khyim na mal du nya? la ba rnams/ /khyod la rab btud thal mo spyi bor sbyar zhing ldib ldib gsol ba bta
46a1(rgyud 'grel): bas skad cig la/ /glog rab 'gyu ba'i sgeg pas dmar por gyur ba'i sprin gyi chu rlabs dag gis khebs par 'gyur/ /'gram pa'i gdub bu myos pa'i chu yis gad ba gnyis ka la brten bur ba'i phreng ba yi/ /dar dir sgra yis bab pa'i
46a2(rgyud 'grel): ban glang zla bas zhe sdang me lce sbar ba'i glang chen gyi/ /mche ba'i rtse mo ldo li mthon po'i steng du lus po gzhag pa'ang khyod rjes dran pa yis/ /ri bo mthon po'i zom rtse'i mkhar la 'dug pa bzhin du dga' zhing 'chi bdag phyir zlog bgyid/ /mdung rings
46a3(rgyud 'grel): bsnun bsad mi yi mag dang gsal zhing can gyi gtor ma'i ston bskyed 'phrog stong du/ /rkun po lag rtser bzung bas g.yo ba'i phub dang ral gris dregs pa shas chen 'thon 'gyur cig /mig ni khro gnyer bcas shing smin 'khyor zur mig lta dang ldan rnam
46a4(rgyud 'grel): bran du bsgo byed pa/ /de ni khyod mtshan dpal gzhi bsam pa'i smyu gus skyo ba med cing gsal bar bris pa lags/ /rkang ba'i sbar mo rab rno rdo rje lta bus tshabs cher bsnun pas glang chen myos pa'i glad/ /bskams nas khrag mang zags pas bkrus
46a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ral ba gsal po 'jigs rung yangs gnya' khebs shing/ /khros te rgyang nas mgo la 'dzin 'dod mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa'i kha can ri dags dgra/ khyod kyi 'thang ba'i spyod pa bstod pa'i don tshig mkhas la skrag ste log nas 'gro ba lags/ /du
46a6(rgyud 'grel): ba 'khyil ba'i mun pa'i gzugs can rnam 'gyur gdengs can phus 'debs grags pa'i 'gram dgang bar/ /bya ba'i ched du kha gdangs 'gyur ba'i lce can thag pa dang 'dra gshin rje'i zhags pa dang/ /sdig dbang gis phrad slar yang khyod kyi yon
46a7(rgyud 'grel): tan bgrang ba lhur len khyod bdag lhur byed pas/ /bud ba myos ba'i phrang ba'i gdub can utpal phrang ba'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa 'chad bar 'gyur/ /rje bos smin bskyod bskul te bkrabs pa rem zhing rtsubs pas co to drangs shad gzings gyur pa/ /
46b1(rgyud 'grel): go khol bskyod pa'i tshig rtsub kyis spyos 'ching ba'i zhags ba rtsu ba mos nyer bcing bkres pa dang/ /skom pas mchu dang mgul pa skams pa gang zhig 'phags ma sgrol ma'i zhabs la skyabs 'gro ba/ /de mi byams pa'i gnyen gyis spangs kyang ma rungs rgud pa de
46b2(rgyud 'grel): dag 'phral du spong bar 'gyur/ /srin po sgyu ma sprul pa las tshul gyis byas bden pa ma yin gzugs brtsams cha lugs tshul/ /rnam 'gyur du ma dag dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i mtshon cha'i 'od zer tshogs kyis mi bzad cing/ /mi ro brgyus pa'i rgyu ma'i tha gu'i
46b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs dag phreng ba'i bkod pa rnams kyang khyod rgyud las/ /btus pa'i gsang sngags dran pas sdig bsal bsrung ba pham pa med pa byed par 'gyur/ /cham chem sgra sgrogs char sprin lus can ngan glang myos chu'i klung gis rgyun gyi mun gtibs shing/ /mtshon
46b4(rgyud 'grel): cha glog ltar 'gyur ba'i 'od zer dang ldan mda' yi char 'bab g.yul ngo 'gyed pa'i tshe/ /phye mar glog par byed cing dpung stobs che ba'i rnam par sdang ba rnams kyis bsgags pa yang/ /khyod kyi spro ba gsol btab dpa' bo gcig gis dgra bo'i sa gzhin na
46b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis 'thag par byed/ /sdig spyod rgyun chags las byung phol mig tshabs chen dag las rnag khrag rul pa zags pa yis/ /myags pa'i sha lpags dang 'brel rtsa sgo'i bu gar srog chags 'gul pas zos pas lus zad rnams/ khyed kyi zhabs la bsnyen pa'i
46b6(rgyud 'grel): sman mchog ri bu goms par bsten la rab tu dga' ba yis/ /sa le spram dang 'dra ba'i lus dang ldan zhing pad+ma dkar po ltar yangs mig can 'gyur/ /gang gi rna ba'i snod du bla ma rnams kyis nyer sbyar man ngag glang mo ma lhung zhing/ /thos pa'i nor dang/
46b7(rgyud 'grel): bral bas mkhas pa'i 'tshogs sar lkugs pa nyid du khas len gad yin pa/ /de yang khyod la gus pa'i nus pas rgyan rnams kun gyi mdzes pa'i 'byor pa dang bcas pa'i/ /dag gi dbang phyug thob nas mi bdag mdun sar rgol pa'i seng+ge'i khri
47a1(rgyud 'grel): dag 'phrog par byed/ /sar nyal rdul gyis lus rgos rked pos 'doms bkris ras ral yan lag rnam par mngon 'gyur zhing/ /shig gi tshe dag rab gcod gzhan gyi khyim sgor rdza chag dum bur zas dag slong pa yang/ /khyod
47a2(rgyud 'grel): mnyes bgyis pas na chung mchog rnams kyis g.yabs pa yi rnga yab kyis 'dzum mdzes pa'i sa/ /glang chen myos pa'i chu yis gdong pa'i mche ba gtams shing gdugs gcig gyen du bteg pa 'dzin/ /skye bo bkren pa rnams kyis yum gcig zhabs 'bring dang
47a3(rgyud 'grel): ni so tshigs gzo yi spyod pa rnams/ /spong ba'i thabs kyis rnam grangs dag gis dub cing skye ba snga mar nyer blangs bsod nams kyis/ nyer bsags dge 'bras nor ma thob dang nor bral rnams kyis 'phya las 'da' bar mdzad khyod la/ /gsol ba btab pas
47a4(rgyud 'grel): phyi nas nor dus las gter ni gser tshogs 'byung ba thob par 'gyur/ /'tsho ba chad pas ngo tsha khyim thab gos zad ma yis sbyo bar byed cing bdag nyid ni/ /gso bar byed phyir gnyen 'dab bu dang gnyen pa shes rnams kyis rgyang ring spangs par gyur pa yis/ /khyod
47a5(rgyud 'grel): la rang gi sdug bsngal zhugs pas rang gi khyim thab bud med gdu bu'i sil sil sgras/ /gnyid log sad par 'gyur zhing rta? mig rtse mos mtshams brkos khang khyim rnams kyis bdag po byed/ /gal te khyod kyis bka' drin cha shas tsam zhig mchis na
47a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs tshogs khyab pa'i 'khor lo dang/ /bud med mtshan brgyan 'og phag chen po g.yo dang glang chen don po mche ba drug pa dang/ /rta mchog spu ni kha dog sngo bsangs rma bya'i mgrin ltar 'tshor dang yon tan dri med nor bu ni/ /nyi ltar mdangs ldan 'od
47a7(rgyud 'grel): can khyim bdag mdzod khengs blon po rtul phod dmag ldan 'byung bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyis rig pa'i grub pa thob pas tsan dan chu yis dri zhim nor bu'i rdo steng du/ /snyu gu ma yis dus 'debs sdug pa dang rol rjes su chags pas bde ba'i nyer sbyar gsar/
47b1(rgyud 'grel): gus par sbyar zhing lag spom mthon po ral gri'i 'od zer sngon pos dpung rgyan g.yo ba yi/ /rig 'dzin dbang po rang dgar gyur te mA la ya yi me tog skyid mos tshal du 'gro/ /nu ma'i than kong do shal gyis mnan mig dkyus ring pos rna ba'i utpal la 'gran
47b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ sgra bskyil manda ra bas brgyangs pas ze 'bru sang pa'i dri yis myos pa'i bur ba dang ldan pa'i/ /lha yi bu mo rkang gdu bar gas pa'i sil snyan 'og pag sgra yi rgyun gyi shin tu dpangs/ /bskyed cing 'dod dran dregs dga' khyod mgon ldan pa dag la/
47b3(rgyud 'grel): gus dang bcas pas gsol ba 'debs/ /rdzing pu'i nang logs rin po ches spras gser gyi par mtsho ze 'bru rdo rje'i tshogs ldan zhing/ /yongs 'du'i ljon shing skye zhing me tog ze 'bru dri zhim rdul gyi bla re mthor bres te/ /lha yi grong khyer rangs ba gying lha mo
47b4(rgyud 'grel): pi wang gling bu sgrogs pa mkhas pas sil snyan ni/ /snyan par bsgrags pa'i dga' tshal lha mo khyod la mchod pa bgyis pas yun rings myong bar 'gyur/ /sems rgyud khyod la gtad pas bsod nams mthu 'bar rnams ni mdzes ma dag dang lhan cig tu
47b5(rgyud 'grel): ga bur e la li shi shing tsha a ka ru dang spang spos phye ma'i dri chu can/ /glong 'khor rba klod bud med sdug gu'i nu ma 'dod pa'i dregs pas 'bur ba'i skyibs 'khyil ba/ /dal 'bab gang+gA'i chu la chu rtsed chu ni drag tu 'thor bas rtsed mo byed par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi
47b6(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras mang du phog pas dag pa'i bka' la lha gci dul ba'i khur bu yis/ /cod pan 'dud pa rnams kyis phyag byas mtho ris steng na lha yi glang chen thal gong ni/ /khrol khrol rgyan gyis spung ba la zhon lus kyi bsdu shas cher langs pa'i bde
47b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs sogs/ /lag ring 'od li bar me bskyil cing char pa rdo rje dang 'brel lha yi yul las skyong/ /khyod sku gtsug gi rin chen rgyan gyis gang na bzhugs bde bar gshegs 'od mkha' khyab bla re can/ /nyi ma shar ka bye ba lta bur ches/
48a1(rgyud 'grel): gsal 'od zer dag gis 'jig rten gsum 'gengs shing/ /zhabs gcig g.yas brkyang gom stabs chen po'i brjid la tshangs dbang khyab 'jug drag po rnams 'dud pa/ /bsgoms pas skye ba la brten rnams kyi srid pa'i 'jigs
48a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rgyun ni gcod par bgyid par 'gyur/ /la la khro ba dang bcas phyag tshogs phyag cha rnams kyi 'od zer dag dang 'brel pa yis/ /nam mkha' i khongs khyab sbrul gyi gdub bu'i gdengs ka dag gis spyod pa mi 'phrog mi bzad pa'i/ /sdab rnams skrag mdzad
48a3(rgyud 'grel): gang mo'i cang te'u drag po brdungs pas rlang bskyeng tshe na ro langs ni/ /thal mo'i sgra chen sgrogs pas bsgyings shing bsnyems pa'i rol pa chen po'i ca co drag par khums/ /la las ba spu'i khung re nas byung nam mkha' khyab pa'i sar gnas sa 'og mtho ris gnas/ /tshangs pa dbang po la sogs lha dang klu dang dri za mi dang grub pa rnams gnas shing/ /phyogs tshogs khyab pa'i 'od zer la bzhugs bde gshegs brgya phrag sprul pa mdza' yas kyis bkra dang/ /ngo mtshar khams gsum
48a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'os brtan dang g.yo bar gnas pa'i dngos po ma lus ngo bor khums/ /la las rgya skyegs li khri'i tshon 'dra nyi ma gzhon nu ches dmar lta ngur dmar bar khums/ /de bzhin gzhan gyi dpal ldan in+d+ri snyal dum brtags pa'i phye ma 'thul
48a5(rgyud 'grel): 'drar sngon por khums/ /la las 'o ma'i rgya mtsho dkrugs dang zho bas chos lhag dkar dang gser 'od ltar khums te/ /khyod sku sna tshogs ngo bo shel bzhin nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel dbye bas tha dad 'gyur/ /khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi grangs ni
48a6(rgyud 'grel): kun mkhyen ye shes sgron mas rab tu gsal ba yi/ /shes bya mdza' dag de nyid dbang gcig thams cad mkhyen pa dngos dang de sras kyis mkhyen te/ /bdag 'dra bya rog sgrog ltar kha gdangs ku co 'don gang lags te de ni mi bzad pa'i/ /sdug
48b1(rgyud 'grel): bsngal rims nang dag gis bskyed pa'i nad can sems kyi rgyud la bzhad gang rgyu zhig lags/ /bdag gi zhu ba gang lags de ni nang gi dang por khyod kyi khyad par du mkhyen cing/ /de bklags brjod pa'i ngal ba'i tshul ni mi mkhas rang sems tshim pa'i
48b2(rgyud 'grel): bye brag lags mod kyi/ /'on kyang sdug par don shes zin pa'i gnyen 'dun byams pa'i mdun du 'dug bzhin tshig dag gis/ /sdug bsngal phyung ste snying yang seng zhes byed la nyid du 'gyur nas rnal mar gnas tshor bzhin/ /dge legs kun dga' i
48b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtshor zla ba'i cha shas gsal ma khyod bstod chu yis yid dag par/ /bgyis pa bdag la tshim mdzad mthong ba stsol cig ye shes nyer bstan dag gis rgyas par mdzod/ /thugs rje shas ches nang gi mun sol gang phyir khyod kyi yon bstod pa
48b4(rgyud 'grel): tsam zhig kyang/ /don yod 'gro ba dag na skye dgu rnams kyi bde brtsegs gnas ni gcig pu lags par khums/ /khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi cha tsam bstod nas bdag gis 'di tsam zhes bya ma nges pa'i/ /bsod nams bkra shis 'dod pa'i 'bras bu
48b5(rgyud 'grel): mngar ba ro myang ma grol bar du longs spyod pa/ /gang thob de yis 'jig rten 'di ni 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs mthil bkra shis kyi/ /bde legs rtags can bde gshegs sras po'i grong khyer bde ba can zhes bya der myur 'gro shog/ //
48b6(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa me tog phreng ba 'dzin ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa rtse gcig tu byed pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan
48b7(rgyud 'grel): po ka na ka barmma dang/ /bod kyi lo tsa ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyi bsgyur ba las/ slad kyis paN+Di ta chen po ma Ni ka shI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas/ /phyag lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong tshes rje dpal gyis cung zad bcos te dag par byas so// //
49a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA ra sra ga d+ha ra stro tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i me tog phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa/ /sngar shar nyi ma snang ba dmar/ /lha mchog spyi btsug nor bu dmar/ /de 'byar kha dog de la ni/ /tshos sar
49a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni bskus pa 'dra/ /'phags ma khyed kyi zhabs gnyis la/ /gus pa'i thal mo dbu rgyan gyis/ /de mdzes mgo yis phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyes byung dus su skyabs sam/ /de ni sgrol ma khyed yin no/ /bstod sar me tog phreng ba 'dis/ /mchod la bdag
49a3(rgyud 'grel): gis phyag 'tshal lo/ /brgal mi nus pa'i sdug bsngal me/ /de la rtag tu lus lhung gnas/ /skal ba ma ldan 'gro sa gang/ /rmongs pa bdag gis ji ltar bya/ /de ltar rtag tu smras nas ni/ /don med bdag ni stobs chung song/ /mkha' la nyi zla dpal
49a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan grags/ /de ni gzhan gyi smra ba thos/ /de thos long ba'i spyod pa ltar/ /mthong rten 'dod kyang gzhan khrid med/ /sdig pa 'joms ma khyed la ni/ /bdag ni skyabs mthong 'dod lags so/ /sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i phyir/ /de la snying rje
49a5(rgyud 'grel): mi mdzad dam/ /ma lus par ni snying rje mdzad/ /de khongs bdag lta yod gyur na/ /khong la snying rje mdzad pa bzhin/ /bdag la de bzhin mdzad 'tshal lo/ /nus pa med pas mi mdzad dam/ /khyed bzhin nus la gnyis pa med/ /'gro ba rnams kyi sdig mun
49a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /de 'joms pa la nyi ma 'dra/ /de ltar yin kyang sdug pa bdag /mi dge las ni ma tshig pas/ /phan las byas pas bdag ni 'gyod/ /skal ngan bdag la skal ba med/ /nyi ma shar yang mun pa gnag /gang+gA'i chu ni shin tu bsil/ /de phyir
49a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gram du bsdang kyang ni/ /skom yang btung rgyum rnyed ngo/ /rin chen sna tshogs yod pa'i gling/ /nor rnams kyis gang khang pa la/ /der 'dug kyang ni bdag phongs bas/ /bcom ldan 'das ma khyed la ni/ /mgon 'dod kyang ni mgon med bdag /
49b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten kun gyi yum gcig ma ma la rtag tu dus nas ni/ /nub ma'i don du bu slong na/ /de la ma yang skyo bar 'gyur/ /mi rnyed nyin re slong gyur na/ /pa yang bu la khro bar byed/ /'jig rten gsum gyi bslangs kyang ni/ /khyed kyi 'bras bu gang bar byas/ /
49b2(rgyud 'grel): dpag bsam shing gi yal ga mchog /de ni sgrol ma khyed yin no/ /thams cad la ni ma lus pa/ /sbyin pa khyod kyis khyab par byas/ /nyon mongs kun gyi me des ni/ /bdag gi lus 'di rtag tu tshig /sa 'og sdug bsngal de la ni/ /bdag gi lus 'di
49b3(rgyud 'grel): nub tsam na/ /sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ni/ /drag po 'phel bar gyur tsam na/ /khyod kyi dam bcas zhal bzhes pa/ /bdag gi steng du grub par mdzod/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i smon lam ni/ /bdag gi sems la shar ba'i dus/ /sgrol ma
49b4(rgyud 'grel): phan 'dogs mdzad par zhu/ /lag bsgreng bstod pa'i tshig brjod cing/ don du drag po dus pa'i sa/ /gzhan la zhus kyang don 'grub bo/ /khyed lta bu la bdag gis zhus/ /kye ma sgrol ma khyed kyis ni/ /bdag spang par ni mi gsha'o/ /khyod kyi spyan gyis
49b5(rgyud 'grel): gzigs tsam nag 'dod thams cad rnyed par 'gyur/ /mi bde mi bzod sdug bsngal ni/ /yang 'byung dogs ni mi 'byung ngo/ /bdag ni sdig can yin gyur na/ /dad pa shin tu 'phel nas ni/ /khyed la dad pa skye mi gsha'/ /ming thos a 'am dran pa yis/ /
49b6(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyi sdig pa dbang med 'phrog /bdag don khyed kyi spangs pa de/ /bden par bdag la gsung bar zhu/ /khyed ni bden par gsung ldan ma/ /snying rje che ba'i sman pa yis/ /nad pa ma shi bar du ni/ /sman gyis phan 'dod che ru byed/ /sgyu ma ser sna nga
49b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal sogs/ /ngan pa de rnams kyis khyer nas/ /re mos khyer bas dal skabs med/ /gnas pa'i spyi nor rnga mo bzhin/ /skad cig dal ba med pas ni/ /sgrol ma'i zhabs kyi pad+ma la/ /bdag gis mchod skabs ma rnyed do/ /des ni yi ge du chag
50a1(rgyud 'grel): 'don/ /de bton pas ni phan 'dogs re/ /dus mdza' rlung gi g.yas su 'khyil/ /des ni gtsugs pa'i chu rlabs 'byung/ /g.yo zhing 'gul ba'i rol pas 'khrug /de rgyab dba' rlabs 'gram du ni/ /brdabs pas sgra grags skad
50a2(rgyud 'grel): mdangs can/ /'jigs byed rgya mtsho de las ni/ /gru chag nub pa'i skabs de la/ /snying rje du skad drag po bton/ /skad cig dran med bems por gyur/ /lha mo khyod la bstod pa yis/ /bde bar rgya mtsho phar bsgral lo/ /sprin nag skor zhing du ba'i nang/ /de
50a3(rgyud 'grel): la me stag can gyi me/ /me lce cher 'bad khyim du ni/ /dal nas mal du nyal ba'i mis/ /khyed la rab btud thal mo sbyar/ /skad cig gis ni glog byung nas/ /myur bar sprin char gyis ni bskor/ /smo byed glang chen 'gram gnyis la/ /'dzag pa'i chu la
50a4(rgyud 'grel): reg nas ni/ /bung ba'i phreng ba bzhin du thal/ /de rnams kyis ni hUM sgra sgrogs/ /sgra de thos nas zhe sdang las/ /glang chen 'thab du byung mno nas/ /khros nas mche bas mi bteg nas/ /'od li la ni bsdad pa bzhin/ /khyed dren tsam gyis 'chi ba
50a5(rgyud 'grel): bzlog /phar log brgal nas rin chen rnyed/ /de steng mkhar du bsdad du phyin/ /mi med stong pa nags gseb du/ /shin tu rno ba'i mtshon rnams kyis/ /brgyab nas yod pa mi ro'i mgo/ tri shU la la gsad ro mang/ /de 'dra nags gseb phyin tsa na/ /
50a6(rgyud 'grel): ral gri phul dang gzung nas ni/ /mda' gzhu bkang nas byung ba rnams/ /zur mig lta zhing khros nas byung/ /rgol nas brdeg du byung tsam na/ /khyed bsams skyo med snya bus bris/ /khyed ming gsal por bris ma thag /dpal ldan khyim du bsdad
50a7(rgyud 'grel): phyin no/ /rkang pa sor mo rab rno bas/ /rdo rje lta bus rab tu brkos/ /smyo byed glang chen mgo khrag byung/ /'jigs byed seng+ge byung tsam na/ /khyed bos bstong la brjod pa yis/ /bred nas seng+ge log nas thal/ /dul 'khyil ba 'jigs ba'i gzugs/ /
50b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed gdengs byed shin tu 'bar/ /rtag tu phung byed kha gdengs pa/ /lce chen ston pa sbrul khro ba/ /gshin rje'i zhags pas bskyigs pa'i mi/ /sdig pa'i dbang gis de ltar byung/ /de dus khyed kyi yon tan bsgrags/ /gus par dad par khyed
50b2(rgyud 'grel): la byas/ /sgrub de utpal phreng bar gyur/ /me tog mchod pa'i mi nges thob/ /dpon gyis mig mtshams mgul dogs kyis/ /des bred dmag dpon rim pa yis/ /thag pas bskyigs nas skra nas drung/ /rtsub mos bkal nas khrid tsam na
50b3(rgyud 'grel): khol po de ni na tsha che/ /ca tse smra ba gtong 'dod nas/ /nye ba gnyen rnams kyis ni bor/ /ltogs nas skom nas mchu skams pa/ /sdug bsngal mdza' med byung tsam na/ /gang gi sgrol ma'i zhabs la skyabs/ /skad cig gis ni grol nas thar/ /sgyu ma
50b4(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'i gzugs mi legs/ /mi ro'i rgyu ma bus pa des/ /phreng ba mang bas ske la btags/ /sus kyang dgag du mi nus pa/ /de byung dus su khyod kyis bsngags/ /de brjod tsam gyis sdig pa dag /srin po'i dran pa med tsam na/ /de rnams kyis
50b5(rgyud 'grel): ni srung bar byed/ /'brug byung ba yi sprin gyi gzugs/ /nga rgyal 'jigs pa rtsang po gsum/ /des ni mun pa gnag pa la/ /glog bzhin mtshan cha snang ba yis/ /mda' yi char pa byung tsam na/ /'thab pa'i dus su bskor nas bkag /shin tu
50b6(rgyud 'grel): stobs che dgra rnams kyis/ /khro zhing brdeg tu byung tsam na/ /sgrol ma khyed kyis stobs byin pas/ /dpa' bo gcig gis de rnams bcom/ /ras ris rnams ni rang dbang byas/ /sdig pas gang ba mdze po'i gzugs/ /lus po skrangs nas
50b7(rgyud 'grel): rnag dad khrag/ chu ser de rnams 'dzag pa ni/ /rtsa sha lpags pa phug pa nas/ /'bu rnams kyis ni zos pa na/ /sgrol ma khyed kyi zhabs brten nas/ /rtag tu khyed la mos gus byas/ /mos gus de dang sman du gyur/ /gser gyi kha dog lus
51a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas/ /pad+ma dkar po rgyas pa'i spyan/ /des ni gzugs bzang lus thob bo/ /slob dpon rnams kyis bka' de la/ /rna ba snod du ma rung bas/ /thos pa'i nor ni phongs par gyur/ /bshes gnyen gser du lkugs pa de/ /khyod
51a2(rgyud 'grel): la mos gus bstod bgyis pas/ /gsung ldan seng khri 'phrog par byed/ /de 'phrogs pa yang rgyal po'i mdun/ /rgyan cha sna tshogs btags nas ni/ /gsung gi dbang phyug seng khri sdod/ /sa la nyal bas rdul mas khengs/ /lus kyi kha dog du bar gyur/ /dug
51a3(rgyud 'grel): po gos kyi lus ma khyab/ /rtag tu shig dang sro ma gsod/ /gzhan gyi mdun du phor gog 'dzin/ /rtag tu slongs mo byed pa de/ /sgrol ma khyed la skyabs tsam na/ /nges par mdzes ma rgod mas ni/ /rnga yab mdzes pas g.yab par byed/ /stobs chen glang po che
51a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis/ /bdag por gyur nas gdugs gcig pa/ /ras ris tsam gyis rgyal por gyur/ /gzhan g.yog las dang yon tan dang/ /tshong dang thabs kyis nor tshol ba/ /tshe snga ma yis dge ba'i nor/ /ji ltar byas kyang nor med pa/ /su la bslabs kyang rnyed pa
51a5(rgyud 'grel): med/ kyi ma khyed la bslangs tsam na/ /sa gseb du ni nor rnyed nas/ /mi de sdug por gyur par byung/ /'tsho ba med pas ngo tsha che/ /gos med pas ni chud mas brgal/ /phongs pa yin pas gnyen gyis por/ /ster dgos mno nas thag rings su/ /kye ma
51a6(rgyud 'grel): med/ /kyi ma khyed la bslangs tsam na/ /sa gseb du ni nor rnyed nas/ /mi de sdug por gyur par byung/ /'tsho ba med pas ngo tsha che/ /gos med pas ni chud mas brgal/ /phongs pa yin pas gnyen gyis por/ /ster dgos mno nas thag rings su/ /kye ma
51a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma khyed la ni/ /rang gi sdug bsngal bstan cam na/ /rta rnams rmig pa sa la brko/ /de brkos sa yang khyim bskor nas/ /rang yid 'ong ba rgyal po'i khab/ /khyim der gnyid ni log pha las/ /mdzes ma rnams kyi lag brgyan grag /des ni gnyid log sad
51a8(rgyud 'grel): pa rnyed/ /phyogs bcur gyur pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /shin tu 'od zer ldan pa dag /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bud med dang/ /mche ba drug yod glang po che/ /rma bya'i ske yi kha dog ldan/ /de ltar sngo ba rta bzangs dang/ /rin po che ni nyi ma'i 'od/ /dri ma med pa'i gter
51b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis bkang/ /dmag gi dpa' bo mang ba dang/ /sgrol ma khyed kyis bka' drin gyis/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur/ /ma la ya yi ldum ra ru/ /nor bu rin po che yi rdo/ /de la tsan dan la sogs bskus/ /lha mo rnams kyang 'tshog sa byas/ /'gron sar mchod pa byas pa bzhin/ /
51b2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu chags nas rtsed mo brtses/ /sgrol ma khyod kyi rig pa grub/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i lha dbang po'i/ /ral gri 'od zer ljang gus ni/ /lag bzang de la phog pa de/ /yang nas yang du gsor byed pa/ /gzugs bzang lta ni thob par 'gyur/ /mu tig phreng bas mdzes par
51b3(rgyud 'grel): btags/ /de btags nu ma'i bar du byung/ /rna bar utpal btags pa de/ /mi dang gang zag 'gram pa 'dra/ /thor tshugs manda ra ba btags/ /dri zhim bung bas bor ma nus/ /rked par g.yer kha mjes par btags/ /zhabs gnyis legs pa de la ni/ /sil sil
51b4(rgyud 'grel): sgra dang g.yer kha btags/ /sgrol ma khyed la bslabs tsam na/ /'dod pa'i lha la dga' ba tsam/ /de phrad lha mo bsnyen bkur byed/ /rdzing 'gram rin po che yis bskor/ /gser gyi pad+ma de la ni/ /ge sar rdo rje pha lam 'bar/ /pa ra dzA ga'i shing de ni/ /cung zad
51b5(rgyud 'grel): bkug pa dri zhim dmar/ /dres na bla re bzhin du khyab/ /tam bu ra dang rnga la sogs/ /lha rnams kyis ni snyan par bsgrags/ /sgrol ma khyod kyis bka' drin gyis/ /lha yi ldum rar yun rings rtses/ /bde ba shin tu nyams su myong/ /ga pur dang ni ka ko la/ /a ka ru dang
51b6(rgyud 'grel): spos dang dri/ /de rnams btags nas chur bsres pas/ /dri zhim chu rnams kyis ni brdeg /lha mo'i nu ma gnyis kyi bar/ /lha yi gtsang po chu mgyogs des/ /phar rdog tshur rdeg rtsed mo byed/ /lha mo mdzes pa de rnams dang/ /khyod kyi bka' drin bsod nams
51b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /lha yul du naM rtsed mo myong/ /mtho ris gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis/ /gus pas bka' ni spyi bos len/ /de len phyag ni byas nas su/ /glang po che la zhon pa la/ /rgyan cha btags pa'i gas ji des/ /lag pa gnyis la gdub bu btags/ /des ni
52a1(rgyud 'grel): lda li bsgyings tsam na/ /bkag mi nus pa ba spu ldang/ /rdo rje pha lam lag brgyan btags/ /khyed kyi sbyin gyis gzigs tsam na/ /lha yi dbang po brgya byin thob/ /lha yi sa ris bsrung ba byed/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa de la ni/ /rin chen me tog
52a2(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor gnas/ /nam mkha' dpal gyi bla res khyab/ /nyi ma shar ka'i 'od 'dra ba/ /des ni 'jig rten gsum po bkang/ /g.yon bskum g.yas brkyang zhabs gcig gis/ /de mnan bkug pa tshangs pa dang/ /dbang phyug chen po khyab 'jug go /khyed kyi sku ni bsgoms
52a3(rgyud 'grel): bgyis pas/ /srid pa'i 'jigs pa phyis mi 'byung/ /skye ba len pa chad nas yong/ /kha cig gis ni 'di ltar mthong/ /nags tshal phyag gis mtshon chas bzung/ /shin tu 'jigs pa stobs po che/ /nam mkha' khyab par lag gdung bu/ /de rnams 'jigs che
52a4(rgyud 'grel): sprul du mthong/ /kye ma'o khros nas skrag par byed/ /rgod pa'i sgra ni shin tu 'jigs/ /ma rungs pa yi spyod pa byed/ /ro langs ting ting shag na brdung/ /'jigs chen rtsed mo sgra chen skrag /kha cig gis ni mthong ba la/ /sgrol ma'i ba spu re re las/ /'jig rten pa
52a5(rgyud 'grel): de 'tsho bar byed/ /bde bar gnas pa tshangs pa dang/ /lha yi dbang po brgya byin dang/ /dbang phyug chen po klu la sogs/ /lha dang mi dang grub thob dang/ /dri za gnod sbyin sprul rnams dang/ /phyogs su rgyu ba'i 'khro lo yang/ /tha med bde gshegs khyim der gnas/ /
52a6(rgyud 'grel): kye ma rab tu rdzu 'phrul che/ /'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa/ /kye ma 'gul ni 'gul gnas po/ /sna tshogs lha med dngos po ni/ /kye ma sgrol ma khyed yin no/ /kha cig gis ni mthong ba la/ /rgya skyegs dang ni sin du ra/ /dkar dmar kha dog nyi ma
52a7(rgyud 'grel): ltar/ /dpal ldan in+d+ra nI la 'dra/ /kha cig gis ni mthong pa la/ /'o ma'i rgya mtsho drubs dkar 'dra/ /kha cig gis ni gser 'dra mdog /khyed kyi gzugs ni sna tshogs mthong/ /shel dang 'dra bar gang 'dod gzugs/ /ye shes mar me thams cad
52b1(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen/ /des ni thams cad gsal bar mthong/ /de nyid mkhyen pa dbang po gcig /nges par khyod kyi yon tan ni/ /grangs las thams cad mkhyen pas shes/ /yang na de yis sras kyis mkhyen/ /bdag gis kha gdangs byas nas ni/ /bya rog kho 'dra'i sgra dang na?
52b2(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal tshad pas byas tsam na/ /de skyes na tsha byung tsam na/ /bdag gis pho rog smra bzhin bton/ /gzhan gyi sems la gzhad gang rgyu/ /bdag gis zhus pa'i don 'di ni/ /ma zhus gong du lhag par mkhyen/ /khyed kyi mkhyen pa de la ni/ /bdag gis zhu ba don
52b3(rgyud 'grel): med gleng/ /'o na'ang rang sems dga' pa'i don/ /nye ba'i gnyen gyi mdun du ni/ /dug dag skyugs pa smras pa bzhin/ /sdug bsngal don der shes kyang ni/ /rang snying yang zhing bde ba bzhin/ /phan 'dogs dga' ba rgya mtsho nyid/ /rab tu gal ba zla ba'i cha/ /kye ma
52b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzes mas gzigs par zhu/ /gdams dag ye shes gnang bar zhu/ /snying che chen me khyod nyid kyis/ /mun nag sems ni gsal bar mdzod/ /khyed kyi bston pa'i chu nges ni/ /bdag gi sems ni gtsang bar bkrus/ /pan nas byung sa gcig rnyed do/ /bstod pa
52b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dis ni 'gro ba'i don/ /'bras bu thob pa yod par mthong/ /rab tu bstod pa'i yon tan cha/ /bdag gis bsod nams bshad mi shes/ /bsod nams de yi stobs kyis ni/ /'jig rten pa kun don grub nas/ /grol ba'i bde ba myong bar shog /spyan ras
52b6(rgyud 'grel): gzigs kyi zhabs kyi mthil/ /de yi mtshan ma bkra shis kyis/ /de dkang yod pa de la ni/ /bde gshags sras kyi sa ris yin/ /bde nas bde ru 'gro ba kun/ /myur bar song nas bde bar sheg /me tog phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa/ /slob dpon thams
52b7(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta zla ba gzhon nus par 'gyur mdzad pa'o// //lha mo sgrol ma'i gsol 'debs kyi bstod pa bzhugs// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ de bi tA ra ku bu kya der sha nA ma
53a1(rgyud 'grel): sto tra/ bod skad du/ /lha mo sgrol ma la smre sngags kyi gsol ba 'debs ba zhes bya ba'i bstod pa/ /rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal 'jig rten kun sgrol ma/ /phyag 'tshal skyabs med 'phags
53a2(rgyud 'grel): ma kun khyab ma/ /phyag 'tshal yang yang dran pas rjes 'dzin ma/ /de ring da lta mgon med bdag la skyabs/ /khyod sngon skyob ro rnam gzigs spyan chab las/ /gang 'khrungs de che de ma thag 'di skad/ /srid gnas gang su 'jigs pas 'jigs 'gyur yod/
53a3(rgyud 'grel): de kun ngas skyabs zhes gsungs dam bca' dgongs/ /nam mkha' thugs zab mkha' 'dra yis/ /mdog 'chad 'gro ba rjes brtse ma/ /srid gnas 'gro ba lag 'dzin par/ /zhal bzhes slu bar ma mdzed cig /khyod nyid rig 'dzin lha tshogs nang/ /zag med
53a4(rgyud 'grel): dga' bdes rnam rol bgyid/ /khyod 'bangs bu ni me nang bsreg /kye kye thogs med mkhyen ldan gzigs/ /bdag rang gis ni nongs bgyis nas/ /me chu dgra sogs 'jigs gyur pa'ang/ /gal te khyod sku rjes dran gyur/ /skyabs mdzad lags na bdag
53a5(rgyud 'grel): ci yin/ /nyid phyag mchod sbyin bdud rtsi yi/ /rgyun 'bebs yi dgags 'bum phrag kyang/ /cig car tshim bgyid kho bo mes/ /lus zhu thigs pa 'bebs ma lags/ /yid 'ong phyag 'tshan utpal rtsi/ /mngar bsil grib ma bsil ldan pas/ /cung zad
53a6(rgyud 'grel): reg na'ang gdung sel ma/ /gus ldan bu bdag nyug mi mdzad/ /thugs rjes brkyang ba'i zhabs g.yas kyis/ /mthe bong rgyun bzang thur 'bebs mas/ /ngan 'gro'i gnas gsum tshim ma mdzad na/ /phongs pa bdag cag gyi nar dor/ /ting 'dzin g.yon
53a7(rgyud 'grel): bskum skyil krung gis/ /gar gyis sa gsum bde mdzad ma/ /sbrang bu mer bcug kho bo lta/ /gar stags rlung gis cis mi skyod/ /'dzum zhal dgyes mas gang gzigs na/ /phag sdig gdol ba mdze can yang/ /lha gzugs sdug mdzes sgyur spyod na/ /kho
53b1(rgyud 'grel): bo gcig spyon yul ma gyur/ /sgeg ldem 'gying mdzes gzi 'od ldan/ /khyod sku sus mthong de don bsgrub/ /don gnyer rtse gcig rjes slob bu/ /bdag la nyid gzigs ston min nam/ /khyod spyan utpal dkyus ring gis/ /zur gzugs 'dod pa'i lha 'drar
53b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /rtag tu nyid spyan mdun gnas dag /ji ltar snang yang mkhyen ma lags/ /lha snyan mnga' ma sgra kun gyi/ /rjes zhugs yul dus kun rig ma/ /kho bo nyams thag nga ros 'bod/ /'brug sgra brag ri ltar gyur gyis/ /skyob ma lha'i shangs dag pas
53b3(rgyud 'grel): gang+gA'i bye brgal rwi rab bsrung/ /bdag 'dir mes tshig sha tshil gsur/ /rgya chen phyogs khyab tshor ma lags/ /thub chen ma cig zla ba'i ljags/ /bung ba'i mchu rtse ro mkhyen na/ /seng+ge 'phrog byed mchod sbyin rgyur/ /ro bro ba la ljags rmongs srid/ /rdo rje'i
53b4(rgyud 'grel): lus mnga' reg mkhyen ma/ /sdig rgyal khros pas me lha mchod/ /mi bzad reg byed cis mi reg /phyogs dus rnam kun thogs med par/ /ma chags ma 'dres ci dga' yang/ /mkhyen ma de ring skal ngag bdag /gnas skabs 'di 'drar gyur
53b5(rgyud 'grel): ma dgongs/ /gang zhig rang sdig rang spyod dam/ /gzhan stobs gzhan dbang gyur de yang/ /thabs stobs brgya mnga' khyod skyabs mdzad/ /bdag 'dir nongs pa gang mchis grang/ /gcig tu gzhan la phan zhugs pas/ /mi ni brgya rtsa brgyad zhugs
53b6(rgyud 'grel): btsal/ /de dbus kho bo khyod 'bangs sreg /kye ma yum gcig bdag yar che/ /sdon las 'bras bu rjes gcod pa'i/ /gnas gyur de dang de las kyang/ /khyod thugs gsung dang sku 'jig bgyid/ /de las gzhan bdag nyid cir dgongs/ /kyi
53b7(rgyud 'grel): tud khyod lha zhabs ba de drung/ /bsil ba'i gnas nas 'bar ba'i mes/ /mi brtson ji bzhin dmyal mar da tshod/ /'di ci su yi khur lags gsung/ /de bas mgon med mgon gcig ma/ /khyod thabs thugs rje thogs med de/ /bdag dang 'gro
54a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ci dga' yang/ /mdzad min mdzad srid khyed zhus pas/ /'on kyang kho bo 'dir tshig pas/ /lus can kun gyi zug rdu dang/ /nyon mongs sdig las cig gyur cig /da ni su la re bar bya/ /kha che'i slob dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i
54a2(rgyud 'grel): bshes gnyen zhes bya ba/ /mi brgya dang bdun gyis bskor ba la/ /tsan dan gyi mes bsregs pa'i tshe/ /nyid kyi yi daM gyi lha rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la smre sngags kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa dang/ /skad cig yud tsam thang
54a3(rgyud 'grel): cig pa/ /'phags ma'i phyag nas char gyi rgyan gnya' shing tsam bab nas/ /mtsho nang gi pad+ma ltar gyur to zhes grag go /paN+Di ta shAkya sh+rI dang lots+tsha ba byams pas bsgyur ba rdzogs so// //sgrol ma dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa/ /
54a4(rgyud 'grel): log tog ma rig gnyid spangs shing/ /blo mchog shes bya kun la khyab/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i mchog brnyes ma/ /sgrol ma sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bde chen zhi ba mya ngan 'das/ /dam pa'i chos mchog yi ge bcu/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu yi chu/ /sgrol
54a5(rgyud 'grel): ma dam chos khyod phyag 'tshal/ /dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba yis/ /'dus pa'i ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ /sgrol ma dge 'dun khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sgrol ma dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa/ /rgya
54a6(rgyud 'grel): gar gyi mkhan po ngA po ka ra shTi dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas dang/ /bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas bi kra ma sh+rI la'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ srag d+ha ra sA d+ha maM
54a7(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ me tog phreng 'dzin gyi sgrub pa'i thabs/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha dang lha min nor lha'i cod pan ston ka'i nyi 'od 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis zhabs kyi rdul la reg /rnyog med gzigs pa'i shes rang mi ka ni snying rje'i rlan
54b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis rab tu gang zhing nyon mongs dra ba gcod/ /rmongs pa'i mthu yis srid pa'i mtsho chen mi zad skye 'chi'i rba brgal drag pos kun nas g.yengs gyur pa/ /skyob pa'i gzings chen dri med gzugs mdzes dpal gyi snying po me tog phreng 'dzin de la bdag
54b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig spros bral mkha' ltar dag pa'i dbyings su ro gcig pa/ /bsam gtan sprin med a sogs yi ges snying kar rab brgyan cing/ /gus pa'i sbyor bas sna tshogs mthu ldan yon tan rin chen gter/ /drang srong tshe 'dzin bla ma'i
54b3(rgyud 'grel): gsung las bdag gis 'dir brjod bya/ /rab tu zhi la dga' ba'i bden 'dzin nags tshal lam/ /g.yeng ba'i rdul bral phug gam ljon shing dur khrod mchog /chu 'gram dbyen pa'i sa phyogs rang bzhin nyams dga' bar/ /chu gtsang spos kyi chag
54b4(rgyud 'grel): chag me tog dri zhim gtor/ /rgyal ba'i sku gzugs dam chos rin chen bzhugs pa dang/ /me tog gdug spos snang ba dri dang zhal zas mchog /rgyal sras yum dang dkyil 'khor mchod phyir legs bzhag bya/ /ri dags 'gan 'dzi sngon po
54b5(rgyud 'grel): legs par btags gyur pa'i/ /stan la 'dug nas bsam gtan bdag gis bsgom par bya/ /thog mar 'od gsal rten 'brel bden stong mi g.yo ba/ /gang zhig shar bas spyod pa'i dus na yul rnams dang/ /dbang po'i tshogs dag rtog bral
54b6(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis kun tu nub/ /rtog med rtog bral rdo rje'i mchog 'dzin kun tu khyab/ /ji bzhin rtog pa'i mdza' yas rang sems sa bon mchog /zla 'od dkar mdzes tAM las phyogs bcu nam mkha' i mthar/ /shin tu rno ba'i 'od zer chen pos khams gsum gyi
54b7(rgyud 'grel): mun ba'i tshogs bcom rgyal ba sras rnams nam mkha' la/ /bzhugs par bltas la bdag yid rtse gcig dri med kyi/ /gang zhig sna tshogs ro gcig dbang po'i gzhu 'dra pa/ /nyon mongs rdul bral zhi bde sprol bde 'gro zhing/ /ye shes rgyun
55a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bab rgyal ba'i sku mdzes padmo la/ /gus pa'i khur gyis mgrin pa smad nas bdag phyag 'tshal/ /kha dog sna tshogs dri zhim dbyibs mdzes me tog dang/ bdug spos a ka ru dang sbrul gyi snying po dang/ /snod mdzes rin chen
55a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma snang ba dril bcas dang/ /chu gtsang dri zhim snying po sbyar ba bdag med dang/ mdog bzang ro brgya ldan pa'i zhal zas mang po rnams/ /gus bcas yid 'ong rgyal sras khyed la 'bul lags kyis/ /sems can tshogs rnams srid pa'i
55a3(rgyud 'grel): gdung bzhi bar mdzod/ /oM badzra buShpa A(rgyud 'grel): hUM badzra b+hu ba A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra A lo ka A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra gan d+he A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra nai be dya AhUM/ gnod pa byed rnams dge ba'i phyogs la snyams pa dang/ /sdig pa'i gzhir gyur bsten du mi rung ji
55a4(rgyud 'grel): snyed? las/ /dug gi bsgregs pa sems gdung gyur pa bdag sogs kyi/ /'phra rgyas tshon chen zag pa'i tshang tshar zad par mdzod/ /gang zhig rgyal sras thub pa'i 'od tshogs mdzes pa'i tshal/ /'bras bu smin pa'i ljid kyi zug rdu gnon mdzad cing/ /
55a5(rgyud 'grel): snying? rje'i rgyun gyis nyon mongs tha ba brlan mdzad pa/ /dregs pa'i rdul phral skyob pa'i mgon la skyabs su mchi/ /yang dag lam bral lta ba'i dug gis myos gyur cing/ /nyon mongs mtshe chen brgal dka' i ngogs su ltung ba rnams/ /shes rab
55a6(rgyud 'grel): gzings chan snying rje'i cha go? mi 'gyur mchog /dri med yid 'ong zla ba'i mdangs gsal thob par bgyi/ /rab tu zab pa'i dka' thub dpal gyi 'bar ba dang/ /nyon mongs chags bral byams pa snying rje dga' ba dang/ /btang snyoms yid brten
55a7(rgyud 'grel): rim gro byed pa'i bde ba mchog /khams dang dbang po la sogs mkha' ltar ro gcig bde/ /bde gshegs byed pa sgyu ma'i yon tan dpag med rnams/ /srid gsum 'gro ba dbang pe'i dri ma sbyor byed pa/ /rab dga' sems kyi grub chen
55b1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i dbyings su 'gyur/ /nyi zla'i sbyor bas mun pa zad 'gyur grod mchog lam/ /bdud rtsi sgron me mu gter yid bzhin rin po che/ /rdul med rdul bral ye shes dbang phyug phyag rgya can/ /ye shes mthar son sna tshogs lus can kun ston pa/ /ting 'dzin
55b2(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i lus can 'phags ma thob par shog /de nas byams pa snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms bsgom/ /gdong nas sems ni ma skyes rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba/ /nges don bdud rtsi nam mkha' las byung dag pa bsten/ /rtog pa rgyun chad sems nyid de nying
55b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ma yin/ /chu tshod thun dang dbyug gu skad cig rim pa med/ /mi 'jigs sgro skur mi rtsol rgyal sras thu po ste/ /gdod nas ma skyes chos rnams byed pa thig le yin/ /spros bral chos nyid yang dag nyid ni snang bas dben/ /bskyed rdzogs theg pa'i
55b4(rgyud 'grel): mdza' bral rtog med bde chen po/ /oM shA n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ke nyaM haM/ de nas snying rje'i shugs kyis rab tu bskul gyur nas/ /rang snying paM las sna tshogs pad+ma de ste dbus:/ /lte ba zla bas brgyan cing dbyangs dang gsal byed kyis/ /kun
55b5(rgyud 'grel): nas bskor ba'i tAM las phyogs bcur 'od tshogs 'phros/ /'gro ba'i don byas tshur la bsdus nas tAM la thim/ /de rnams skad cig nyid la sgrol ma'i sku lngar gyur/ /sngon mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi stag gi gos gyon ma/ /gri gug thod pa ral
55b6(rgyud 'grel): gri sdigs mdzub phyag rgya can/ /ser mo zhal gsum phyag drug g.yas sngon g.yon pa dmar/ /ral gri dgra sta mda' dang zhags pa gzhu dang dung/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi brtsod kyi kha dog sna tshogs brgyan/ /mi 'jigs mda' dang gzhu dang
55b7(rgyud 'grel): u tpa la dmar po ba snams/ /sku mdog ljang ser chos kyi phyag rgyas thugs ka ru/ /u tpa la sngo 'dzin shar sogs go rim ji bzhin/ /sna tshogs rgyan ldan phyogs rnams sreg cing gsang sngags bzlas/ /rnam snang la sogs rgyal
56a1(rgyud 'grel): po'i rigs kyis dbu brgyan pa/ /nu ma rgyas shing mi 'jigs phyag dang utpal 'dzin/ /brtson pa'i lus ldan zla ba'i mdangs can dbus su bsam/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re ni Sh+Tha dA ru Na pra ta ha ta tsat+tA
56a2(rgyud 'grel): ushma ha na swahA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re b+ha ya ha ra Na rak+Sha ba ra Na gu pa tiM bad+d+hyi sa ma he swAhA oM tA re tut+tA re an b+hi bra sa n+na ta a b+hi pra dz+nyA pra swa d+ha swAhA/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re b+ha ya ha ra Na hUM hUM hUM mri tyudaN+Da ya ma daN+Da ya ma dyu ta swAhA/ de ltar gsang sngags
56a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa'i 'od kyis phyogs khyab cing/ /gzungs kyi snying po mthu chen 'di yang brjod par bya/ /na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): AryA wa lo ki te shwa rA ya/ po d+hi satwa ya/ mahA satwA ya/ /ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ta dya thA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re sarb duShDa Na pra duSh+Ta Na ma ma kri
56a4(rgyud 'grel): te dzaM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ band+hA ya/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+Ta staM b+ha na tA re swAhA/ mang du bzlas la stos bskyed cho ga 'di ltar bsam/ /snod mdzes nang du 'bras sogs kha zas bzang po rnams/ /mngon par bshams pa'i cha gnyis
56a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma kha bye ba'i/ /phyag rgya bcing zhing sku gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog /lan bdun brjod pas kha dog dri ro phun sum tshogs/ /oM na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba bud+d+ha po d+hi sa twAnAM/ a pra hi ha ta sha sa nA nAM/ he he b+ha ga ba ti sa ma dA sarbA bud+d+ha A ba lo ki te/ i daM ba liM
56a6(rgyud 'grel): gritNa gri cNa/ /A mri ta kha kha khA hi khA? hi/ hiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+ha rmA NI A dya nu tpa n+na twA ta oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ a mri ta kha kha khA hi khA haM tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ band+ha pand+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gardza gardza/ bi spho Ta ya bi spho Ta ya/ sarbA bag+hi
56a7(rgyud 'grel): nAM bin ya/ ma hA ga na ji twa dzwi wi tAn+ta ka rA ya hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swAhA/ dpag med cha gcig rig pa'i lho mo rnams la 'bul/ /cha gcig nang du 'od zer spu gu bskyed byas te/ /nag po chen po tha kar dbyig gi snying po dang/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin
56b1(rgyud 'grel): grul bum tshogs rnams la/ /'dod pa'i gsol ba btab cing gus pas dbul bar bya/ /brgyad dang bcu bzhi bcu dang nyi shu gsum rnams la/ /zhi ba rgyas pa dbang dang mngon spyod sbyin sreg dbul/ /dkar dang ser dang dan ra dang nag po'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /
56b2(rgyud 'grel): rtse khru gcig dang gcig dang phyed dang rtse khru cig /zlum dang gru bzhi zla gam gru gsum bri bar bya/ /thams cad sor bzhi bskyed cing 'od phreng phyi rol bri/ /'khor lo dkar dang sna tshogs rdo rje ser po dang/ /pad+ma dmar dang gri gug sngon po thab rnams kyi/ /rim pa ji bzhin
56b3(rgyud 'grel): legs par nang du dgod par bya/ /mar dang zho dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi ka ra dang/ /'bras til gro dang nas sogs 'bru yi rnam pa dang/ /dur ba ku sha la sogs cho ga gzhan bzhin bsog /de las gzhan ba'i sreg rdzas khyab par mang po rnams/ /nye bar bshams la thog
56b4(rgyud 'grel): mar drang srong me lha mchog /zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog dkar po tshangs skud can/ /dbyug pa spyi blugs bgrang phreng mi 'jigs phyag rgya can/ /ral pa'i cod pan dka' thub lus ring zla ba'i steng/ /mngon par bskyed la dgang blugs bdun gyis rab tu mchod
56b5(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod cing se gol gtogs la gshegs par bsam/ /oM bah+ni rA dz+nyA pra tits+tsha swahA/ de nas rdzas dang me thab dri chab bzang pos bsang/ /oM pra k+ShA la bi shud+d+he swAhA/ mchod pa'i yo byad snying po'i sngags kyis dbul bar bya/ /mnyes par gyur nas smon
56b6(rgyud 'grel): lam btab cing mi snang bsgom/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dam tshig sems can skyong/ /ched du brjod la lus ngag yid gsum gyi/ /spyod lam khyad par can gyi gnas bya zhing/ /de las gzhan pa'i bsod nams mang po bsag /drang srong tshe 'dzin bla ma'i gsung snyan
56b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag la bsnyad gyur pa/ /byang chub myu gu'i phreng bas lus brgyan gzhan don 'brug sgra sgrogs/ /snying rje'i shugs kyis bsod nams sprin chen grangs pa'i char rgyun gyis/ /nyon mongs 'khrugs pa'i me chen rab tu bsil bar byed par shog /me tog phreng 'dzin
57a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs 'phags pa 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlab pa paN+Di ta chen po ta thA ga tA rak+Shi ta sa mdzad pa rdzogs so// //cog kru lo tsa ba mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o/ /bkra shis/ /
57a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shU n+ya tA b+ha pA na/ bod skad du/ stong pa nyid bsgom pa/ me tog phreng 'dzin sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtum mo e yi sbyor ba yis/ /lus kyi pa spu cher ldang zhing/ /yang dag lta ba goms gyur pa/ /de nyid chos rnams chos nyid brjod/ /de
57a3(rgyud 'grel): ltar sgrub pa'i thabs len mang du go nas par byas la bsnyen pa 'bum phrag bcu sngon du song ba'i gang zag gis ri yi phug la sogs pa dben pa'i gnas su stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i rim pa la 'jug par bya ste/ de yang skad cig gis bdag gi snying kar paM las pad+ma a
57a4(rgyud 'grel): las zla ba'i steng du dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi yi ges tAM ku mu ta dkar po lta bu la kun nas bskor ba las 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar byas te slar log pa tAM la thim par blta'o/ /de ma thag tu bdag nyid 'phags
57a5(rgyud 'grel): ma sgrol ma me tog phreng 'dzin zhes bya ba sku mdog dkar mo sten ka'i sbrin med pa'i zla ba lta bu lang tsho la bab pa'i cha lugs 'dzin pa/ /g.yas mchog sbyin pa g.yon pa u tpal sngon po kha du mar gyes pa 'dzin pa/ /rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis sku
57a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes par byas pa/ /pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du sku brtson pas bzhugs pa la sems bstang de bsgom par bya'o/ /de nyid 'od kyi rnam pa las/ /rang rig rnam pa gzhan med de/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi lam gnyis dgag /rang sems dbu ma'i lam du gzhug
57a7(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo las/ /bsam gtan gyis ni phyi rol dngos po btang nas sems de brtan par yang ni byed/ /srog dang rtsol bas nyi zla spangs nas mun pa can du srog rlung rgyu bar byed/ /'dzin pa'i yan lag gis ni thig ler dbugs kyi 'byung
57b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug dman par yid byas nas/ /rjes dran rang gi gzugs las mkha' la ri bong tshan bzhin 'od zer chen po 'byung/ /'od kyi phung po sku la thim/ /sku yang pad+ma zla ba la/ /de nyid dbyangs dang gsal byed la/ /de yang yi ge tAM la bsdu/ /tAM yang thig le nyid
57b2(rgyud 'grel): la thim/ /thig le stong pa'i yi ge med/ /de nyid sems kyi mtshan nyid do/ /rang sems 'dod nas ma skyes phyir/ /rtag sogs brtags pa gal 'jug /de nyid spros pas dbyen pa'i phyir/ /cung zad bsgoms kyang bdag gzhan gyi/ /rtog pa sna tshogs 'gag
57b3(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /rgyun tu bsgoms pa smos ci dgos/ /de ltar de bzhin nyid la blo/ /mnyam par gzhag pa'i mthu chen gyis/ /yang dang yang du goms byas nas/ /myur du byang chub reg par 'gyur/ /stong pa nyid bsgom pa rdzogs so// //
57b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ku driSh+Ti dU Sha Na/ bod skad du/ log par blta ba sun dbyung ba/ /khro gnyer can gyi sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag lta ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /sna tshogs las kyi rnam pa can/ /ji ltar me yis bud shing bzhin/ /khro gnyer can gyi
57b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba bri/ /re zhig sgrub pa'i thabs nas byung ba'i cho ga rnams dang bsnyen pa 'bum phrag bcus mthu thob par byas la/ /dur khrod la sogs pa shis pa'i gnas su skrad cig gis khro gnyer can sgrol ma sku mdog sngon mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma stag gi
57b6(rgyud 'grel): na bza' can rus pa'i phreng bcan sha lus rgyas pa spyan dmar zhing gdang ba/ /g.yas gnyis na gri gug dang ral gri/ /g.yon gnyis kyis thod pa dang sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba/ /pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du bsgoms la/ /de yi thugs ka'i tAM las 'od 'phros
57b7(rgyud 'grel): bsam dag pa'i las can gyi skyes bu la thim zhing bkug par bsams la/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu de ni Sh+Tha dA ru Na pra ti ha ha/ tsit+tA uSh+ma(rgyud 'grel): hA ni swAhA/ zhes pa'i gsang sngags bzlas shing/ /rkang gnyis kyi khrag dang/ rtsi nag pos 'khro lo rtsibs bcu ba?
58a1(rgyud 'grel): bris la dbus su gzugs brnyan dang/ rtsibs dang mu khyud la gsang sngags ming dang bcas ba bri bar bya'o/ /de nas yungs kar gyis brab cing gsang sngags bzlas de'i rjes la sbyin sreg dang/ gtor ma dang/ mchod pas khro gnyer
58a2(rgyud 'grel): can lha mo la mchod la tsher ma can gyi mes spra tshil dang 'khor lo bsros la dug ha si nag po'i shun pa 'am/ /rnga mo'i rgyus pas dkris pa sa bdag gam klu chen po'i gnas su bskyal bar bya'o/ /smyo dang dbugs ni rtseg pa dang/ /gyen du blta zhing rgyug par
58a3(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /lus po skem dang mig ser dang/ /lus la sha bkra me dbal 'byung/ /gzhan yang mdze dang shu ba dang/ /'brum bu bas ldags 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /tshe yi dus kyang byed par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba'i che ba yis/ /gnod sbyin mkha' 
58a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gros sems dkrugs shing/ /las kyi myu gu zang byed pa/ /khro gnyer can gyi spyod pa'o/ /lta ba ngan pa sun dbyung ba/ /rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ tso ra band+ha/ bod skad du/ /chom rku bcings pa/ mya ngan med pa'i sgril ma la phyag
58a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /glang chen stag dang mi rgod dang/ /chom rkun 'jigs pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ /rlung gi bung bas lus sbyong ba/ /mya ngan med pa'i sgrol ma mchod/ /de yang sgrub pa'i thabs nas ji ltar bshad pa'i cho gas 'phags ma'i tshogs yongs su mnyes par
58a6(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /nags tshal lam ri khrod la sogs pa gnas khyad par can du ri dags kyi pags pa'am/ /'gan dzi sngon po legs par btags pa la 'dug la/ byams pa dang snying rje chen po sngon du song bas bdag gi snying gar paM las pad+ma a las zla
58a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du tAM ser po de las phyogs bcur 'od 'phros 'phags ma dgyes pa dang sems can gyi don byas la slar bsdus pas tAM la thim pa dang bdag nyid mya ngan med pa'i sgrol ma sku mdog gser btso ma'i mdog 'dra ba rin po che
58b1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs kyi dbu rgyan cod pan dang ldan pa/ /zhal gsum phyag drug /g.yas sngo g.yon dmar ba/ /g.yas pas ral gri dang dgra sta dang mda'/ /g.yon pas zhags pa dang gzhu dang dung 'dzin par bsgoms la/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re b+ha ya ha ra Ne rak+Sha ba ra Ni gu ba
58b2(rgyud 'grel): ti badyI(rgyud 'grel): sh+ya ma he swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags bzla zhing stag pa'i shun lpags la gur gum dang gi baM gis 'khor lo rtsibs bdun pa bris pa la snying po gzungs dang bcas pa lte ba la sogs pa la ci rigs pa bris la/ /sbyin sreg dang gtor ma'i cho gas
58b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa/ sngags dang 'od zer gyi rang bzhin gyi 'khor lo gril la mgrin pa'am/ /dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas 'brog dgon pa la sogs pa nyam nga ba'i gnas su sgrol ma gsal bar bskyed la sngon du goms par byas pa'i rlung bsri zhing snying
58b4(rgyud 'grel): po dang gzungs bzla zhing bdag gis grib ma bzhin du g.yas su 'od zer can mya ngan med pa'i cha lugs/ /phag bdun gyis drangs pa'i shing rta la bskyon nas mi 'jigs kyi sgras brgyan pa dang/ g.yon logs na sdigs mdzub sgrol ma dmar mo zhal
58b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis ma g.yas pas sdigs mdzub/ g.yon Da ma ru'i sgra 'byin pa/ lus gos dang bral bas/ mi 'jigs pa'i dbyangs sgrogs shing gshegs par bsam mo/ /de nas bag tsha ba'i sa phyogs su thar pa dang me tog phreng 'dzin la sogs
58b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bstod pa bya'o/ /gcan zan khro bo mang pos gang ba yi/ /tshang tshing nags sam chom rkun 'du ba'i gnas/ /lam med nyam nga'i gnas su bdag lus pa/ /cho ga 'di nyid kyis ni yongs su grol/ /chom rkun bcing ba rdzogs so// //
58b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bi dyA bard+ha ni/ bod skad du/ rig pa bskyed pa/ rig byed sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig rmongs pas blo ldongs pa/ rig byed sgrol ma rig pa'i mchog /rgyal po khyim bdag mgu byed pa/ /blang phyir bdag gis bri bar bya/ /
59a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang sgrol ma'i rig pa mchog blang pa'i slad du bsnyen pa'i grangs tshad du son zhing sgrub thabs kyi cho ga blo 'dris pa'i rten gyi gang zag gis byams pa dang snying rje sngon du bskyang la skad cig gis rig byed sgrol ma sku mdog tshos
59a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po lta bu zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas kyi dang po mi 'jigs pa'i phyag dang/ gnyis pas mda' dang/ g.yon gyis rin po che'i gzhu dang/ g.yon gnyis pas utpal dmar po 'dzin pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ /pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la
59a3(rgyud 'grel): skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ de'i thugs kang paM las pad+ma/ a las zla ba'i steng du tAM dmar po byu ru'i mdog lta bu las/ phyogs bcur 'od 'phros tshur bsdus nas bdag gi kun tu rmongs pa'i tshogs thams cad zhi bar bsam zhing sems gtad la
59a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas skyo bar gyur na gang sngags rgyun mgal me'i 'khor lo lta bus sems sbyang snas yang ngo'i tshis brgyad kyi nyin par nas 'tshal dang gur gum dang 'gi bi rnams spyar la pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa gnyis bris la/ oM tA re tu t+tA re
59a5(rgyud 'grel): tu re a ni b+hi pradz+nyAM pra sA d+ha na/ a b+hi pra dz+nya pra sU d+ha swAhA/ zhes bzla zhing bdag dang 'khor lo phan tshun thim zhing snying po dang gzungs dgod/ 'khor lo gcig la dbyangs dang gsal byed bri bar bya'o/ /de nas bcwo lnga'i mtshan phyed la zla ba la mngon du phyogs
59a6(rgyud 'grel): bas mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang sbyin sreg dang gtor ma rnams phul la me long g.ya' yongs su dag pa bu ga med pa la sin d+hu ra dmar po gdal la gser ram zangs kyi thur mas 'khor lo ji lta ba bzhin du phyi nang du gnyis bris la snying po dang gzungs
59a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ phyi ma la dbyangs dang gsal byed bkod de cung zhig bzlas pa bya zhing mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod la 'khor la gnyis dril te mgul du gdags par bya/ /sin du ra legs par bsdus te dug lang ka wa ti'i sbu gur blugs la mchan
59b1(rgyud 'grel): khung g.yon par btags te thig le dmar po skra mtshan su bya zhing/ bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer du zhugs na rgyal po dang khyim bdag dad cing 'dun par 'gyur ro/ /sgra dang bstan bcos mang po dang/ /rol mo rgyu rtsal ji snyed dang/ /lha dang gnod sbyin bu mo
59b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /rig byed mthu yis 'dun par byed/ /rig pa bskyed pa rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ mri tyu ThA ki pa/ bod skad du/ 'chi ba bsu pa/ dpal sgrol ma chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrol ma ljangs ser cho ga yis/ /'chi bdag chad pa
59b3(rgyud 'grel): zhi mdzad cing/ /mkha' 'gro srin po'i gnod pa rnams/ /sgrol ma sgrol ma mchog yin no/ /re shig rmis ltas dang lus kyi rnam 'gyur la sogs pa 'chi pa'i rtags rnams dmigs shing/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed pa rnams kyi 'jigs
59b4(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po zhi bar bya pa'i phyir snying po'i grangs bgrangs shing ma yengs pa'i bsam gtan mang du goms pa'i rnal 'byor pas dben pa'i sa phyogs stan bde ba la 'dug ste lus kyi 'jug ba sngon du btang byams pa dang snying rje chen po sems can la bskyed
59b5(rgyud 'grel): la sgyu ma lta bu'i blo cung zhig goms par byas te skad cig gis dpal sgrol ma chen mo sku mdog ljang ser rin po che sna tshogs kyis sku legs par sgras pa/ phyag gnyis kyi thugs kar chos smra ba'i phyag rgyas utpal sngon po 'dzin pa/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng
59b6(rgyud 'grel): du skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ de'i thugs kar pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du tAM ljang ser de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas dus ma yin par tshe'i dus byed pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi bdag gis mthu med par byas la tshur la bsdus la sgyu ma lta
59b7(rgyud 'grel): bu'i blos sdug bsngal gyis nyen ba'i sems can rnams la dmigs shing snying po'i mchog 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re b+ha ya ha ra Ne hUM hUM hUM mri dyu danDa?  ya ma danDa ya ma d+hu na swAhA/ /zhes pa bzlas zhing/ gzungs dang sbyin sreg dang gtor
60a1(rgyud 'grel): ma dang mchod pa phu pa la bstod pa bya'o/ /de'i rjes la gro ga la gur kum gyis 'khor lo rtsibs bdun pa bris la che ge mo'i sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig la sogs pa spel la snying po dang gzungs dgod par bya'o/ /de nas rin po che
60a2(rgyud 'grel): 'am rdza sar pa ha spyar ram/ rwa 'am shing gi za ma tog gnang du 'khor lo dril la skud pa dmar pos snod lan mang du bcing/ dar ma ras dkar po'i na bza' g.yogs la dge 'dun gyi sde chen po'i gtsug lag khang gi shing ngam/ /mchod rten
60a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi shing la bcing la/ /dus khyad par can la mchod pa chen pos mchod cing sgom pa dang snying po dang gzungs dang bstod pa rnams brjod par bya'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma stobs mo che/ /khyed kyi gsang sngags rjes dran pas/ /'chi bdag gnod pa zhi
60a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas/ /zhabs kyi rdul la reg par shog /'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ paN+Di ta chen po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa 'chi ba bslu ba rdzogs so// //cog kru lo ce ba mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// //
60a5(rgyud 'grel): *?/ /'phags ma lha ma sgrol ma'i bstong ba bzhugs// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA ra de bi stotra sarba artha sA d+ha na nA ma sto tra rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba bstod pa'i rgyal po/
60a6(rgyud 'grel): mgon bo thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zla ba skar ma'i tshogs dang mkha' la mdzes/ /mgon po sems dpa' bskor cing 'gron nang mdzes/ /zla ba dri med gdung ba sel ba bzhin/ /mi
60a7(rgyud 'grel): shes kun spangs 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel/ /byang chub phyogs chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin rnam thar mang po can/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis brgyan pa la/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus rab tu brgyan/ /srung byed gsum
60b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ma 'dris dran gsum dang/ /mi 'jigs bzhi brnyes yongs su dag bzhi mnga' / /stobs bcu'i rtsal ldan skye la thugs rje che/ /bag chags kun bcom mi brnyes rnam kun bcom/ /rigs lnga nyon mongs lnga bcom ye shes lnga/ /sku lnga mngon par byang chub
60b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam nga brnyes/ /lam lnga sbyor mdzad sangs rgyas lnga'i sku/ /phung po lnga spangs zag zad mngon shes lnga/ /dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi snying po khyod/ /yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas rgyu yi mchog /chags sdang la bral 'gro ba'i don gyi phyar ri/ /cha lugs rnam pa
60b3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs 'dzin pa khyod/ /sna tshogs 'phrin las sku mdog ljang khu can/ /dbu la 'od dpag med pas rab tu brgyan/ /'khor lo sgyur pa'i rgyal po'i cha lugs can/ /'gro ba'i ded dpon sgrol ma khyod kyi sku/ /mdzes pa'i ral pa dbu rgyan cod pan dang/ /dar
60b4(rgyud 'grel): dpyangs zla tshes sna tshogs rdo rjes mdzes/ /rna rgyan mgul rgyan dpung rgyan gdu bu dang/ /ska rags zhabs gdub ba da'i smad dgris mdzes/ /rin chen nor bus spras pa'i do shal dang/ /dpung rgyan se mo dos ni shin tu brgyan/ /bcos bu'i ras dang dang don sna
60b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa'i/ /dar ding lha yi dar zab na bza' mnabs/ /pad+ma'i rigs ni pad+ma las 'khrugs can/ /sna tshogs pad+ma mchog gi gdan la bzhugs/ /chags sdang zhi sdang gti mug la sogs kyis/ /ma gos dpad+ma dmar po bzhin du dag/ /dpang po gshin rje chu/
60b6(rgyud 'grel): lha gnod spin dang/ /'byung po me lha rlung lha srin po dang/ /sa bdag steng gi lha tshogs ma lus rnams/ phyogs skyong 'gro don sprul mdzad khyod kyi sku /tshangs pa khyab 'dzug dbang phyug lha chen dang/ /drag po zhi ba u ma la sogs las/ /rgyal 'gyur lha
60b7(rgyud 'grel): yi lha ste sgrol ma khyod/ /khams gsum kun gyi dbang phyug chen por grags/ /thod pa mi 'chang thugs rje'i thod pa can/ /ral pa rnams spangs shin tu dga' bas mdzes/ /g.yang gzhi dang bral mtshan dang dpe byad spras/ /thal bas ma bskus byams pa
61a1(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa'i bdag /dbyug gu gsum spangs bslab pa gsum dang ldan/ /dur khrod gnas dor chos kyi dbyings su rol/ /rked phran cang te'u la sogs sgra spangs nas/ /gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cus chos kun sgrogs/ /tshangs skud
61a2(rgyud 'grel): mi bsnams mya ngan 'das pa'i sku/ /mtshan spyod spangs nas dus kun mnyam par spyod/ /log sred byung gdung ba'i dka' thub spangs/ /dam pa'i brtul zhugs ma lus rab tu ldan/ mtshon cha dor nas shes rab mtshon cha bsnams/ /zhe sdang rnams
61a3(rgyud 'grel): spangs sgrub pa'i rtsa rgyun gcod/ /phyogs 'dzin mi mnga' grub mdza' kun gyi bdag /chags pa mi mnga' kun la mkha' ltar spyod/ /mdza' spangs nam mkha' lta bur khyod kyi thugs/ /shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad khyod kyi sku/ /sgra dang
61a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod par snang ba thams cad gsung/ /sgrol ma chos kun sdus pa'i snying po can/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang mngon spyod dang/ /dgug dang dgar dang sde rangs bskrad pa dang/ /lkugs dang tshig 'phrog gzugs sgyur bsrung la sogs/ /dus
61a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum rgyal ba kun gyi 'phrin las can/ /sku yi dbang phyug gsung gi dbang phyug dang/ /thugs kyi dbang phyug 'dod yon dbang phyug ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul kun 'gro yon tan brgyad dang ldan/ /chos sku mkha' ltar dbyer med rtogs gyur kyang/ /gzugs
61a6(rgyud 'grel): sku 'ja' tshon lta bur 'gro la ston/ /ji srid dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag po mchog /sgrol ma 'gro ba 'khor ba'i gseb lam sgrol/ /gang gis dran na ngan song 'jigs pa dang/ /rgyal po rkun po me chus 'jigs pa dang/ /seng+ge stag sbrul srin
61a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'jigs las sgrol/ /'byung ba 'khrugs dang gdon gyis skyeng pa yi/ /srog 'phrog nad kyi bye brag ma lus dang/ /drang srong mkha' 'gro'i dmong gyur kun las sbrol/ /nor bu sngags dang sman sbyor 'dod pa bzhin/ /'gro la 'jig rten 'das pa'i
61b1(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub kun/ /mos pas dran pa rnams la stsol ba yin/ /rgyal srid 'dod pas g.yul ngor rgyal ba dang/ /longs spyod grags pa 'dod pa de dag dang/ /bkur ba'i dri ngas bral 'dod sbyong ba yin/ /gang gis bstod pas bde gshegs kun la bstod/ /dus gsum
61b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi skyed mdzad ma/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas ma lus khyod kyi sku/ /rje btsun sgrol ma yon tan phung po can/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug la sogs dang/ /drag po u ma ka ra sham la sogs/ /skul byed lu gu rgyud dang khro gnyer can/ /mA ma kI dang
61b3(rgyud 'grel): spyan dang gos dkar mo/ /'gro ba gang gis 'dul ba de don du/ /ji ltar khyad 'phags brjid pa'i cha lugs can/ /thabs tshul rnam pa mdza' yas ston pa'i sku/ /'gro ba'i skyabs mchog rje btsun sgrol ma mchog /spyi bor 'od pag med bzhugs phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs
61b4(rgyud 'grel): pa brgyad skyob sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /grags pa mdza' yas sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /'gro don sgrub pa sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /sdug bsngal nges sel sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /phyag stong spyan stong sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /mkha' ltar mdza' yas sgrol ma'i sku la
61b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dud/ /mtshan la dpes brgyan sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /zla 'dra'i yan lag sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /nyi ma ltar gsal sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /dus gsum 'gyur med sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /sa ltar rten 'gyur sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /chu ltar 'dzin mdzad
61b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /me ltar smin mdzad sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /rlung ltar rgyas mdzed sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /sman pa'i rgyal po sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /sman ltar nad 'joms sgrol ma'i skul 'dud/ /thugs rje'i chu rgyun sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /'dul ba'i
61b7(rgyud 'grel): thabs mkhas sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /sgeg kyang chags bral sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /thar pa'i lam ston sgrol ma'i sku la 'dud/ /stong nyid nam mkha' lta bu'i chos kyi sgra/ /'gro ba ma lus pa la nges sgrogs pas/ /mu stegs ri dgas sgrags mdzad seng+ge che/ /rje btsun
62a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi phyed rdo rje 'dzin pa'i zhags pa dang/ /chos sgrogs dud dang shes rab mnga' 'dzin dang/ /'dren pa'i lcags kyu yid 'od utpa la/ /snying rje gzhu dang lta ba'i sdigs mdzub mdzad/ /thugs kyi rnam par dag pa brda?
62a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul du/ /rdo rje la sogs rtags su byin brlabs pa'i/ /phyag brgyad mtshan ma brgyad kyis rab brgyan pa'i/ /rje btsun sgrol ma'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje sgrol ma rin chen sgrol ma dang/ /pad+ma'i sgrol ma las kyi sgrol ma dang/ /bdug pa'i sgrol ma me tog sgrol ma
62a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ar me'i sgrol ma dril bu'i sgrol ma dang/ /lcags kyu'i sgrol ma zhags pa'i sgrol ma dang/ /lcags sgrog sgrol ma dril bu'i sgrol ma dang/ /bcu gnyis 'khor la'i tshogs kyis rab bskor ba'i/ /rje btsun sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon po 'ong dpag med la
62a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag na pad+ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten dbang phyug khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don yod zhags pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khro rgyal rta mgrin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs pa brgyad skyob khyod la
62a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag stong spyan stong khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje bcu gcig zhal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang phyug chen po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje chos chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nyid don mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten dbang rab khyod la phyag
62a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje spyan rgyas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ral pa gcig ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mo khro gnyer can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje chen po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bud med sgyu 'phrul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ku ru ku le khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha
62a7(rgyud 'grel): mo gos dkar khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ /gang zhig sdom pa de bzung nas/ /sgrol ma'i sku gzugs spyan sngar ni/ /khrus byas dad pas rtsa gcig gis/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstong nas/ /gsang sngags bzlas brjod pa'i byas na
62b1(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun sgrol ma zhal bstan nas/ /gdud ba thams cad sel ba dang/ /dngos grub ma lus byin brlab 'gyur/ /zla ba yar ngo'i chos brgyad la/ /lci ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rje btsun sgrol ma mchod byas nas/ /bstod dang gsang sngags 'di bzlas na/ /mgon
62b2(rgyud 'grel): po bzhin du bdag 'gyur te/ sgrib pa rnams dang dral ba dang/ /dri bas skur bdag pa dang/ /rgyud gsum yon tan ma lus 'grub/ /rgyal po g.yul du 'jug pa'i tshe/ /spyi bor snying po 'di bcangs na/ /bstod dang gsang sngags 'di brjod na/ /dgra bo 'dod bzhan
62b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang du 'gyur/ /bud med gang zhig bud med kyi/ /dngos po las ni bral 'dod dang/ /'jig rten dgos pa mchog dang ni/ /'jig rten 'das pa grub 'dod pas/ /khrus byas gos dkar bgos nas ni/ /bsnyen gnas bsrung bar nges gnas ta/ /yar ngo'i tshes
62b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad mchod bstod bzlas/ /de dag the tsom med par 'grub/ /'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa/ don thams cad 'grub pa zhes pa/ bstod pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so// //slob dpon mA tri tsi Tas bstod pa'o// //'phags pa sgyu 'brul dra ba'i rim pa?
62b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ /A rA sA yA dzA la kra min pa tA re ga sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rim pas rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ /rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /re zhig dang por rnal 'byor pas yid dang rjes su
62b6(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa'i gnas su stan bde ba la 'dug la/ sems can thams cad la dmigs nas/ /byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la rang gi snying gang sna tshogs pad+ma'i stong du zla ba'i
62b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la yi ge tAM ma rka ta'i mdog can 'od zer lnga 'phro ba/ 'od zer gyi rtse mo las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pas nam mkha' gang bar bsgems la/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis go rims bzhin du/
63a1(rgyud 'grel): dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ gnas pa'i ngo bor gzhug par bya'e/ /bcug pa'i rjes la yi ge tAM las byung ba tUM gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang in+d+ra nI la'i 'od lta bu bsgoms la/ rdo rje de las rnam par snang mdzad
63a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' i lam ma lus ba kun tu khyab par spros la bsgom mo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang/ /rdo rje de nyid las byung ba'i me tog dang/ spos dang/ mar me dang/ lha bshos dang/ na bza' dang rgyan la sogs
63a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dag rgya che ba bsnams pa mdza' yas pas mchod nas/ de rnams kyi mdun du/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par
63a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas par byas la/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas lta ba sna tshogs pa'i dra bas bcings pa'i sems kyi rgyun la dmigs nas/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems bsgoms
63a5(rgyud 'grel): la sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra sA b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba 'di thams cad rang gi lus dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' i rang bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas sngags 'dis sngar bshad pa'i rdo rjer nga rgyal bya'o/ /oM badzra
63a6(rgyud 'grel): At+ma ko haM/ de nas yi ge hUM las rdo rje'i bdag nyid kha dog ser po ri sa gzhir bsgom mo/ /de nas steng du sna tshogs pad+ma la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ /de yi steng du yi ge tAs byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje/ /de las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma
63a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma'i ngo bor bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa nor bu ma rka ta'i mdog 'dra ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan can/ /rtsa ba'i zhal don yong grub pa'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa sems pa'i skyil mi krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /de
63b1(rgyud 'grel): la dbus ma'i zhal ni nor bu ma rka ta'i mdog can/ /g.yas pa nag po/ g.yon pa dkar po'o/ /g.yas pa'i phyag dang po mi 'jigs pa sbyin la/ /gnyis pa la rdo rje nag po/ gsum pa na mda''o/ /g.yon pa'i dang po sdigs mdzub mdzad pa/ gnyis pa la utpa la
63b2(rgyud 'grel): sngon po/ /gsum pa la gzhu bsnams pa'i/ /bspu'i khur bu re re nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyis nam mkha' gang ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas 'gro ba rnams kyi 'jigs pa thams cad sel ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma bsgoms la/ de nas phyin
63b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs par bya'o/ /de la spyi bo'i dbus su oM gyi ngo bo sku rdo rje'o/ /mgrin par A(rgyud 'grel): 'i ngo bo dmar pa gsung rdo rje'o/ /snying gar hUM gi ngo bo na ga po thugs rdo rje'o/ /brang la nor bu ma rka ta'i mdog can gyi yi ge tAM ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i
63b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs dpag tu med pa 'phro bar bsgoms la/ de nas sngags 'dis bzlas pa bya'o/ /oM tA re tutrtra? re tu re swAhA/ /bzlas pa byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sgrol la ji ltar nus pa tsi yod kyis mchod par bya'o/ /de la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das
63b5(rgyud 'grel): ma rje btsun sgrol ma sngar bshad pa'i rim pas so/ /de la shar gyi 'dab ma la/ /oM satwa badzri hUM/ lho'i 'dab ma la/ oM ratna badzri hUM/ nub kyi 'dab ma la/ oM d+hu rmA badzre hUM/ byang gi 'dab ma la oM ka rma badzri hUM/ me'i phyogs su oM mA khye badzri hUM/ bden bral gyi phyogs su
63b6(rgyud 'grel): oM d+hu pa badzra hUM/ rlung gi phyogs su oM gand+ha badzri hUM dbang ldan gyi phyogs su oM rA sa badzri hUM/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su/ oM badzra aM ku shi hUM/ oM badzra pA sha hUM/ oM badzra spro Ti hUM/ oM badzra a bi shi hUM/ bsgom pa dang bzlas pa byas la/ de nas gshegs su gsol
63b7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /bsam gtan las langs nas kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ mchod rten la sogs pa la nus pa ci yod kyis mtshar par bya'o/ /oM badzra arg+ha hUM/ oM badzra buShpa hUM/ oM badzra d+hU pa hUM/ oM badzra A lo ge hUM/ oM badzra bd+he hUM/ oM badzra a re hUM/
64a1(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga tA a nut+ta ra pu dza me g+ha pra sa ra sa mu dra hUM/ 'phags pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rim pas rje btsun ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma tA dza na dang/ lo tsa ba gzhon nu 'od kyis
64a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA re maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma sA d+ha nA/ /bos skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma dam pa'i zhabs kyi ni/ /pad+ma la
64a3(rgyud 'grel): gus phyag byas te/ /'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /man ngag rgyud la brten pa bri/ /bla ma la gus dad pa che/ /byang chub sems dpa' i snying rje che/ /rtog pa legs bar 'joms pa des/ /rje btsun mnyes byas man ngag ma nos/ /dang por dben zhing
64a4(rgyud 'grel): nyams dga' bar/ /nyer spyod yo byad rdzogs par bya/ /de nas byang chub sems bskyed la/ /phyag dang mchod dang gsol ba gdab/ /rjes su yi rang bsngo ba sogs/ /byas te tshang ba'i gnas bzhi bsgom/ /de nas gzung 'dzin brtan g.yo kun/ /stong par
64a5(rgyud 'grel): byas te sngags bzlas bya'o/ /oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+ha rma/ swa b+ha bo shu d+ho nya haM/ zhes pas stong par bya'o/ /de yi ngang las hUM bsams te/ re ba gur dang phyogs mtshams bcing/ /khro bo bcu yi srung 'khor bsgom/ /de steng e las chos 'byung
64a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /laM baM raM deM yaM las ni/ /sa chu me rlung dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de steng bruM las 'khor lo'o/ /der ni nA da babs pa las/ /bsgyur te gzhal yas khang bsam bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /ka ba brgyad mdzes rgyan ldan bsam/ /oM sarba
64a7(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta a ta la badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nang paM las pad+ma ni/ /'dab ma brgyad pa 'phar ma gnyis/ /dbus su A li kA li las/ /nyi zla ga'u ra bsam par bya/ /dbus su yi ge tAM ser bsam/ /de ltar kA li ar gyur pas/ /
64b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam sbyar de gnyis gyur par bsam/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rak+to badzra swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko haM zhes brjod par bya'o/ de ltar dbus kyi tAM las ni/ /shar gyi nyi ma'i bar du ni/ /yi ge oM gyi rnam par spros/ /lhor ni tA dang nub tu re/ /byang du rgyu yi yi ge spro/ /de nas sgo yi
64b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs dag tu/ /rA re tu re bzhi po spro/ /steng du tA dang re gnyis spro/ /'od zer 'phros pas sems can sbyangs/ /lhar byas sa bon thim pa las/ /rang rang sa bon gyis mtshan pa'i/ /rdo rje me tog phreng ba yis/ /mar me skong bu dung chos dang/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags
64b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrog dang/ /dril bu rnams su gyur par bsam/ /de las 'od 'phros sbyang bsdus la/ /lha mo rnams su bsam par bya'o/ /de la dbu su lha mo sgrol ma ni/ /phyag brgyad zhal bzhi kha dog ser/ /rgyan ldan mdangs sdug lang tshor ldan/ /mchen dang dpe byad bzang pos
64b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /g.yo zhing pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /rdo rje de bzhin zhags pa dang/ /mdung dang mda' ni g.yas na bsnams/ /rdo rje lcags kyu utpa la/ /gzhu dang sdigs mdzub g.yon pa na/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs/ /sa gsum dbang du sdud pa bsam
64b5(rgyud 'grel): de yi shar du me tog gi /sgrol ma dkar mo zhal gcig ma/ /phyag gnyis me tog phreng ba 'dzin/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis spras par bsam/ /lhor ni spos kyi sgrol ma ste/ /kha dog nag mo spos 'dzin ma/ /nub tu mar me'i sgrol ma ste/ /ser zhing mar me'i
64b6(rgyud 'grel): snod 'dzin ma/ /byang du dri yi sgrol ma ste/ /ljang gu dri yi dung chos bsnams/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas shar sgor sgo skyong dkar/ /lcags kyu 'dzin pa bsam par bya/ /lhor ser zhags pa ma bsam bya/ /nub dmar lcags kyi sgrog
64b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin ma/ /byang du ljang gu dril bu'o/ /de rnams zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /rin chen rgyan gyis legs spras shing/ /g.yo bcas gser gyi rna chas rgyan/ /spyan gnyis lang tsho phun sum tshogs/ /steng du rnam par sgrol ma ste/ /'og tu gnod mdzes
65a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma'o/ /'khor lo sbrul zhags bsnams pa bri/ /de ltar thams cad mtshan nyid mtshungs/ /de nas skye mched dag la ni/ /mig gnyis rna ba gnyi dang/ snam/ /lce danglus dang yid rnams su/ /maM daM i dang riM saM naM/ /gti mug zhe
65a2(rgyud 'grel): sdang ser sna la/ /'dod chags phrag dog bdag med la/ /gnag dang dmar dang ser mo sngo/ /ljang gu dkar mo rnams bsams te/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis ldan pa'o/ /sku la oM las mkha' spyod ma/ /sa spyod bdag med ma gsum las/ /rdo rje gsum
65a3(rgyud 'grel): po bsam par bya'o/ /de nas 'od zer rab 'phros pas/ /rang bzhing yi ni zhing khams nas/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa lha mo rnams/ /'gugs pas dgug gzhug bcing so mnyes bya'o/ /de nas sems dpa' gsal bar lta/ /slar
65a4(rgyud 'grel): yang 'od zer 'phros pa las/ /sangs rgyas rigs lnga spyan drangs la/ /mchod bstod gsol ba gdab par bya/ /de nas dbang bskur rgyas btab ste/ /rtse mo rigs lnga rnam par mtshan/ /gzhan rnams rang gi rigs kyis gdab/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka
65a5(rgyud 'grel): badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas sa bon las spros pa'i/ /lha mo rnams kyis mchod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza me g+ha badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rigs kyis sa bon la/ /bdud rtsi lce la blangs byas
65a6(rgyud 'grel): te/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA a mri ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bstod pas legs bstod te/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tu sti badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ka haM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gsal la yang dang yang du blta'o/ /de nas sngags bzlas pa ni
65a7(rgyud 'grel): nam(rgyud 'grel): Arya ba la ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi swa twa ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kU ru Ni kA ya/ ta dya thA oM rA re tutdua? re tu re/ swahA duSh+Ta na/ pra duSh+Ta na/ ma ma kri te/ je ma b+hA ya/ staM b+hA ya/ mo hA ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+Ta na stam b+hA na tI re
65b1(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swa hA/ phar phyin bcu yi lha mo la/ /yi ge bcu pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /bsnyen pa bye bas 'grub 'gyur zhing/ /las la rang sngags khri bzla'o/ /de nas skyon rnam dag bsgom/ /gtor ma byas te lha gshegs la/ /ci bde ba
65b2(rgyud 'grel): yi spyod pas gnas/ /de ltar yang ngang yang goms pas/ /gcan zan bsrung dang dbang du bya/ /bskrad dang bud med dgug pa dang/ /bcings pa grol drangs tshang bcad dang/ /bsreg dang mnan pa bsrung ba sogs/ /rgyud thos man ngag ldan pas bsgrub/ /
65b3(rgyud 'grel): bla ma mnyes pa mchog yin pas/ /de yis rje btsun yun rings bsten/ /sgrub thabs dkon pa'i tshogs de yis/ /de nyid mthong bas phyag byas te/ /bla ma dam pa lhan cig skyes/ /gnyes par byas te de mthong shog /rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol
