65b4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i lha bcu'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ spob dpon chen po lhan cig skyes pa'i ral pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'brog mi lo ce bas bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ Arya po thI shwa ri sA d+hA nAM nA ma/ bod skad du/
65b5(rgyud 'grel): 'ang gas ma gnas kyi dbang phyug ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya pa/ /'phags ma gnas kyi dbang phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gsar ba bdag gis bshad/ /gsang ba'i de nyid man ngag ste/ /cho ga snga dro pangs nas ne/ /snying rjes brlan
65b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems kyis su/ /yid ni g.yo ba med bya ste/ /sems can thams cad gdon bya'o/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni blangs nas su/ /thod par rtog med sems kyis gzhag /rlung dang me yi steng du ni/ dag dang kho la dang tshos par bya/ /nor 'dzin maN+Dal byas nas ni
65b7(rgyud 'grel): byang chub yan lag rab tu sbyin/ /'jam pa'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /rab brtan rdo rje skyil krung bcas/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya yang dag bya/ /khams gsum stong pa nyid du lta/ /'di ni thams cad rmi lam 'dra/ /nye bar rnyed pa gang yang med/ /dra za'i
66a1(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer rnam pa 'dra/ /'gro ba sgyu mar bltas pa'o/ /thugs ka'i nam mkha' i dbus gnas par/ /ye shes zla ba dri med bya/ /dbus su tAM yig bsam mi khyab/ /'od zer lnga ldan 'bar ba yis/ /phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /
66a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma'i gzugs rnams rnam bsgom bya/ /de rnams spyan drangs byin gyis brlab/ /ye shes sku ni rjes su dran/ /de nas sems can thams cad la/ /ye shes 'od zer rnam dag bya/ /sangs rgyas de nyid rab gnas bya/ /byang chub snying po mchis kyi bar/ /myur du
66a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sgrol ma can/ /nam mkha' yi ni mdun du blta/ /ye shes mchod pa sna tshogs pa/ /ye shes las ni skyes pas bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro/ /sems can thams cad don byas te/ /cho ga gsum gyi sbas pa'i sdig /bla ma'i mdun
66a4(rgyud 'grel): du rab tu bshags/ /sdig pa thams cad grol bdag nyid/ /myur du sangs rgyas thob pa'o/ /bdag nyid sgrol ma'i rnam par bya/ /'gro kun de bzhin sgrol ma ru/ /bltas nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ /byin brlabs sa bon de rab bzhugs/ /chos rnams rnam
66a5(rgyud 'grel): rtog bral ba dang/ /rang bzhin med cing bdag med rnams/ /dbyer med rnal 'byor pas gzigs bya/ /sngags 'di dag ni brjod par bya/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+ha rmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho nya haM/ oM swa b+hA ba shu n+ya tA sarba d+ha rmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho nya haM/ oM shus n+ya hA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ nam mkha' i khams zla dbus gnas par/ /stong pa nyid kyi ye shes mchog /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /zla bar haM yig ye shes/ /rdo rje'i rlung dang me dang chu/ /de nas sa yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /ri rab dang ma bruM las byung/ /gzhal yas khang ni
66a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par blta/ /de yi dbus su pad+mar gnas/ /lte ba ge sar 'bar ba'o/ /'dab ma brgyad ldan dga' ba'o/ /rnam pa sna tshogs yid 'phrog pa'i/ /de phyir 'bar ba'i 'khor lo ste/ /rtsibs ni bcu gnyis shin tu mdzes/ /thig ni lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /de yi
66b1(rgyud 'grel): sgo ni bzhi pa la/ /lha yi sta babs rnam bzhi'o/ /me long la sogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'o/ /gnas skyes rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'o/ /phyogs skyod mgon po rnams spyan drangs/ /byang sems de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /ye
66b2(rgyud 'grel): shes rlung gis dgug par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma kun dga' byed rnams/ /kun mkhyen sangs rgyas kyi gang rnams/ /zla bar rab tu zhugs par bsgom/ /de gyur pa las bdag nyid ni/ /lha mo sgrol mar bsgom par bya/ /sku mdog dmar la zhal bzhi pa/ /phyag ni
66b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /nyi ma 'char ka brgya yi 'od/ /dang po'i zhal ni dran par bya/ /dri med nam mkha' i rang bzhin sngo/ /g.yas kyi zhal ni dran par bya/ /sha ka sa la sha bzhin ljang/ /g.yas kyi zhal ni yid dga' bas/ /de ltar dkon mchog gsum
66b4(rgyud 'grel): drag po/ /rnam par 'gyur pa'i zhal 'jigs byed/ /cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa po/ /mi sdug de nas bsgom par bya/ /ser po zhi ba steng gi zhal/ /rgyan kun gyis ni brgyan pa'o/ /thod pa'i phreng bas dbu brgyan pa/ /ye shes lnga ni nye bar mdzes/ /de ltar de ni
66b5(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid che/ /zhal bzhi par ni bsam gtan bya/ /thod pa rdo rje ral gri dang/ /Da ma ru g.yas phyag na bsnams/ /yid bzhin nor bu kha TwAM ga/ /dril bu de bzhin utpal dmar/ /de yi g.yon par bsgom par bya/ /de yi brla la yod pa ni/ /stag gi
66b6(rgyud 'grel): sham thabs gyon pa'o/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar byed pa/ /sna tshogs pad+ma zla dbus gnas/ /snying rje'i khro ba 'jigs byed ma/ /spyan gsum dmar po bgrang pa'o/ /drag po g.yon phyogs lta bar byed/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la rtag gnas/ /gnas rnams
66b7(rgyud 'grel): kyang ni dgug pa'i mchod/ /rnal 'byor ma tshogs dbus gnas par/ /bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa'o/ /pU dza oM a go ra de ma/ /ka o tri ko ka la ka hi/ pre gri sau su na si ma ku/ /de ltar yi ge nyi shu bzhi/ /rnal 'byor ma gnas dkyil 'khor la/ /
67a1(rgyud 'grel): lus la cho ga'i cho ga yis/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu 'grub/ /mtshogs kha spyi bo rna ba g.yas/ /ltag pa g.yon gyi rna ba dag /smin mtshams dang ni spyan dang ni/ /dpung pa'i rtsa ba gnyis de bzhin/ /mchan khung gnyis dbu ma gnyis/ /
67a2(rgyud 'grel): lte ba'i sna yi rtse mo dang/ /kha dang mgul la go cha bya/ /snying kha dang ni 'doms dang ni/ /gsang gnas bshang lam de bzhin brla/ /bus mo go rim ji bzhin no/ /dang po su ra ti shwa ri ti/ /gnyis par su ra son ta ri/ /gsum pa su rata tsan tra dang/ /bzhi pa su
67a3(rgyud 'grel): rat ma lo ni/ /lnga pa su rat b+hak+Shi'o/ /drug pa su rat ki mi ni/ bdun pa su rat u gra dang/ brgyad pa su rat u ta ma/ /gnas dang nye ba'i gnas song bsgom/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu gyur/ /dkar dang ljang dang sngo ba dang/ /bzhi pa sku mdog ser
67a4(rgyud 'grel): bo dang/ /ser dang dkar dang dmar ba dang/ /sku mdog sngon po brgyad pa'o/ /thod pa dang ni kha TwAM 'dzin/ /dril bu Da ma rus brgyan pa'o/ /thod pa'i phreng bas dbu brgyan pa'o/ /rgyan ni thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ /rin chen ye shes steng dbus brgyan/ /de
67a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams pad+ma'i 'dab mar gnas/ /shi khi b+hi ma shi kha Na Di/ /ki ra li de bzhin ji ti li/ /u Ti dzi Ta de bzhin tsaN Di/ /mauN+Da bi ka Do ud ka ti/ /ki ri Di nar te ki dang ngo/ /zhing dang nye zhing tshan do ha/ /de bzhin nye ba'i tshan do ha/ /'du ba nye ba'i 'du ba'o/ /
67a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas ni de rnams gnas pa yi/ /lha mo bcu gnyis bsgom par bya/ /phyed dmar phyed ni ljang ba rnams/ /thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams/ /skra grol ba dang khro gnyer can/ /rtag pa'i mchog ni dbu brgyan rnams/
67a7(rgyud 'grel): thod pa kha TwAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /phyag gzhan 'khor lo rdo rje'o/ /gaM bu tsaM dang puk+ka si/ /Do m+bi de bzhin ma toM gi /bzhi ni sna tshogs mdog rnams so/ /sgo srungs khro gnyer chen mo'o/ /mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ /g.yon bskum g.yas brkyang nges
67b1(rgyud 'grel): par gnas/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /mi bskyod pa yi dam tshig ste/ /dbu rgyan steng du rgyan rnams so/ /thod pa kha TwAM ga 'dzin pa/ /phyag gzhan gri gug mgo bo bsnams/ /rgyan rnams kun gyi lus brgyan pa/ /bdud bzhi'i steng du yang
67b2(rgyud 'grel): dag gnas/ /thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa rnams/ /dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod rnams/ /dang sogs dbang po rnam par dag /snying rje ldan pa bsgom par bya/ /thams cad gcer bu 'dzin pa rnams/ /snying rje'i dga' ma mdzes pa rnams/ /lham pa'i dbus su
67b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag gnas/ /lha mo sgrol ma rnam par bsgom/ /bur ti shwa ri'i sde rnams ni/ /rim dang rim min bskor ba'o/ /'khor lo rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la/ /shi khi la sogs nor bu'i bar/ /rim dang rim pa min pa'o/ /'gro ba'i bdag mo rnams ra dgod/ /
67b4(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa bkug dang brkyang ba dang/ /yang ni brkyang dang dgug pa'i bar/ /kaM pu tsi sogs sgo rnams su/ /g.yon du bskor bar rnam par dgod/ /de ltar rdzogs pa'i sgrub pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor gnas dang yang dag 'brel/ /de nas cho ga rab tu phye/ /rigs lnga po
67b5(rgyud 'grel): ni bsgoms par bya/ /spyi bor braM yig dkar po ste/ /mgrin pa'i h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ni nyi ma'i mdog /bru yig nag po thugs ka ru/ /a ni lte bar gser gyi mdog /gsang ba'i gnas su khaM ljang khu/ /sgoms shig rnam par cho ga'o/ /'khor pad rdo rje rin
67b6(rgyud 'grel): chen mchog /sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzi rnams gnas/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad la/ /cho ga des ni cho ga bya/ /thugs ka'i sa bon 'od lcags kyus/ /sangs rgyas ye shes 'khor lo dgug /ba spu'i sgo rnams pad+ma gnas/ /mchod pa'i lha mo rang las
67b7(rgyud 'grel): sprul/ /dad pa mchog gis yang dag mchog /yang ni rang la gzhug par bya/ /de nas dbang bskur gsol ba gdab/ /bde gshegs rnams ni dngos grub ster/ /ji ltar bltam pa tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar
68a1(rgyud 'grel): lha yi chu ni dag pa yi/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o/ /oM sarbwA tirtha a b+hi Sho ka sa ma ya h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ye hUM/ oM sarba tiSh+Tha a b+hi She kata sho d+hi sho d+ha A t+ma ki sar sar pra sa ra pra sa ra/ /sarba bud+d+ha a d+hi Sh+Thi te swAhA/ /ma lus
68a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad rnams/ /sgrol ma'i gzugs su nges lta bar/ /sgom sbyor gyis ni sgom gyis shig /bsgom pa sgom min skad cig tsam/ /gnas gyi man ngag rim gyis dang/ /bla ma'i rnal 'byor ma rim gyis/ /man ngag dam tshig rnyed
68a3(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi mchog sbyin gyis/ /ye shes rtog pa bsgom bdag nyid/ /ye shes rtog pa sgom gyis shig /rtog pa bral ba med pa ni/ /ye shes ma yin rtog pa yin/ /chos kyi bdag nyid
68a4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid/ /rang bzhan med
68a5(rgyud 'grel): cing yi ge med/ /sku mdog 'das dang rnam pa med/ /ring po ma yin zlum po min/ /de nyid 'byung po thams cad rnams/ /rnal 'byor ye shes yid med pa/ /de ni de nyid bzlas pa yis/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug thob pa'o/ /oM tA re tuthA re tu re
68a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ /de ltar dam tshig sngags yin te/ /bcom ldan 'das mas rab tu bshad/ /dang po oM dang de nas ming/ /hUM phaT yi ge yang dag ldan/ /zlos shig lha mo rnams kyi sngags/ /thams cad la ni mchod pa'o/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa rim pa
68a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /sgo pa rnams la'ang dran par bya/ /oM hUM phaT/ sngar bshad pa yi ming ldan pa/ /cho ga 'di yis yang dag bzlas/ /oM traM h+ri khaM hUM laM maM saM traM dza/ phung po khams rnams dag pa'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM lus ngag yid gsum dag pa
68a8(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /sngar bshad cho gas bsngags pa yis/ /cho ga 'bum phrag gcig bzlas bya/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag don/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zad don du/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams rtag tu ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni lha bshos te/ /
68b1(rgyud 'grel): dus kun rnal 'byor rnams kyi ni/ /dud 'gro bsad nas mchod par bya/ /sngags bas tsA ru'i bsgrub pa bya/ /rnal 'byor ma ldan bza' bar bya/ /bza' dang bza' min bza' bar bya/ /btud dang btung min rtag tu gtung/ /bya dang bya min bya ba'o/ /rnal
68b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma tshogs dkyil 'khor du/ /sdig pa yis ni mi reg go /mnyam nyid bstan pa'i chos nyid do/ /rnal 'byor bla med nor bu'o/ /gsang ba bla med bla med do/ /rab snang min pa bshad min bya/ /skye ba 'di la grub pa thob/ /srog gcod la
68b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs spangs pa ste/ brdzun dang phrag don mi bya'o/ /blo ni sems can don du bya/ /de ni rnal 'byor thob pa'o/ /dge ba bcu ni nges par bya/ /de bzhin tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang/ /sbyin pa la sogs gtong la dga' / /mnyes shing mchog ni sgrub pa'o/ /
68b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang rnal 'byor bla med bsgom/ /ji ltar blo yi rim pa ltar/ /rnal 'byor sogs bdag rnal 'byor ma/ /rigs rim ji ltar bsan bcos so/ /ri dags thogs pa sna tshogs pad nyi la/ /sgrol ma bdag nyid bsgom bya ba/ /sna tshogs mdog dang zhal
68b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa/ /g.yon bskum g.yas ba rkyad gnas pa ste/ /dbus kyi zhal ni ljang gu la/ /g.yas ni ser bar blta bar bya/ /g.yon gyi zhal ni sdo ba la/ /steng gi zhal ni dkar ba'o/ /bsam gyi mi khyab mche ba gcigs/ /thor pas dbu la brgyan pa mo/ /
68b6(rgyud 'grel): dbu la don yong grub pas brgyan/ /mi yi rus ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /skra grol mig ni yangs pa mo/ /spyan gsum dmar mo mdzes ma ste/ /ral gri rdo rje gsor ba ste/ /'khor lo lcags kyu 'dzin pa mo/ /dril bu thugs kar sdigs mdzub mdzad/ /gri
68b7(rgyud 'grel): gug mgo bo'i lag ba gzhan/ /utpal thod pa kha TwAM ga /tshangs pa'i lpags pa steng du gnas/ /khyab 'jug dbang phyug che zhabs dag /mnan pas sa la 'jigs rung 'gyur/ /sngar smos rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams/ /reg gi dkyil 'khor
69a1(rgyud 'grel): dbus gnas pa/ /de rnams thams cad sna tshogs mdog /gcer bu 'jigs pa'i rjes su song/ /gsang ba zab mo bla med sngags/ /dbu rgyan dpal rim las byung ba/ /rnal 'byor ma gnas thams cad la/ /rim pa yang
69a2(rgyud 'grel): dag spyod pa mchog /gnas kun bla med mnyam sbyor te/ /rnal 'byor ma thugs bla na med/ /lha mo'i las ni thams cad byed/ /dag pa sdig pa sel bar byed/ /mnyam gzhag med pa'i sgrub pa yis/ /rnal 'byor bsgom pa sgom pa ste/ /sngags
69a3(rgyud 'grel): pas rtag tu bsam gtan gang/ /nyon mongs ma lus zad par 'gyur/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo sa gzhir ro/ /de yi rnal 'byor che rnams spyod/ /gnas kyi cho ga grub bdag nyid/ /ji ltar bde bas spyad par bya/ /hUM thugs kar ro/ /oM mtshogs khar
69a4(rgyud 'grel): ro/ /hUM(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor ro/ /hUM spyan la'o/ /hUM go cha'o/ /phyag phaT phyag mtshan la'o/ /go cha'i go cha 'dir shes bya/ /rim pa'i rjes su rim pa ni/ /bdag nyid yi dam lha grub bdag /'gro ba ma lus de ltar blta/ /srid pa'i dpa' rlabs sgrol sgrol ma
69a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa bzlas pa rtag tu bya/ /dur khrod dam ni shing gcig gam/ /ri yi rtse mo sa phug khyim/ /khyim ma ma smad 'tshong gnas su 'am/ /gzhan yang rgyal po'i khab tu 'am/ /rtags cig drung/ /phyi yi nags tshal shi ba'i gnas/ /rgya mtsho dang ni chu
69a6(rgyud 'grel): mig rnams/ /ma mo'i gnas su nges par gnas/ /gang yang lon med grub pa'o/ /thogs med rtag tu spyad par bya/ /rnal 'byor de yis sgom pa rnams/ /gnas kyi sde yi rnal 'byor ma/ /rigs kyi rdo rje skyes pa'ang rung/ /ye shes rdo rje'i
69a7(rgyud 'grel): sgom pa'am/ /rim pa sde yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /bla yi sde rjes rim pa'o/ /byang chub sems ni rab bstan bya/ /thams cad shin tu rab bstan blo/ /gdan min rnam par rtog pa bral/ /yul chos rnam par spangs par bya/ /lus dang ngag yid sde
69b1(rgyud 'grel): yis ni/ /myur du de gsum grub pa thob/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /oM yig dag ni rnam par bsgom/ /spyi bo'i steng du song bar lta/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi char phab bo/ /ji ltar rnal 'byor rab tu bya/ /u pa ha ra dbul par bya/ /der ni rnal 'byor
69b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gyis/ /skad cig tsam gyis gzi brjid 'grub/ /rnal 'byor thams cad sel bar byed/ /ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa' i gtam/ /sgrol ma'i gzugs ni gzugs chen mo/ /bsgoms shig de nyid yang dag don/ /baM yig bar song bsgom par
69b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /oM ni lce yi rtse mor blta/ /thams cad bza' ba'i gnas yin cing/ /yid bzhin nor bu mchog bzhin no/ /zhi ba thams cad sdug bsngal sel/ /ye shes sems dpa' rab bsgom bya/ /rnal 'byor gang zhig 'di bsgom de/ /byang chub sems
69b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' grags pa che/ /gnas gsum grub pa thob par 'gyur/ /sgrol ma'i lha mo rnal 'byor ldan/ /rdo rje gsang rgyud bla med du/ /rdo rje ldan mas bris pa'o/ /sems can ye shes 'phel ba'o/ /'phags ma gnas kyi dbang phyug ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /
69b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud las mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje ldan mas phyung ba rdzogs so// //thugs rje chen pos dbang ldan gsum bskur ba'i grub thob wa ni ta b+ha dra'i slob ma saM g+ha ma sh+rI b+ha dra dang/ /bod kyi lo tsa ba 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo
69b6(rgyud 'grel): rjes bsgyur ba'o/ /rdo rje ldan ma/ /paN+Di ta pa ra he ta/ tha ni ta b+hwa dra/ saM g+ha ma sh+ri b+ha dra/ 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rje mkhas pa sa phug pa// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ /shwI o rgyan tA ra kra ma a b+hi sa ma ya nA ma/ /bod
69b7(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ /dpal u rya na gyi sgrol ma'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ /'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdug bsngal srid pa'i mun pa ni/ /sel bar byed pa'i nyi 'od can/ /thugs kar snying rje brlan pa la/ /rtag tu bdag ni
70a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pa 'am/ /rnal 'byor mas/ bsam gtan gyi khang pa yid dang mthun par/ /'jam pa'i stan la 'dug nas/ rang gi snying gar a las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil
70a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la/ tAM yig dmar po las 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phros pas ma lus pa'i nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor khyab par bsgoms par bya'o/ /de nas 'od zer gyi zhal mthong bar bya ba'i ma lus pa'i bla ma dang/ yi dam lha dang/ de bzhin gshegs
70a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams bltas te/ /de rnams la sems kyis mtshed pa byas la/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa brjod de/ /de nas brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i 'gro ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i bdag nyid dang ldan par blta'o/ /sngags brjod
70a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /oM shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra ta b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de'i rjes su nam mkha' la pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM yig las skyes pa'i khro bo'i rdo rjes bskrad do/ /rdo rje ra ba bsgoms pa'i gnas pa'i chos 'byung gi dbus su gzhal yas khang gi nang du/
70a5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dbus su haM yi ga bltas te de nas haM yig las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spro bar bya ste/ bdag nyid sgrol ma'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o/ /sku mdog dmar mo zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa gar byed pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba can/ rgyan thams cad
70a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan pa/ stag gi 'phags pas smad g.yogs pa/ /rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dbus na gnas pa/ spyan gsum ma gzhal khro gnyer can/ de'i dang po'i zhal dmar po g.yas kyi gnag pa/ /g.yon pa'i ljang pa/ steng du zhi ba ser po'o/ /g.yas
70a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag rnams na/ Da ma ru dang/ thod pa dang/ ril gri dang rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa na utpa la dang/ rin po che dang/ dril bu dang kha TwUM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /de nas sna tshogs pad+ma la lha mo brgyad/ /su ra ta shwa ri dang/ su ra ta cen tra/ su ra ta ma li ni/
70b1(rgyud 'grel): su ra ta b+hak+Shi/ su ra ta ka mi ni/ su ra ta u gra/ su ra ta u tA ma/ dkar mo/ ljang gu/ sngon mo/ ser mo/ dkar mo/ dmar mo/ sngon mo/ ji ltar g.yas kyis Da ma ru dang ka pA la 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa rnams kyi dril bu dang kha TwAM ga 'dzin pa/ /bro
70b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyer can/ thod pa'i phreng ba can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de'i phyi rol tu 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa la shi kha b+hi ma/ shi kaN+DI/ ki rA lI/ ra Da sI/ ra u tra/ dzwa trI/ tsan+d+ri/ ma u d+hi/ bi ka ta/ u ta ka ta/ ki ri Ti/ nar ti ka/ de dag thams
70b3(rgyud 'grel): cad g.yon phyed dmar ba/ g.yas phyed ljang gu /g.yas na 'khro lo/ rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon na thong pa dang kha TwaM ga 'dzin pa/ zhal khro gnyer can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skra grol pa/ g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang dang/ g.yon
70b4(rgyud 'grel): bskum g.yas brkyang gi gar gyis gnas pa/ dang po g.yon dang/ g.yas su 'gro ba/ gzhan yang de'i phyi rol du sgo bzhi ma/ kaM pu tsi/ puk+ka yi/ DoM pi ni/ ma taM ki /g.yas na gri gug thod pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon ma'i mgo bo dang/ kha TwAM ga
70b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ nyi ma'i gdan la g.yon bskum g.yas brkyang bas bdud bzhi'i steng du g.yon du bskor ba/ kha dog sna tshogs bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas gnas kyi cho ga bya ste/ de la mtshogs
70b6(rgyud 'grel): kha/ spyi bor rna ba g.yon/ ltag ba sogs phrag rna ba g.yas/ /smin ma'i bar/ mig gnyis dpung pa/ mchan khung gnyis/ nu ma gnyis/ lte ba/ sna rtse/ kha/ ske/ thugs ka/ lte ba'i 'og /gsang gnas/ bshad lam/ brla gnyis/
70b7(rgyud 'grel): ngar gdong gnyis/ rkang pa'i rting/ rkang pa'i 'og /rkang pa'i mthe bong/ bus mo gnyis la rim pa ji lta bar/ pu dzA o a/ go rA de ma/ ka o tri ko/ kA la kA hi/ pre gri so su/ na si ma ku/ pul+li ra ma la yaM/ dzA la d+ha raM/ o n+ya naM/ ar bu daM
71a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa bzhi'o/ /go ta wa ri/ ra mi shwa ra/ de wi ko Ti/ mA la we/ nye ba'i gnas bzhi'o/ /kA ma ru paM/ o Ti/ zhing gnyis so/ /tri sha ku ne/ ko sa laM/ nye ba'i zhing gnyis so/ /ka li ka/ laM ba kaM/ 'du ba gnyis so/ /kan tsi hi ma la aM
71a2(rgyud 'grel): nye ba'i 'du ba gnyis so/ /pre ta pu ri/ gri ha de pa ta/ ma la ya gnyis so/ /sau raSh+TaM/ su bar+Na dri ba nye ba'i ma la ya gnyis so/ /nag raM/ sindU?/ he sham/ dur khrod gnyis so/ /ma du di shaM/ ku lu ta/ nye ba'i du khrod gnyis so/ /mtshogs kha thugs ka/ lte ba/ gsang gnas/ /brla
71a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ byin pa la rim pa bzhin du/ /b+h+ruM b+h+ruM a h+ri khaM zhes bya ba ni go cha'o/ /de rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo'i dbus su/ hUM A(rgyud 'grel): oM/ de ltar yi shes/ ye shes can gyis bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas dbang bskur ster bar bya'o/ /lha mo'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang/
71a4(rgyud 'grel): ku ra ti shwa ri la sogs pa la/ dbu la rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /shi khi la sogs pa rnams la dbu la rnam par snang mdzad/ /kaM pu tsi la sogs pa rnams la dbu la mi bskyod pa'o/ /de nas arg+haM sbyin par bya'o/ /nge nas bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o/ /de la yaM raM las dkyil 'khor
71a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi steng du pad+ma'i snod bdud rtsi lngas bkang nas sha/ g+ho ha a ma oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM de yis byin gyis brlab bo/ /de nas sngags bzlas pa ni/ /yi ge bcu bcu phaT mthar spyang/ swAhA mthar spangs pa'o/ /lha mo la bzlas pa byas pa thams cad la oM sngar ming gi yi ge mdza' hUM thaT/
71a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas so/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa sgo'i lha mo rnams la'o/ /bsgom pa las langs nas lta mo'i gzugs su 'dzin pa bsgom par bya'o/ /ji ltar nus pas mchod pa'o/ /gtor ma sbyin pa'o/ /de la gtor ma'i sngags 'di'o/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+ha rmA NAM A tya nu tpanA twata
71a7(rgyud 'grel): oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swA tA zhes bya ba brtag tu byas na grub pa thob po/ /de la the tshom ma byed cing/ bcom ldan 'das ma u rgyan gyi sgrol ma'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa rdzogs so// //thugs rje chen pos dbang lan gsum bskur pa'i grub thob win? taM
71b1(rgyud 'grel): b+ha dra'i slob ma paN+Di ta saM g+ha ma sh+rI b+ha dra dang bod kyi lo tsa ba 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjes bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ o n+yan tA ra ka ma/ bod skad du/ u rgyan gyi sgrol ma'i rim pa/ sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha rnams kun nam bcu
71b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum mam/ /dgu 'am lnga yi bdag nyid can/ /gtso bo 'ga' zhig bsgoms nas ni/ /sngags ni 'di rnams bzlas pa bya/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re hUM phaT/ oM bu re te shwa re hUM phaT/ oM su ra te son+ta re hUM phaT/ oM su ra te tsan+d+ra hUM phaT/ oM su ra ta ka mi ni hUM phaT/
71b3(rgyud 'grel): oM su ra ta u gra hUM phaT/ oM su bata a ta ma hUM phaT/ oM ?? khi hUM phaT/ oM b+hi ma hUM phaT/ oM shi khaN+TA hUM phaT/ oM kA rA li hUM phaT/ oM dzA Ti li hUM phaT/ oM ra u twi hUM phaT/ oM jA Ti hUM phaT/ oM ma un+tshi hUM phaT/ oM b+hi ka Ta hUM phaT/ oM utshha sha Ti hUM phaT/
71b4(rgyud 'grel): oM ke ri Ti hUM phaT/ oM narte ki hUM phaT/ oM dza(rgyud 'grel): kaM putsi hUM phaT/ oM hUM pukra si hUM phaT/ oM maM DaM mi ni hUM phaT/ oM ho me toM ki hUM phaT/ gang sngags 'di rnams yang dag brjod/ /snying gi dbus su gtso mo ste/ /mtshogs ka la sogs gnas rnams su/ /lha mo
71b5(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa bzhi bsgoms/ /slob ma rnams la nges par ni/ /lha rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob/ /u rgyan gyi sgrol ma'i rim pa gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba rdzogs so// //paN+Ti ta saM g+ha ma bri dang/ loM tsa ba 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjes
71b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur pa'o// //oM tA re tu tA re hUM phaT/ oM su ra te shwa ri hUM phaT/ la sogs pa'o/ /oM a sha pu tsi hUM phaT/ oM hUM la sogs pa'o/ /oM tA re tut+tA re da ha da ha/ /ba tsa ba tsa pa/ /ma tha ma tha/ i maM ba li grih+Na ma ma sarba karya ni/ swa ra ya/
71b7(rgyud 'grel): swa da ya/ hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ gtor ma'i sngags so/ /DA ki ni rdo rje ldan ma paN+Di ta sa ra he ta/ grub thob wi? ni ta b+ha dra/ kha che'i paN+Di ta pa ra he ta/ grub thob nyi ni ta b+ha Ta/ kha che'i paN+Di ta si b+ha ma he b+ha Da/ 'jam dpal gsar ma des sa phug pa// //
72a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ maN+Dal a b+hi She ka ta bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga /rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'chang gis gang gsungs shing/ bla
72a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i man ngag las 'ongs pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya/ /bsnyan pa sngon du song ba yis/ /sa rnams sbyang sogs byas nas ni/ /khor bo chen po bzlas bya zhing/ /cho ga shes pas dkyil 'khor bya/ /rab tu drag po'i gsang sngags dang/ /go
72a3(rgyud 'grel): cha srang bu 'khor lo dang/ /dum gcig rdo rje ra ba dang/ rab 'bar me dang khro bos bsrung/ /sa yi lha mo lhag gnas dang/ /sems bskyed pa dang gso sbyong dang/ /nyi shu bzhi yi sdom pa drug /so shing dor dang rmi lam brtag /ngan na 'bad pas
72a4(rgyud 'grel): re bzlog bya/ /srad bu mdud pa gsum ldan pa/ /gsang sngags bzlas pas lag g.yon la/ /legs par bcings te bsrung bar bya/ /sa gzhi bstar bar bcu phyed byugs/ /man ngag ldan pas thig gdab bya/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang /
72a5(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi nang rol nag por gnas/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi ni rnam par brgyan/ /'dod yon la ni lha mo mdzes/ /dra ba dra phyed nyi zla dang/ /me long rnga yab rin chen phreng/ /pad+ma dur khrod rdo rje dang/ /me 'ong 'bar ba legs par bri/ /
72a6(rgyud 'grel): dbus su pad+ma ge sar 'bar/ /'dab brgyad kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /phyi rol 'bar ba'i 'khor lo ni/ /mdzes pa'i rtsibs bzang bcu gnyis pa/ /dbus su zla bar utpal dmar/ /'dab mar thod pa 'am dril phu ni/ /dkar ljang sngo ser phyogs g.yon
72a7(rgyud 'grel): bskor/ /ser dkar dmar sngo mtshams rnams su/ /g.yas su bskor ba zla ba la'o/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs la 'khor lo ni/ /bcu gnyis zla bar gnas par bya/ /sgo bzhir gri gug rab 'bar ba/ /nyi ma'i gang na la gnas pa bri/ /bsam gtan gyis ni
72b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan bsgom/ /phyi nang gsang bar bcas pa yi/ /mchod pa rim bzhin legs mchod bya/ /rdo rjes bltam pa byas nas ni/ /slob mas gsol ba btab pa la/ /bla ma'i man ngag gis dbang bskur/ /nam mkha' thabs dang shes rab
72b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /snyoms 'jug khu ba mi bskyod pa'i/ /dbur zhugs rdo rje'i lam nas 'thon/ /shes rab pad+mar lhags gyur te/ /nam mkhar spros te dbang bskur ro/ /mi bskyod rang bzhin chu yis so/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra ud ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ su ra ta twaM haM/
72b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba gsum las byung ba yi/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po byin/ /cod pan rgyal ba lnga bstims te/ /mgo bo'i gnas lngar dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra d+hA twa shwa ri
72b4(rgyud 'grel): a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM sarba satwa badzri a b+hi Shiny+tsa bruM/ oM ra twA badzri a b+hi Shi ny+tsa a(rgyud 'grel): oM d+ha rmA badzri a b+hi Shiny+tsa h+rI:/ oM sarba bi shwa a b+hi Shi ny+tsa traM/ oM hUM traM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di dar dpyangs dpral bar bcings/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gnas bso/ /
72b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag med par gnas pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang/ /di ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /shin tu grub phyir rdo rje zung/ zhes brjod gnas gsum reg ste sbyin/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shi ny+tsa h+rI(rgyud 'grel): rta
72b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu ni gnas pa yis/ /oM badzra g+haN+TA a a(rgyud 'grel): gri hi so se b+ha ga wa na ma ye san+na ni hi to b+ha ba ti/ /g.yon par yongs su gtad par bya/ /rtag par rdo rjes gnas pa yis/ /rdo rje dril bu mgor gzhag ste/ /oM badzra stwa stwa a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi
72b7(rgyud 'grel): badzra a b+hi Sha ka ta/ khyod ni rdo rje che ge mo/ /me tog ltung ba'i rjes 'gror brjod/ /slob dpon dpang sogs brjod na yang/ /kye yi rdo rje ji bzhin brjod/ /dkyil 'khor dur dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bsdus pa/ pa ra he ta paN+Ti tas sbyar brdzogs so// //
73a1(rgyud 'grel): kha che'i paN+Di ta saM g+ha ma sh+rI b+ha dra dang/ 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjes bsgyur ba'o// //oM tA re tut+tA re tsa la pra tsa la sh+rI g+haM ga mi ni de ba tat+ta uts+tsha tra ya hUM/ 'di bya rog gi sgro la lan sum cu rtsa gcig bzlas nas
73a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya'i sgo la sgrub pas zhag bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro/ /sgrol ma'i gzungs kyis srin lag la lan bdun bzlas la/ /bdag gis mig gnyis phyis te/ de nas rgyal po'i drung du phyin na rgyal bo de slob ma lta bur 'gyur bas dang pa byed pa dang/
73a3(rgyud 'grel): dag tu mi smra/ sbyin pa ster kho la ltar 'gyur ro/ /khros kyang dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'di ni yid ches pas ngo mtshar ro/ /bdag nyid sgrol mar bsgoms te/ tsha ba'i mar khus lus byug pa bya/ /sngags khri bzlas/ /bzlas pa'i rjes su 'bras mkhar ma can gyi
73a4(rgyud 'grel): ma dag pas dri ma gton/ /de la snam khu ra byas la bsgrub bya la byin na nges par the tshom med pa'o/ /gos kyi thu ba nas bzung ste gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs kyi gnod byed bkug la thu bar bstums te mdun pa byas la sngags 'di lan bdun bsngags
73a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ 'jigs pa'i sa gang du 'gro yang 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo/ /stag dang chom rkun dang sbrul dang/ /glang po che dang/ ma he dang/ dred la sogs pas kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang gi thab tu u twa la dmar po'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa
73a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad byas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /spra chil dang ska tshe'i 'bras bu dang/ po son cha dang/ a sho ka'i lo ma rnams mar dang sbrang rtsi'i lde gu dang bcas pas stong phrag lnga'i sbyin sreg gis nyi ma bdun gyis rang 'dod pa'i bu ma
73a7(rgyud 'grel): thob bo/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu ka b+hi d+ha na ku ma ri ma hA murb+ha he na ta pya pi tA pra yats+tsha du me swAhA/ rgya shug gi tsher ma stong phrag lnga rang byung gi me tog dang bcas pas sreg blugs byas na/ skyes pas skyong ba'i bu mo yang 'gugs so/ /sngags ni
73b1(rgyud 'grel): oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a ma ka b+hat+tA naM swA tha na ta paska rA ya ma ma na ke dza/ zla mtshan 'dzag pa'i ras la bcom ldan 'das ma phyag gnyis zhal gcig ma lcags kyu dang utpa la zhags pa dang bcas pa rnams bri/ /de'i mdun du mchod pa byas nas/ phyi
73b2(rgyud 'grel): nas bsgoms ldan sngags bzla bar bya'o/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu ki ma ma i pis taM swabnaM ka thA ya hUM phaT/ stong phrag lngas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhags pas a mu ka'i mgrin pa bcings/ /lcags kyus drangs nas bsgrub bya rkang pa'i 'og tu
73b3(rgyud 'grel): bsams te/ khol mo'i tshul gyis bza' bar bya'o/ /na mo gu ru b+hya(rgyud 'grel): me sbar bsangs nas rdzas thab bskyed/ /byin brlabs spyan drangs pad gdan dbul/ /chu bzhi phul la phyag rgya bstan/ /dgug gzhug dbang bskur rgyas gdab bya/ /ku sha byon zan
73b4(rgyud 'grel): me ltas brtag /sreg rdzas phul nas mchod bstod bya/ /nang mchod hUM tra dzA yis bsang/ /'das pa'i dam tshig bskyed cing gzhug /dbang bskur mchod bstod byon zan dbul/ /sreg rdzas mchod bstod gsol ba gdab/ /bzod gsol
73b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs shing dam tshig bsdu/ /me lha gsol gdab sreg rdzas kyi/ /lhag ma phul la dgad blugs gsum/ /yon bdag lag pa nas bzung dbul/ /gtor ma mchod pa bstod pa dbul/ /gsol ba gdab cing me lha gshegs/ /dam tshig bsdu
73b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing lhag chad bskang// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ /e ka bI ra yo gI sAd+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpa' mo gcig pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ zhing chen gyi rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po
73b7(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'i byang chub ste/ /gnyis pa sa bon yang dag bsdus/ /gsum pa gzugs rten yang dag rdzogs/ /bzhi pa yi ge rim bzhin dgod/ /ces gsungs pa/ dang po sems can thams cad kyi don du sangs rgyas thob par 'dod pa'i snying rje
74a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po sngon du dmigs la/ /oM shU n+ya tA dzA na badzra swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko haM/ zhes brjod pas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin rnam par mi rtog pa'i stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ /gnyis pa ni stong pa chen po'i dbus su paM
74a2(rgyud 'grel): las sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar/ /a las zla ba/ de'i steng du raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor che ba bsam mo/ /de'i dbus su tAM dmar po yongs su gyur pa las utpa la dmar po yu ba la tAM gis mtshan pa'o/ /gsum pa 'di de las 'di
74a3(rgyud 'grel): zer 'phros bas dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad mtshad/ /sems can thams cad kyi sdig sgrib sbyangs/ tshur 'dus nas thim pas rje btsun ma'i sku ru bdag nyid bskyed par bya ste/ zhal bzhi phyag brgyad ma g.yas kyi zhal sngon po/ /g.yon
74a4(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu dbus dmar po/ /steng zhi ba'i zhal ser po/ /khro zhal gsum po la spyan dmar po zlum pa gsum gsum mche ba gcigs pa'o/ /phyag brgyad kyi dang po na rdo rje/ gnyis pa na ral gri/ gsum pa na kA pa la/ bzhi pa na Da ma ru'o/ /g.yon
74a5(rgyud 'grel): dang po na utpa la/ gnyis pa na rin po che/ /gsum pa na kha TAM ga /bzhi pa na dril bu'o/ /sku mdog shin tu dmar ba don yod grub pas dbu rgyan byas pa'o/ /dpral ba'i steng na thaM cad pa lnga yod pa/ mi mgo lnga bcu tham pa'i phreng ba'i do shal
74a6(rgyud 'grel): can rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis pad+ma dang zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bsam mo/ /bzhi pa ni spyi bor zla ba'i steng du oM dkar po/ mgrin par pad+ma dmar po'i steng du A:
74a7(rgyud 'grel): dmar po/ /snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i steng du hUM sngon po bsgom mo/ /bzlas pa ni snying ka'i smad du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du utpa la dmar po'i yu ba la tAM dmar po bsam/ de la sngags kyi phreng ba 'od zer dmar po dang bcas pa spros pas/ sems
74b1(rgyud 'grel): can gyi sdig pa sbyangs la/ /bde ba mdza' dag thob par bya'o/ /tshur 'dus kha na mar zhugs phyag mtshan sa bon la thim/ nang du rang la rtogs pa skyes par bsam mo/ /de bzhin du yang nas yang du bsam zhing/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re hUM phaT ces pa
74b2(rgyud 'grel): nus tshang bzlas so/ /'jog tsa na sems can thams cad kyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par gyur cig bya'o/ /de nas spyod lam thams cad sgrol ma'i nga rgyal gyis goms par bya'o/ /dpa' mo gcig pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ /
74b3(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta pa ra he ta dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o/// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ oM n+yan gra ma tA re po sA d+ha nI nA ma(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ u rgyan gyi ri pa'i lha sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes
74b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo 'phags ma sgrol ma gnas chen gyi dbang phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang ba'i rgyud du rdo rje'i tshig 'di gsungs/ /de kho na nyid rtogs dka' man ngag 'di/ /spros pa dang bral rnam par rtog med las/ /dang po snying
74b5(rgyud 'grel): rjes langs te bshad par bya/ /nyam nga spangs pa'i sems kyis sa gzhir dris/ /maN+Dal byas te bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i/ /thod pa rlung mes dag bsgom bdud rtsi 'bar ba yis/ /lus la khyab byugs phyi nang dag byas nas/ /'bol ba'i stan la
74b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje skyil krung dang/ ye shes phyag rgyas brtan pas rab 'dug nas/ /stong kyang snang ba'i 'gro gsum thams cad la/ /rmi lam sgyu mi dra ze'i grong 'drar blta/ /snying nang mkha' dbus ye shes dri bral ba'i/ /zla ba'i steng du tAM yig 'od zer lnga/ /
74b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba 'phros te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang/ /sgrol ma dang bcas thams cad grub pa rnams/ /kun nas ye shes sku can dran par bya/ /ye shes 'od zer ngag gi phyogs bcu yi/ /sems can thams cad bla med byang chub ni/ /sangs rgyas sa la
75a1(rgyud 'grel): rab bkod mkha' dbyings dang/ /'gro ba thams cad sgrol mar rab bltas te/ /ye shes mchod pas sna tshogs gnyis med mchod/ /dkon mchog gsum la skya bsu mchi ba dang/ /sems can kun gyi don byas gsum po
75a2(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /dbye pas mi she sdang bcas sdig pa bshags/ /sdig las rnam grol myung du sangs rgyas shog /bdag nyid 'gro ba sangs rgyas sgrol ma dang/ /snang ba'i yul rnams thams cad sgrol mar bya/ /rnam par rtog pa ma lus bcom pa
75a3(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /chos rnams rang bzhin stong zhing bdag med do/ /oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ nam mkha' i khams su zla ba'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /de la stong pa'i ye shes kyis mnan pa/ /zla ba dbus su tAM gi yi ge las/ /rdo rje rlung me g.yo ba'i
75a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag pa'i/ /ye shes byin brlabs sangs rgyas kun zhing gi /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dad de bzhin gshegs/ /byang sems mgon po kun nas g.yo ba yis/ /ye shes rlung gi gnyis med yi ge la/ /thims pas ye shes ma lus thams cad mkhyen/
75a5(rgyud 'grel): de khengs 'dres las gyur pas bdag nyid dang/ /'gro ba mdza' dag sgrol ma'i sar bskyed de/ /dmar dang sngon po ljang gu cung zad khro/ /dpa' bo zhi ba ser po steng gi zhal/ /thod pa phreng bas dbu brgyan ye shes lnga/ /rgyan rnams ma lus thams cad
75a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa yi/ /rdo rje ral gri utpal rin po che/ /thod pa kha TwAM dril bu Da ma ru/ /'dzin cing bde ba'i ye shes 'bras bu 'byung/ /stag lpags sham thabs phyed krung gar gyis gnas/ /sna tshogs pad zla'i dkyil brtan snying rjes khros/ /spyan gsum
75a7(rgyud 'grel): dmar bas kun la gziT g.yon du/ /blta bzhin rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /zhing du spros pa mchog gi rnal 'byor ma tshogs dbus/ /'jug cing bde ba thams cad rab ster bzhugs/ /pu dz+nyA a'u? a go ra de ma ka u tre ku ka la ka he pri swEeM so na
75b1(rgyud 'grel): si ma ko/ yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag kyang/ /rnal 'byor ma gnas 'khor lo ma lus dgod/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dbang phyug rab tu bsgrub/ /spyi bo spyi gtsug rna g.yon ltag khung du/ /rna g.yas smin mtshams mig dang lag gnyis la/ /de bzhin
75b2(rgyud 'grel): mchan khung gnyis gnas nu ma gnyis/ /lte ba sna rtse kha mgrin snying ga rnams/ /pho kha gsang gnas bshad lam de bzhin brla/ /rje ngar bel gong rkang mthil rkang sor dang/ /pus mo rim bzhin 'di dag lus la dged/ /de nas lha yi rim pa
75b3(rgyud 'grel): dgod par bya/ /dang po lha mo pu ra sha ti sha ri/ gnyis ba su ra ti son d+ha ri/ /gsum pa su ra ti tsan tra k+Sho'o/ /bzhi pa su ra ti ma li ni/ /lnga su ra ti bak+Shi dang/ /drug pa su ra ti ka mi ni/ /bdun pa su ra ti gra ha dang/ brgyad pa su ra nyi mu ta ma/ /
75b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas dang nye ba'i gnas lha mo bsgom/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dbang phyug rab tu bde/ /dkar po ljag gu sngo ser kha dog bzhi/ /ser dkar dmar sdo kha dog de brgyad do/ /thod pa kha TrAM? dril buTa ma ru/ /phyogs 'jin brgyad po thod pa'i phreng ba dang
75b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan khro bo yi/ /she k+Shi b+hi ma shi khaN+Di dang bcas pa/ /kar li dza tra li de bzhin du/ /rautra dza tri de bzhin tsan+d+ra dang/ /mai Di ba ka tya ka ste bcas/ /ko ro tra na rta ki kaM bu dzI/ puk+ka si Dam bi ni ma taM ge ni/ /yongs skor
75b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag zhing dang nye ba'i zhing/ /tshan do nye ba'i tshan do 'du ba nye 'du ba/ /dur khrod nyer ba'i dur khrod lha mo/ /bcu gnyis byed dmar phyed ljang thod phreng gis/ /dbu rgyan sna tshogs rgyan ldan skra grol ba/ /cung zad bsgyings shing cod pan rnams snang ldan
75b7(rgyud 'grel): thod pa kha naM 'khor lo rdo rje bsnams/ /sgo skyong bzhi ni sna tshogs mdog can la/ /mche ba gcigs shing g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum bzhugs/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma'i steng dbus na/ /mi bskyod pa yi dam tshig thor tshugs rgyan/ /thod pa kha TrAM gri gug
76a1(rgyud 'grel): mi mgo 'dzin/ /sbrul gyis rgyan can bdud rtsi'i steng gnas pa/ /thams cad phyogs kyi gos can snying rje yis/ /dga' ba bde ldan rin chen ye shes kyis/ /bdag pos spyi bor spras te rnam par brgyan/ /bde chen dbang phyug lte ba'i dbus
76a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'i/ /bzang zhing che ba'i sgrol ma rnal 'byor ma/ /dga' bde'i dbang phyug ma kun 'dab ma la/ /g.yon bskor g.yas bskor dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i/ /'gro ba'i bdag mo'i 'khor lo mang po ni/ /shi k+Sha nas gzung tsan+d+ra mdza' ma ni/ /nir ti
76a3(rgyud 'grel): rkang stabs gar gyis bskor ba'o/ /sgo bzhi kaM bu la sogs g.yon bskor gnas/ /spyi bo snying ga lte ba gsang ba brla/ /pus mo'i rim bzhin rang gi mtshan ma'i dbus/ /shin tu bzang ba ye shes lnga yi rigs/ /lus la dgod pa bruM hUM aM traM khaM/ rdo
76a4(rgyud 'grel): rje pad+ma 'khor lo la sogs dbus/ /sems la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid bkod nas ni/ /ye shes 'od zer gyis ni 'khor lo dgug /mnyam pa'i sems kyis mchod yon la sogs dang/ /ye shes bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod yon gyis/ /mchod cing
76a5(rgyud 'grel): bstod nas ye shes bdag la zhugs/ /rang gi spros nas ye shes rgu rgyun gyis/ /dbang bskur shin tu spros shing ye shes kyis/ /mchod pa spros nas sangs rgyas rnal 'byor pa/ /sems can mdza' dag sgrol ma'i gzugs su mtheng/ /bsgom par
76a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma yi bsgom pa yi/ /ngo bo mchag gi de nyid zhing rnams rim pa ltar/ /rnal 'byor ma yi man ngag dam tshig rim/ /bla ma'i rjes 'brengs bdag gis thob pa'o/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin las rtogs pa/ /ye shes
76a7(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa'i bdag nyid ngo bos rtogs/ /ye shes rtog pa'i dri bral ye shes med/ /rtog med chos kyi bdag med mnyam pa nyid/ /kha dog dbyibs dang yi ge rang bzhin med/ /rang med chos rnams kun gyi de kho na/ /mchog gi dkyil 'khor
76b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ye shes gnas/ /de kho na yi bzlas pa mchog gi mchog /de ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu bsgrub/ /bdag gi de nyid bzang po rab grub pa'i/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gi /ming gi yi ge dbus gnas thams cad la/ /dang
76b2(rgyud 'grel): po'i sa bon dang sbyar mdza' ma ru/ /hUM phaT sbyar bas sgro bzhi'i lha mo bsdus/ /de steng dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba yis/ dus rnams kun tu rnal 'byor bya ba'o/ /phyugs dag gsad nas g.yos byas lta bshos bzhin/ /rnal 'byor ma grogs bza' dang bsgom pa'o/ /
76b3(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bza' dang bza' min de bzhin du/ /btung dang btung min bgrong bya bgrod min spyad/ /rnal 'byor ma tshogs dkyil 'khor 'di dag ni/ /sdig pas ma gos mnyam nyid brtan pa'i chos/ /rnal 'byor gong ma rnal 'byor ster gsang ba'i/ /shin tu
76b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba 'og ma'i gong ma 'di/ /sba zhing mi brjod skye ba 'di la 'grub/ /dge ba bcu dang tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi ldan/ /sbyin sogs mang po gtong ba'i snying stobs can/ /mchog dang mchog min ma khengs gong du bsgom/ /ji ltar rigs kyi
76b5(rgyud 'grel): rim par son pa yi/ /gang la mos pa sna tshogs rnal 'byor ma/ /ri dags gdan can sna tshogs pad nyi la/ /bdag nyid rje btsun sgrol ma'i gzugs 'dzin na/ /sna tshogs mdog can zhal bzhi brkyang bskum du/ /yang dag brtan zhugs ljang khu ser po
76b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dmar po steng zhal g.yon dkar mche gtsigs zhal/ /thod pa zhal gyi steng gnas don grub kyi/ /dbu rgyan mi rus rgyan 'dzin skra grol ba/ /spyan gsum dmar bas mdzes pa'i gzugs can la/ /ral gri rdo rje gsor ba 'khor lo dang/ /lcags kyu
76b7(rgyud 'grel): dril bu snying kar sdigs mdzub 'chang/ /gri gus mi mgo mchog tu utpal thod/ /kha TwAM ga 'dzin tshangs pa'i lpags steng g.yogs/ /dpang phyug chen po khyab 'jug gi steng du/ /zhabs kyi pad mas bzhugs shing thugs 'khrug pa/ /sngon du
77a1(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs/ /rnal 'byor ma tshogs thams cad sna tshogs mdog /phyogs kyi gos 'dzin gsang ba spas pa yi/ /gang gi dpal ldan rnal 'byor byang phyogs kyi/ /rim pa'i rim pa gong ma'i
77a2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor mchog /brgyud pa'i rim pa thams cad bla na med/ /bsam gtan rnal 'byor ma snying bla na med/ /'dis ni bzang po'i las rnams thams cad byed/ /sbyangs pas sdig yongs spros med bsgom par bya/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor gang gis sa
77a3(rgyud 'grel): 'og dang/ /sa stengs sa bla ma lus phyi nang kun/ /lus kyi zhing gi ngo bo'i bdag nyid ni/ /gnas su ji ltar bde bar snying gar hUM/ /dpral stengs oM dang spyi bor haM mig tu/ /hUM dgod lus kun haM phaT yan lag kun/ /mda' spro ha he ho hi haM phaT/
77a4(rgyud 'grel): snying ga dpral ba spyi bo mig lus kun/ /yan lag thams cad yan lag drug lus la/ /cho ga rim bzhin 'gro ba'i rim par dgod/ /yi dam lha yi ngo bo'i baM bdag nyid du/ /'gro ba thams cad bltas te srid pa las/ /sgrol ba'i sgrol ma'i
77a5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas bsgom de mchog yin/ /dur khrod shing gcig ri khrod gnas bzhi phug /mchod rten mdza' 'khob rnal 'byor ma yi gnas/ /smad 'tshong ma gnas lam dang rgyal po'i grong/ /chu 'gram chen bo'i drung dang rtags gcig pa/ /dbang phyug che
77a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas rdzing bu steng ka 'am/ /'jig rten mkha' 'gro ma yi gnas sam gang rung du/ /brtson pas gcig /trwa? grogs med ngo bo'i bdag nyid du/ /yid dga' rnal 'byor rgyud pa zhing rgyud rigs brgyud pa'i/ /rnal 'byor ma yi bdag mo shin tu za/ /
77a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo brgyud pa ye shes brgyud pa bsgom/ /ri paM brgyud pa bla ma'i rim brgyud pa/ /mi phye ba byang sems ngo bo brtan pa 'di/ /legs par mi phyed nges pa nyi? shes pa yi/ /mi bden yul chos rnam par rtog pa spangs/ /lus ngag yid kyi rgyud
77b1(rgyud 'grel): las bsgom 'grub pa/ /spyi bo'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /steng na bdud rtsi lnga 'bab yang dag 'phro/ /gang zhig brtan pas oM yig bsgom par bya/ /mi phyed byas pa ji ltar rnal 'byor gyis/ /steng nas 'bab pa 'byung bar byed pa yi/ /'di
77b2(rgyud 'grel): yi rnal 'byor ma yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /ngang gi ngo bo gzi brjid bcas pa dang/ /kun nas sdug bsngal thams cad spangs shing zhi/ /mchod gnas chen po rje btsun sgrol ma'i sku/ /bsam gtan de kho na nyid don phyug pa'i/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems
77b3(rgyud 'grel): dpas gang gsungs pa'i/ /mchu la baM yig ngag gi lam gyi lce la a gzhag ste/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'di mchog sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog cing zhi/ /ye shes de nyid rang bzhin mthong ba 'di/ /gang zhig 'di bsgom rnal 'byor byang chub sems
77b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' yi/ /grags pa chen pos zhi gsum 'grub par shog /lha mo sgrol ma'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor ldan/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud du sgrol ma yi/ /sgrub thabs gong du bris pa rdo rje'i tshig /sems can ye shes thob byed gang yin 'di/ /ma dad
77b5(rgyud 'grel): pa la mi sbyin bya ba ngan pa dang/ /chags can khro ba can min slob ma'i bu la min/ /sdug bsngal blo can la min slob dpon gyis/ /gzhan la sgrub thabs 'di sbyin byang phyogs kyi/ /u rgyan nas 'ongs bram ze'i gnas kyi nang/ /zhing gi bu
77b6(rgyud 'grel): mo'i rnal 'byor ma tshogs rdo rje'i tshig de grub/ /bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo sgrol ma/ /u rgyan gyi rim pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje ldan mas gsungs pa'o/ /ma hA A tsa rya ratna sh+rI'i slob ma paN+Ta ta pa ra ha ta
77b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ lo tsa ba nag tsho dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur pa'o/ //rgya gar skad du/ pa li a lpa bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ gtor ma'i cho ga nyung du/ /gnas chen gyi dbang phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nyid lha yi rnal
78a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor dang ldan pas/ /ci 'byor pa'i rdzas sngon du bshams la/ /oM swa b+hA pa shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+ha rma(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho nya haM/ zhes brjod pas stong pa'i ngang las yaM yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor/ /der gnas pa'i raM las me'i
78a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor/ /de'i steng du a las thod pa che ba gcig bsam mo/ /de'i nang du ma ra bi shu mu las/ /dbus su ma las sha chen/ /shar du ra las khrag /bi las lho ru dri chen/ /nub tu shu las byang chub kyi sems/ byang du mu las
78a3(rgyud 'grel): dri cha/ da dag zhu ba las hUM oM traM a khaM ldar gyur par bsam mo/ /de dag zhu ba las de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs su dmigs la/ /de rnams zhu pas bdud rtsi dkar po'i rnam par bsams te/ steng du rim par hUM A(rgyud 'grel): oM rnam par
78a4(rgyud 'grel): bsams te sbyang ba dang sbar ba dang rtogs par bya'o/ /de nas snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros bas rnam 'byor ma'i 'khor lo bltas te/ oM a ra li ho(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUm baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sarba tsak+Sha yo gi nI ye/ badzra bi ro tsa nA ye i maM laM pra tI ts+tsha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra
78a5(rgyud 'grel): ma ma sarba sA d+ha nAM nany+tsa shAn+ti puSh+TaM sarba tra rk+ShA bA ra na gu b+hiM tiM ku ru hUM ces pa lan gsum brjod pas dbu lo/ /de nas snying ga'i tAM gi 'od zer las/ mchod yod/ me tog /bdug pa/ snang gsal/ dri cha ba/ tsAn dan/ gur kum la sogs pa dang/
78a6(rgyud 'grel): zhal zas/ bla gre gdugs/ rgyal mtshan/ ba dan/ na bza' la sogs pas mchod do/ /de nas de ma thag tu dngos grub gang 'deb pa la gsol ba btab la gshegs su gsol lo/ /rang gi snying la rjes su zhugs par bsam mo/ /gtor ma'i cho ga
78a7(rgyud 'grel): nyung du zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ /paM tha shwa ra pu dza kra ma/ bod skad du/ zhing gi dbang phyug ma'i mchod pa'i rim pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag na rdo rje sdigs
78b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzub bsnams /kha dog nag po khro bos mdzes/ /bong thung yan lag sbrul gyis brgyan/ /smin ma sma ra skra ser gyen/ /spyan gsum sdigs mdzub snying gar 'chang/ /bgegs mthar byed pa dang po ru/ /sad nas stan las langs byas te/ skad cig
78b2(rgyud 'grel): ma yi rnal 'byor bya/ /dang po gtsug lag khang la sogs par zhugs la/ phyag bya ba'i sngags ni oM sarba ta thA ka ya bAk+tsa t+ta pre na min badzra banda ni ka ro mi zhes pas so/ /stan gyi steng du 'dug ste/ gong gi bgegs mthar byed kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis phyogs
78b3(rgyud 'grel): bcur sa gol gtog cing/ oM a mri ta kuM Da li ha na ha na sarba big+ha nAM da ha da ha sarba pA baM hUM phaT/ ces pas bgegs bskrad do /oM big+ha nAM ta kri ta sa ma ye taM me pra yats+tsha A(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM a mra ta ta kuN+Da li ni swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis lhung bzad dang
78b4(rgyud 'grel): dri dang/ bdug pa'i 'khor lo yis bya'o/ /da blugs la bdung rtsi'i bsgom pa yis byin gyis brlab po/ /bdag dang gnas dang rnal 'byor bsrung bar bya'o/ /zhing gi sgrol ma'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu'i bsgom par bya ste/ /
78b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas g.yon du dril bu gnas la 'di ltar bsgom mo/ /oM shA n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko hUM/ zhes pas stong pa'i ngang las gru gsum pa'i maN+Da la gyi nang du sna tshogs pad+ma'i nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su h+riM ga sa bon yongs su gyur pa las sku
78b6(rgyud 'grel): mdog dkar mo bsgom mro/? /phyag bcu zhal lnga sngags rgyas thams cad kyi phreng ba can/ /dang po'i zhal dkar po/ /g.yas ser po/ rgyab dmar po/ g.yon in+d+ri nI la/ steng nag po g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje/ 'khor lo ral gri/ lcags kyu/
78b7(rgyud 'grel): chos 'byung ngo/ /g.yon pa rin po che/ pad+ma/ dril bu/ zhags pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi po ti'o/ /de las spros pas 'jig brten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi gzugs kyis bkug par bsam
79a1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ bgegs gdug pa can thams cad dang/ sdug bsngal gyi bye brag dang bcas pa gcod pa'i rdo rje ral gri'o/ /sems can sgrol ma'i mchod pa'i sngags zhal nas/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti sarba ta thA ga tA nAM sarba twa a pra ti hA
79a2(rgyud 'grel): ta g+ho kha nAM oM ganb+he a zhes so/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma bdag nyid kyi sngogs/ oM badzra g+ha N+Dar ni tar phra ra Ni ta saM phra ra ni ta sarba bud+d+ha k+She tra pra tsa li te pra dz+nyA pA ra mi ta nA da swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ badzra d+ha ra h+ri da yA sando Sha na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ /thams cad dag tu
79a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang khro bo'i rgyal po dang bcas pa sgra yis yang dag par bskul bar byas pa yis/ /mchod pa'i dus su rtag tu spyan 'dren pa ste/ /gang zhig gis/ bdug pa dang bcas pas dkrol
79a4(rgyud 'grel): bas so/ /dril bu 'dis spyan 'dren pa myur du bskul ba dkyil 'khor gyi nang du brtan par byed pa'o/ /cho ga 'di yis sgra yis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo myur du thob pa dang/ mthong ba dang dge ba dang/ thos pa gang gis sdig pa thams cad las rnam
79a5(rgyud 'grel): bar grol pa dang/ byang chub kyi sems skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dkrol ba des sdug bsngal thams cad med pa dang/ /nad dang/ de bzhin du 'jigs pa chen po brgyad dang/ gdug pa'i sprin gyi gnod pa dang/ rlung dang char ches pa dang/ chungs pa dang/ spongs
79a6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /bdud dang bgegs dang log 'dren dang/ de bzhin du gnod sbyin dang srin po'i mche ba dang bcas ba de thams cad phyogs bcur 'phros par 'gyur ro/ /skra gnas g.yo zhing ba rgyal ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub
79a7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dang/ lha dang rdo rje khro po dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ lha chen po rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ 'phags skyes po la sogs pa rgyal po chen po dang/ 'phrog ma dang/ gza' dang rgyu skar la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis 'od bar
79b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /byin gyis brlabs rab tu byed pa'o/ /grub pa chen po'i dngos grub ster ro/ /'dod pa'i don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o/ /tshe ring ba dang/ nad med pa dang/ mi sdug pa dang bral ba dang/ sdug pa dang bde ba chen po bla na med pa'i ye
79b2(rgyud 'grel): shes ster ba dang/ 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid du sgrol ba'o/ /mchod pa'i maN+Dal gyi dus dang/ rab tu gnas pa byed pa dang sbyin sreg gi las byed pa dang/ de bzhin du gzugs brnyan mchod pa rab tu spyod pa'i dang por 'di blangs
79b3(rgyud 'grel): te phyag bya'o/ /de bzhin du de nas rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yon pa byin gyis brlab ste/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM traM khaM sor mo rnams la rim par yi ge mthe chung gi bar du bkod pa/ de nas phyag byas rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzung ba g.yas su
79b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dug pa'i dri 'khor lo'i dung bzung la 'dis spyan drang pa'i dus/ /de bzhin du gshegs su gsal pa gnyis la rdo rje dril bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ lha dang khro
79b5(rgyud 'grel): po de bzhin du gang gi rigs kyi cho ga la/ /mtshan ma gang gi mtshan ma de/ /mngon du song ste dril bu dkrol bar bya'o/ /zhi ba la 'khor lo mdun du byas te dkrol lo/ /rgyas pa la rin po che sngon du byas la gzung ngo/ /chags pa dang/
79b6(rgyud 'grel): dgug pa dang/ dbang du bya ba la pad+ma sngon du byas te myur du dkrol bar bya'o/ /drag po'i las thams cad la sna tshogs rdo rje sngon du byas te dkrol lo/ /gang gis las kyi rjes su 'jug pa de'i 'phro ba de spros te 'ong/ /gnas
79b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhi'i gtsug lag khang dang rang gi khyim du de bzhin du gzung ba dang mchod pas/ rtag tu longs spyod chen po'i rgyu dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'di'o/ /sngags thams cad kyi gnas dran pas thams cad 'grub par byed do/ /
80a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa la mos pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das ma'i rdo rje dang dril bu las gang gi rjes su 'jug pa 'dzin pa'i cho ga de'i bsam gtan bsgom pa'i rim pa'o/ /rdo rje slob dpon chen po lha'i rigs lha nyi ma dpal gyi
80a2(rgyud 'grel): zhal gyis mdzad pa las mtshan nyid la sogs pa 'dir ma brjod do/ g.yas su gnas pa'i rdo rje las oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba A t+ma ko nya haM/ zhes stong pa'i ngang las pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du hUM gyur pa las/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog
80a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas pa thugs kar rdo rje/ /g.yon pa dril bu dkur brten pa/ skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ zhe pa'o/ rin po che'i rgyan dang kha dog sna tshogs pa'i dar gyis bkris pa bsgom mo/ /de las 'od zer spris pas
80a4(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs par gyur te thim pas rdo rjer gyur pa g.yas pas bzung la oM badzra rA dza hUM/ zhes pas mchod pas mchod do/ /yi ge brgya pa'i sngags brjod pas maN+Dal bdud rtsi ldar gtor la/ /oM ma hA maN+Dal bi d+hi
80a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ de bzhin du sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs las 'byung ba bzhin gyin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags kyis mchod pa la sogs pa/ bsang gtor bya ste/ oM badzra A rya tA ra a rg+haM swAhA/ oM badzra puShpe swAhA/ oM badzra d+hu be swA hA/ oM badzra de pe swAhA/ oM badzra gand+he swAhA
80a6(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra ne be dya swAhA/ dril bu mchod par byas la srin lag gi sor mo yis rdo rje bzung ba/ /oM mi di ni ni badzra b+hA ba hUM/ oM badzra a rdza ni gri he hUM/ oM badzra su ka sa na hUM/ sngags gsum po 'dis byin gyis brlab bo/ /bdag nyid
80a7(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa ni g.yon pa'i srin lag mthe bos dri zhim po bsnams zhing/ lha mo'i 'khor lo'i sngags kyi gnas chen gyi rnams la mchod pa ma lus pa yid kyis bya'o/ /de nas bdud rtsi lnga yis mchod la btung ngo/ /de nas thang sku la
80b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i rten la mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod do/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu bzung la ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs pa'i sngags brjod do/ /de bzhin du yi ge brgya pa dang dril bu'i sngags dang/ /de nas sgrol ma'i 'khor lo'i sngags rnams bzlas
80b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas lha mo rang rang gi sngags kyis mchod yon la sogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad dbul lo/ /bdug pa'i dus su dril bu dkrol zhing/ de nas sgrol ma'i 'khor lo'i rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /gtor ma dang bdud rtsi lngas mchod do/ /de nas
80b3(rgyud 'grel): bstod pas bstod pa dang/ yan lag bdun pa dang smon lam gdab po/ /de nas yi ge brgya pa brjod la/ /oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang
80b4(rgyud 'grel): byon par mdzad du gsol/ /ces pas ye shes kyi 'khor lo phyir gshegs su gsol/ /bsgoms pa rnams rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las nang du gshegs su gsol/ zhing gi dbang phyug ma'i mchod pa'i rim pa rdzogs so// //
80b5(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta pa ra he ta dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ tat+twa kA ri kA/ bod skad du/ de kho na nyid kyi tshig le'ur byas pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag
80b6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /rtog pa'i dra ba sbangs pa yi/ /zab mo rnam pa kun la khyab/ /kun nas 'phro ba grangs med pa/ /kun tu bzang po phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig snying gi pad+ma lte ba la gnas pa/ mar me 'bar ba phra ba lta zhing mi bskyod sems/ /
80b7(rgyud 'grel): yul la mi 'jug khams gsum thams cad gnyis med 'byung/ /chos dbyings yang dag nyid la phyag 'tshal bdag mcho go/ nang du gzhug pa dpang po thams cad g.yo ba'i rta/ /gang shes ma lus rgyal ba mnyam 'gyur khams gsum la/
81a1(rgyud 'grel): phan pa bskyed pa rab tu 'byung ba mthong ba 'di/ /'byung ba rtag tu nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i dpal/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor pa/ /chos rjes dran pa'i sbom pa pos/ /chos rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /chos sku'i
81a2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin 'byung ba po/ /dbus su mar me'i rnam par shes/ /ye shes mchog gi rtogs pa yi/ /rgyun du 'bar bsgom rtag par ni/ /'bar ba de la the tshom med/ /snying la rtag tu gnas pa yi/ /yi ge rnam med thig le gcig /de nyid bsgom pa'i
81a3(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu de/ /ye shes bskyed pa mchog gi gnas/ /gnas 'dir rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /snying rje'i sems kyis rol cing gnas/ /gnas 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba gsum/ /de dag thams cad mchod
81a4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di sngon lam/ /de rnams gsal bar de nyid rtag tu 'dir/ /mchod pa 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad dang/ /nang gi bdag nyid rdo rje rnal 'byor la/ /rnal 'byor rdo rje 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje mchod 'byung ba/ /mchod pa'i lam 'di 'byung ba'o/ /
81a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa lnga yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /myur bar sangs rgyas nyid thob bo/ /lnga yis mchod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /de dag rgyud du bshad pa yin/ /phyi yi mchod pa'i sems ni gzhan/ /nges pa'i rang bzhin sems goms bya/ /lha yi 'byung gnas
81a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa la/ /de ni yid kyi mchod pa chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu brtse bar dgongs/ /bshad pa chung du yang dag 'byung ba 'di/ /rgyud du don dam med pa de nyid de/ /don dam bde ba yang dag 'byung ba 'di/ /bshad dam ma
81a7(rgyud 'grel): bshad ci yang med pa'o/ /gnas chen nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bye brag kun/ /zhing chen 'di dag tu ni yang dag zhugs/ /zhing dag tu ni 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /ngal du ba las ni de yin de nyid min/ /de ni de kho na nyid thob pa min/ /mi bden de dag kha cig
81b1(rgyud 'grel): tsam yang med/ /des na kho na yod skyes bu de/ /mi bden de dag kha cig tsam yang med/ /zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang tshan do rnams/ /der ni phyin pas dri ma med pa 'byung/ /des na khro 'am grags par 'dod pa yis/ /skyes bu zhing du 'gro bar byed pa de/
81b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi gong du brjod pa de nyid do/ /sems can mos pa'i sems kyis rnal 'byor pa/ /bsam gtan mchog las bde ba gzhan na med/ /khams dub de dag phyi rol rnal 'byor yin/ /de bas 'di ltar bsam gtan las bya'o/ /khams dub 'di
81b3(rgyud 'grel): dag bskor ba ni/ /phyi rol pa yi rnal 'byor yin/ /des na phyi rol spang bar bya'o/ /gnas dang rnal 'byor rol pa yis/ /mthong ba rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma/ /rnam par dag pa'i ye shes spyan/ /dpal ldan rnal 'byor rab tu brtan/ /snying rje chen
81b4(rgyud 'grel): ? sems kyis so/ /de yis mchog gi dngos grub dag /ji ltar 'dod pa ster ba 'grub/ /ye shes chags bral rnal 'byor pa/ /sgrub pa rab tu nges pa 'di/ /sna tshogs 'bad pas yang dag ldan/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa cung zad tsam/ /de nyid byas
81b5(rgyud 'grel): bas brtul zhugs gnas/ /gang gang rab tu spyod pa byas/ /bza' ba brtan pa brtul zhugs can/ /bsam gtan bza' ba yid skyes pa/ /smyon pa'i spyod pa gzugs can de/ /ji ltar gcer bu 'am gcer bu min/ /gang dang gang yin de dang des
81b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lha bsgom byed pa rnams/ /de kho na nyid rnam par bsam/ /zla drug rim pa bden pa la/ /lkugs pa lta bur rab tu gnas/ /rnal 'byor chen po mar ma 'bar/ /ye shes mchog 'bar des mthong nas/ /rnal 'byor ma des g.yog byed do/
81b7(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar pad+ma bzang po la/ /ngang pa dga' bas dral du gnas/ /dpal ldan rdo rje yang dag par/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jig rten 'di/ /sems can kun gyi don byed pa/ /'dir ni bdag gis
82a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi don du/ /dag pa'i sems kyis byas pa yin/ /'di dag snying rje cung zad tsam gyis ni/ /gang brjod des na 'byung bar 'gyur ba yi/ /de nyid sgras pa bdag gis rgyas ma byas/ /bla ma'i drin bzung yang dag mdza' la
82a2(rgyud 'grel): mos/ /sems sed dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags stobs kyis/ /bshes gnyen mi 'gyur mngon par rjes yi rang/ /de kho na nyid man ngag yang dag bris/ /'phel ba bdag gis gang thob 'di yis sems can gyi/ /snying po'i sgom mchog spyod bzang myur
82a3(rgyud 'grel): du dga' / /rin chen 'od zer 'jig rten kun la shog /de kho na nyid kyis man ngag rdzogs so// //paN+Ti ta pa ra he ta dang/ lo tsa ba nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ tat+ta kA ri
82a4(rgyud 'grel): kra? u pa de sha bri t+ti nA ma(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ de kho na nyid kyi tshig le'ur byas pa'i man ngag gi 'grel pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig snying gi pad+ma'i lte ba la gnas pa/ /mar me 'bar ba phra ba'i lta zhing mi
82a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyod sems/ /yul la mi 'jug khams gsum thams cad gnyis med 'byung/ /chos dbyings yang dag nyid la phyag 'tshal bdag mchog go /gang zhig ces pa chos kyi dbyings so/ /phyag 'tshal chos kyi dbyings yang dag pa'i mdza' 
82a6(rgyud 'grel): la'o/ /gang zhig chos kyi dbyings ni khams gsum thams cad gnyis med du 'byung ba'i yang dag pa'i mdza' 'o/ /yul la mi 'jug de la phyag 'tshal te/ /snying po'i pad+ma'i lte ba la gnas pa ces pa/ /snying ni snying la pad+ma 'dang ma
82a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa'o/ /kha dog dmar po 'byung ba bzhi rang bzhin ni/ /de lte ba'i dbus su zla ba nyi ma'i mchog gnas pa'o/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rang bzhin de la zla ba sa dang chu'i rang bzhin nyi ma me dang rlung gi rang bzhin no/ /de ltar lti pa'i dbus su
82b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa de bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings de bzhin nyid yang dag pa'i mdza' o/ /mar me 'bar ba zhes pa gnyis su med pa 'bar ba rab tu mthong bar song ba'o/ /ci 'di gsungs pa phra bar lta zhing ces pa/ /phra ba ni bcom ldan 'das te shin tu phra
82b2(rgyud 'grel): bas kyang ches phra ba'i rdo rje chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig pa'o/ /lta zhing ces pa pad+ma'i rtsa ba lta bur gsal bar ro/ /mi bskyod sems pa ces pa des sems rtsi gcig pa'i rgyud du 'bab pa rtag tu bya'o/ /ci 'dir gsungs pa khams gsum
82b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa dag /gnyis su med par song ba yang dag par bsdus pa mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gcig par/ /thams cad nam mkha' i rnam par rab tu mthong ba'i don no/ /gong du brjod pa'i bsam gtan gyi
82b4(rgyud 'grel): yid rang gi tshul gcig pa yang dag par bsdus pa de 'di'o/ /yang dag brjod par byas te 'gro ba'i de kho na nyid gcig pu 'di gnyis su med pa nyid song ba kha cig cung zad spros pa med par mar me 'bar ba de la yon tan 'di 'byung ba'o/ /
82b5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal te/ zhes pa nyid la phyag 'tshal nas ci byed na 'di gsungs pa/ nang du gzhug pa dpang po thams cad g.yo ba'i rta/ ye shes ma lus rgyal ba mnyam 'byung khams gsum la/ /phan pa bskyed
82b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rab tu 'byung ba thob pa 'di/ /'byung ba rtag tu nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes pa'o/ /nang du gzhug pa zhes pa rnam par g.yeng bar 'gro ba'i spangs pa brjod pa'o/ /ye shes yang dag pa'i mdza' mthong ba'i spyan 'byung ba'o/ /rang
82b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byung gi rnal 'byor dri ma med pa'i dpal 'od shes pa de/ dpa' bo mchog gang yin pa'i dbang po de nam mkha' i rnam par 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor gang yin pa'o/ /nang du zhes pa phyi rol tu g.yeng ba thams cad kyi sems nang du gzhug pas 'phro ba'i
83a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yo thams cad bcings pa ni sde drug gi dbang po'i rta'o/ /rang gi yul 'dod pa'i sems 'di ni byed pa bcings pa'i rnal 'byor bya ba'i skyil mo krung ngo/ /de nas phyis dri ma dang bral bar 'byung ngo/ /ye shes gang 'byung
83a2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pas ye shes ma lus sogs pa kun nas rgyal ba las rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba'o/ /mnyam 'byung ni skad 'byung ba lhung bzod ltar 'byung ba'i gnas pa 'di gsungs pa 'byung ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
83a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi ye shes bskyed pa/ gzhan ma yin pa'i mchog rgyal pa'o/ /de'i rigs khams gsum pa'o/ /khams gsum pa 'di dag thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyu 'byung ba rnams so/ /gsung gi ngo bo ye shes su byed pa 'di'i don yin no/ /'di ni 'byung ba
83a4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs phra ba de 'byung ba'o/ /bsgom pa po nam mkha' i dpe dang nam mkha' i de nyid dri ma med pa'i dpal lo/ /bzang po gang zhig de kho na nyid gsum pa'o/ /rnam par rtog pa bsdus nas 'dzin pa de nyid gnyis kyi tshul gyis 'gro bar mthong ba gang brjod
83a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ rmongs pa chen po'i rnam par rtog pas 'khor bar ltung ba'o/ /rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa de/ /nam mkha' i rnam par mthong ba 'di rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor pas/ /chos rjes dran pa'i bsgom pa
83a6(rgyud 'grel): pos/ chos rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /chos sku'i rang bzhin 'byung ba'o/ /ci brjod pa des bcom ldan 'das bsgom pa 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhes pa la sogs pa ni/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'phel ba 'di
83a7(rgyud 'grel): ltar sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i tshul gyis rang bzhin de'i dgus na chos kyi dbyings kyi bcom ldan 'das so/ /de'i grogs rnal 'byor pa 'di'i sgyu ma rnal 'byor ji skad gsungs pa ni/ chos rjes dran pa'i bsgom pa pos zhes pa chos 'di
83b1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbus su gnas pa/ gong du brjod pa de dag ni bsgom pa ni/ de nas rnal 'byor pas chos kyi dbyings yang dag par bskyed la nam mkha' i rnam par rab tu 'byung bar song ba'i chos sku 'byung ba'o/ /de'i don ni 'di'i steng du
83b2(rgyud 'grel): thig le bzhi rnams la lha mo bzhi rdzogs pa'o/ /lte ba'i thig le las bcom ldan 'das rdzogs par ro/ /rang gi yi dam gyi lha bsam par bya'o/ /de'i thugs kar pad+ma'i lte ba la chos kyi dbyings bsam ma/ /gnas pa de bul ba bul bar
83b3(rgyud 'grel): khad kyis rim gyis ji ltar rnal 'byor bsgom pa goms par bya'o/ /de nyid zhi ba'i rnam par 'jug pa zhugs gang du rtsa gnyis 'gog pa de dag gis/ /'gog pa'i rnam pa rang bzhin med pa nyid goms par bya ba 'di de brjod pa/ gong
83b4(rgyud 'grel): nas gong du khad kyis rim par rang bzhin med pa nyid 'byung ba'o/ /man ngag 'dis zhi pa gcig pu'i bde ba thob pa'o/ /dbus su mar me'i rnam par shes/ /ye shes mchog gi rtog pa yi/ /rgyun du 'bar bsgom rtag par ni/ /'bar ba de la the tshom
83b5(rgyud 'grel): med/ ces pas dbus su mar me la sogs pa 'di dbus kyi mar me 'di bskyed pa mthong ste/ dbus kyi mar me rnam par shes pa'am/ sems dang yid shes gang gsungs pa de rnam par shes pa 'di'i rnam grangs so/ /de ni dbus su mar me'i rnam
83b6(rgyud 'grel): par shes pa/ snying ga'i pad+ma'i ge sar gyi dbus su song pa bsgom pa'i yid g.yo ba med pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o/ /mchog gi rtogs pa de kho na nyid kyi dpe 'di nyid rgyun du mi g.yo bar rnal 'byor
83b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa bsam par bya'o/ /de dag bsgom pa goms pas rgyun chad med pa'i tshul du bsgom pa'i yid nyid do/ /de lta bas na byed pa 'bar ba 'di snying gi mar me de don 'di'o/ /bum pa can gyi byed par gnas pa 'am myur du ye shes kyi
84a1(rgyud 'grel): gtum mos 'gog pa'i rnal 'byor 'di brjod pa/ /'byung rdub 'gog pa'i 'bar ba'i bsam gtan 'dis/ /de nyid med pa kun nas byed pa la the tshom ma byed cig /thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung ji lta ba yin no/ /snying la
84a2(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu gnas pa yi/ /yi ge rnams med thig la gcig /de nyid bsgom pa'i skyes bu de/ /ye shes bskyed pa mchog gis gnas zhes pa la snying la zhes pa/ snying gi pad+ma'i gi sar gyi dbus su phra ba'i thig le rdo rje rang bzhin du gnas pa/ dus
84a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du brtan par gnas pa ci yang med pa rnams/ /rang gi ngo bo med pa yi ge med pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ rang gi rnam pa rnam par shes pa nang du gnas pa'i rang bzhin no/ /nam mkha' i rnam par rab tu snang ba de nyid 'di'i rnam par bsgom pa ste
84a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes skye ba'o/ /ci nyan thos la sogs pas ma rtogs pa de/ mchog tu rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /gnas 'dir rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /snying rje'i sems kyis rol cing gnas/ /gnas 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad
84a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba gsum/ zhes pa ni/ phyag 'tshal ba sngon du byas nas/ tshigs su bcad pa lnga'i de kho na nyid du bstan te/ /da ni phyi rol gyi mchod pas g.yengs par 'gyur bas nge spangs par gsungs te/ 'di ni de'i
84a6(rgyud 'grel): snying ga'i pad+ma'i ge sar gyi dbus su/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa dang bcom ldan 'das so/ /rtog pa'i dra ba rnam bsal ba/ snying rje chen po'i rigs kyis gnas/ /gnas 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /sems kyi rang bzhin de
84a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /de ni rig pa gang zhig rtog pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad ces pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ces pa byams pa la sogs pa'o/ /byang chung ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes so/ /sems gang
84b1(rgyud 'grel): la mos pa 'di dag de nyid du gsung gis gsungs pa'o/ /byang chub med cing ming med pa/ /gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rtog pa las grol ba'i ye shes kyi sems ni 'di byang chub dran pa 'di'o/ /gcig min pa'i 'gro ba gsum byung ba
84b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ de gsungs pa 'gro ba gsum ste de'i rnam par snang zhes pa 'byung ba'o/ /'di ltar khams gsum 'di thams cad sems kyis byas pas 'byung ba'o/ /phyi rol dang nang gi 'gro ba'i bdag nyid med par rab tu snang ba'o/ /rgyal ba'i sras po yi rnam
84b3(rgyud 'grel): par khams gsum la 'di rnal 'byor 'byung bgod du gsungs pa'o/ /de dag thams cad mtshod pa 'di sngon lam/ /de rnams mar me de nyid rtag tu 'dir/ /mchod pa de 'dir rgyal ba thams cad dang/ /ces pa la sogs pa gang zhig nges
84b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin thig le'i rgyal po'i mchod pa des/ dus thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa'o/ /gzhan gyi don gyi phyi rol gyi mchod pa sbyongs la/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pa g.yeng ba de dag gong du brjod pa 'di dag
84b5(rgyud 'grel): bra ba'i/ /rdo rje mgon po bcom ldan 'das snang ba'o/ /rnam par blta zhing rab tu blta ba'i gnyis su med pa'i lha mchod pa'o/ /ci phyi rol gyi mchod pa g.yeng bar byed pa'o/ /nang gi bdag nyid rnal 'byor la rdo rje rnal 'byor 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas
84b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mchod 'byung ba/ /mchod pa lnga yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /'di dag mchod pa med pa nang gi bdag nyid 'di brjod pa bdag nyid rdo rje rnal 'byor brjod de/ thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa 'di gsungs pa/ dman pa'i bsam pa 'di gsungs pa'o/ /
84b7(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dang mthun par rdo rje mi 'jigs pa'i rnal 'byor byed pa rdo rje'o/ /de gsungs pa'o/ /de nas yang rdo rje mchod pa 'di'i bdag nyid mi 'jigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa nyid la byed pa ni rdo rje mkhas pa'o
85a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa lnga yi rnal 'byor pa/ /myur bar sangs rgyas nyid thob bo/ /de dag rgyud du bshad pa yin/ /phyi rol mchod pa'i sems ni gzhan shin tu byas pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis zung du bshad pa'i rgyal ba'i mchod
85a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /mchod pa lnga'i me tog la sogs pas phyi nang gi bdag nyid gong du brjod pa'o/ mchod pa des ni myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'o/ /yod pa 'di dag rgyud du gsungs pa'i phyir rol du 'di bsdus pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /nges pa'i rang bzhin sems
85a3(rgyud 'grel): goms bya/ /lha yi 'byung gnas bsgom pa'o/ yid kyi mchod pa chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu brtse bas dgongs/ /'di mchod pa zhes pa gzhan med pa'o/ /de nyid med pa'i ngo bo mtshan nyid ci yang med pa 'di brjod do/ /rang bzhin med
85a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ming gi sgra ni gzung ba rang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba yin/ /de rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bor gnas de ltar goms par byas pa las/ de byed par rang gi lha'i rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de ni rang gi yid kyi mchod pa chen po yi/ /de'i tshe
85a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje rnal 'byor ma brtse bas thugs dgyes par byed pa'o/ /ci sa na phyi rol gyi mchod pa g.yeng bas byed pas so/ /bshad pa cung zad yang dag 'byung ba ni/ /rgyun du don dam min pa de nyid de/ /don dam pa dzan pa yang
85a6(rgyud 'grel): dag 'gyur ba 'di/ /bshad dam ma bshad 'di la ci yang med/ /bstan bcos su med par brjod bdag gi rnal 'byor brtan par gnas pa 'di gsungs pa'o/ /yod pa 'dir bshad pa 'jig rten pa 'dul ba'i don du sangs rgyas kyi
85a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyud du gsungs pa'o/ /de nyid med par yang don dam par de/ de nyid sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rigs rgyas par mdzad pa 'di rnam par mi rtog pa nyid do/ /gnas che n+nyi? shu rtsa bzhi'i bye brag kun/ /zhing chen 'di dag tu ni yang dag zhugs so/ /
85b1(rgyud 'grel): zhing dag tu ni 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /ngal dub las yin de ni de nyid min/ /phyi rol gyi g.yeng bas yid g.yeng ba yid zhi bsam pa dad ldan pas mi bya'o zhes gsungs so/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi zhes pa la sogs pas 'di nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bye brag tu byed pa
85b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing bzhi'i be brag ces pa la sogs pa dpag tu med pa/ de'i zhing la sogs pa'i byed pa sems kyi rdo rje rnam par bzhugs pa'o/ /'di'i ces pa nye bar mi bskor ba gsungs pa/ de skad bskong bas khams ngal dub sdug bsngal gyi bya ba 'od bar byed
85b3(rgyud 'grel): pas de kho na'i rnal 'byor chen po rnams gang des ni de thob pa'o/ /de ma yin pa mi bden pa de dag kha cig tsam yang med/ /des na de kho na yong skyes bu de/ /mi bden de dag kha cig tsam yang med/ /zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang tsha nod rnams/ /der ni phyin
85b4(rgyud 'grel): pas dri ma med pa 'byung/ /de nas khro ba 'am grags pa 'dod pa yis/ /skyes dgu zhing du 'gro bar byed pa skye/ /med de rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ zhing la sogs pa bskor bas dri ma med par 'byung ngo/ /de la bdag rgol pa'i sems
85b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag zhing la sogs pa rang zhing dang nye ba'i zhing gi mchog tu byed pa dri ma med pa 'byung zhes pa/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dgongs pa yang dag par 'byung ba 'di ngo mtshar che'o/ /de nas gang la bskor bas stobs nyams par byed pa'i bya ba/ khyim
85b6(rgyud 'grel): mang po'o bya ba gang g.yeng ba'i sems gnyis med par zhi ba la sogs pa'i ming gi grags pa thob kyi bzang po ma yin par 'byung ba'o/ /bdag gi gong du de nyid de/ /sems can mos pa'i sems kyi rnal 'byor pa/ /bsam gtan mchog las
85b7(rgyud 'grel): bde ba gzhan na med/ /de bas 'di ltar bsam gtan las bya'o/ /stobs kyis de dag bskong bas brjod du med pa dri ma med pa mthong zhing myong ba de don dam par yang med pa'o/ /bsam gtan zhes pa 'di bsam gtan gyi sems rtse gcig
86a1(rgyud 'grel): pa de las byung ba'i bde ba gzhan ci yang med de/ de nyid bsam gtan gyi bya ba nyin mtshan du bya'o/ /khams dub de dag bskor ba ni/ /phyi rol pa yi rnal 'byor yin/ /des na phyi rol spangs par bya/ /gnas bya rnal 'byor
86a2(rgyud 'grel): rol pa yis/ /dub pa zhes pa de dag phyi rol pa mngon par gnas pas/ /khams dub nges par ster bar 'gro ba'i phyi rol gyi bya ba phar la spang ngo/ /de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor ba rnam par gnas pa rnal 'byor rol ba'i bde ba'o/ /mthong ba rdo rje rnal 'byor
86a3(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /rnam par dag pa'i ye shes sbyan/ /skal ldan rnal 'byor rab tu brtan/ /snying rje chen po sems kyis so/ /brtse ba'i dbang gis gnas pa 'di la/ /bsam gtan pas mthong ba 'dis bskor ba'i bya ba med pa'o/ /de yis mchog gis dngos
86a4(rgyud 'grel): grub dang/ /ji ltar 'dod pa ster ba 'grub/ /ye shes chags bral rnal 'byor pa/ /bsgrub pa rab tu nges pa 'dis/ /de dag ci yi ngo bor mthong/ /zhes pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje ma brtse ba'i dbang gi bden pa mchog gi dngos grub ye shes ji ltar
86a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa'o/ /gzhan yang ral gri la sogs pa ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa gang yin pa/ /ye shes bsgrub pa thams cad rab tu byed pa'o/ /sna tshogs 'bad pas yang dag ldan/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa cung zad tsam/ /de
86a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid byas pa brtul zhugs gnas/ /gang gang rab tu spyod pa bya/ /ye shes chags bral bsgrub pa yis/ /ci brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa 'di btang snyoms 'di zhes pa/ sna tshogs zhes pa 'di rab tu byed pa'i theg pa'i lus g.yeng pa'i
86a7(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa mi brjod do/ /'di ltar rgyun tu gnas pas bskor bar mi bya/ /de kho na nyid kyi brtul shugs spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang po'i dbang du brtul shugs kyi spyod pa gsungs pa'o/ /gang gang rab tu spyod pa byas/ /
86b1(rgyud 'grel): bza' ba brtan pa brtul zhugs can/ /bsam gtan bza' ba yid bskyed pa/ /smyon pa'i spyod pa brtul zhugs can/ /med par ston pa'i rgyun du ji ltar bza' ba la gnas pas 'di la ci bya zhes brjod do/ /gang gang zhes pa rab tu bza' ba 'am rab
86b2(rgyud 'grel): tu bza' ba min/ /bslangs pa 'am ma bslangs pa 'am/ mos pas byin pa 'am/ mos pa med pas byin pa 'am/ /bza' bar gnas pa bza' ba'i bya ba bya/ /brtul shugs can gyis brtul shugs so/ /bstan bcos nas bzung ba'i spyod pa'i brtul
86b3(rgyud 'grel): zhugs kyi sdom pa mi bya'o/ /nyin mtshan du bsam gtan gyi bza' ba 'di bza' ba'o/ /nges par 'byung ba brtan par smyon pa'i rnam pas gnas par bya'o/ /gzhan gyi drung du 'gro ba g.yeng ba'i ngo bo'o/ /de ltar gcer bus gcer bu min/ /gang dang
86b4(rgyud 'grel): gang yid de dang des/ /rang gi lta sgom byed pa rnams/ /de kho
86b5(rgyud 'grel): na nyid rnams bsam par bya/ /mgo la sogs pa'i slongs mo g.yeng ba'i spyod ba brtul shugs kyi gtam la rtog pa'i rtsa ba byed pa 'di gsungs pa/ /bya ba'i rgyud la sogs par gcer
86b6(rgyud 'grel): bu la sogs spangs pa dang/ ci ltar drung du gnas pa'i rgyud 'dir gsungs pa'o/ /bzhi mdo la sogs par gang dang gang du gnas pa'i de la skyil krung bza' bas/ /nyin mtshan dus thams cad du bzlas pas de gang gis lus dka' ba 'di'o/ /
86b7(rgyud 'grel): de dang de la sogs pa gang gis gnas kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i de nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /bzla drug rim pas bden pa la/ /lkugs pa lta rung rab tu gnas/ /rnal 'byor chen po mar me 'bar/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma des g.yog byed do/ /
86b8(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa mang po 'di yis ci zhig bya/ /ye shes dang rnam par shes pa 'di gsungs so/ /zla drug ces pa la sogs par bden par 'di zla drug gis sangs rgyas kyi dngos grub po/ /ci'i phyir 'gro ba dang 'grogs par dka' ba 'di gsungs pa mi smra ba la
87a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa/ dngos po'i dbang du byas pa mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs 'dis/ /rnal 'byor chen po 'bar bas rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma drung du byon nas bzang bor byed do/ /ye shes mcho ga 'bar des mthong nas/ /rnal 'byor ma des
87a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yog byed do/ /ji ltar pad+ma bzang po la/ /dang pa dga' ba dral du gnas ye shes pa la sogs pa ye shes de rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'i rnam pas 'bar ba'i snang gsal de bzang po de la gsal zhing sna ngo/ /ji ltar pad+ma 'byung ba
87a3(rgyud 'grel): la rgyas pa la dang pa dral du 'jug pa ltar mkha' 'gro'o/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin yang dag /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gzugs brnyan lta bu'i 'jig rten 'di/ /sems can kun gyi don byed pa'o/ /dpal ldan la sogs pa 'dis
87a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu bstan te/ dpal legs par rtogs pa'o/ /'di ni bdag gis sems can gyi don du/ /dag pa'i sems can rnams kyi gang byas pa/ /'di dag snying rje cung zad tsam gyis ni/ /gang brjod des ni 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /nges par bzung
87a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i? dgongs pa brjod pa'o/ /'di dag la sogs pa bde bar rtogs pa'o/ /de nyid spas pa bdag gis rgyas ma byas/ /bla ma'i drin bzung yang dag mdza' la mos/ /sems bzang pa yi dge ba bsags stobs kyis/ /rgyas ma byas zhes pa la
87a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs de cig /de nyid pa'i de kho na nyid ma brjod sbas pas bla ma'i drin gyis sems can bzung ba'o/ /bshes gnyen mi 'gyur rjes yi rang/ /de kho na nyid man ngag yang dag bris/ /dge ba bdag gis gang thob 'di yis sems can gyi/ /
87a7(rgyud 'grel): snying po sgom mchog spyod bzang myur du dga' / /ma 'ongs pa na mi brtan pa la gsol 'debs 'di brjod/ /sems kyis bsags pa zhes pa ni bsags pa'i sems ni dus ring por dge ba 'phel ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i lam byas pa'o/ /de dag
87b1(rgyud 'grel): thob par gnas pa 'di yis sems kyis rlabs 'phel ba 'di ltar byas pa sred cing zhen pas grub pa thob pa'o/ /myong ba gang yin pa byung ba brtan pa mi rtog pa byed pa 'di la yid la byed pa bzang po 'di/ thams cad du thams cad rlabs byed pa'o/
87b2(rgyud 'grel): de kho na nyid kyi man ngag yang dag par bris pa'i bdag gis bsod nams 'phel ba de yis 'jig rten thams cad la de kho na nyid kyi rin po che ltar gsal ba rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig /de kho na nyid kyi man ngag bris pa'i bsod nams gang des
