87b3(rgyud 'grel): thob pa 'di brjod pa'o/ /de kho na nyi 'di zhes pa la sogs pa legs par go ba rdzogs so// //de kho na nyid kyi man ngag mkhas pa chen po slob dpon su dza ya sh+rI b+ha dra'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar gyi
87b4(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa rin chen dpal gyi zhabs la gtugs pa/ paN+Di ta pa ra he ta dang/ lo tsa ba nag tsho dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ pi thi kra ma tA da bi sto traM/ bod skad du/ gnas chen gyi
87b5(rgyud 'grel): rim pa'i lha mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye dang mdza' dbus rnam pa med/ /e ye yi ge'i rigs las skyes/ /ye shes bdud rtsi'i khu bas myos/ /zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal/ /
87b6(rgyud 'grel): bco lda'i dus kyi rnam pa med/ /dus med thig le'i tshul gnas pa/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas/ /zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal/ dang po mdza' dang dbus ma'i tshul/ /rigs lda'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/ /ye shes lnga ni
87b7(rgyud 'grel): gcig gi tshul/ /zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung/ /nam mkha' rnam pa thams cad du/ /khams lnga yi ni rnam pa'i tshul/ /zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal/ /A li kA li las byung ba/ /dbyangs dang
88a1(rgyud 'grel): gsal byed thams cad la/ /yi ge med pa'i rnam pa thob/ /zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal/ /sku gsum rigs la 'jug pa'i tshul/ /thar lam rab tu 'byung ba yi/ /rigs kyi tshul med lhag pa'i tshul/ /zhing
88a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal/ /stong phrag bdun bcu gnyis gnas pa'i/ /rtsa yi bu ga'i sbubs kyi nang/ /a ba d+hu tI'i dbus gnas pa/ /zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal/ /stong pa shin tu stong pa dang/ /stong pa chen po gong du gnas/ /
88a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad stong pa steng na gnas/ /zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal/ /brjod pa tsam las skye 'gag med/ /brjod pa'i mdza' la gnas pa dang/ /tshig bzhi dag gi gong du 'pho/ /zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal/ /nang du rang la
88a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa yi/ /'khor lo bzhi yi rnam par gnas/ /byang chub lhag pa'i tshul gnas pa'i/ /zhi gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag gi yul/ /zhing gi 'dren pa'i lha mo de/ /zhing bzhir snyoms par gnas pa yis/ /
88a5(rgyud 'grel): zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal/ /mu stegs lta ba khyab 'jug ma/ /nyi ma tshangs pa'i rang bzhin kun/ /ci yang med pa'i gzugs 'dzin ma/ /zhing gnas lha mo nyid phyag 'tshal/ /oM gyi gsang sngags 'di nyid la/ /bdag gis
88a6(rgyud 'grel): mos pa'i sems kyis ni/ /mi bskyod rdo rje byas pa yis/ /sems can rjes su 'dzin par shog /gnas chen gyi lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta pa ra he ta dang/ lo tsa ba tshul khrims rgyal mtshan
88a7(rgyud 'grel): gyis bsgyur ba'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ pi thi shwa ra sto tra/ bod skad du/ zhing gi dbang phyug ma'i bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das zhing gi dbang phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun rtog thams
88b1(rgyud 'grel): cad yang dag 'phrog /dngos rnams rang bzhin ngo bo ni/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /snying rje'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khrul pas khyab pa thams cad du/ /zhabs kyis mnan nas rnam par spangs/ /nyon mongs thams cad
88b2(rgyud 'grel): bsal ba yi/ /zhing gi dbang phyug phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thams cad gnyis med mchog tu spangs/ /don rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /rnam pa can ni rnam pa med/ /byang chub gzugs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sku mdog dmar mo
88b3(rgyud 'grel): zhal bzhi ma/ /dga' ba la sogs gzigs pa yi/ /khro mo'i zhal gsum 'od 'phro ma/ /zhi ba'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phyag 'tshal mgo po'i phreng ba ma/ /lnga lnga steng du yongs su 'dzin/ /skyil krung phyeng pa'i gar gyis gnas/ /
88b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du gzigs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /snying gi pad+ma'i dbus su ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas/ /snying rje yis ni khros pa'i thugs/ /zhing gi dbang phyug phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lhung bzed ral gri rdo rje dang/ /Da ma ru ni
88b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas su gnas/ /g.yon na kha TwAM dril bu dang/ /rin chen utpal bsteng phyag 'tshal/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor nang na gnas/ /stag gis pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /sna tshogs pang zla'i dkyil na gnas/ /sbyan gsum ma la phyag
88b6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstod/ /rtsa gsum pa yi nang na gnas/ /dgug pa gsum ni yang dag 'phrog /ngo bo gsum ni yang dag len/ /sku gsum bsnyems la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nyid gsum gyi gzugs mdzes ma/ /sdug bsngal
88b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum po spangs pa yi/ /su 'og sa steng sa bla khyab/ /rang bzhin ma la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i zhing rnams su/ /rnal 'byor ma ni nyi shu bzhi/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas na bzhugs/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bu li?
89a1(rgyud 'grel): ra ma la pa'i zhing/ /legs dga' rnal 'byor dbang phyug ma/ /lha mo dkar mo phyag bzhim/ /spyi bor gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /legs dga' 'dzin ma rnal 'byor ma/ /dzA laM d+ha ra spyi gtsug bzhugs/ /ljang gu
89a2(rgyud 'grel): mgo bo'i phreng bas na/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug phyag 'tshal bstod/ /u rgyan du song ze 'brul/ /legs par dga' ba zla ba ma/ /sku mdog dkar mo u rbu'i ste/ /legs dga' phreng ba seng mo ni/ /go ta ba ri nye ba'i zhing/ /rna ba g.yas
89a3(rgyud 'grel): la yang dag gnas/ /legs par dga' ma zar ma ni/ /sku mdog ser mo phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ra me shwa ra smin mtshams su/ /dkar mo legs dga' 'dod ma ni/ /de bi ko Ti mig gnyis la/ /dmar mo legs dga' khro mo'i gzugs/ /
89a4(rgyud 'grel): dpung pa'i rtsa gnyis yang dag gnas/ /ma la zhing gi 'dren pa mo/ /lha mo sku mdog sngon yo'i 'od/ /phyag 'tshal legs bla med ma/ /zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang brgyad/ /zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi ma'o/ /thams cad thod pa'i phreng ba
89a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /phyag 'tshal bla med rnal 'byor ma/ /spyan gsum thong pa kha TwAM ga/ dril bu Da ma ru 'dzin ma/ /thams cad ngo bo rang bzhin bdag /phyag 'tshal rnal 'byor ma phyag 'tshal/ /phyag 'tshal kA ma ru pa la/ /zhing dang mthun
89a6(rgyud 'grel): gcod ces bya ba/ /mchan khung gnyis la gnas pa'o/ /lha mo gtsug tor bstong phyag 'tshal/ /phyag 'tshal o Ta 'thung gcod la/ /num gnyis na gnas pa yi/ /zhing na yang dag ye shes gzugs/ /rnal 'byor 'jigs ma phyag 'tshal
89a7(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /nye zhing tra sha ku ne ru/ /gtsug tor cung zad ces bya ba'i/ /rnal 'byor lte ba'i yul na bzhugs/ /phyag 'tshal thams cad 'dod ma la'o/ /ko sa la ni nye ba'i zhing/ /rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba ye/ /sna rtser gnas pa'i yid kyis bsam/ /
89b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal mchog ni dbang phyug ma/ /ka ling+ga ni kha la gnas/ /phyag 'tshal rnal 'byor ral tshogs ma/ /tshando bzhugs ba'i lha mo la/ /phyag 'tshal lhan cig skyes ma la'o/ /'thung gcod tshando lam ka/ drag mo mgrin bar gnas
89b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /ral can nye ba'i tsando la/ /kany+tsi snying ga bla na med/ /li d+ha hi ma la yi gnas/ /u pa tshandor gnas pa'o/ /phyag 'tshal rnal 'byor gtum mo la/ /yang dag rtog pas thams cad bsreg /'du ba pre ta bu ri pa/ /thod can ma ni gsang bar
89b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /srin pa'i zhal ni gnas pa yi/ /rnal par 'gyur byed ma phyag 'tshal/ /sauraSh+Ta nye 'du ba/ /thor tshugs brla gnyis yang dag gnas/ /gser gling rje ngar gnyis su ni/ /nye ba'i 'du ba gar mkhan ma'o/ /phyag 'tshal sku gsung
89b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs bdag la/ /rnal 'byor ma ni bcu gnyis dran/ /thod pa kha TwAM ga 'dzin ma/ /'khor lo rdo rje kun tu bsnams/ /thams cad mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin/ /spyan gsum skra rtse 'bar ba can/ /gar ma dpa' mo chen me ni/ /bzhad pa'i gsung gi
89b5(rgyud 'grel): 'ong zer can/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis/ /phyed ni dmar la phyed ni ljang/ /skra brjes legs pa'i sbyan mda' ma/ /phyogs kyi gos can mchog 'dzin pa'o/ /phyag 'tshal phyogs skyong ma rnams la/ /kaM pu dzil sogs pa bzhi/ /
89b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig spyan ni gsum ma'o/ /phyag bzhi ma ni mjes ma ste/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng na gnas/ /hi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /bdud bzhi yi ni gdan la bzhugs/ /sna tshogs mdog can phyogs kyi gos/ /rngam pa'i zhal can 'jigs
89b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzugs/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis yang dag bzhugs/ /dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrong gnas/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas kun nas brgyan/ /thong pa kha TwAM ga 'dzin pa/ /gri gug me yi mgo bo bsnams/ /rkang pa'i bol gong yul du ni/ /kaM bu dzi
90a1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lha mo puk+ka pi/ /rkang pa'i mthil du kun nas bzhugs/ /si d+hu'i zhing du bzhugs pa ni/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de bzhin ma ro'i yul song ba/ /phyag 'tshal rnal 'byor lto
90a2(rgyud 'grel): de me/ /bus mo gnyis ka'i yul gnas pa'i/ /ma taM gi la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ze 'bru'i dbus na bzhugs pa yi/ /'khor ba'i 'dren pa rnal 'byor ma/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i nang na gnas/ /sgrol ma'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /
90a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bzhi yi ting 'dzin gnas/ /tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi ma/ /snying rje chen po yi ni thugs/ /rang bzhin med la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dang po'i yi ge man ngag zhal/ /A li kA li la gnas gzhan/ /ro ma rkyang ma a bi na/ /gnyis su med la
90a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje pad+ma yang dag bsdus/ /snying gi gnas las bzhengs pa yi/ /stong pa snying rje gnyis su med/ /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bsam gtan thams cad zla phyed spangs/ /dag bzhi po rnams rtogs pa yi/ /
90a5(rgyud 'grel): ska rtse brgya che'i rnal 'byor ma/ /mchon nyid med la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rtog med mtshams med brten pa med/ /rtog med gnas pa med pa yi/ /thogs med yon tan ram mis legs/ /rgyud med rnam pa phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par mi rtog
90a6(rgyud 'grel): brten pa med/ /bsam gtan bzlas brjod spangs pa yi/ /spangs pa nga rgyal med pa yi/ /rtog tu shar la phyag 'tshal bstong/ /rtog med bcom pa rnam bcom med/ /spang bya med cing gnas pa med/ /rang bzhin med pa snang pa med/ /the tshom
90a7(rgyud 'grel): med la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mchog tu zhi ba phra rags med/ /mchog dang bar dang tha ma spangs/ /kun nas ngo bo thams cad bzhugs/ /thams cad 'das ma phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thams cad sems kyi gzugs can ma/ /thams cad mchog
90b1(rgyud 'grel): tu yongs su ste/ /bgegs rnams rab tu zhi ba ma/ /bgegs med ma la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /tshad med longs spyod med pa la/ /sa 'og sa bla rnam par khyab/ /gnyis med 'chi med lha mo ni/ /mthong ba med la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sngon nas spangs pa
90b2(rgyud 'grel): med pa 'dzin/ /gnyis su med dus gzi brjid can/ /tshad med kun nas rang gis rig /ngo bo med la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /grangs med pa yi mi bzad pa/ /shes mig 'jigs pa spangs pa'o/ /'chi ba spangs pa'i dbang phyug mdza' / /dga' ba ma
90b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bla ma'i drin gyis gdul bya bzhin/ /rnal 'byor ma mos spyod lam gyis/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /zhing gi rnal 'byor phyag 'tshal lo/ /mos pa chen pos rjes su chags/ /bstod pas bstong pa'i rkang pa 'di/ /sgra dang sgra
90b4(rgyud 'grel): med shes pa med/ /bzod pa mchog gi dbang phyug ma/ /bdag ni byis pa rmongs pa ste/ /mos pas bstod pa shin tu dga' / /zhing gi dbang phyug ma'i bstod pa 'di blon po'i rigs shin tu dga' ba'i paN+Di tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
90b5(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta ye shes rdo rje dang/ lo tsa ba nag tsho chen pos bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra g+haN+Da lak+Sha Na nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i grub pa bshad
90b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de 'dzin pa la rtag brtan pa/ /sor bzhi rang bzhi dang bcu pa bcu gnyis pa dang bcu drug pa dang/ brgyad pa dang/ nyi shu'i tshad kyi gser gyi rdo rjes sa'i gtso bo'i rig pa 'dzin pa nyid dang/ rtag tu rab tu bzang po thob go/ /rgyal pho rang gi
90b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po gong ma nyid zangs gyi rdo rje yis 'dod pa 'grub bo/ /rdo'i rdo rjes lha ma yin gyi dbang po kun dang/ gnod sbyin rnams kyang bskyod pa'o/ /don thams cad 'grub par 'byung ba lcags kyis te/ lcags gcig gis dpal tshe nad med pa nor kun thob
91a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /gza' thams cad dang seng ldeng gis so/ /ma du ka'i shing gis gnod sbyin bsgrub po/ /des chos kyi don bsgrub po/ /lha'i shing gi sgra med par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rus pa yis mi'i srog 'phrog go /shel gyis thams cad
91a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang po'i gzhu ltar snang ngo/ /zhe sdang gi las la nim pa yis so/ /wa'i b+hu sha'i shing gis gsang pa dang skams pa dang/ /sha za 'grub rtag tu rab tu bzang ba'o/ /dri za gnod sbyin kun 'grub po/ /su ru tsan dan gyis so/ /sa yis gzugs gzhan du rnam
91a3(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /srin pos skye gnas 'grub bo/ /mya ngan med pa'i shing las byas pa'i rdo rjes nor 'phel lo/ /dmar po 'am dkar po tsandan gyis gang 'dod pa rab tu thob po/ /rtse lnga pa sran te shel gyis rtag tu bsrung brgyal ba'i zhabs drung bzlas pa byas na
91a4(rgyud 'grel): 'grub po/ /dri zhim pos mchod pas zhi ba'i sems dang ngag gang bzlas pa rdo rjer bzung nas byas na 'grub po/ /sgrub pa pos sngags pas gzung ngo/ /ming med pa rdo rje bcang ba byas te sems rtse gcig pas so/ /rdo rje'i rgyu gang las byung ba'i mtshan
91a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid rab tu btus te phyag 'tshal nas shes rab ye shes brib tu bri ba med pa'o/ /rdo rje'i mtshan nyid brjod nas dril bu'i mtshan nyid 'og nas 'byung bas shes so/ /gser gyis byas pa rtse lnga pa 'od bzang po cha gsum pa gzung ba'o/ /rtse mo bye ba rnams
91a6(rgyud 'grel): bye brag tu'o/ /dang po dril bu gdong bshad pa ni/ /dpal gyi gdong dang/ pad+ma'i gdong dang ba lang gi gdong khog pa bsil ba'i dbyibs su'o/ /de lta bu'i dril bu phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ngo/ /dpal gyi gdong gis rgyas pa'i las thams cad 'grub
91a7(rgyud 'grel): po/ /pad+ma'i gdong ni pad+ma'i dbyibs su byas pa ste/ dbang gi las byed ngo/ /ba lang gi gdong du byas pa'i dril bus zhi ba'i las ster bar byed do/ /sor bdun pa dang/ brgyad pa dang/ sor bcu gnyis pas shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi'o/ /
91b1(rgyud 'grel): rang 'byung gi shes rab kyi rnam pa ni dril bu'i khog pa chos 'byung ba'i dbyibs dran pa'o/ /ye shes ldan pa lnga'i thabs kyis rdo rje steng na gnas pa'o/ /chos 'byung gi nang du triM gi yi ge las de bsgom par bya'o/ /dril bu de chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma
91b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo/ /yi ge hUM la rdo rje ye shes lnga'i ngo bo dran par bya'o/ /de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas so/ /'di skad 'byung ba'i dril bu de lus ngag yid gsum gyi rnam pa'o/ /khog pa
91b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i gnas dran pa'o/ /de'i steng du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa gsung rdo rje'o/ /de'i steng du bum pa'i bsam gtan te byang chub kyi sems kyis yang dag par gang ba'o/ /de'i steng du sems kyi rdo rje bsgom mo/ /pad+ma'i steng du de
91b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i mtshan ma'i rnam pa'o/ /'khor lo rin po che/ pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /lnga pa spyi bor yang dag par gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa rang gi rnam pa'o/ /sa gzhi khog pa'i rnam pa ni lha mo sangs rgyas spyan yang dag par gnas
91b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /chu'i rnam pa ni mA ma kI bum pa yang dag gnas pa byas pa'o/ /me'i rnam pa ni gos dkar mo'i rang bzhin no/ /khong pa'i rlung gi rnam pa dbus su bltas pa sgrol ma'o/ /stong pa'i dbus na rdo rje lce g.yo ba'i gsung ngo/ /nam mkha' i ni bum pa'i
91b6(rgyud 'grel): steng na rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mgon po yang dag gnas pa'o/ /sa'i snying po dang 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po ni rdo rje 'dzin pa gzhan no/ /mtshan ma'i steng du phreng bas bskor ba ni gsum po de'i tshul gyis brjod pa'o/ /spre'u yi gdong ni byang
91b7(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' i lha'o/ /de'i gdong ni steng du rdo rje'i phreng ba'i rnam pa ni sgo skyong dang dpa' bo chen po khro bo bcu dran pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam pa'i dril bu shes rab kyi sgra'i rnam pa de'i rdo rje sems dpa' snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdo rje
92a1(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o/ /chos 'byung ba'i maN+Dal gyi zhing du gnas pa sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du gnas pa/ sku mdog dkar mo/ /bsgom mo/ /rdo rje dang dril bu'i mtshan nyid rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta
92a2(rgyud 'grel): par he ta dang/ lo tsa ba nag tsho dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ ka pA la pU dza bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ thod pa mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ zhing chen gyi rnal 'byor ma la
92a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /lhung bzed chen po'i mchod pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nyid bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i snod dang/ gzhan gnyis kyang bshams la/ rang rang gi cho ga ltar byin gyis brlabs la/ de'i steng du mchod pa'i gnas la/ /rang gi yi dam lha gang yin
92a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gdan pad+ma dang/ nyi ma 'am zla ba 'am bdud dam ro la sogs pa la/ rang rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge las phyag mtshan sa bon gyis mtshan pa/ de las spros bsdus pas yongs su gyur pa las dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo 'am/ lha brkyang pa bskyed la/
92a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes pa dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya'o/ /dbang bskur nas rigs kyis bdag pos rgyas gdab po/ /g.yon gyi la yi dam gyi lha gzhan bsgom/ /g.yas kyi la paM las pad+ma/ /raM las nyi ma'i steng du hUM las sna
92a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la hUM gis mtshan pa de las spros bsdus pa las/ /bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zhal gsum phyag drug pa g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus sngo/ /spyan gsum dmar pa/ /mche ba gtsigs pa/ dbu skra
92a7(rgyud 'grel): dang sma ra ser ba/ g.yas dang po na sna tshogs rdo rje/ gnyis pa 'khor lo/ /gsum pa na ral gri/ g.yon dang po na sdigs mdzub dang dril bu/ gnyis pa na zhags pa/ gsum pa na dgra sta/ zhabs g.yon bskum pa/ /g.yas brkyang ba/
92b1(rgyud 'grel): stag gi sham thabs can/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ me dpung 'bar ba'i dbus na bzhugs pa bsgom mo/ /de nas me tog la sogs bas mchod do/ /de nas bar chad zhi bar gsol ba gdab po/ /mthe bo dang srin lag sbyar bcug la/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM lan
92b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum bzlas pas bdud rtsar zhu bar bsgom mo/ /de nas dbus ma'i maN+Dal la me tog la sogs pas mchod do/ /de nas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa'i rang gi lugs ltar bzla zhing dbul lo/ /yang lha gzhan gyi la me tog la sogs pas mchod pa dang/ yang
92b3(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsis mchod do/ /de zhu bas yang dbus ma la mchod do/ /de ltar ma 'byor na yang ci 'byor pa'i snod gcig tu bdud rtsi byin gyis brlabs pa/ lhud bzed la mchod do/ /de nas 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab bo/ /thod pa mchod pa'i rim
92b4(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs so// //rmi lam sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ swabna tA ra no pi ka/ bod skad du/ rmi lam sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags ma rmi lam sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sprin bral mkha' 
92b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil zla rgyas gzugs/ /rab dkar bsil ba'i 'od ldan ma/ /ma lus rmi lam gsal mdzad de'i/ /zhabs la mgos btud de bsgrub bshad/ /dge bas rab tu sngar langs te/ /gdong sogs dag byas dri zhim byung/ /rje btsun de rten mdun bdar
92b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /yid 'ong mchod pas mdzes par byas/ /skyabs gsum lha mor bcas pa la/ /skyabs gsum 'gro la phan yid kyis/ /mi dge med pa'i sems ldan pas/ /thog mar bsod nams tshogs bsag bya/ /oM a mri ta kuN+Da li ha ma ha na sarba big+hwA na ta Da ha ta
92b7(rgyud 'grel): Da ha sarba pA paM hUM phaT swAhA/ /'khyil pa khros pa'i sngags 'di yis/ /rmi lam bar chad bgegs bsal la/ /dri med baidU rya 'dra yi/ /mkha' la 'phags ma bsgom par bya/ /rab mdzes paM las chu skyes stum 'jam gsal zhing gsar ba'i?
93a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dab tshogs rgyas/ /de steng dkar bsil ri bong 'dzin 'khyil de dbus khams gsum rgyas 'gengs tAM/ /kun nas mun sel skar ma'i rgyal po 'od bzang mdog can rab 'phros las/ /yongs gyur 'phags
93a2(rgyud 'grel): ma rmi lam sgrol ma zhi ma dge ma mdzes ma blta/ /rab dkar lang tsho rgyas pa'i gzugs/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis mchog sbyin mdzad/ /utpal sngo 'dzin 'gying tshul sgeg /mtshungs med gcig pos kun khyab ma'o/ /dri zhim dbu
93a3(rgyud 'grel): skra bzang 'khyil li/ /lha rdzas rin chen du mas brgyan/ /mthing kha'i dar gyis stod g.yogs shing/ /sna tshogs kha dog sham thabs mnabs/ /mu tig phreng ba'i dra ba yis/ /mnyam par mdzes pa'i ska rags dang/ /ga sha se
93a4(rgyud 'grel): ral khar bcings shing/ /cod pan don yod grub pas brgyan/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang skyil krung gis/ /srid dang zhi la mi gnas shing/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs/ /spu sgo kun nas rab 'phro ba'o/ /ci
93a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dra'i ye shes lha mo 'di/ /bkug la mchod pas mnyes byas bstim/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /byin brlabs phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bsngags/ /de nas maN+Dal mchod bcas pas/ /gus par phul la gsol ba
93a6(rgyud 'grel): gdab/ /zhal zas btung ba bzang ldan pa/ /dkar gsum ma'ar gsum me tog dbul/ /rin chen phreng ba dkar thogs te/ /ma yengs blo yis 'phags ma la/ /rtse gcig yid bstod gsang sngags mchog /'bum phrag
93a7(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa bzhir bzlas/ /oM swabna ta re swAhA/ de nas zang zing med par ni/ /rang gzhan don du rmi ltas brtag /grong pa'i chos kyis ma sbags pa'i/ /bu mo dus bzang dag la mchod/ /dri zhim khrus byas gos brgyan mdzas/ /
93b1(rgyud 'grel): rang lo'i grangs sam brgyad dam bdun/ /arg+ha la sogs mchod sngon 'gos/ /zas dkar zho dang 'o ma sbyin/ /'gron bu dar sogs yon byin la/ /dung chos chus gtor ci bder dengs/ /de rjes byi dor drir ldan pa'i/ /khang bar tshangs spyod brtul
93b2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs gnas/ /sdas su me tog dri zhim gyis/ /byugs pa'i maN+Dal bzang byas la/ /mchod pa lnga dang khyad par du/ /gu gul mar mo dbul bar bya/ /'jim ril sran ma'i tshad bcos te/ /kuN+Da li yi sngags bdun gyis/ /btab la nyi
93b3(rgyud 'grel): shu rtsa gcig ni/ /phyogs bcur gtor bas bar chad zlog /gsum bdun gcig ni rin po cher/ /bsgoms pas maN+Dal steng du dbul/ /sten la dgram dang gzung bar bya/ /de rjes gang 'dod gsol btab nyal/ /oM swabna tA ra sA bna a ba lo
93b4(rgyud 'grel): ki ni/ /trai lo kya ni dar sha? ni/ trai lo kye bi dzA ra ni/ b+hu taM b+ha baM b+ha ba si sham/ shu b+ha shu b+ha taM mi sa tye ka tha ya swAhA/ /brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu gcig /yang na lan bdun bzlas par bya/ /gsol btab sngags 'dis yid ches bas/ /lan cig bzlas
93b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang mi 'grub med/ /de tshe 'phags ma mdun gyi mkha' las phyogs bcur 'od mdzad thugs ka las phyung bsil zer gyis/ /bdag snying gdung gsal thab thil? dra ba ma lus spangs te sprin med mkha' ltar dag byas nas/ /glang chen sna 'dra'i phyag
93b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes ring brkyang bdud rtsi can las bdud rtsi'i rgyun phab snying sogs bkang/ /de mthus lus kun kun nas dri med shel bum mchog ltar gtsang zhing rab dag yid 'ong 'gyur/ /de 'og rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad/ /lha mo mchog la rtse gcig tu/ /ma
93b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yengs sems kyi dal bus ni/ /ji srid gnyid log bar du bzlas/ /seng+ge'i nyal stabs dge bas nyal/ /bag yod dran dang ma bral ba/ /dngos sam brda 'am chig dag gis/ /dge dang mi dge mthong bar 'gyur/ /thub pas sna tshogs las
94a1(rgyud 'grel): grub kyis/ /rgyud du gang gsungs lha mo che'i/ /brtag pa don kun sgrub byed 'di/ /rmi lam sgrol mas yang dag bshad/ /rmi lam sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon zla ba'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
94a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta su ga ta sh+rI dang/ lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// //rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam zhig 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /bltos pa thams cad rab spangs te/ /ci 'byor
94a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa sngon du bya/ /byang chub sems ni brtan par bsgom/ /'byung bzhi thim pa lha bzhir bsgom/ /rnam shes thim pa yid kyi lha/ /'od gsal la thim 'od gsal te/ /bskyed rim thim pa rdzogs rim bsgom/ /lus kyi sheng
94a4(rgyud 'grel): nyams smig rgyu snang/ /snying gar bla ma bsgom par bya/ /sgo dgu skams nas du ba 'byung/ /lte bar rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom/ /drod ba tul srin bu me khyer 'dra/ /gsang bar don yod grub pa bsgom/ /dbugs chad mang me 'bar ba mthong
94a5(rgyud 'grel): smin mtshams rta mgrin bsgom par bya/ /srog bral nam mkha' 'dra ba la/ /thams cad 'dus pa lhag pa'i lha/ /de rjes ma bcos 'gro 'ong med/ /rang gi ji ltar bzod ltar bsgom/ /mthar ni pha ma'i sa bon gnyis/ /dkar dmar
94a6(rgyud 'grel): thig le nyi zlar gyur/ /kha sbyar dbus su rang gi sems/ /srog gi sa bon taM yig blta/ /sna tshogs 'od zer 'phro 'du yis/ /'phags tshogs mchod cing 'gro don byas/ /bcu gnyis mdzad pa mthar phyung ste/ /gang 'dod
94a7(rgyud 'grel): zhing du 'tshang rgya'o/ /gson tshe srog rtsol la brten nas/ /thim pa bdun ni rim bzhin bsgom/ /'chi kar dngos su thim 'gyur bas/ /ma brjed tsam gyis 'grub par bzhed/ /rje btsun A rya tA ra'i man ngag la brten nas 'chi kas ma'i
94b1(rgyud 'grel): nyams len/ /dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i kha che shAkya sh+rI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bskyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA ra sA d+ha nA ma/ /bod skad du/ 'phags ma
94b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten sgrol mdzad sgrol ma che/ /de la phyag 'tshal de sgrub thabs/ /mdo tsam slob ma la phan phyir/ /'dir bri sgrub pos grub gyur cig/ //dang por re
94b3(rgyud 'grel): zhig snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ta ljang gu bsam la/ de'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa spyan drangs te/ /bla ma rdo rje sems dpa' i gzugs can du bsams nas/ yid las byung ba'i mchod pas mchod de/ /me tog
94b4(rgyud 'grel): la segs pa'i mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas/ /mchod pa'i yan lag bdun rgyas par bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa ma lus so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung/ /
94b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /byang chub bar du bdag skyabs mchi/ /rang dang gzhan gyi don sgrub phyir/ /byang chub sems ni bdag gis gzung/ /byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed bgyi zhing/ /sems can thams cad bdag gis mgron du
94b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyer/ /byang chub spyod pa yid 'ong spyad par bgyi/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /zhes brjod cing de dag gi don dran par bya'o/ /de nas tshed med pa bzhi bsgom par bya ste/ /byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dag
94b7(rgyud 'grel): go /de'i rjes la chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom ste/ oM swa b+hA ba shu d+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+ha rmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba shud+d+honya haM zhes brjod par bya'o /dre nas pad+ma dang zla ba rang nyid kyi ngo bor ba saM pa'i yi ge tAM las 'od zer 'bros pas snod bcud 'ong du zhu nas
95a1(rgyud 'grel): tAM la thim pa'i bar dang de yang rim gyis zhu zhing thim nas thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom mo/ /yang sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pas pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la tAM sngon por langs la/ /de yongs su gyur pa las utpa la
95a2(rgyud 'grel): ljang gur blta zhing/ /de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros tshur 'dus pa yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das ma'i skur blta'o/ /de yang sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la zhabs skyil krung dang/ /phyag g.yas mchog sbyin par mdzad
95a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ g.yon utpal la'i sdong bu 'dzin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing cha byad phun sum tshogs pa/ me long gi gzugs lta bur bsam par bya'o/ /de nas rang dang 'dra ba'i ye shes bstims la thal mo gnyis sbyar ba las gung mo
95a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis rgyab tu mdzub mo'i rtser sbyar te/ yid kyis snying ga'i pad+ma la tAM ljang gu 'od zer 'bar bas don thams cad mngon par bsgrubs nas/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /bsnyen pa ni 'bum phrag
95a5(rgyud 'grel): bcus 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rigs pa dang yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad sdud par byed do/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i blos nam mkha' lta bur bsgom pa ni rim pa bzhin no/ /de las byung ba'i dge bas yongs su bsngos nas dge ba'i spyod pas gnas
95a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA ra swa d+ha nA/ bod skad du/
95a7(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog mar phyag 'tshal pa la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams byas la/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang btang snyoms te tshangs pa'i gnas
95b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+hA(rgyud 'grel): sarbA d+ha rmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho nya haM/ zhes brjod pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mos par byas te/ de'i ngang las paM las pad+ma dang/ a las zla pa'i steng du yi ge tAM ljang gu yongs su gyur
95b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ utpa la tI gis mtshan pa las/ 'phags ma sgrol ma sku mdog ljang gu/ zhal gcig /phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas pa mchog sbyin dang/ g.yon pa utpa la'i sdong bu 'dzin pa/ zhabs phyed krung gis gnas pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis
95b3(rgyud 'grel): nye bar mdzes pa/ me long dang ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bur bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du tshon gang gi sku tshad dang ldan pa'i sgrol ma/ de'i thugs kar utpa la'i steng na sa bon gyi yi ges mtshan pa bsam par
95b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de'i 'od kyis 'og min nas ye shes sems dpa' bkug la mchod pa bya zhing/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ mnyes par bya'o/ /de nas spyi bo dang/ mgrin pa dang/ snying ga rnams su oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes
95b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yi ge gsum po dkar po dang dmar po dang mthing nag gi kha dog can gyis sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas yi ge tAM gi 'od zer gyi de bzhin gshegs pa lnga la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
95b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad spyan drangs pa la mchod pa dbul ba dang/ dpang bskur ba bya ste/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi she ka sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM zhes brjod pas de dag gis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun phrab pa dang/ bdag nyid kyi sku gsung thugs
95b7(rgyud 'grel): yongs su tshim par 'gyur te/ bdud rtsi de'i rgyun phyin ma las grub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa spyi bo'i steng du bsam par bya'o/ /yang tAM de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros te/ sems can thams cad la phog pas sgrol ma'i
96a1(rgyud 'grel): sku ru gyur nas slar de nyid la 'dus par bsam mo/ /de ltar yang dang yang du spro bsdu byas te/ de la skye bar gyur na oM tA re tut+tA tu re swAhA/ zhes bya bas sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub
96a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs/ kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po/ shAkya sh+rI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas byung ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra bA ra hi tA ra sto traM/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phag mo sgrol ma la bstod pa/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stong
96a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid snying rje phag mo che/ /sgrol ma'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /smra bsam brjod med pha rol phyin/ /sgrol ma'i gsung la phyag 'tshal/ /dri med ye shes zla ba'i thugs/ /sgrol ma'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zla 'od srid pa'i mun sel ba/ /
96a4(rgyud 'grel): 'joms khyer nyi ma'i dkyil dang mtshungs/ /thabs dang shes rab yon tan ldan/ /sgrol ma la ni rtag tu 'dud/ /'gro la bu bzhin rtag tu gdungs/ /srid gsum rnam thar gsum la 'god/ /seng ldeng nags la rab gnas shing/ /
96a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa brgyad las shin tu skyob/ /sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /mngon par dga' ba'i zhing khams su/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro skur ston cing/ /sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i zhing khams su/ /rin chen mkha' 'gror skur
96a6(rgyud 'grel): ston cing/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal nad sel mdzad/ /sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bde ba can gyi zhing khams su/ /pad+ma mkha' 'gror skur ston cing/ /bde ba chen po'i ngang la gnas/ /sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par
96a7(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i zhing khams su/ /las kyi mkha' 'gror skur ston cing/ /phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro don mdzad/ /sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mdza' dbus med pa'i zhing khams su/ /pha rol phyin ma'i skur ston cing/ /phyogs bcu'i
96b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas tshogs dang bcas/ /sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dur khrod brgyad kyi zhing khams su/ /rdo rje phag mor skur ston cing/ /me dpung 'bar ba'i dbus na bzhugs/ /sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod/ /paN+Di ta zla ba grags pas bstong
96b2(rgyud 'grel): ba mdzad pa rdzogs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ udztA ra sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma khro mo la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bstod pa/ jo mo byin rlabs can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal ral pa gcig 'chang khro mo ni/ /mi ro
96b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar po'i steng na brkyang bskum bzhugs/ /rgyas pa'i lha mo stag dang sbrul gyis brgyan/ /shin tu khros pas gad brgyangs cher sgrogs pa/ /g.yas pas ral gri mthing gser rtse la me 'bar zhing/ /'og ma gcod byed gri gug rab tu 'phyar/ /g.yon gyi
96b4(rgyud 'grel): dang po utpal rab rgyas shing/ /'og ma thod pa skra bcas rak+tas bkang/ /ral bya'i thar cog dbu la rab tu mdzes/ /spyan gsum sa gsum gzigs pas dri med chal/ /mgo bo'i thod phreng skam rlon spel mas mdzes/ /de lta'i gzugs ni gzhan min
96b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid do/ /dpal ral pa gcig me'i rtsa ba'i sngags don 'gyur du bsgyur ba'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa rkang pa bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// //lha mo u gra tA gi sgrub thabs ba bzhugs/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ /u ga tA ra de lrI? sA d+ha naM/
96b6(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ /lha mo u gra tA gi? sgrub thabs/ shes rab gsal byed u gro tA ra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di nyid kyi bsgrub pa nyams su len par 'dod pa'i gang zag gis/ /gnas kyi khyad par/ /ling ga gcig pa'aM/ /dur khrod dam/ khang stong la sogs
96b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas/ /som nyams pa'o/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas/ /gnas gsum rdo rje gsum bsam par bya zhing/ /yi ge gsum las 'od zer 'phros/ /srid pa gsum po thams cad snang bar byas/ /slar tshur 'dus nas thim par bsam mo/ /
97a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas stong pa nyid kyi don bsam zhing/ /oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA wa shud+d+ho haM/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas stong pa'i dang las nam mkha' i gnas su/ /a(rgyud 'grel): yig dmar po yongs su gyur pa las/ pad+ma dmar po/ /de'i
97a2(rgyud 'grel): steng du/ taM yig yongs su gyur pa las ka pA la mtshan dang ldan pa'o/ /de'i steng du hUM yig sngon po yongs su gyur pa las/ /gri gug sngon po hUM gis mtshan pa'o/ /de yongs su gyur pa las/ /rang nyid rje btsun ma u gra tA ra nyid du gyur pa ni/ sku mdog sngon
97a3(rgyud 'grel): mo/ 'jigs su rung ma/ mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba dang ldan pa/ zhabs g.yas bskum zhing g.yon brkyang ba/ sku lus sbom thung/ gsus khyim tshab utpal la'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ zhal gcig ma/ lha'i gzugs can ma/ gzhan pa'i gang rgyangs
97a4(rgyud 'grel): can/ dgyes par mdzad ma/ ro'i gdan pa bzhugs pa/ klu chen po brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan pa/ spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ lang tsho gzhon sha dang ldan pa/ phyag rgya lnga yis yang dag par
97a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ ljags 'dril ba/ mche ba drag tu gtsigs pa/ rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang/ thod pa thugs kar 'dzin cing/ /'og ma gnyis kyis ral gri dang/ utpa la 'dzin pa/ dmang seng dang ldan pa'i ral pa gcig
97a6(rgyud 'grel): ma/ ral pa'i khrod na rigs kyi bdag po mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par gyur pa'i lha mo skur bsam par bya'o/ /de ltar lha mo'i skur bsgom pa nyams su blangs pa nyid kyis sgrub pa po ni snyan dngags mkhan chen por 'gyur ro/ /de nas bzlas pa
97a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ h+ri trAM hUM phaT/ ces pa snying ga'i gnas su 'od zer rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa bsams nas/ yi ge rnams kyi 'od zer lnga yis mi shes pa'i dud shing bsregs shing/ ye shes kyi snang ba bskyod par bsam mo/ /g.yas ral gri'i
97b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas su mi rus kyi phreng ba 'chang bar mos la bzlas pa bya'o/ /de ltar 'di'i sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa tsam gyis 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi gsung gi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur ro/ /'od zer spor bsdus sbyor ba nyid kyis yid rtsa gcig
97b2(rgyud 'grel): tu mnyam par bzhag la sgom zhing/ rang nyid snyan ngag mkhan chen po rig pa'i gnas lnga pa chen po'i paN+Di ta yin snyam du nga rgyal bya'o/ /de ltar bsgom pa la rtse gcig tu gnas pa nyid kyis/ the tshom med par snyan dngags mkhan chen po
97b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gnas lnga ba'i paN+Di ta chen por 'gyur ro/ /gtor ma gtong bar 'dod na/ gtor ma bsangs/ sbyangs nas/ A(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i thod par oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ las byung ba'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bsams la/ sngags 'di nyid kyis gtor
97b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dbu lo/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): i ka dza Te/ ma ma u pa nI tA ya/ sarba satwan+toM/ shAn+taM ku ru/ puSh+Ti ku ru/ rak+ShaM ku ru/ mahA ta k+Sha ka/ nA gA d+hi pa ta ye/ i maM ba li grih+Na pa ya gri h+Na pa ya pa ra bi dya karSha ya/ tA Ta Twa Ta/ ts+tsho da ts+tsha da/
97b5(rgyud 'grel): ts+tshe nga yats+tshe da ya/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes pa lan gsum mi bdun gyis so/ /mchod pas mchod nas/ hUM gi yi ge las byung sngo zhing sbom thung ral pa'i thor tshugs ldan/ /g.yon brkyang mchog gis mi ro mnan cing mi zad
97b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi gad rgyangs can/ /ral gri utpal dang ni gri gug thod 'dzin glu chen brgyan dang ldan/ /'gro ba'i mi shes mun pa 'joms mdzad sgrol ma drag mo khyod la 'dud/ ces pas bstod do/ /gal te dngos dang rmi lam la sogs par 'byung po dang
97b7(rgyud 'grel): sha za 'jigs su rung? ba dang/ bung med shin tu ring pa dang/ sbrul la sogs pas 'tshang dang/ yid mi phebs pa dang/ bsgrub snying mi 'dod pa rnams byung na gegs yin pas/ 'di'i gtor sngags kyis gtor ma btang zhing/ /rje btsun lha mo'i rnal
98a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor la yid brtan pas/ thams cad stong pa nyid du bsam zhing/ /nyam nga ba dang/ bag tsha ba nyid du mi bya'o/ /de dag thams cad rang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bsgrub pa po yid spro ba dang/ sems dpa' ba dang/ bsgrub
98a2(rgyud 'grel): pa la blo brtan pa dang/ rmi lam du ma dang/ sring mo dang/ rje mo la sogs pa'i bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ lus sbom zhing brjid pa dang/ dri dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i bud med kyi chegs kyis phyag mtshan po ti la sogs pa ster ba dang/
98a3(rgyud 'grel): rang gis rnyed pa dang/ nyi zla shar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni grub pa'i rtags so/ /rjes su yi ge brgya bas nongs pa bshags shing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /lha mo'i nga rgyal la
98a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pas spyod lam thams cad yongs su bskyong bar bya'o/ /lha mo u gra ta ra'i sgrub thabs rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po sh+rI ba na ratna'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de nyid dang chos 'khor lo tsa ba
98a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal ye shes zhes bya bas dpal 'khor bde chen du bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// //sgrol ma u gra tA ra'i sgrub thabs rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa bzhugs// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya u gra tA ra swAd+ha nAM nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags
98a6(rgyud 'grel): ma sgrol ma drag mo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrol ma srid pa gsum sgrol u gra tA ra la btud de/ /bla ma'i man ngag ji bzhin de yi sgrub thabs bdag gis brjod/ /ling ga gcig dang de bzhin dur khrod yang na
98a7(rgyud 'grel): khang pa stong par ni/ /gnas der srid gsum grol ba'i rig ma rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub/ /'jam par gyur pa'i byis pa'i ro 'am yang na 'jam pa yi/ /stan la sogs la mnyam gnas dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /thog mar kha gdong
98b1(rgyud 'grel): dag par rab byas gsum la skyabs su 'gro/ mdun gyi nam mkhar bla ma mchod la sdig pa bshags pa dang/ /rjes su yi rang bsod nams yongs bsngo lam ni rab tu bsten/ /tshangs ba'i gnas bzhi rjes su dran pas byang chub sems ni bskyed/ /skad cig rnam pa'i
98b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas rdo rje gsum ni bde mnyam bzhag /de ni gnas gsum bsam bya de las 'od zer rab 'phros nas/ /srid gsum sbyod pa'i sems can gsal bar mdzad nas slar yang ni/ /khams gsum mdza' dag bsdus nas stong pa nyid du bsam
98b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de nas shU n+ya tA sogs rang bzhin rgyal ba'i gsang sngags brjod/ /de nas nam mkhar a yig las byung chu skyas dmar po bsam/ /slar yang de steng taM yig las ni pad+ma'i snod bsam bya/ /de dbus hUM yig mthon mthing dag dang mtshungs pa bsams nas ni/ /hUM yig de las skyes pa'i gri gug sa bon gyis brgyan blta/ /gri gug yongs gyur bdag nyid sgrol ma mtshungs par bsgom pa ni/ /g.yon brkyang zhabs can mi bzad mgo ba'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang/ /chu skyes sngon pos rnam par
98b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan cing thung zhing lto 'phyang 'jigs byed ma/ /bzang mo zhal gcig spyan gsum gang rgyangs 'od dang ldan/ /rab tu dgyis shing ro mnan klu brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dmar zhing zlum pa'i spyan can stag gi lpags pa rked la bsnams/ /
98b5(rgyud 'grel): lang tsho gzhon zhing phun tshogs phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /ljags ni rab 'khyug mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs chen 'jigs byed ma/ /phyag g.yas ral gri gri gug g.yon na utpal thod pa bsnams/ /ral gcig dmar ser gyen
98b6(rgyud 'grel): bsngas mi bskyod ma yis dbu brgyan ma/ /bsgoms pas stobs ni rab rdzogs rnal 'byor snyan dngags chen por 'gyur/ /gal te blun rmongs gyur kyang sgom pa'i ro la 'bad byed na/ /bzlas pa 'bum phrag gcig gis 'jam pa'i dbyangs nyid
99a1(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'gyur/ /snying gar yig gsum sngags chen rab bkod paT yig mdza' ru'o/ /yang dag 'od zer lnga ldan mi shes bud shing rab tu bsreg /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rjes 'brang de nyid btu ba'i cho ga brjod/ /dang por sa
99a2(rgyud 'grel): yi pha rol dbyangs yig bzhi bas rnam brgyan cing/ /nga yig zhon zhing 'od 'bro zla ba thig le yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin bzhi pas ta yig brgyan te rnam par yang dang/ sbyin/ slar yang haM yig las sbyor yang dag u yig ring por ldan/ /
99a3(rgyud 'grel): phaT yig de nas sbyin zhing yongs rdzogs sgrub pa'i sngags nyid do/ /ral gri'i gnas su mkhas pas mi mgo'i phreng ba rnam par bsam/ /yang dag sngags mchog bzla zhing spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ brtan pa'i sems kyis brtag byas bdag nyid
99a4(rgyud 'grel): mkhas shing snyan dngags che/ /rab tu bsgom la goms pas de nyid the tshom med par 'grub/ /hUM gi yi ge las byung sngon zhing sbom thung ral ba'i thor tshugs ldan/ /g.yon brkyang mchog gis mi ro mnan cing mi zad mchog gi gang brgyangs can/
99a5(rgyud 'grel): ral gri utpal gri gug thong ba 'dzin cing klu chen rgyan dang ldan/ /'gro ba'i mi shes mun pa 'joms mdzad sgral ma drag mo khyod la 'dud/ /sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rab byas dge ba bdag gis gang bsags pa/ /de yis 'gro ba ma lus rgyal
99a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bstan la mkhas par shog /de 'dir rtag pa'i rdo rjes blo 'phel sgrub thabs byas pa yi/ /zab mo la ni mkhas pa rnams kyis 'di la bzod pa mdzad rigs so/ /'phags ma sgrol ma drag mo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes
99a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po sh+rI bA na ratna'i zhal snga nas dang/ lo tsa ba many+dzu sh+ris slad nas bsgyur ba dge'o bkra shis phun sum tshogs// //ral gcig ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/ /
99b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ e ka dzA Ti swa d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ ral gcig ma'i sgrub thabs/ ral gcig ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang zhabs kyis ro yi snying dang rkang mnan khro bo'i gad mos bsdigs mchog ma/ /ral
99b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig utpal gri gug thod pa g.yas g.yon phyag ldan hUM yig sa bon las byung mchog /mi thung thod mo ral pa kham pa rgyas pa'i thod cog drag mo klu yis rab brgyan ma/ /'gro ba gsum gyi mun pa la gzhag ro yi gdan/ /sgrol ma drag mo rang gi bsod
99b3(rgyud 'grel): par shog /rgyan nag las byung srid pa gsum/ /sgrol byed sgrol ma la btud de/ /bla ma rnams kyi man ngag bzhin/ /de yi sgrub thabs bdag gis brjod/ /mtshan ma gcig gam dur khrod dam/ /dus kun du ni khang stong du/ /rab tu mkhas bI
99b4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pas/ /srid pa mthar phyin rig ma sgrub/ /bu chung ro 'jam la gnas sam/ /yang na gdan 'jam 'bol ba la/ /kun tu gnas te rnal 'byor pas/ /dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /yang
99b5(rgyud 'grel): dag rnal 'byor la 'dug nas/ /gnas gsum rdo rje gsum bsgoms la/ /de nas 'od zer 'gro bar bya/ /srid gsum spyod pa'i sems can rnams/ /gsal bar byas la tshur dgug cing/ /bsdus rjes yang ni bsgom par bya/ /sna tshogs kun las
99b6(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid/ /de nas rgyal ba'i sngags brjod de/ /stong nyid bsgom zhing de dang las/ /a las mtsho skyes dmar po blta/ /de yi steng du yang bsgom pa/ /Tw'M yig las byung pad+ma'i snod/ /de yi dbus su yang ni bsgom/ /hUM mdzad yi ge sngon po ste/ /
99b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas hUM mdzad las skyes pa'i/ /gri gug sa bon gyis brgyan pa/ /gri gug yongs su gyur pa las/ /bdag nyid sgrol ma rab tu bsgom/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang 'jigs su rung/ /mgo li phreng ba 'phyang ba mo/ /mi'i thung 'jigs byed gsus
100a1(rgyud 'grel): pa sbom/ /sngon mo tsho skyes kyis brgyan ma/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum ldan ma ni/ /khro bzhang sdigs byed shin tu gsal/ /kun nas dga' byed ro la gnas/ /klu brgyad rnam par brgyan pa ste/ /spyan rtsa dmar zhing zlum pa'o/ /
100a2(rgyud 'grel): sku smad stag gis pags pa g.yogs/ /lang tsho dar bab phun tshogs ma/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /zhal nas ljags 'dril 'jigs ldan ma/ /mche ba gtsigs shing g.yon du gzigs/ /g.yas pas ral gri gri gug 'dzin
100a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pas utpal thod pa 'dzin/ /dbu skra kham pa drag pos brgyan/ /spyi gtsug mi bskyod rnam par brgyan/ /sgom gyi stobs kyis rdzogs pa na/ /rnal 'byor mkhas pa chen por 'gyur/ /gal te rmongs pa bems po yang/ /sgom gyi ro la
100a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang gyur na/ /'bum phrag sngags ni bzlas pa yis/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /sngags chen 'di ni yi ge gsum/ /phaT yig mdza' can snying la gnas/ /'od zer lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /mi shes bud shing sreg byed
100a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /rnal 'byor spyod pas rjes 'brangs nas/ /de yi bsdu ba'i tshe ga brjod/ /dang po sa yi phyi ma gzung/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas brgyan/ /gsal zhing 'bar ba ra la zhon/ /zla tshes thig les rnam par brgyan/ /de nas taM yig sbyin par
100a6(rgyud 'grel): byas/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas brgyan/ /haM yig dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan/ /yang dag nyid du sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas phaT yig spyin par bya/ /grub pa 'am sngags ni yongs su rdzogs/ /mkhas pas ral gri stod sa ru/ /mi rus phreng
100a7(rgyud 'grel): ba bsgom par bya/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sngags mchog yang dag bzlas pa bya/ /brtan pa'i sems kyis bsam par bya/ /paN+Di ta bdag snyan ngag mkhan/ /sgom stobs rgyun ni ma chad na/ /grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /
100b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs byas pa yis/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang bsags des/ /rgyal ba'i bstan par skye bo rnams/ /snyan ngag mkhan du 'gyur bar shog /'di ni blo gros rab bsgrub ma/ /rtag pa'i rdo rjes byas pa yin/ /mkhas pa chen po paN+Di
100b2(rgyud 'grel): tas/ 'di la shin tu bzod par 'os/ /rgya nag las ni byung ba yi/ /sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs yongs su rdzogs// //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+De ta chen po TA na shI las 'o na 'da' i sku grong du lha'i skad las bod kyi brda' la 'khrul pa med par
100b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur ba'o// //lha mo ral gcig ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrol ma khro mo'i ba ling gi gtor ma la sngags 'dis lan gsum mam/ /bdun gyis dbul bar bya ste/ /sngags ni 'di yin/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): e ka dzI Tis mo ya/ na bA nas ha na
100b4(rgyud 'grel): swA g+hi ku ru puSh+Ti ku ru ma he dak+Sha ka nA gA rI pa ta yaM/ i maM ba lIM grih+Na grih+Na/ grih+Na pa ya/ grih+Na pa ya/ pa ra mirya kra sa bru Ta bru Ta/ ts+tsha nda ts+tshi nda/ binda binda/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUm phaT swahA zhes pas phul la/ de nas rdo rje dbyangs can ma la bdag gi don la
100b5(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab/ /rjes su mi dmigs pas rgyas gdab/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo/ /sgrol ma khros pa'i ba ling gi gtor ma rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta rA nA shI las/ 'gren gyi 'khyad
100b6(rgyud 'grel): gsar du rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o/ /'phags ma sgrol ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma/ /ba ling gtor ma phul ba bzhes nas su/ /'gro rnams ma lus mun pa bsal nas su/ /shes rab blo yi pad+ma kha 'byed shog X/ dmar mo rab 'jigs nam mkha' i
100b7(rgyud 'grel): mdog /zhal gcig phyag bzhi stang stangs mdzes/ /mi shes yid 'joms la btud te/ /gzhung don bsgom rim 'di gsal bya/ /dang po kho nar rig pa dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis/ /dur khrod dam phyi nang gi rten stobs ldan bzhugs
101a1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'am/ /rab tu dga' zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs su gnas khang byi dor bya/ /rten dang mchod pa dngos sam yid kyi rnam 'phrul gyis bkod de/ bu chung gi ro 'jam zhing gnyen pa dri zhim po'i chus bkrus la/ /me tog gi phreng ba
101a2(rgyud 'grel): btags la/ rang nyid bde bar gnas pa'am/ de med na yang stan 'bol ba la gnas te/ bdag gis ral gcig ma bsgrubs la/ rang bzhin gyi mi shes pa'i mun pa rnam par gzhom par bya'o snyam du bsam mo/ /de nas skad cig gis rnam pa
101a3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu rtog pa'i tshogs rang sar dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go /de'i rjes la spyi bo mgrin pa/ snying ga gsum du/ oM dkar po dang/ A(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang/ hUM sngon po dang gsum shin tu gsal bar blta zhing/ 'od zer gyi
101a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs spros pas 'gro ba'i mi shes pa'i mun pa rnam par bcom nas gnas gsum gyi yi ge la bsdus la/ sku gsung thugs rnam par dag cing 'pho 'gyur med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o/ /dngos po 'am mtshan ma thams cad rang gi ngo bos
101a5(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'i don de nyid blta bar bya ba'i phyir/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na 'dzra swa b+hA ba ATma ko haM/ zhes brjod cing/ dngos po dang mtshan ma'i bag la nyal phra mo tsam yang med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bya'o/ /de'i ngang las A(rgyud 'grel): dang TaM rim gyis gyur pa
101a6(rgyud 'grel): las/ pad+ma dmar po dang thod pa khrag gis bkang ba/ de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hUM sngo zhing dangs pa blta bar bya'o/ /hUM yongs su gyur pa las gri gug gi yu ba nas nyi ma'i steng na hUM gnas pa'o/ /de yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das
101a7(rgyud 'grel): ral pa gcig ma sku sbom zhing thung pa/ mdog bai DU rya ltar sngo zhing dangs pa/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ /dang po gnyis ral gri dang utpal bsnams pa/ 'og ma gnyis gri gug dang thod khrag thugs kar 'dzin pa/ zhabs g.yas bskum
101b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon brkyang bas dbugs bral gyi snying dang rkang pa mnan pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang/ brgya phyed dang/ stag lpags dang/ klu brgyad sbrul sngon po'i gzugs kyis dbu rgyan dang/ rna rgyan dang/ mgul rgyan dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ phyag gdub zhabs
101b2(rgyud 'grel): gdub dang/ ska rags dang/ se ral kha rnams kyis rab tu dpa' ba' i chas su zhugs pa/ spyi gtsug na thub pa mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa spyan gsum me mdag ltar dmar zhing 'khrug pa cung zad g.yon du gzigs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ lce glog ltar 'khyug pa/
101b3(rgyud 'grel): gang rgyangs chen po sgrogs pa/ phyi nang gi bdud thams cad brlag par byed par bsgom mo/ /de'i thugs kar pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i hUM sngon po blta zhing/ mdun gyi 'dab ma nas g.yas bskor du/ h+ri tri hUM pha ru rnams
101b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom zhing/ yig 'bru de dag las dpag tu med pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phros pas 'gro ba'i mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad bsreg par bsam zhing/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan blo gros kyi snang ba thams cad tshur 'dus te rang la bstim zhing
101b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid yon tan dang blo gros kyi snang ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pas brgyan par bsam mo/ /de nas bzlas pa bya ste/ g.yas dang po'i ral gri mi rus kyi phreng bar bsgyur la/ thugs pad+ma nyi mar rigs sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin las ma g.yos pa'i ngang las/ h+riM triM hUM
101b6(rgyud 'grel): phaT ces ci nus su bzlas so/ /de las skyon pad 'dab kyi yi ge hUM la bsdu/ bdag gzhan gyi blo gros ngan pa'i mun pa thams cad gtan nas dag par gyur cig snyam pa'i smon lam drag po gdab po/ /rjes shes kyi skabs su yang rtag tu dpa' mo'i nga rgyal dang ma bral
101b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de 'dra'i ting 'dzin bzlas par bsam/ /brtan zhing chad du skyol gyur na/ /mi shes sprin tshogs dpag med mas/ /dpyar zad bzhin du dengs par 'gyur/ /sgrol ma'i blo 'phel slob dpon klu sgrub kyi man ngag mkhan rtag pa rdo rjes tshig le'ur
102a1(rgyud 'grel): byas ba/ rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA nA shI la'i gsung lhag chad med par bkod pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ shu kla e ka dzA Ti sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ ral gcig ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs/ ral
102a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+mar gnas pa'i snod mchog la ni yi geM hUM las byung ba'i dkar mo ni/ g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum zhabs kyis gnas ma nu ma rab rgyas spyan gnyis yang dag dmar/ /g.yas pas mi rus phreng 'dzin g.yon pas kha ma bye
102a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i utpal sngon po bsnams/ /ral pa kham pa dang ni ldan pa'i lha mos rtag tu khyed la skyong gyur cig /klu brgyad 'jigs rung dang bcas sems kyi dbang phyug dbu brgyan can/ /snying rje ro yis kun nas gang nga'i ljags bskyod bzhad mdzad ma/ /ri dags dgra po
102a4(rgyud 'grel): yi ni phags pa'i na bza' 'chad pa mo/ /de lta'i sgrol mas mi shes mun pa gsod par byed par shog /dpal ldan gnyis med rdo rje yis/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi chu skyes la/ /btud de rol pa sngas pa yis/ /sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs brjod par bya/ /dang por re shig sngags
102a5(rgyud 'grel): pas kha bshal pa la sogs pa byas te stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug nas me tog dri zhim po bkram pa'i sa phyogs su ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa bshams la/ rang gi snying gar hUM dkar po nye bar blta'o/ /hUM dkar po de las rang gi ba spu'i bu ga dang/ kha la sogs pa'i
102a6(rgyud 'grel): sgo las 'od zer rnam pa lnga 'phro bar bsams te/ /'od zer de dag gis gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten khams mdza' yas pa snang bar byas nas/ de nas 'og min na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'chad par 'gyur pa'i sku mdog la sogs pa dang ldan
102a7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ gang yang bdag la gsol ba 'debs pa'i sems can de dag la byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ zhes pa cig char mdun na 'dug par bzhugs par bsams la/ de nas yi ge hUM las me tog bdug spos dri dang phreng ba la sogs pa spros pas mchod do/ /de nas byams
102b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang/ mchod pa dbul ba dang/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ bsod nams la rjes su yi rang/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /oM badzra puShpe/ AM(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes pas bsngags pa'i me tog la sogs pa ming spel dang
102b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas dbul lo/ /de nas bdag dang chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ste/ oM swa b+h+ra ba shud+d+hA(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+ha rmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ oM shU N+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas smon lam gyi dbang gi yi ge
102b3(rgyud 'grel): a yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma dkar po dang/ de'i dbus su yi ge TaM yongs su gyur pa las thod pa nor bu chu shel lta bu'i 'od can khrag gis yongs su gang ba/ /de'i dbus su yi ge hUM dkar po 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa/ shin tu mdzes pa de yongs su gyur pa las utpa la sngon po kha ma byeng ba yi
102b4(rgyud 'grel): ge hUM gis bya ni gyis brlabs par bltas la/ de dag yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ sku mdog dkar mo/ /stag gi pags pa'i smad dkris can phyag g.yas pas mi rus kyi phreng ba 'dzin pa/ g.yon na
102b5(rgyud 'grel): utpal sngon po kha ma bye ba bsnams pa ral ba kham pa gyen du rjes pa tshangs pa'i gnas kyi bar du shin tu khyab pa/ klu gdug pa can brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ karko Ta sngon pos thong byas pa/ /'jog po dmar po'i do shal can/ dga' po dang nyer dga' bo ser po
102b6(rgyud 'grel): dag ni na cha dang ldan pa/ mdza' yas dkar po'i tshangs skud can/ nor rgyas dkar po'i ska rags dang/ dung skyong dkar pos phyag gdub byas pa/ pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po dmar pos zhabs gdub byas pa/ do shal dang zhabs gdub dang dbu rgyan dang se ral khas brgyan pa/
102b7(rgyud 'grel): zhabs g.yas brkyang zhing g.yon bskum pas ro'i steng du gnas pa/ shin tu 'jigs su rung ba zhal mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa/ ljags bsgril ba/ dpal mi bskyod rdo rje cod pan gyis spyi bor brgyan pa/ byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems dang ldan pa zhig
103a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom mo/ /rang gi snying ga'i hUM dkar po'i 'od zer gyis ye shes sems ma'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bltas te/ de nas dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba ste/ ye shes sems ma dang chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa ltar dbyer
103a2(rgyud 'grel): med par blta'o/ /de nas rje btsun ma'i thugs ka'i pad+ma'i steng du yi ge hUM shel dag pa'i mdog lta bur 'od zer brgya stong phro bar blta bar bya'o/ /bsgom pa las dub na sngags don dang ldan pa gzhal du med pa myur ba dang/ bul ba dang/ mi gsal ba dang/ ma tshang ba spangs nas
103a3(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis dmigs te bzlas par bya'o/ /de la sngags btu ba ni sde tshan bdun pa'i bzhi pa la mes yang dag par ldan pa yi ge i yis brgyan cing zla tshes dang thig les mdzes par byas pa'o/ /ji ltar 'dod pas bzla'o/ /lte ba'i dbus su bzla 'dab ma brgyad kyi steng du yi
103a4(rgyud 'grel): ge h+rI shin tu 'bar ba blta'o/ /de nas phreng ba'i rdog po rnams yi ge h+ri gi gzugs su bltas la/ de rgyun ma chad par rang gi kha nas 'thon te lte ba'i lam du zhugs shing kha nas byung bar bsams la/ sngags kyi rgyal po yig 'bru gcig po 'dis yid bzhin nor bu ltar
103a5(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa dang yams thams cad 'jig pa dang/ dbang du bya ba dang dbab pa dang 'gro ba 'khrug par byed pa'i sngags sangs rgyas kyi gsungs blo brtan pas bzlas par bya'o/ /'di lta bu'i sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas snyan dngags mkhan du 'gyur ro/ /'dzin par nus
103a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ rdo rje lta bu'i tshig dang ldan pa dang/ nor che ba dang/ tshe ring ba dang/ bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /khyud gi dbang po ltar srid pa gsum gyi dug med par byed pa dang/ myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur bar gdon mi za'o/ /oM
103a7(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI hUM haM ha(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis sangs rgyas nyid kyang sbyin par byed na dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+ri hUM g+hA ta ya sarba bag+hAn hUM phaT swAhA/ sngags 'dis gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma ral pa gcig ma dkar mo'i
103b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs dpal gnyis med rdo rje las byung ba slob dpon rol pI sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs ba ren+d+ra dzI ga tA la'i paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las yul dbus kyi grub pa thob pa'i gnas drang srong srin po ring bsgyur ba'o// //
103b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ rak+ta e ka dzA Ti sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ ral pa gcig ma dmar mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ bcom ldan 'das ma ral gcig ma dmar mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /A snying kar oM yig las pad+ma dmar po lta bu las/ de'i dbus su slar yang bsam
103b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba a yig las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ de'i steng du slar yang bsam par bya a yig las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang/ de la hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje thong par bsam par bya/ /lha dang lha ma yin gyis khrag gis gang ba'i yi ge gsum gyis
103b4(rgyud 'grel): khyab par ro/ /slar yang nam mkha' la sna tshogs rdo rje bsam par bya zhing/ de yongs su gyur par bcom ldan 'das ma bsam par bya ste/ zhal bzhi pa thung zhing lto ba 'phyang ba chen por 'jigs pa'i klu brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ mche ba gtsigs shing cung zad 'dzum pa'i ro'i steng
103b5(rgyud 'grel): du lang tsho gsad pa yang dag par thob pa/ lo brgyad gnyis lon par bsam zhing/ mgo bo gsar pa'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang bar byed pa dang/ skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa yang ngo/ /stag gi phags pa'i sham thabs dkris pa/ zhal dang po dmar po ya ba'i me tog
103b6(rgyud 'grel): dang mtshungs pa/ zhal g.yas pa kun da zla ba mtshungs pa/ zhal g.yon pa nag po sna tshogs dang/ u tpa la gsar pa sngon po lta bu'o/ /steng zhal zhi pa bong bu'i zhal du ba'i tshogs 'dus pa nye bar 'bar bas rab tu mtshon pa'o/ /phyag brgyad la ral gri dang
103b7(rgyud 'grel): gri gug dang rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ mdung 'dzin pa'o/ /gzhan la u tpa la sngon po dang/ thod pa dang/ gzhu dang/ rdo rje zhags pa'i bsdigs mdzub dang ldan pa'o/ /mchog tu dga' bas yang dag par myos par 'khyud par byed pa'i mi bskyod pa 'dzin pa rgyan sna
104a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pas brgyan pa'o/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das ma spro ba'i gzugs su rnam pa dang bcas par mkha' la bsam par bya zhib/ rnal 'byor ni ji ltar man ngag las tsandan dmar po'i 'bru'i phreng bas bgrang bar bya'o/ /blo dang ldan pa'i sngags chen po ni/ h+ri d+hAM
104a2(rgyud 'grel): khri sh+rI tri ya(rgyud 'grel): brgyad lhag pa'i brgya bzlas pa las sgrub pa po tshigs su bcad pa byed/ khri tsho gcig bzlas pa las chos kyi phung po rnam par 'byed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /ma thos pa rnams 'dzin zhing shes par byed do/ /'bum bzlas pas ral pa gcig ma dmar mo'i sgrub pa
104a3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par ldan pa'o/ /'di mdzad pa ni kun spangs rdo rje zhes pas kyi'o/ /rang gi snying kar u dpa la 'dab ma bcu drug pa bsam/ dbus su hUM yig dang 'dab ma la hI(rgyud 'grel): yig bsam/ hUM yi gi yi ge nas spros te bsgrub bya'i yid bkug cing slar yang 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i
104a4(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yis spros te/ bsgrub bya'i mgrin pa nas zhags pas bcings te sgrub pa po'i rkang pa la phyag byed par bsams te/ d+hi tri(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI h+rI(rgyud 'grel): cho ge me dbang du bgyis ya/ de ltar bsgom zhing sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /gal te 'ongs par ma gyur na nges par 'chi'o/ /rgya gar shar
104a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs paN+Di ta/ mi dbang bzang po zhal snga dang/ dam chos smra ba'i btsun pa ni/ /legs a'i blo gros bdag gis bsgyur/ /'di las byung ba'i dge ba ni/ /rnam par dgar ba'i bsil zer 'dis/ /gzhan sde'i ku mud tshogs rnams la/ /rtag tu dbugs 'byin byed par
104a6(rgyud 'grel): shog/ //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ a ka dzA tri a d+hi Sh+nya na bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ ral pa gcig ma dmar mo'i byin brlabs kyi cho ga/ bcom ldan 'das ma dmar mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po pad+ma 'dab brgyad byas la/ de nas bum pa gcig rin po che la sogs
104a7(rgyud 'grel): pas rang dag par bkang ste/ de'i dbus su bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas slob mas bla ma'i maN+Dal byas la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /de'i rjes su bcom ldan 'das ma'i maN+Dal byas la skyor chur sbyangs te/ bdag
104b1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba la sogs pa byas nas/ dbus su me tog gcig dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ces pa'i sngags kyis me tog re la bsngags nas dbus su lan gsum dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas lha mo'i sngags kyis lan gsum dbul bar bya'o/ /oM rA rA ye nA ma(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'dis
104b2(rgyud 'grel): lan gcig dang/ oM ak+Sho b+hya ya na ma ces pas lan gsum dbul bar bya'o/ /oM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): gu na badzra a na ma(rgyud 'grel): shar du lo/ /oM khaM badzra tsakra ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): lho ru'o/ /oM gaM badzra gand+ha yai na ma(rgyud 'grel): dbus su'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): bi shwa badzra yai na ma(rgyud 'grel): byang du'o/ /oM pradz+nyA na ta ka ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): bden bral
104b3(rgyud 'grel): du'o/ /oM bad mAM te ka ya ni ma(rgyud 'grel): rlung du'o/ /oM big+hA n+ta kA yA na ma(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan du'o/ /dbus su yang bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags kyis lan gsum du me tog dbul lo/ /mdun du maN+Dal byas nas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM ta re gu Na badzra tsa kra badzra g+haNa Ta badzra biSh+Tho
104b4(rgyud 'grel): badzra na hAM khaM gi h+rI na sa pA bi g+ha haM ku ru swAhA/ sngags 'dis khrus bya'o/ /oM sarba b+hu ta rak+Shan du swAhA/ spyi bor bsrung ba rnam par sbyin par bya'o/ /oM dza to dza to/ ud ke na ka yaShtsa ka tsa taM ba sho d+ha ya h+rI(rgyud 'grel): 'dis chu 'thung du gzhug ste lus ngag yid rnam par dag par bya
104b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir/ oM dze Ti dze Ti a ni na ra dza TA ya kA aM bi sho d+hA ya swAhA/ 'dis ral pa spyi bor bcing bar bya'o/ /lus rnam par sbyang pa'o/ /oM h+ri Ta ma le le ma le a na kA ma la bAg bi sho d+ha nA ya swAhA/ 'dis phreng ba sbyin no/ /oM dza Ti dza Ti ma hA ra k+Sha bi rka ti ka pA
104b6(rgyud 'grel): la d+ha nu/ shang ya ci taM bi sho d+hA ya swAhA/ 'di saM gri gug dang thod pa dang gzhu dang mda' sbyin par bya ste/ sems rnam par sbyar ba'o/ /oM hUM snying kha la'o/ /h+ri mgo bor phaT spyi bor tri mig la'o/ /d+h+ri phrag pa la'o/ /khaM yan lag thams cad la'o/ /'dis yan lag
104b7(rgyud 'grel): drug bsrung bar bya'o/ /oM a hya hi sa ka dza tir Shar na da sha d+hi ka saM g+haM bu ru dzA grnyA bi na ya ka ni nar ma thA nor ma tha bi d+hI sa ya/ kha da kha da mA ra ya mA ra ya/ he b+hag tha tI sarba sA lha ni swAhA/ 'dis phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas sngags bshad la/ bu kyang ni mi
105a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa/ /mkha' la bcom ldan 'das ma bzhugs/ /gal te byin brlabs med pa la/ /sngags 'di bshad nas de yi tshe/ /khyod ni dmyal bar lhung bar 'gyur ces rnam par brjod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i man ngag bsgom pa la sogs
105a2(rgyud 'grel): pa sngar bshad pa ltar bya'o/ /ral gcig ma dmar mo'i byin brlabs kyis chog /nag po spyod pa pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta mi dbang bzang po dang/ lo tsa ba gzhon nu shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o/ // */ /rgya gar skad du/
105a3(rgyud 'grel): a gra tA ra/ i ka dzA TI u ba de sha sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ mchog gi sgrol ma ral pa gcig pa'i man ngag gi bsgrub thabs/ bla ma dam pa rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig rmongs pa'i blo ldongs dang/ /tshe thung nad dbul dgra bgegs sogs/ /'jigs
105a4(rgyud 'grel): kun sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i mchog /de yi bsgom rim 'dir gsal bya/ /dang po kho nar bsnyen pa tshad du son cing/ /sgrub thabs la blo 'dris pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ dur khrod dam phyi nang gi rten stobs dang ldan pa la sogs pa bzhugs pa/ yid dang mthun zhing
105a5(rgyud 'grel): shis pa'i gnas khang byi dor byas la. rten gsum dang/ mchod pa lnga ci rigs pa dngos sam yid kyis bshams la/ nal bu'i ro 'jam dri bzangs kyis byugs pa'am/ yang gdan gzhan der bsgoms pa'i steng du/ sems gnas pa'i yan lag
105a6(rgyud 'grel): du/ lus skyil krung gis 'dug la/ legs lam gyi gzhi ma nas brtsams te/ chos thams cad kyi mchog gi blo sngon du btang nas/ rang lus tha mal par gnas pa'i mdun gyi nam mkhar/ lam gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor/ sna bug g.yas pa nas
105a7(rgyud 'grel): rdubs pa las/ rlung mkhris bad kan la sogs pa'i nad gzhi thams cad dang/ nang grol ljan ljin mi gtsang ba'i rdzas thams cad ded pas bshad lam nas 'thon te/ 'og gi zhing khams dpag tu med pa blos 'khyud tshad du bskyal/ yang mdun gyi baM gyur
105b1(rgyud 'grel): ba las/ chu'i dkyil 'khor sna bug g.yon pa nas rdubs pas/ lus kyi nang gi dri ma thams cad dag par bkrus te/ chu lam nas bton nas snga ma bzhin du bskyal lo/ /de nas rlung kha sbyor gyi 'og nang du lud pa'i lte bar yaM dang/ rtsa gsum gyi mdud mdor raM gyur pa
105b2(rgyud 'grel): las/ me dpal sran ma tsam cig bsgom mo/ /de'i 'og sgo'i yaM las rlung g.yos pa las me lce dar skud tsam cig dmar nar gyis 'bar te de las 'od zer dus mdza' i nyi ma ltar tsha ba du ma 'phros pas/ tshe thog ma med pa nas kyi sdig sgrib thams cad bye sgro la me
105b3(rgyud 'grel): mched pa ltar skad cig gis bsregs me lce snying gar sleb phas snying padmo dbus kyi hUM spros pas/ de la 'od zer nyi ma shar ba ltar 'phros pas/ lus kyi nang thams cad du khyab pas/ sgrib gsum gyi gnas ngan len/ bag chags dang bcas pas thams cad
105b4(rgyud 'grel): kha sna dang ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rlangs kyi tshul du 'thon nas/ lus shel dkar kyi gzhal yas khang bzhin du dag par bsam de nas ma lce mgrin par sleb pas/ a las 'od 'phros pas/ spyi bo yi oM zhu ba'i dangs ma'i thag pas thugs kar
105b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bar 'jag gi ting nge 'dzin brtan par bsgom mo/ /de nas thugs kha'i hUM las 'od 'phros pas don gnyis byas/ tshur 'dus pas dpa' mo brgyud pa dang bcas pa'i bla ma rnams spyan drangs te rang gi spyi gtsug gi steng nas mar rim gyis zhugs pa la bdun
105b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag sngon du btang la/ gsol ba drag tu btab pas pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa de steng thod khrag /de'i steng raM las nyi ma/ de steng hUM las gri gug rdo rje yi yu ba hUM gis mtshan pa/ de las 'od 'phros pas don gnyis byas pa las/ tshur 'dus pas bdag
105b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid bcom ldan 'das ma sku mdog sngo bsangs bai DUrya ltar dangs pa/ me ri 'bar ba'i dbus na/ nyi ma dangs pa dang/ ma dang dbugs bral gyi rol steng na zhabs g.yas bskum pas ro 'jam pa'i long bu mnan pa/ g.yon pa cung zad brkyang pas snying khar brdzis pa
106a1(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug lon pa'i na tshod dang gzi brjid kyis mdzes pa/ shin tu 'khrugs pa mi'u thung gi sha tshugs can/ /sku spom la rags pa gsus khyim che ba/ stag lpags rlon pa'i sham thabs can/ /mgo rlon klad khrag 'dzag bzhin pa
106a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga bcu'i do shal 'phyang ba/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i dang po gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod khrag thugs kar 'dzin pa/ 'og ma gnyis kyis ral gri dang/ utpa la po tis brgyan pa bsnams pa/ zhal mche ba bzhi gcigs pa/ ljags bar
106a3(rgyud 'grel): snang gi glog ltar 'khyud pa/ ha ha dang/ hi hi'i gad rgyangs chen po bsgrags pas phyi nang bdud thams cad skrag nas 'byer ba/ smar dmar ser gyen du 'tshub pa/ smin phrag dang dpral bar khro gnyer bsdus pa/ spyan gsum dag me'i phung po ltar dmar
106a4(rgyud 'grel): sheg ge dgrad nas cung zad g.yon du gzigs pa/ ral gceg kham ser gyen du brdzes pa/ thod skam lnga yis skra mtshams brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs mdzes pas spras pa/ dbu rgyan/ rna rgyan/ dpung rgyan/ phyag gdub/ zhabs gdub/ se
106a5(rgyud 'grel): mo do rnams klu chen brgyad kyis rigs lnga'i kha dog du dpa' ba' i chas su gtsugs pa/ rgyan drug po de la kyang rus chen dang/ rin po che dang/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa gsal btab la/ cig char chu nang gi zla gzugs ltar mi skyo'i bar du
106a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o/ /bsgom pas skyo na bzlas pa la 'jug par bya'o/ /de'i rang thugs pad+ma nyi ma'i dbus kyis hUM sngon po la/ mdun nas g.yas bskor du 'dab ma bzhi la h+ri traM hUM phaT/ ces pa las 'od zer 'phros pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i
106a7(rgyud 'grel): mun pa bag chags dang bcas pa bcom nas/ sdig pa'i tshogs thams cad ye nas yang dag par brjod de/ 'od des bla ma brgyud pa dang bcas pa dang/ rigs lnga yab yum phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa
106b1(rgyud 'grel): bskul te/ bdag la dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i lhag ma lud pa las/ mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsam mo/ /yang de las 'od 'phros pas don gnyis byas tshur 'dus pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan ma lus pa bdag gi thugs kar
106b2(rgyud 'grel): thim pas/ phyogs bcu nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas su gyur pa nga yin snyam pa'i sems pa yang bya'o/ /gang na yang phrin las tshad med kyi 'khor lo dang/ sgrol ma 'od lus kyi 'pho ba dang/ bar de nye lam gyi man ngag dang/ phan brtson byang chub kyi spyan brlabs la
106b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa thun mong ma yin pa'i gnas yin pas/ skabs gzhan du shes par bya'o/ /de ltar sngon 'gro'i sgom stobs rdzogs pa dang/ g.yas ral gri /g.yon utpa la'i po ti'i rgyab tu bshag pa'i tshul du/ phyag gug gi dung chen gyi phreng ba bzung la/ thugs pad+ma
106b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dab can pandu'i me tog ltar dmar ba la/ yi ge 'bru bzhi btso ma'i mdog can mdun nas chos skor du bkod la/ bskyed rims las ma g.yos shing/ phrin las kyi rnal 'byor gyi ngang las bzlas so/ /'jog khar yig 'bru las 'od zer dkar sngo dmar ser nag po lnga
106b5(rgyud 'grel): las tshe dang longs spyod 'khor dang grags pa ye shes lnga bsdu bar bya'o/ /'chi med dbang phyug mi zad gter kha bye/ /sa gsum kun khyab 'gro kun 'dren pa'i mchog /lnga rig kun mkhyen nga snyam nga rgyal gzung/ /sems nyid yid bzhin mchod na 'dod dgu
106b6(rgyud 'grel): 'grub ces so/ /de nas yid skyon pad 'dab kyi yi ge hUM la/ de thig le la bsdus pa/ thig le stong pa yi ge med ces so/ /spros pa'i mdza' thams cad dang grol te/ bdag gzhan gyi blo gros ngan pa'i tshogs thams cad dag par bsams nas/ 'dod pa'i don gzhan la
106b7(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba drag tu btab te/ rang bzhin med pa'i ngang las bsngo ba'i rgyas btab ste/ rjes shes kyi gnas skabs su 'ang spyod lam thams cad phrin las kyi rnal 'byor dang ma bral bar bya'o/ /de ltar bsgom bzlas kyi rnal 'byor 'dris pa dang/ dngos sam rmi lam gyi
107a1(rgyud 'grel): rtags rnams 'byung ste/ yid gzhung dran bzang ngag rgod snyam dag mkhas/ gzhan byams nad zhi stobs dang longs spyod 'phel/ /zhing mthong phyag yul rin chen rin dang khri/ /chu 'thungs brgyan gnyis zag pa mi rtags brgyan/ /de ltar
107a2(rgyud 'grel): rtags rnams ma byung na sbyin sreg bya zhing sngags kyi bsgrub pa la 'bad par bya'o/ /chos rnams gdod nas ye stong phyir/ /bsam brjod bral ba'i don 'di la/ /sna tshogs lta ba kun spangs la/ /mchog gi rnal 'byor yid la gyis/ /mchog gi sgrol ma ral pa gcig
107a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i man ngag gi sgrub thabs/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal gyi bdud rtsi/ bdag nyid chen po klu sgrub kyi mchog gi rim pa/ tshe'i dngos grub mnyes pa/ 'chi med go cha las brgyud pa/ snyan ngags mkhan po rtag pa'i rdo rje'i man ngag /lnga rig lkog du gyur ba b+ha
107a4(rgyud 'grel): gu pa paN+Da Di ti'i khyad chos/ rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN chen dA na shI la las/ shAkya'i dge slong rig pa 'dzin pa khu rnal 'byor pa las/ 'on d+har sang skri ta'i skad las rang 'gyur du gsungs so// //rgya gar skad du/ tA ra de pa pany+tsa sA d+hA naM/ bod
107a5(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ sgrol ma lha lnga'i sgrub thabs/ thugs rje che ldan ma'i dpal ldan ye shes ma/ /gsal ba'i thugs rje 'gro la ston/ /bdud bzhi tshar gcod ston pa'i mchog /lha mo rtse ldan ma la nyer btu de/ /'gro ba'i gdugs gcig ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de yi bsgrub
107a6(rgyud 'grel): thabs cho ga bshad/ /bas mdza' shing gcig lha yi gnas/ /dur khrod dben pa bkra shis pa/ /dad ldan dbang thob dam tshig ldan/ /gsang thub gus la shes rab che/ /dpa' la brtson 'grus blo ldan pas/ /maN+Dal mchod pa 'dud rtsir ldan/ /rten dang mchod pa'i yan
107a7(rgyud 'grel): lag bcas/ /lha gsar spyan drangs phyag 'tshal te/ /mchod pa bdun po tshad med gsal/ /'od spro bsdu dang stong par gsal/ /oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de las toM sa bon la/ /yaM dang paM gyis rlung dang chu/ /sa dang raM gyi sa dang me/ /de steng bruM las
107b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang/ /gru bzhi rta babs bzhi dang ldan/ /mu khyud lte ba rtsibs bzhir ldan/ /gru ched sgo bzhi rgyan dang ldan/ /dbus su pad+ma dur khrod gdan/ /rtsibs la dur khrod pad+mas mdzes/ /de steng taM zhu hUM du gsal/ /de la thod pa hUM gis mdzes/ /spro bsdu sbyor bas sku bskyed do/ /
107b2(rgyud 'grel): mthid nag zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ /spyan gsum rngam pa'i nga ro can/ /sprul dang stag pags dus pas brgyan/ /ral gri rus phreng gri gug bsnams/ /utpal thod pa g.yon par 'dzin/ /thod phreng bongs thung 'gying bag can/ /nu 'phyang bcu drug lo ltar mdzes/ /
107b3(rgyud 'grel): me ri phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan/ /dbu skra dud kha thod pas brgyan/ /shin tu gsal bar mdangs ldan bskyed/ /de nas thugs ka'i sa bon las/ /shar gyi rtsibs la oM 'phros pas/ dkar po 'od ldan gsal bar bsam/ /zhu bas rdo rje sgrol ma bskyed/ /mdog dkar zhal
107b4(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /rus pa'i rgyan dang sbrul gyis brgyan/ /stag lpags thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon pa ni/ /utpal dkar po 'dzin pa bskyed/ lho phyogs rtsibs la h+rIM(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pas/ ser po 'od ldan zhu ba yis/ /rin chen sgrol ma gser mdog la/
107b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan ldan phyag g.yas rin po che/ /utpal seng po 'dzin pa te/ brkyang bskum khro mo'i cha lugs la/ /dges pa'i gar dang ldan pa bskyed/ /nub phyogs rtsibs la triM 'phros pa/ /pad+ma'i sgrol ma thugs rje can/ /mdog dmar zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /phyag g.yas pad+ma
107b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po'i 'dzin/ /g.yon pa utpal rang rtags te/ /rgyan ldan gong dang mthun par bskyed/ /byang phyogs rtsibs la phaT 'phros pas/ /las kyi sgrol ma sna tshogs mdog /phyag g.yas ral gri 'bar ba ste/ /g.yon pa utpal rang rtags te/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par
107b7(rgyud 'grel): brkyan/ /bskyed la ye shes spyan drangs la/ /mchod bstong byas la gnyis med bstim/ /byin brlabs dbang bskur rdzogs byas la/ /mi gsal bar du gsal bar bsgom/ /skyo na bzlas pa 'bad par bya/ /snying ga'i dkyil du yig 'bru lnga/ /kha dog lnga ru gsal byas
108a1(rgyud 'grel): la lnga las 'od lnga spro byas la/ /lnga sbyangs tshur 'dus lnga ru gsal/ /rab 'bring tha ma gsum dang drug /bcu gnyis bar du 'grub par 'gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab gsal bar bsgom/ bzhi po sreg gso bde ba rgyas/ /rdo rje nor bu'i rtse la drang/ /bsgyil zhing
108a2(rgyud 'grel): bde ba nyid la blta/ /mtshan ldan snod du bzang pos dgong/ /lnga las 'od 'phros 'dod lnga dgug /gnyis med bstims la longs spyod bya/ /mi rgod sa dang ske tshe dang/ /sngags dang ting 'dzin bcas pas bcing/ /oM a mu ki pA sha mA nA ye swAhA/ zhi ba dkar po 'phro 'dus
108a3(rgyud 'grel): spyar rgyas pa ser po bsod nams brgyas/ /mi rmongs dbang du dmar pos bsdus/ /mngon spyod nag po'i 'od kyis gsang/ /shes rab 'phel ba'i 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /nyi shu bar du bsgrub par du/ /dkar gsum chu gtsang skyur rtsis dgang/ /sngags bzlas tho rangs dus
108a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid du/ /gsol btab de dus bza' bar bya/ /oM pradz+nyA pa ra ta ra sa ta muM phaT swAhA/ 'jam dbyangs shes rab lta bur 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus ldan pas sbyor ba bya/ /lha nye 'dod pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /thad ka lugs sku ras ris la/ /rab gnas byas la lhar bskyed la/ /ya
108a5(rgyud 'grel): shes bstims la mchod bstod bya/ /bdag nyid tho mal nyid du ste/ /bzlas pa khri bya gsol btab 'grub/ /oM rat na si tu bI ra sti hUM phaT/ mi gsal gsal bar 'dod pa yi/ /rin chen snod du 'o mas dgang/ /na le sham gyi rdzas kyang blugs/ /rten gyi
108a6(rgyud 'grel): mdun du gzhag byas la/ /lhar bskyed gsang sngags 'bum du bzlas/ /oM ta ra tsa krus? sa ma ti hUM phaT/ srid gsum gsal ba'i shes rab 'char/ /lha klu gnod sbyin 'byung po dang/ ro langs mkha' 'gro mi ma yin/ /gnod par mi 'gyur dbang du 'du/ /bdud dang
108a7(rgyud 'grel): mu stegs pham par byed/ /'jigs chen brgyad las rnam par thar/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod zla bzhin rgyas/ /shes rab nyi ma lta bur 'gyur/ /nyon mongs bag chags mkha' bzhin 'gyur/ /gang 'dod thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /mi mthun phyogs
108b1(rgyud 'grel): las rnam par rgyal/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri rnams dang/ /ro dang reg las phun sum tshogs/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod las/ /skad cig ma las 'grub par 'gyur/ /nad kyi rigs su gang gtogs pa/ /me dang rtsi sgyar? lta bur 'gyur/ /mthu stobs dbang phyug
108b2(rgyud 'grel): grags dang ldan/ /shi 'phos bla med zhing du skye/ /bla ma mkha' 'gro spyan snga ru/ /lo gcig zla ba gang bsgrub pa/ /smon du gtsugs te 'bad par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rten rnams la/ /rab gnas dbang ni bskur byas la/ /dus bzang mtshan dang gtor ma dbul/ /
108b3(rgyud 'grel): me tog sngon pos maN+Dal dbul/ /de ltar lha rnams lung ston 'gyur/ /'bad par gyur kyang rtags med na/ /nyams dang sdig pa che ldan pas/ /spyin sreg tshogs 'khor maN+Dal dang/ /sku gzugs bzhengs la bshags pa bya/ /lha yi spyan sngar gsol ba
108b4(rgyud 'grel): gdab/ /bzlas pa nyis 'bum bskyar la 'bad/ /bdag la bri ba'i mthu med kyang/ /sgrol ma ral gcig gtso bcas la/ /mos pa'i gang zag dngos grub 'dod/ /de yi don du rnam par bkod/ /dngos grub lha yi zhal mthong shog /sgrol ma lha lnga'i sgrub
108b5(rgyud 'grel): thabs rin po che gsal ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta ratna d+ha ti dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur bal// //rgya gar kyi yul shar phyogs na
108b6(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rje chos bshad kyin yong pa la/ /phag rdzim rgan mo cig der btud nas/ res zhing ni ngu/ res zhing rgod pa la/ slob dpon gyis mkha' 'gro ma cig yin par shes nas/ khyod res ngu res rgod pa ci nyes byas pas/ /nga rgod pa khyod phyin tsi ma
108b7(rgyud 'grel): log par bshad pa la dga' nas rgod pa yin/ /du ba khyod rang gi rgyud la yang ma thebs par 'dug /slob ma la yang khyed grags phyir la nyan gyin 'dug pa la du ba yin zer/ der phyag dang bskor ba byas/ maN+Dal phul nas gdams pa zhu byas pas/ nga phag
109a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzim rgan mo cig la chos ci la yod/ nga khyod la lung bstan gyis zangs ling phyi'i yul na/ rnal 'byor ba jo mo sgrol ma bsgom pa cig yod kyis/ /der song la gdams pa zhus cig zer nas/ slob dpon gyis gser mang bar bsnams
109a2(rgyud 'grel): nas byon pas/ zang ling gi rgyal po cig la 'di na jo mo sgrol ma bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor ba cig yod par 'dug pa? gang na yod dris pas/ de nga'i mchod gnas yin lung pa'i phu ya gi na yong zer/ der rgyal po la gser zho gcig phul nas/ nga dang
109a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jal bar zhu bya ba'i zhu ba 'bul dgos byas de byar mi 'dod khong gi nga ma shi bar du mchod gnas bya bar chad ngas khong la chos zhu ba la sogs pa ci byung yang ngo mi byed par chad pa yin zer/ 'phrad pa'i thabs yod dam byas pas yod kyis dgon par song la de'i sgo
109a4(rgyud 'grel): na jo mo sgrol ma'i sku cig yod kyis bskor ba byed du nang bar 'od gis/ bskor ba zin zin du sngod la zin pa dang/ rdo gru bzhi cig gi steng du cung zhig sdod kyis/ /der maN+Dal bul la zhus cig zer ro/ /der byon nas bsdad pas nad par byon nas sdun la bskor ba
109a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad nas rdo'i steng du bzhugs pa la gser phul nas gdams pa zhus pas/ gser bsnams nas slob dpon la phyi rgan rgyab nas nang du gshegs so/ /der zhag gsum la gsol ba 'debs kyin bsdad pas/ zhag gsum nas byon nas/ /khyod ci 'dod
109a6(rgyud 'grel): gsung/ bdag sangs rgyas pa'i gdams ngag zhu byas pas/ jo mo sgrol ma dngos grub brtan par gzigs pa'i rgyud la brten nas gdams pa gnang nas bgrubs pas lo gsum gyis zhal gzigs/ des sgrub thabs las tshogs thams cad mdzad/
109a7(rgyud 'grel): de'i slob ma a mo g+ha badzra chen po/ de'i slob ma bla ma rdo rje gdan pa/ des bla ma ri bo lo tsa ba dang// /rma chung lo tsa ba la gnang/ /des bla ma spyal ba dang gung ston gnyis la gnang/ /des bla ma d+har rma kIr ti la gnang//
