109b1(rgyud 'grel): dus mtshams nag mo zhes bya ba dang/ bdud kyi srang mda' nag po zhes bya'o/ /srog gnad la dbab pa nag po de ba ta la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sde brgyad 'thab pa'i nyi ma la/ /'brub khung gru gsum pa brtsigs la/ dur khrod sol bas byugs pa la/ /ming dang rus su bcas
109b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bri/ /'brub khung nag po'i nang du gzhug /bya nag mo yi sgo nga la/ /dgra yi ming rus bris pa la/ /rkang gis srad brgyus pa yi thag /thod tshel khug du gzhag byas la/ /dug dang mi khrag yungs kar la/ /myong byed yu yis byugs byas la/ /smyug sdong nar
109b3(rgyud 'grel): du blugs byas la/ /zhag gsum bar du sngags 'dis gdab/ /ha badzra ma hA kA la ni sa la he rak+Sha hu hUr pa ha na d+ha ru mA ra ya phaT/ 'od dang sgra ni de la 'byung/ /de nas sgo nga'i drag sngags so/ /hi sha rA rag ma sA d+hA klu sha la mra ra ya phaT/ he ma tsa sa ma ya
109b4(rgyud 'grel): dzA dzA/ sgong dal la drag tu gdag chong de bjung dang sgo bjung ngang/ /mi nag mgo nas 'then pa 'byung/ /rma bya'i sgro yi klad la bskor/ /de yis tshe 'phrul zhi bar 'gyur/ /sngags des sgo nga lci bar 'gyur/ /'brub khung nang du lhung ba dang/ /thun brab gsang pa'i
109b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di'o/ /sa ma yA che ge mo mA ra ya song/ /bdud po srog la yaM he dza dza/ bdud po srog na d+ha ru na/ hi ma tA kA la sa ma ya dza dza/ zhag bdun par du gsang ba brtsam/ /de nas de ni chu la dor/ /de yis bzas pa brlag par nges/ /dus mtshams
109b6(rgyud 'grel): srang mnga' i las/ /gu ru lhu sho ris mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ kA ru Na tA ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ thugs rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ thugs rje nye 'gyur khro mo lha mor ston/ /mtho ris thar pa'i bgegs
109b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams sgrol mjad ma/ /'jigs pa chen po brgyang skyob cing/ /'dod yon lnga'i gdung ba sel/ /phrin las bzhi yis 'gro don mdzad/ /rtag tu sems can mdun du zhugs/ /gsol ba btab pas mi bslu ba'i/ /sgrol ma ral gcig ma la 'dud/ /
110a1(rgyud 'grel): bla ma brgyung ba'i bka' drin gyis/ /snyan rgyud zhal nas lung bstan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi gsungs pa ni/ /gnyis po 'brel 'dod don du bri/ /gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba/ /zab pa bas kyang zab pa nyid/ /mchod pa bzhin du 'dod
110a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /theg chen rigs ldan smin pa nges/ /lha yi tshan ma dur khrod dang/ /khang stong dben la bkra shis par/ /mchod yon zhal zas ldan pa la/ /bsdam bya bsdam par byas nas kyang/ /'jam pa'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /skad cig legs nyan bdun po
110a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal/ /'od kyi srid gsum gsal nas su/ /bsdus te thams cad stong sngags gsal/ /dang po pad+ma dmar po'i steng/ /sa bon pad+ma nang du hUM/ /gri gug hUM bcas byung ba ni/ /ral gcig sgrol ma rje btsun ma/ /g.yon brkyang mgo bo phreng bas brgyan/ /thung zhing
110a4(rgyud 'grel): gsus pa 'chang ldir 'jigs/ /pad+ma sngon po ri yi gdan/ /phyin ra gsang ba'i sku mdog 'chang/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum he he bzhad/ /klu brgyad stag gi pags pas dkris/ /bcu drug gnyis pa 'o mas brgyan/ /lngas brgyan ljags 'dril mche gtsiT
110a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs/ /rus chen phreng ba ral gri gug /rab rtags bde skyong kham ral gcig /dmar zlum me stag phung po can/ /dbu rgyan dur khrod rin chen spras/ /dgug dang gzhug dang mchod bstod nas/ /yi ge gsum ni sngags chen po/ /phaT ni mdza' rus snying kar
110a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /'od zer lnga dang mnyam du mchungs/ /mi shes bud shing bsreg pa'o/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rjes 'brangs nas/ /de yi btu ba'i cho ga bshad/ /dang po sa yi bar phyogs sbyin/ dbyangs yig bzhi pas rna par brgyan/ /ra la zhon cing 'gro ba'i 'od/ /thig
110a7(rgyud 'grel): le zla tshes yang dag ldan/ /de nas traM yig sbyin par bya/ /bzhi pa nyid kyi rnam par brgyan/ /ring po dag dang yang dag ldan/ /hUM yig yang ni sbyin par bya/ /phaT kyi yi ge de nas sbyin/ /yongs rdzogs grub pa'i sngags nyid do/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /
110b1(rgyud 'grel): drug pa gsum na 'grub par 'gyur/ /gsum kha gsal zhing brtan pas so/ /mchog thugs gsum ste kha dog lnga/ /lnga spyangs lnga gsal lnga ru 'grub/ /nam mkha' 'brug sgra sprin sangs pa/ /nyi ma zla ba gsal zhing rgyas/ /shes rab dngos na gnas pa yis/ /'byung ba'i lha
110b2(rgyud 'grel): mo gshegs byon nas/ /rang nyid dbyings kyi rnam pa yi/ /gnyis kyi gcig tu gtubs la rol/ /lnga las lnga 'bros lnga bkug la/ /b+ha gar thim nas longs spyod bde/ /yid du 'ong ba thams cad la/ /dbyibs dang ngag ni brtan pas bya/ /rgyu ba'i bar chod mi rgod dang/ /
110b3(rgyud 'grel): sa dang rnal ma skye tsher dang/ /dbang po'i ting 'dzin sngags dang bcas/ /gsal na the tshom mi bya'o/ /gcig nas phyed du 'jam dbyangs bsgrub/ /chu gtsang dkar gsum sgyur rtsil/ /sngags bzlas bsgrubs te tho rangs btung/ /rigs gsum gtso bor lta bur 'gyur/ /oM
110b4(rgyud 'grel): pradz+nya buSh+Ting ku ru le swAhA/ phan yon bzhin du 'dod yis/ /sku gzugs spyan sngar mchod pa dbul/ /rgyu ba bzang dus gsol btabs 'grub/ /bar chod gzungs kyi zhi bar 'gyur/ /a mu ki pa sha man ya swAhA/ /tshang pa khyab 'jug nyi zlas kyang/ /drag po phyogs
110b5(rgyud 'grel): skyong 'dod lhas kyang/ /pa spu rtse mo gnod mi nus/ /'chi bdag las rgyal 'gro ba bzhin /skra dkar gnyen ma skad ngan nad/ /dbul ba la sogs mdor bsdus pa/ /nang sogs 'jigs pa che brgyad du/ /sdug bsngal rab tu 'joms par byed/ /bskul ba med par
110b6(rgyud 'grel): gos btung dang/ /khang bzang rin chen yongs dang 'du/ /ral gri dang ni mig sman dang/ /rkang pa bum pa bzang sogs 'grub/ /tshigs bcad mkhan dang snyan ngags mkhan/ /blo rno shes rab dri med 'gyur/ /gzhan yang ci 'dod dngos grub la/ /'khor lo las ni
110b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bdag la dri ba'i mthu med kyang/ /bka' rang abla ma'i gdams pa yis/ /ral pa gcig ma'i sgrub thabs dkod/ /'gal gzigs mkhas rnams bzod pa mdzod/ /dang po'i las can dman dang bar ma mchog dag las/ /dngos grub skal pa so
111a1(rgyud 'grel): sor mos pa rnams/ /dang cing mos pa thams cad mthar phyin rtse mo dgod par bya phyir bris/ /phan yon dgos pa 'di yis gang gis bsgrubs pa myur du 'grub par shog thugs rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs dngos grub phreng ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon
111a2(rgyud 'grel): rtag ba badzra mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba mkhas pa pa ris rgya dpe pong du sbyan drangs nas/ pa spug rang gi gser khang du bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o// //rje btsun ma
111a3(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtor ma gtod par 'dod pa yis/ /mtshan ldan bkra shis snod du ni/ /sha dang bdud rtsi sna lnga dang/ /khrag dang chang sna tshogs kyis dgang/ /rlung dang sgyid pu me yis bskol/ /sku gsung thugs sngags sbyangs nas ni/ /rang 'dun
111a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo mchod nas ni/ /lngags kyis btab la 'dod gsol gdab/ /bshags dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo/ /nam(rgyud 'grel): sarba bud+d+ha po d+hi sa twa na ma a pra ti ha ta swA swa nAM/ he he b+ha gA ba ti/ ma hA satwa swargA bud+d+ha/ a pa lo ki ti/ maM saM laM b+ha ta ro e ka dza Ti/ i ngaM ba li
111a5(rgyud 'grel): bri h+Npa ya hUM/ sarba bi sa re swAhA/ hUM pad+ma rigs kyi lha tshogs dang/ thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs/ /rje btsun sgrol mar la gcig ma/ /mchod pa dam la dbul ba ne/ dkar mo dad ni stobs chen mo/ /rtsub mo dang ni brlab byed ma/ /nag mo tshan mo nag mo dang/ /
111a6(rgyud 'grel): srung ba mo dang spong byed ma/ /tshangs mo dang ni rigs byed ma/ /gsang pa mo dang bkra shis ma/ /ri khrod ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /hUM ma gtum ma bdud rtsim/ /bson nams gter dang mthar byed ma/ /drag mo brtul zhugs chen mo dang/ /phan mdzad ma dang
111a7(rgyud 'grel): skya rab byed ma/ /don grub dang ni nor gter ma/ /ral pa gcig ma 'khor dang bcas/ /dur khrod brgyad kyis mkha' 'gro ma/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro ma lus dang/ /lha dang lha min thams cad dang/ /mchod sbyin gter ma 'di bsnams la/ /bdag la dngos grub
111b1(rgyud 'grel): gsol 'debs pas/ zang zing lo tog 'bras bu rnams/ /rin po che ni sna tshogs dang/ /dud 'gro rkang 'gro mi nor phyugs/ /ro brgya'i zas dang sna tshogs zas/ /btung ba kha mdar chang sna tshogs/ /gos bzang srab 'jam sna tshogs dang/ /cang shes glang chen 'dod
111b2(rgyud 'grel): 'job/ /zhing dang khang bzang 'dod 'dze ba/ /'jigs pa brgyad dang bral bar mdzod/ /bcud len tshe ring nad med mdzod/ /phyogs skyong bde brgyad tshogs rnams dang/ /'chi bdag bdud las rgyal bar mdzod/ /ral gri mig sman bum pa bzang/ /rkang mgyogs gter dang/
111b3(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod dang/ /blo rno shes rab tshig bshad dang/ /snyan ngags mang thos chos shes shog /rgyal rigs la sogs rigs bzhi rnams/ /'gro pa dbang du 'du bar shog /rigs drug ngan song lcags grol shog /gnod dang bdung rnams bar chod zhi/ /tshe dang stobs dang
111b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rgyas shing/ /tshe dang chos dang bstan pa dang/ /bla ma'i sku dgra skad cig sgrol/ /rtag tu gar skyes gar gnas kyang/ /gsang sngags lam dang mi 'bral zhing/ /chos kyi 'khor bo longs spyod shog /mngor na rang la ci 'dod pa/ /bsam pa yid bzhin grub pa dang
111b5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'dod thams cad myur bral nas/ /sems can kun gyi don grub shog /thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs/ /rje btsun sgrol ma'i zhal mthong shog /ngal pa gcig pa'i dngos grub gnyis/ /bsams shing bsgrubs pas myur thob shog /rje btsun ma'i nang gi gtor
111b6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i cho ga /slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //yul bal po rdzong du bsgyur ba lags gsung ngo// /*/rgya gar skad du/ ta li sa ti tsakra/ bod skad du/ phyir zlog pa'i 'khor lo/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag
111b7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /bsnyen pa yongs rdzogs rnal 'byor pas/ /bar chod bzlog pa'i cho ga brtsam/ /dben pa'i gnas su maN+Dal dang/ /mchod pa gtor ma bshams la ni/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa rdzogs bsgoms la/ /mchad pa bstod pa dus gsum dbul/ /de nas snying gar
112a1(rgyud 'grel): rtsa bsams la/ /zhu bas 'khor lo rtsibs bzhir gyur/ /lta ba stong pa'i nang nyid du/ /bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gnas/ /rtsibs gnyis rtse la gri gug bsam/ /gnyis pa ral gri me 'bar bsam/ /'bar ba me dang 'od
112a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khrugs nas/ /'khor lo de la mtshon cha ni/ /char ba ba ba phas gser par bsam/ /de nas sngags 'dis 'khor lo bskor/ /oM h+ri traM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ /tsa kra lo ga mA ra ya mA ra ya/ b+h+ruM b+h+ruM/ rtsi pi tse ri/ ta ra ta ra/ phaT phaT swAhA/ de ltar drag po'i sngags
112a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pas/ /'khor lo skad cig mi spong 'khor/ /mtshon cha'i char dang 'od 'khrugs pas/ /gzhan gyi rig sngags smod pa dang/ /gdon dang par chong gang yin pa/ /bkug la 'khro lo mtshen chas btul/ /ting 'dzin gsal dang bzlas pa ni/ /
112a4(rgyud 'grel): brton? bas rab nyu 'dad? phar bya/ /de ltar zhag ni lnga tsam bdun/ /gsum gsum bar du byas gyur na/ /phyag na rdo rje'i stobs kyang rdugs/ /phyir bzlog 'khor lo slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //mkhas pa chen
112a5(rgyud 'grel): po rna pan tshas 'bar gyis bsgyur pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ tA ra gu tya(rgyud 'grel): sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma'i gsang ba'i bsgrub thabs/ mgon po sbyan ngas gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchog dang thun mong 'od pa dang/ /
112a6(rgyud 'grel): bang chong nyer 'tshe zhi ba dang/ /'dod pa'i yon tan 'phol 'gyur zhing/ /phrin las rnam bzhi bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /lha mo gsar ba'i sgrub thabs bshad/ /dang po nyams pa'i skyon bral zhing/ /brtson 'grus ldan pa'i skyes bu yis/ /shin tu
112a7(rgyud 'grel): dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /maN+Dal khru gar tshang du bya/ /dri chen dri chus cha ga chag gdab/ /mchod pa lnga ldan ngas ris dgram/ /phyi nang bar chod zhi bar blta/ /stan la legs 'dug nub tu lta/ /skad cig lha bsam 'od kyis su/ /srid gsum
112b1(rgyud 'grel): zhing sbyar spyan drangs la/ /yan lag bdun po blo yis bya/ /tshang med bzhi bsam stong nyid bsgom/ /a las me byung gru gsum dbyibs/ /dkar po bsams la de stengs su/ /a bsam zhu bas lha mo bskyed/ /mdog smug pong thung thod phreng can/ /zhal gcig
112b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis rgod pa'i gdangs/ /rus pa'i phreng bas sku brgyan cing/ /me dpung 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs/ /phyag g.yas mda' gzhu rab tu 'dzin/ /utpal thod pa byang sems gang/ /g.yon pa thod dkar 'dzin pa bskyed/ /snying gar e yi cha byad la/ /a yi
112b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma 'od 'phros pas/ /ye shes drangs pa mchod pa ni/ /tshig tu ma yin blo yis dbul/ /bzhis bstim byin brlabs dbang bskur bya/ /bskyed la gsang sngags yid la bzlas/ /kha dog lnga ldan snying gar bsam/ /bstod la bzlas pa bya ba ni/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): aM d+h+ri
112b4(rgyud 'grel): situ hUM/ 'bru bdun dngos grub 'byung bar byed/ /bzhi 'am gcig dang bdun na 'grub/ /thun par gtong ma yang dbul/ /ming dang gtam yang gsang spyong bya/ /bzhe las me sung bde ba da bab/ bsgyil la lhan skyes bde ba bsgom/ /e yi a las 'od 'phros
112b5(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /'dong pa'i yon tan de bkug la/ /mtshan ldan snod du bkug byas la/ /rtags rdzogs longs spyod gzhan du min/ /phrin las rnam bzhi skabs dang sbyar/ /rin chen dang 'dra bsgrub pa'i thabs/ /'jigs pa kun sgrol bde ba star/ /nad med gdon rnams rang
112b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin 'gyur/ /phongs pa kun sgrol 'byor par ldan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur 'gyur/ /sbub thabs 'gro la phan phyir bkod/ /lhag pa'i lha yi zhal mthong shog /bar chad nye bar zhi gyur nas/ /'gro rnams de yi zhal mthong shog /sgrol ma gsang pa'i
112b7(rgyud 'grel): skyab thabs/ /dpal rtag pa'i rdo rje lung bstan pas bkod pa/ gsang pa za ma tog cas bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan por dna d+ha ra dang/ /lo tsa ba rmas bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ kA ru Na swa d+ha naM ka rma bi nya
113a1(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ thugs rje sgrol ma las sna tshogs pa'i sgrub thabs/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dben pa'i gnas sams phyogs su/ /srog chags spangs pa'i sal ni/ /rin chen 'brul dri dang bcas/ /chu gtsang la ni sngags ni bzlas
113a2(rgyud 'grel): oM h+riM trM hUM phaT oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ brgya rtsa brgyad dang bzlas la gdab/ /de nas 'jim pa spyang byas la/ /rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis/ /snying ga'i sngags la lnga 'phros pas/ /'jim pa 'od lnga dag tu 'gyur/ /de las 'od 'phros 'jim pa yi/ /byin brlabs bsdus te
113a3(rgyud 'grel): de la bstim/ /de nas 'bi bya ba dang/ /lkol phor sngags kyis 'ong kyis sbyang/ /sngags 'dis tsha tsha gdab par bya/ /oM h+riM triM hUM phaT h+rI(rgyud 'grel): A yu badzra kA ya tsit+ta hUM/ sgrol ma 'od kyi skor gsal nas/ /ye shes dgug dang gzhug pa dang/ /mchod pa bstod
113a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rgyas par bya/ /me tog la ni rten 'brel sngags/ /lan bdun bzlas te gtong bas na/ /rab tu gnas par bya ba'o/ /rten la bskor ba byed pa ni/ /lha yi nga rgyal ldan pa yis/ /snying ga'i sngags las 'ong 'phros pas/ /rten de stong ba nyid du bsam/ /stong
113a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dang las maM las ni/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsam par bya/ /de steng hUM sngon zhu ba las/ /thod pa gri gug sku du bsam/ /snying gar sngags kyi 'khor lo las/ /'od 'phos sangs rgyas thams cad dgug /bstim la mchod pa bstod pa bya/ /de nas
113a6(rgyud 'grel): bskor nga? tha ma la gyis/ /bstong dang sngags bzlas gus par bya/ /ting 'dzin lha yi thugs ka nas/ /'od byung rang ga la phog pa yis/ /sgrib dag sgrol ma'i sku ru gsal/ /sngags 'dis rab tu bskor bar bya/ /oM h+riM triM hUM phaT oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM sa ti sa ma ya hUM phaT
113a7(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bskor ba'i cho ga'o/ /sbyin sreg cho ga bya ba ni/ /yang gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad nas/ /nya yi bar du brtsam par bya/ /snod gtsang ras kyi sdong bu la/ /mar dkar gyis ni mar me sbar/ /me long khud du til li na/ /sdig pa yin ni gzugs byas la/ /
113b1(rgyud 'grel): mdun du bzhag la spyi bor ni/ /kaM bsams zhu bas lus la thim/ /de yi 'od kyis bdag gis ni/ /sdig pa thams cad shad pa yi/ /lam nas sdig gzugs de la bstim/ /me mar hUM las sgrol mar bskyed/ /ye shes dgug la sogs pa ni/ /sngon gyi ji
113b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin shes par bya/ /de nas sdig pa sngags 'dis bsreg /oM h+riM(rgyud 'grel): trIM hUM swarbA b+ha ba da ha shAn tiM ku swAhA/ mthab srin gnyis kyis sdig pa bsreg /brgya rtsa brgyad du bya bar gsungs/ /ser ba srung ba'i cho go ni/ /bsnyan pa mngon rdzogs rnal 'byor pas/ /yungs
113b3(rgyud 'grel): kar me tog sngon po la/ /sngags btab nam mkha' i phyogs su gtor/ /oM h+riM h+ruM rak+Sha sa ma ya b+hya te d+ha ra huM huM hu phaT phaT/ lha ying rgyal ldan pas su/ /sku gtsugs mdun du mchod pa dang/ /gsol ba gang cing 'bar pa/ /khro mo lha la bstod pa/ /chos
113b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid mnyam pa'i ngang las kyang/ /mdzes ma khro mo sgrol ma mchog /ye shes lnga yi ngo bo nyid/ /sku mdog drag po'i/ bro tshul can/ /bod thung gsus 'phyang 'gying bag can/ /mgo phreng brgya yis sku la brgyan/ /dur khrod ro yi dkyil na bzhugs/ /sku gsum
113b5(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba'i lha mo khyod/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum he he sgra/ /yan lag klu brgyad rgyan dang ldan/ /sku snad? stag gi pags pas dkris/ /ljags 'dril mche pa rab tu gtsigs/ /phyag bzhi dang po phreng ba ste/ /thugs rje 'gro 'dren gri gug gis/ /nyon
113b6(rgyud 'grel): mongs bag chags rtsad nas gcod/ /mdzas pa'i dang rtags utpal dang/ /thod pa dug lnga rnam 'dzoms rtags/ /khro mo khyod la dus gsum du/ /bdag ni dran bgyid skyabs su mchi/ /dus rnams gdug pa'i bar chad rnams/ /zhi bar khro mo khyod kyis
113b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /rgya gar bsil ba'i seng ldeng phug du slob dpon rtag pa'i bdzas mdzad pa pa rdzogs so// //mkhas pa chen po pa ri lo tsa bas bsgyur ba'o// //dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas nyid du/ /drag po bdud kyi nyi ma la/ /dkyil
114a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bca' dang thun rdzas bsog /lha mo srad mda' bca' byas la/ /bdag nyid gtso bo'i nga rgyal bya/ /sgo nga'i bya ba rdzogs pa dang/ /thun rdzas rnams la sngags 'di gdab/ /oM khA ta ra war ti rbad dza dza/ zhag bdun bsngags la thun
114a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzas 'di/ /dkyil 'khor byang gi phyogs su gzhag /de nas sgo nga'i steng nyid du/ /kha las lha mo bskyed byas la/ /gdugs pa'i sngags rgod 'di yis gdab/ /he khA ta he badzra ma nu sarba thang rbad/ /sgo nga la ni zla phyed bar/ /drag pa'i sems kyis gdab par bya/ /
114a3(rgyud 'grel): sgong 'brub khung lhung ba dang/ /gri gug dag gi btol byas la/ /thun gyis brab cing sngags 'dis gsad/ /dzA dza thang thang drad/ he mugs srog mA ra ya thun ni rbad hUM hUM srog la he kha ta badzra rbad/ /bcu gcig bar du thun gyis brab/ /de nas mnan dang bsreg
114a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /lha mo ngan gsang gi las la sbyar/ /kha yi gdong ba srang mda' nag mo zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon rtag pa'i badzras mdzad pa// //rje btsun sgrol ma thugs rje sgrol/ /dngos grub sgrol ma gus btu de/ /phyag 'tshal skyabs 'gro byin gyis
114a5(rgyud 'grel): rlobs/ /bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rje btsun sgrol ma dngos grub bla na med pa'i gsang ltar bslub pa'i/ sgrub thabs kyi man ngag me tog gi phreng ba lta bu'i man ngag ni/ 'dir chos 'di la mos shing gus pas/ skye ba 'di nyid la sgrol ma'i go 'phang
114a6(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'dod pas/ rgyu bzhi ste 'khor ba la gshed mar mthong ba dang/ /zas nor la dug du mthong ba dang/ /'khor ba'i las 'bras bu dan song gsum du mthong ba dang/ byas pa don med cing 'bral zhing mi rtag par shes pa dang/ sangs rgyas
114a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi chos 'dod pa tshad pas gdungs pa chu 'dod pa lta bu brtson 'grus can de la 'byung gi /gzhan la ma yin pas/ kun la spel na rang gi dam tshig nyams shing dngos grub ring la don med par 'gyur ro/ /de yang sdom pa gsum gyi lung sgrub thabs ji
114b1(rgyud 'grel): lta ba bzhin du byas la/ /lam du blangs nas sangs rgyas sgrol ma thob par 'dod pa la don gsum ste/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa thun mong pa yin pa'i tshogs lam dang/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa thun mong ma yin pa ye shes kyi lam dang/ gzhan ma dad pa bzlog pa las
114b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu dang gsum mo/ /sgrub thabs bzhin bskyed rim rdzogs nas rang gi thugs ka'i nyi zla'i steng du taM ljang sngon mdza' mar dpa' mo 'bru lnga'i 'od zer kha dog lnga'i 'od kyis 'ja' tshon ltar bsams nas/ sngags bzlas te/ dmigs
114b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dol bltas pas 'ong 'phros te/ 'gro ba lnga'i rgyud sbyangs pa dang/ rang gi dug lnga sbyangs bsregs te/ 'gro ba drug gi sa bon ye shes lnga'i 'od kyis bsregs pas/ sems can gyi don tha mi dad pa'o/ /slar 'dus pa las/ rang gi phung po lnga rdo rje sbol
114b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ 'khor lo skrol ma dang/ rin chen sgrol ma dang/ pad+ma sgrol ma dang/ las kyi sgrol mar gyur pa dang/ snang la rang bzhin med pa dang/ gsal 'dzin pa med pa bsgom/ thun bzhi'i sbyor bas bya'o/ /de'i grogs gtor ma dang/ mchod pa dang/ bskor ba
114b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ?? maN+Dal dang/ bstod pa dang/ gzungs dang tsha tsha gdab p la sogs pas bskangs te/ bskyed rim lam du bslang ba'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa la don bzhi ste/ sna tshogs lam khyer dang/ nyi ma lam khyer dang/ nam mkha' lam khyer ro/ /sna tshogs
114b6(rgyud 'grel): ni rgya che ste/ skar ma ltar snang ba sna tshogs 'di/ /gzung ba'i yul chags sdang gnyis la brten nas/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal myong bar byed pas/ de zil gyis mnan pa ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes par bya'o/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i chos kyang rmi
114b7(rgyud 'grel): lam lta bur shes par bya/ /de las ches lhag pa'i chos cig yod na'ang/ sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bur shes par bya'o/ /dngos por rang rgyud pa'i zhen pa log ste/ rgyu mar shes par gzung bas stong zhing 'dzin pas dben pa thabs lta'i rnal 'byor dang
115a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab stong pa de rgyu stong pa dbyer med pa lam yin par rgyal ba'i bka' las gsungs so/ /de bas na lha'i lus sgyu ma lta bu dang/ dag sngags 'brug sgra lta bu dang/ sems ting nge 'dzin gsal ba nam mkha' i ngo bor 'das pa ni/ rdzogs pa'i
115a2(rgyud 'grel): rim pa'i lam dang po'o/ /lam gnyis pa nyi ma ni/ /lus kyi sgrol ma bsgom ste/ 'byung ba rim par brtsegs la sgo gnyis bcas la/ bdag po nang du bsdad la/ khang pa dbus mar me sgron btang la gdugs kyi 'od phab la lam po che nas 'thon te/ yul bzhi ru
115a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas la/ phyi rol thams cad la mi sprad par byas la/ mar me rlung gis bskyod par byas la/ rang gi dgon pa nor bu rin po che de la rkun mos mi khyer ba'i mel tshe la brtson par byas la/ dbul 'phongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsum pa thabs khyad par can gyi
115a4(rgyud 'grel): lam gyis/ /sangs rgyas myur du thob par bya ba ni/ mi'i bu mo shes rab sgrol ma bsten la bya ste/ dbang po 'bring po rtog pa zil gyis mnan pa ni/ tshad dang ldan pa'i bu mo dang/ dam tshig tu ldan pa gsang spyod kyi rtan dang/ 'ba' yul la su rung ba'i pho nyas/
115a5(rgyud 'grel): steng 'og las thams cad bya ste/ kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems skye chu bzhin phab nas/ don dam dang gnyis su med pa'i sems rdzing bzhin du bskyil la/ phyi nang gzung 'dzin sna tshogs thams cad skad cig ma ye shes kyi 'ong du bsdus nas/ bde ba chen por
115a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /sgo lnga yul thams cad bzhi ru bsdus la de yang gcig gi ngo bor gsal ba thun dang thun mtshams su bcad la bsgom mo/ /dang po rab gyi dbang du byas na/ nam mkha' lam khyer bsgom par bya ste/ rten med lam du 'jug pa ni/ nam mkha' rnam pa
115a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum ste/ nang gi nam mkha' dang/ phyi'i nam mkha' dang/ par snang gi nam mkha' o/ /nang gi nam mkha' la gnyis te/ shes par bya ba la gsum dang/ bzhag par bya ba la gsum mo/ /shes par bya ba gsum ni/ phyi nang bcung kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad rang
115b1(rgyud 'grel): gi sems su shes par bya ba dang/ sams nying spros pa nye bar zhi ba dang/ de bde chen zung 'jug 'ong gsal ba'o/ /bzhag par bya ba gsum ni/ nang zab mo'i gtan tshigs gsum ste/ bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis thog ma bar gsum dbyibs dang kha dog ngos
115b2(rgyud 'grel): gzung rten btsal ba la sogs pa dang/ zab mo dbang gi dus dang/ snang stong dbyer med kyi mtshams ni gnyug ma'i sgrol ma ste/ 'khor ba las sgrol ba'i sgrol ma'o/ /phyi'i nam mkha' la bzhi ste/ dpe don la bsre ba dang/ don dpe la bstim pa dang/ de gnyis dbyed
115b3(rgyud 'grel): med du gnas la gnas pa dang/ nyid gsum gcig tu go bar bya ba'o/ /bar snang gi nam mkha' la drug ste/ bems po'i sna rtse dang/ 'od kyi sna tse dang/ dran pa'i sna rtse dang/ dus kyi sna rtse dang/ dbyibs kyi sna rtse dang/ myong ba'i sna rtse dang/ thun du bcang la
115b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa'o/ /de dag la 'bang pas bskyed pa'i rim pa brtan zhing zhal mthong ba dang/ snang rtags thams cad sgyu mar myong ba dang/ ngo bo ma skyes pa'i chos la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas/ mthong ba dag nas sa dang lam la 'jug ste/ mthar phyin par
115b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /nga ni gsum pa las kyi tshogs kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pas/ 'gro ba ma dad pa dang par bya ba dang/ dang pa phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang/ skye bo ngan pa bstan pa la sdang btshar bcad par bya ba'i phyir/ phan gdags dang tshar
115b6(rgyud 'grel): bcang bar bya ste/ rgyal ba'i bka' dang bla ma'i gdams ngag gi rjes su 'brang ste/ snod dang mi mtshungs pa rnams la bstan pa na rang ngan song du 'gro ste/ sngon gyi paN+Di ta rnams song ba'i gtam rgyud las shes par bya'o/ /mchems med pa byed pa'i skye bo bla
115b7(rgyud 'grel): ma dang chos kyi bar chad byed pa de/ kha sbyor dbye bar 'dod na bdag rje btsun ma'i bskyed rims brtan pa dang/ thugs ka'i 'khor lo 'bum tsho drug 'than pas nges shes rab ngos ni dus kyi gnad dang sbyar ba ste/ rje btsun ma 'byung ba lnga'i lha mo des yang me lha
116a1(rgyud 'grel): gtam gyi ngo bor rgyu ba na/ khro mo chen mo dbyings kyi 'od kyis gri gug gis snying nas dral/ /sngags la che ge mo a mu kaM mA ra/ zhes pa ni gnyis zhes bya'o/ /bkug ste ka pA lar bcug ste/ ral gris gtubs la/ kho'i srog rlung gi don
116a2(rgyud 'grel): snying lnga srog pa rtsa nas drangs nas/ khro mo'i zhal du gsol te/ sha zos khrag rdubs dus pa 'chos/ shes pa rlung la bstims pa ste/ lha mo'i thugs nam mkha' stong par phyal gyis gtang ste/ nam phyed na/ brgya 'am stong du bya/ nyin phyed dang/ tho rang su byas na
116a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya lus sems kha sbyar byed par 'gyur ro/ /da ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ste bza' ba dang btung ba dang/ dri zhim pa dang gos dang/ yul dang mi yid du 'ong ba dang/ dgra dang thams cad dbang du rang ji lta bar bsgrub pa ni/ yid bzhin nor rnyed pa lta bu ste/ rnal 'byor
116a4(rgyud 'grel): pa chos kyi bar chad 'tsho bas mi 'byung ba ni/ sngar bstan pa lta bu/ thugs ka nas nyi zla'i steng na 'od zer lnga'i 'khor lo gnas pa las/ 'od zer lnga 'phros te rang gar 'dod pa'i rang gi ga pA la dum bu gcig pa mdzes shing rgya che ba'i nang du 'ongs par bsams te/
116a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rang gis sid+d+hi hUM zhes 'ongs par bsams btsam gyis/ /rgyal po'i bsod nams tsam yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na yid du 'ong ba thams cad la zhes pa'o/ /de gang gis 'grub na lha gsal ba dang/ ngag brtan pas ste bzlas pas 'grub
116a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ dus kyi gnad la ngal so nus pa des so/ /da ni rnal 'byor ba 'jigs pa chen po brgyad dang/ mi rgod ma rungs pa bcings zhing bzlog par bya ste/ dben par bag yongs su rgyu ba ni/ bdag gang yang rung ba'i lam du rgyu ba'i dus su/ gom pa 'bor khar rje
116a7(rgyud 'grel): btsun sgrol ma ying la dran par thal gyis bya ba dang/ g.yas pa'i rogs po spangs la/ de ma yin pa'i rogs kyis thad kar/ spyi gtsug utpa la'i phyag rgya bcing la/ yi dam gyi gsol ba gdab/ gos kyi bsham gyi sna la nang gi yi ge paM las pad+ma'i steng
116b1(rgyud 'grel): ru taM ljang sngon bsams la/ de'i 'od kyis 'jigs pa brgyad gang 'od du bos pa de gos khung du h+ril gyi dril la/ rgyu ba gnyis ka bcad la/ bsgrub bya mtshams tshun chad/ /phyag mtshan rus phreng gis bcad de/ /'gul mi shes par byas nas/ lam gyi sa chums/
116b2(rgyud 'grel): cig btums la sngags bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod do/ /mdud pa dmar po bcings la sngags a mu kaM pA shaM ma nA ya swAhA/ de rnams res 'jog ma yin par dus gcig tu bya ba'i man ngag go/ /'jigs pa thar nas mdud pam bkrol na sdig pa che'o/ /
116b3(rgyud 'grel): rten 'brel de rnams tshang na the tshom med do/ /da ni shes rab blo 'phel bsgrub par bya ste/ yang sngar bstan pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ chos kyi shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med par bya ba ni/ tshes gcig nas gzung na/ tsan tra rus pa'i bar du sgrub
116b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ zhag lngar chu gtsang la sngags btab te/ tho rangs dus kyi gnad la sbyar ste btung ngo/ /de nas zhag lngar dkar gsum la btags te dus gsum du btu ngo/ /de nas zhag lngar sbyar rtsi gzhan gyis ma 'phags pa la sngags btab la btung ste/ de'i
116b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM pradz+nyA pUSh+Ti pU Sh+TaM ku ru swa' hA/ zhes mthar rten gyis bzlas te/ tho rangs 'thungs na 'grub po/ /nang ma re la shlo ka sum stong zin no/ /gal te ma grub na yon tan la sogs pa ste/ sngar bstan pa ltar bsnyen pa grub nas/ rang ji ltar 'dod pa
116b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du 'dod pa thams cad bsgrubs nas/ rten lha mo byin brlabs ldan pa la/ g.yon pa'i sa dang/ mo'i dus su mchod pa dang/ gtor mas mnyes par byas la/ bstod pa dang gsol ba btab ste/ sngags kyi mdza' rten/ de ma ta re e ka dza Ti ma ni sand+hi hUM nas
116b7(rgyud 'grel): pas 'grub po chu shel gyi sbyor ba bzhin no/ /gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad dbang du bsdu bar 'dod na/ sngags 'di mthar brten bya ste/ na mo b+ha ga nyra te/ uSh+Ni Sha sa d+ha re d+ha ra na twi ye swAhA/ gi waM la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags nas dpral ba'i thig le
117a1(rgyud 'grel): byas na/ gang la ltas pa de dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /mig rdzas la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te/ mig la bkus na gang 'phrad pa de dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /chu khyor gang la sngags lan bdun bzlas te/ 'thungs na ma slang bar zas rnyed par
117a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /tshogs kyi nang du 'gron/ rang gi gos kyi mdza' ma nas/ lag pa g.yon pas bzung la nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te phyin na tshig btsan zhing bden par 'gyur ro/ /shags 'debs na lan thebs shing mi 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /lam du 'gro na dus dang sbyang
117a3(rgyud 'grel): na don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs rings rtag tu bzlas na/ bdud dang nag po'i phyogs kyi mi tshugs shing/ dgra dang bgegs kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang phan yon dang/ phan yon gyis nyams su blang pa'i man ngag /bla ma dam pa rnams las
117a4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar shes par bya'o/ /las tshogs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rje nyer bsdus pa/ /rje btsun sgrol ma dran pas 'dod sgrub ma/ /de'i sgrub thabs dka' 'grel man ngag nyams su blang thabs 'jug tshugs 'dis/ /mun pa bsal nas 'gro ba'i don bkod bdag
117a5(rgyud 'grel): gis slob par shog /rje btsun ma sgrol ma'i man ngag me long dangs pa zhes bya brdzogs so// //bems po'i sna rtse dang 'od kyi dang/ dran pa'i dang/ dus kyi dang/ dbyibs kyi dang/ myong ba'i sna rtse'o/ /rtag pa'i badzra nas brgyud pa'i dngos grub brtan
117a6(rgyud 'grel): gzigs kyi rgyud bskor 'di/ /rma dang ba ri gnyis kyi lugs/ /d+hA rmmA kI rti zhes bya bas/ /bca' dang bla ma gus ston la/ /zhus pa rin chen lta bu 'di/ /sgrol ma'i zhabs la gtugs par smon// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ se dan+ta sh+rI ye
117a7(rgyud 'grel): yog ni rma shma shA na ka lnga nA ma/ /bod skad du/ /dpal u rgyan gyi rnal 'byor dang/ rnal 'byor ma'i rang byung gi longs spyod dur khrod kyi rtog pa zhes bya ba/ bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shar gyi dur
117b1(rgyud 'grel): khrod dbang po gtum drag dpag chad bcu gnyis khor yug la/ /dpag tshad lnga zheng du gnas pa/ dbyibs ni shing rta rkang pa gsum pa lta bu/ gtso bo klu sgrub snying bos byin gyis brlebs/ /shing ni gser mdog lom brgyar gyes shing/ zhing skyong dkar po gri thong
117b2(rgyud 'grel): glang chen gdong/ /phyogs skyong brgya byin glang chen gdan rigs bcas/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro pre ta yi dags za/ /byang chub chen po'i mchod rten gyi sa 'dzin/ /mdza' yas sngon po'i klu ni 'dud byed cing/ /thod pa brtsegs pa'i spyil bus kun bkang zhing/ /de na rnal
117b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ba'i rgyal po A rya de ba la sogs pa shin tu mang ba bzhugs so/ /rnal 'byor ma ni mdzes ma dang snying stobs can ma la sogs pa'o/ /de dag ni rgyud gsang 'dus kyi rjes su 'jug cing klu sgrub yid la byed pa'o/ /lho'i dur khrod gshin rje 'bang ba'i nags tshal/ dpag
117b4(rgyud 'grel): tshad drug cu gnyis khor yug pa/ /dpag tshad bco lnga rgyang grags gcig /dbyibs ni 'khor lo 'dra/ /Dom+bi he ru yis byin gyis brlabs/ /bai dU rya mdog lo ma brgyad gyes shing/ zhing skyong nag po gri thod ma he gdong/ /phyogs skyong gshin rje ma he gdan
117b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs bcas/ /rin chen mkha' 'gro kang ka dbang bskur byed/ /cho 'phrul ston pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin/ /dung skyong dkar po'i klu ni 'dud byed cing/ /thod pa rus pa dum du'i spyil bus bkang/ /rnal 'byor pa ni a ba d+hU ti dang/ /phag mo la sogs pa'o/ /de
117b6(rgyud 'grel): dag ni gsang 'dus dang/ gshin rje gshed nag po'i rjes su 'jug cing? Dompi he ru ka yid la byed do/ /nub kyi dur khrod chu bdag thong pa can dpag tshad bzhi bcu brkyang khor yug lag dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du gnas/ /dbyibs ni ba lang spyod lta bu zlum po ste
117b7(rgyud 'grel): mkhas brta dbyangs kyis ni byin gyis brlabs/ /byi ru'i mdog can lo 'dab rgyas/ /zhing skyong dmar po gri thong chu srin gdong/ /phyogs skyong chu lha chu srin gdan rigs bcas/ /pad+ma mkha' 'gro chos ston kun d+ha ra/ lha las babs pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin/ /
118a1(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dga' po'i klu rnams 'dung byed cid ro rnams brtsegs pa'i spyil bus kun bkang zhing/ de ni rnal 'byor pa ni ku ku ri pa dang/ rnal 'byor ma ni snying po'i rgyun ma dang/ de dag thams cad ni rgyud sgya 'phrul chen mo'i rjes su 'jug cing/ slob
118a2(rgyud 'grel): dpon rta dbyangs yid la byed pa'o/ /byang ge dur khrod lus ngan 'jigs byed dang/ /dpag tshad brgyad cu pa khor yug la/ dpag tshad nyi shu zheng du gnas/ /dbyibs ni shing rta rkang pa bzhi pa lta bu/ /slob dpon pad+ma can gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /nar gar
118a3(rgyud 'grel): ljang mdog lo ma brgyar gyis shing/ /zhing skyong ljang gu gri thod khyu mchog gdod/ /phyogs skyong gnod sbyin khyu mchog gdan rig bcas/ /las kyi mkha' 'gro las 'byor dam tshig la/ /bkra shis brtsegs pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin/ /ljang gu kadko?
118a4(rgyud 'grel): Ta'i klu rab 'dud/ /ro yi spyil bus kun nas bkang ba'i zhing/ /de na rnal 'byor pa ni bzang po dang/ /rnal 'byor ma ni brdud ma la sogs pa'o/ /de dag rgyang dges pa rdo rje'i rjes su 'jug gcig slob dpon mtsho skyes rjes su dran par byed do/ /shar lho'i du 'khrod
118a5(rgyud 'grel): me mtshams dpal 'dren dpag tshad bcu gnyis khong yug la/ /dpag tshad gsum ni zheng du gnas/ /dbyibs ni skyes pa gzho nu'i lag mthil lta bu ste/ gtso bo sa ra ha yis byin gyis brlabs/ /shing ni a mra'i mdog can lo 'dab rgyas/ /zhing skyong
118a6(rgyud 'grel): ser po gri thod ra skyes gdong/ /phyogs skyong me lhar skyes gdan rig bcas/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ro langs sbyin sreg byed/ /pad+ma spungs pa'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin/ /dkar po pad+ma chen po'i klu rab 'dud/ /yi dags ro yi spyil bus kun bkang zhing/ /de
118a7(rgyud 'grel): na rnal 'byor pa ni d+hu na ka na ka dang/ rnal 'byor ma ni pad+ma rdo rje la sogs pa'o/ /de dag ni rgyud bde mchog 'khor lo'i rjes su 'jug cing dpal sa ra ha pa rjes su dran par byed pa'o/ /lho nub kyi dur khrod dbang ldan ha ha sgrogs zhes pa dpag tshad drug khor
118b1(rgyud 'grel): yug la/ dpag tshad bzhi ni zheng du gnas/ /dbyibs ni pad+ma dkar po kha bye ba lta bu ste/ dpal mchog nag po zhabs kyi byin gyis brlabs/ /in+d+ra nI la'i shing ni lo 'dab rgyas/ /zhing skyong nag po gri thod mi yi gdong/ /phyogs skyong srin po yi dags
118b2(rgyud 'grel): gdan rig bcas/ /dam tshig mkha' 'gro gyad rnams nye bar ston/ /bdud 'dul chen po'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin/ /gzi can dkar dmar mdog can klu rab 'dur/ /keng rus yi dags lo ma'i spyil bus gang/ /de na rnal 'byor pa ni bram ze stobs
118b3(rgyud 'grel): can gyi bu rnal 'byor pa gser mdog can dang/ rnal 'byor ma ni bzhin khrom la sogs pa'o/ /de dag ni rgyud snying po gnyis dang/ rta mchog gi rgyud kyi? rjes su 'jug cing dpal nag po zhabs rjes su dran par bya'o/ /nub byang dur khrod bden bral mun chen
118b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa dpag tshad bcu bzhi pa 'khor yug la/ /dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du gnas/ /dbyibs ni chu yi ri mo 'khyil ba lta bu ste/ /mkhas pa ku kur pas byin gyis brlabs/ /shel gyi mdog can shi'i na lo 'dab rgyas/ /zhing skyong sdon pa gri nod sha ba'i
118b5(rgyud 'grel): mdog /phyogs skyong rlung lha sha ba'i gdan rig bcas/ /thams cad mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i chos ston cing /gtsug phud ngag pa'i mchod rten gyi sa 'dzin/ /pad+ma dkar po'i klu ni rab tu 'dur/ /rtsa spyil dus pa'i rgyan spras kyis gang zhing/ /de na rnal 'byor pa
118b6(rgyud 'grel): ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang/ rnal 'byor ma ni zhing la sogs pa'o/ /de dag ni rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i rjes su 'jug cing dpal ku ku ri rjes su dran par bya'o/ /byang shar gyi dur khrod drung du ca tsha sgrog ces pa bdag tshang nyi shu khor yug la/ /dpag tshad lnga ni zheng du
118b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /dbyibs ni dge slong gi lhung bzed lta bu ste/ mkha' 'gro rdo rje phag mos byin gyis brlabs/ /rin chen dung mdog shing ni lo 'dab rgyas/ /zhing skyong dkar sham gri thong rta yi gdong/ /phyogs skyong 'byung po rta yi gdan rig bcas/ /'jig rten
119a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro bskyod cing gtor ma 'dzin/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i mchod rten gyis sa 'dzin/ /nor 'dzin na ros mdog can klu rab 'dud/ /so 'phag brtsegs pa'i spyil bus kun bkang zhing/ /de na rnal 'byor pa ni dpal he ru ka pa
119a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rnal 'byor ma ni bdag med ma dang/ bdud rtsi ma la sogs pa'o/ /de ni rgyud kha sa ma ya nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rjes su 'jug cing/ rdo rje phag mo rjes su dran par byed do/ /dpal dbu rgyan gyis rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i rang byung gi longs
119a3(rgyud 'grel): spyod dur khrod kyi rtog pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon bir ba pas mdzad pa las btus pa/ rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA sh+rI dz+nyA na kI rtis rang 'gyur mdzad pa'o// //dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khrul pa mya nga ma thang chen la/ /nyon
119a4(rgyud 'grel): mongs nyi mas rab gdungs pa'i/ /'gro ba 'tsho ba'i klung gyur pa/ /srog 'dzin mgon le nyer btung nas/ /gang gis nyon mongs zhi byed pa/ /rtogs dka' thabs mang rgya mtsho las/ /mchog gyur mgon pos gsungs pa'i don/ /bla ma'i gsung las blangs
119a5(rgyud 'grel): pa brjod/ /'di na gang dag nyon mongs spong gnyon mongs 'gyur/ /ji ltar bkres pas kha zas dang/ /sgom pa chu la rgyab phyogs bzhin/ /dper na me yi bud shing dang/ /ma phrang sdud cing mi gsal zhing/ /'chi 'gyur de ltar 'gro ba'i sems/ /'dod pa
119a6(rgyud 'grel): spangs na ma dud 'gyur/ /yul la shin tu chags pa'i sems/ /'od pa spangs pas zlog byed pa/ /de ltar mi 'gyur thabs dman phyir/ /nyon mongs 'phel ba kho nar zang/ /gang dag shin tu bcings pa'i mi/ /'dug nang gzhan du 'gro ba yi/ /bsam
119a7(rgyud 'grel): pa rtag tu bsten byed cing/ /lus sems bde bar mi 'gyur bzhin/ /sems mi bde ba don gnyer bas/ /de rnyed par ni ma gyur par/ /kun tu rtog pa rgyas 'gyur zhing/ /gnyug ma'i yid gnas mi 'gyur ba/ /dper na glang chen ma rungs pa/ /gang tshe char
119b1(rgyud 'grel): gis rab myos pa/ /dad kyis dul 'gyur de yi tshe/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi longs spyod 'gyur/ /de ltar sems kyi glang po yang/ /yul gyi chang gi rab myos na/ /dmu rgong rtog pa dul 'gyur zhing/ /gnyug ma rnal 'byor pa yis len/ /gang dag spros pas ma
119b2(rgyud 'grel): spros pa'i/ /gnyug ma'i sems yid ma rnyed na/ /rtog pa'i dra bas 'chad min te/ /rtog las 'khor ba sna tshogs 'byung/ /de phyir yang dag gzhug pa'i yid/ /mthong bar 'dong pas lus dang sems/ kun rtog rlung rnams zhi bya'i phyir/ /nam yang gdung bar mi
119b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de ltar gdung ba spangs pa las/ /sems ni bde ba'i ngo bor 'gyur/ /'khrul pa'i sprin sdug 'gag 'gyur zhing/ /'ong gsal dri med nam mkha' mthong/ /bde de 'dod pa kun las 'byung/ /yang dag bla ma'i man ngag bzhin/ /thabs dang bcas pa'i rnal
119b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pas/ /rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan bsten/ /gti mug 'khrul pa las kyi sprul/ /sdug bsngal rba klong cher 'khrugs pa'i/ /'khor ba'i chu bor bying ba yi/ /'gro la brtse ba chen po bskyed/ /'dir ni 'di don 'dis mi nus/ /yang dag ye shes snang ldan
119b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ yi dam rgyal po'i gzugs kyis ni/ /sems can skyabs la brtson par bya/ /rang gi bskyed pa yi ge'i gzugs/ /de nyid snying gi dkyil du gzhog/ /'od kyi sdig pa zang byas te/ 'gro mang sdug bsngal zhi par bya/ /btus pa'i sbyor bas lha gang gi /
119b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas la dang pas de nyid bsam/ /byin gyis brlab dang dbang bskur ba/ /gzhug dang mchod sogs thams cad bya/ /de nas bzhin bzangs mig yangs ma/ /lang tsho rgyags shing skye gnas dang/ /nu ma mkhrang zhing sha rgyas pa'i/ /bu mo yid 'ong mdun du
119b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhag /gtsug tu mangs dang rong ldan dang/ /bu ga 'phen dang bskyod pa dang/ /mtshams su mdzes par gyur pa yis/ /mdzad pa mdzes par bya ba dang/ /rnal 'byor la ni rtag gus shing/ /lhag par zab mo'i tshes la dang/ /khro med rnam rtog spangs pa'i
120a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag /yongs su smin byas byin gyis brlab/ /gtso nyid gang gi rig ma rung/ /cho ga mkhas pas bsgoms nas kyang/ /de ru ye shes 'khor lo gzhug /mtshan ma gnyis kyang sngags kyis sbyang/ /ling kha brtan por gyur pa ni/ /skye
120a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas dbus su gzhag par bya/ /dam por 'khyud pas gnas nas ni/ /yang dang yang du tsum pa bya/ /sen mos cung zad drud pa dang/ /ma mchu so yi gtsir bar bya/ /mig ni rab tu bsgyur bya zhing/ /lce yeng lce yis bskyod par bya/ /mgrin par dngos dgang
120a3(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /gshub pa 'am yang na gsal pa ru/ /chags pa'i tshig gis sbyor ba yis/ /kha sbyor bde ba dang po bsgom/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dab ldan pa'i/ /rlung gi rang bzhin pad+ma las/ /mgrin par 'bar ba'i ye shes ni/ /bya ba grub pa nyon mongs
120a4(rgyud 'grel): 'joms/ /de ru rdo rje nub gyur nas/ /rkang pa skyod pa spangs nas ni/ /lus ngag sbyor dang ldan pa yis/ /dgam zhing bsdu ba dag tu bya/ /mig ni sna rtser phab nas su/ /gzugs sogs yul la ma zhen par/ /de dag las skyes bde ba mchog /yang dag ye
120a5(rgyud 'grel): shes gnyis pa bsgom/ /brgyad gnyis 'dab mar bcas pa yi/ /chu yi ngo bo pad+ma las/ /snying gar 'bab pa'i ye shes ni/ /so sor kun tu rtog par brjod/ /sgyu rtsa la mkhas pas bskyod bya zhing/ /bu mos kyang ni rked pa bskor/ /dbugs kyang cung zad cung
120a6(rgyud 'grel): zad bsdam/ /ngal gyis sgyu rtsal thams cad spyad/ /mig ni mi 'dzums par gyur pas/ /reg la rtog cing ma zhen par/ /bde ba'i ye shes gsum pa ni/ /rnal 'byor mkhas pas rtog par bya/ /bcu drug phye kyi 'dab mar bcas/ /chu yi rang bzhin pad+ma
120a7(rgyud 'grel): las/ /lte bar 'bab pa'i ye shes ni/ /me long lta bur lang dag brjod/ /rigs kyi mtshan mas sa bon bcas/ /nor bur chud par bsam bya zhing/ /rlung dang yid ni mi rgyu bar/ /byas te mkhas pas 'dod pa gzung/ /gos med rtog pa nyer zhi ba/ /
120b1(rgyud 'grel): mig gnyis rab tu gdangs pa yis/ /rang byung gzhom med mkha' mnyam pa'i/ /ye shes bzhi pa gsal por bsgom/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'dab ldan pa'i/ /'dab skyes sa yi rang bzhin las/ /de 'dab de ru zin gyur pa'i/ /ye shes mnyam pa nyid du
120b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /gal te nger ni ma zin na/ /bde ba chen po mi gsal zhing/ /phung po skye mched nyams pa dang/ /gnyis med ye shes rtogs mi 'gyur/ /dar bas las byas skud pa drug /sor bcu drug gis rked pa bsdams/ /bu mo'i khrag gis bsgos pa dang/ /
120b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrul gyis shun par yang dag ldan/ /sor bcu gnyis ldan shing bu la/ /mdza' ru song gnyis dor ba dang/ /dkyil du srang bus bcings nas ni/ /sor drug rdo rje'i mdud pa byas/ /sor gnyis mthar du sbrel byas nas/ /mkhas pas rang gi rked par
120b4(rgyud 'grel): bcing/ /mdun gyi shing bus 'phra bkod de/ /lte ba'i phyogs su gzhag par bya/ /bu mo'i byin pa g.yon pa ni/ /skyes bu'i drug khug g.yas pas blang/ /dbugs bsdams pa dang ldan pa yis/ /rtag thur sel brkyed par bya/ /glang po'i sna yi sbyor ba ni/
120b5(rgyud 'grel): lag pa glang po'i sna lta bu/ /sna lnga sbyar bar byas pa yis/ /de ru sems 'gag the tshom med/ /spru yi rtsa ba brdungs pa ni/ /lcags kyi snod du yun rings btsos/ /rtsigs ma phud de kar dang/ /til dang sbyar ba mkhas pas gza'/ /'di ni zos pa tsam
120b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis kyang/ /stobs 'phel mdangs dang ldan pa dang/ /thig la 'dzin pa'i thabs kyi mchog /sman gyi sbyor ba dam pa'o/ ba 'am ri yi 'o ma ru/ /ka ra ha sa de bar sbyar/ /'di ni bcud len mchog tu bshad/ /thig le 'dzin pa nyid yin no/ /
120b7(rgyud 'grel): bya yi brun dang mi khyi yi/ /rus pa bzhibs pa'i lde gu yis/ /rdo rje rtag par bsku byed pa'i/ /sa bon 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /khyim bya'i tshil bu til mar dang/ /byi'u yi sha rnams yang dag spyang/ /de yis pad+ma la bskus na/ /che ba'ang zum nas thig
121a1(rgyud 'grel): le 'dzin/ /lcum gyi rtsa ba brdungs pa yis/ /pad+mar bskus na de 'dzin to/ /sa bon mi 'byung thabs kyi mchog /khyad par rdzas kyi sbyor ba'o/ /sna tshogs thabs lam rmongs pas/ /nan tan byas te bzung ba de/ /myur du 'bad pas
121a2(rgyud 'grel): lus ngag dang/ /sems kyi rtsal gyis bzlog par bya/ /lus kyis rtsal gyis lto ba brdebs/ /de tshe ngag stobs yi ge hUM/ /lam yig phreng par rgyud mar ni/ /drangs par bsams pa sems kyi stobs/ /mnyam gnas bskyod pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /dgu po lus stobs
121a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM yig gi /nga ro drag pos mgrin par dgang/ /maM yig phreng ba sems kyi rtsal/ /snying gnas lus stobs sprug pa dang/ /dag gi 'dren pa yi ge A/ paM yig phreng bar bsams pa yin/ /gsung gi dbang phyug gnas su drang/ /lus kyi rtsal gyis mgrin
121a4(rgyud 'grel): par dgug /ngag ni oM yig 'dod la brtson/ /taM yig phreng bar bsams pa yis/ /phyag rgya chen po'i gnas su drad/ /sgo dgu dgag pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rlung dang de bsres rtsa mig dgang/ /sdigs mdzub 'phen pa'i rtsal gyis kyang/ /yang dang yang du spro
121a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /de ltar sbyor ba de dag gis/ /spu yi khung bu'i gnas su yang/ /bde ba'i ye shes g.yos gyur te/ /kun rtog rdul dang bral bar 'gyur/ /de nas rnal 'byor mkhas pa yis/ /d+hU twI dkar po stong pa ru/ /snying gi lam nas sems bcug pas/ /
121a6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rtog pa nub par bsgom/ /d+hU tI'i nang du rang gi sems/ /thig le'i gzugs kyis gnas pa ni/ /thur du phab ste nor bu yi/ /nang du yang dag gnas par bsgom/ /thams cad stong pa bde ba che/ /brjod med rang bzhin shes dka' zhing/ /rnam
121a7(rgyud 'grel): rtog rba rlabs nyer zhi ba/ /gsal ba'i ro ldan nyams su myong/ /ba spu gyen du log pa dang/ /lus ni drag tu 'bar pa? dang/ /'dar dang g.yo 'gyur mchi ma 'dzag /rdul bar 'gyur ba de dag rtags/ /yang na rtag par rgod pa dang/ /du ba 'am brgyal
121b1(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /reg pa la sogs rkyen dag las/ /bde ba bzod dka' skye bar 'gyur/ /rtog med nyam nga rnam par sbangs/ /dga' ba rgyas shing ngo tsha med/ /glu len sgra 'byin 'dod pa'i sems/ /rang 'byung bde ba'i ros myos rtags/ /de ltar yang dag
121b2(rgyud 'grel): goms pa las/ /snang ba ye shes chen por 'char/ /phyag rgya ma la bltos med par/ /sgrib bral bde ba rgyas par 'gyur/ /bzang ngan bdag dang gzhan la sogs/ /yod dang med pa'i sbyor nyid dang/ /'dir ni skyon dang yon tan sogs/ /bde ba che la mi mnyam
121b3(rgyud 'grel): med/ /bstod grags rnyed ldan bden gyur pa/ /'dir ni smad cing ma grags dang/ /dbul po sdug 'phongs gang gyur pa/ /bye brag med brtogs pa'i gdengs/ /mdor na gang tshe rnal 'byor pas/ /rtsol dang mi rtsol nyer zhi zhing/ /blang dor med par gang spyod pa/ /
121b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub spyod pa rlabs chen po/ /de ltar ma nyid bde ba che/ /mdza' bral rgyun mi 'chad pa yi/ /nyams su myong ba ma bstan par/ /sgyu 'phrul phyag rgya bzang mo brten/ /mi mo mtshan nyid rab ldan zhing/ /rigs kyi dbye bas phyed pa ni/ /rgyud las gsungs bzhin
121b5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pas/ /kha dog mtshan ma kun shes bya/ /'gro tshogs chags sogs nyon mongs dang/ /sdug bsngal gdung ba bsil byed pa/ /rnal 'byor mchog gi rgyud rnams las/ /rgyal bas gcig tu bka' stsal pa'o/ /dam pa'i man ngag la
121b6(rgyud 'grel): brten te/ gsang chen theg pa'i lam gyi tshul/ /yang dag spyar ba byas pa las/ /'jig rten 'khor ba nub par shog /paN+Di chen po don yod rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/ /rjes chags kyi sbyor bas de kho na'i rnal 'byor la 'jug pa'i man ngag
121b7(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ karma mu dra pa ri kU u pa de shA nA ma/ bod skad du/ las kyi phyag rgya brtag pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi mo dung gi rnam bkod dang/ /
122a1(rgyud 'grel): ba lad padmo'i rigs las byung/ /dbye ba sum cu rtsa gnyis las/ /tha ma rnam par spang bar bya/ /de dag so so'i spyod pa dang/ /kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma dang/ /dang tshul rnams las so so yi/ /rigs kyi mtshan nyid shes par
122a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /ser zhing dmar ba'i bud med gang/ /tshig snyan rtag par spyod lam mkhas/ /skad gdangs mthon bos sma byed cing/ /tsog tsog por ni 'dug la dga' / /lta ba zur gyis gsal por 'dzin/ /tshig kyang zur gyis des rtogs pa'i/ /bud med blo
122a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog de lta bu/ /rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu/ /ser zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang/ /lus ni dgye min sgru ba min/ /byin du yan lag thams cad legs/ /khyad par du yang smin phrag mdzes/ /bzhin 'phel chung zhing rdom chung la/ /oM sa ko'i
122a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs ni chung dgye yi/ /mdza' ba rtag tu sdug gyur pa/ /dbang phyug mi mo gnyis pa yin/ /bung gang ser ba'i mdog ldan zhing/ /rtag par de'i mig pom tshe/ /bya byed mang zhing 'gro 'dug dga' / /nam yang de yi tshig mi brtan/ /dbang po rno
122a5(rgyud 'grel): zhing brjed ngas chung/ /yid bu 'ong ba'i skyes bu la/ /lta brtson byed kyang chad mi btsan/ /mi mo rten bya min par gsungs/ /yid 'ong sngo bsangs kha dog can/ /mig dkyus rang zhing de rab mdzes/ /byad kyis/ bzangs ring mchu skor che/ /bzhin dang rkang lag ri
122a6(rgyud 'grel): mo mang/ /dul zhid ngag snyan mnyen des che/ /chos sam 'jig rten mthun 'jug gis/ /'dris pa rnams la gzhung bzang zhing/ /bkra shis yan lag mi mo mchog/ bud med utpal mdog 'dra zhing/ /lus gzar 'dril zhing sen mo zlum/ /mig yangs
122a7(rgyud 'grel): dkar zhing yid du 'ong/ /skra mnyen smra ba nyung ba'i bdag /skye bu rnams la gus byed cing/ /brtson pa mthar phyin byed la brtson/ /khong yangs snyon la mkhas gyur pa/ /bsten na dngos grub 'phel bar 'gyur/ /byin du mdog gnag dpral ba/
122b1(rgyud 'grel): mer/ /mtshams mdza' dma' zhing rdzim 'thug /bor thud yan lag rtsub pa dang/ /mig mi sdug cing smra ba man/ /'dum kha yang zhing chags la dga' / /gang la skyes bu bzang ngan med/ /dri nged mi bzad par ldan pa'i/ /bud med bsten pa nyams par 'gyur/
122b2(rgyud 'grel): bud gang zangs 'od rab mjos shing/ /gang gi mgul pa yan lag ring/ /thung du ring po ma yin zhing/ /smin ma phra zhing smin phrag yangs/ /khong dal rtag par spyod lam gtsigs/ /rna ba bzang dang rab ldan zhing/ /so thags mnyam pa'i bud med ni/ /rtag tu
122b3(rgyud 'grel): yon tan ring mi 'gro/ dmar ba'i zangs kyis mtshon pa yi/ /bzhin bzangs sdom zhing cung zad spom/ /drang zhing lus khyim legs pa dang/ /shin tu brla dang ra smad rgyas/ /rang don nyams pa rnam par spang/ /bslu ba'i mi nus khong shes che/ /skra dang ba spu
122b4(rgyud 'grel): ring ldan pa'i/ /bu mo longs spyod sa zhig yin/ /mdog dmar spyod lam chos la dga' / /mtho dman tshig dang spyod pam can/ /rtag par smra la dga' byed cing/ /phyin ci log tu ston par byed/ /brnab sems rtag tu ston byed cing/ /gtor dang mi ldan 'jungs pa
122b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ chags dang sdang ba mang ba yis/ /bud med skyon gyis dri ma can/ /dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang/ /sbom zhing phra ba'i skabs dang ldan/ /nu ma brla dang do smad rgyas/ /ske dang sked pa sor mo ring/ /so dang sen mo mnyam ldan zhing/ /tshig b+huM? byin pa
122b6(rgyud 'grel): bags kyi phra/ /lte ba'i 'og phyogs drang ldan pa'i/ /pa spu'i phreng ba gyen du langs/ /lte khung zab cing pad dbyibs 'dra/ /skye gnas mcho zhing bu ga jug /dal gyis mig ni rdo ba byed bya'i/ /mi mo dbang phyug dpal gyi gzhi/ /bud gang kun da ltar dkar zhing/ /rus
122b7(rgyud 'grel): pa rags shing lus stobs can/ /rtag par mngal du bu po 'chags/ /spyod lam dal zhing mdzes dang ldan/ /'jig rten? byu ma 'jug mkhas shing/ /phrad par dka' zhing bral dka' ba'i/ /bu mo gsang thub blo gros can/ /sngags pa rnams kyis smad mi bya/ /
123a1(rgyud 'grel): ba lang padmo'i rigs las byung/ /dbye ba sum cu rtsa gnyis las/ /tha ma rnam par spang bar bya/ /de dag so so'i spyod pa dang/ /kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma dang/ /dang tshul rnams las so so yi/ /rigs kyi mtshan nyid shes par
123a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /ser zhing dmar ba'i bud med gang/ /tshig snyan rtag par spyod lam mkhas/ /skad gdangs mthon pos smra byed cing/ /tsog tsog por ni 'dug la dga' / /lta ba zur gyis gsal por 'dzin/ /tshig kyang zur gyis des rtogs pa'i/ /bud med blo
123a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog pe lta bu/ /rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu/ /ser zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang/ /lus ni dgye min sgu ba min/ /byin du yan lag thams cad legs/ /khyad par du yang smin phrag mdzes/ /bzhin 'phel chung zhing rdom chung la/ /o sa ko'i
123a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyings ni chung dgye yi/ /mdza' ba rtag tu sdug gyur pa/ /dbang phyug mi mo gnyis pa yin/ /bud gang ser ba'i mdog ldan zhing/ /rtag par de'i mig bom che/ /bya byed mang zhing 'gro 'dug dga' / /nam yang de yi tshig mi brtan/ /dbang po rno
123a5(rgyud 'grel): zhing brjed ngas chung/ /yid du 'ong ba'i skyes bu la/ /lta brtson byed kyang tshad mi btsan/ /mi mo rten bya min par gsungs/ /yid 'ong sngo bsangs kha dog can/ /mig dkyus ring zhing nge bar mdzes/ /byad kyis bzangs ring mchu skor che/ /bzhin dang rkang lag ri
123a6(rgyud 'grel): nob mang/ /dul zhid ngag snyan mnyen des che/ /chos sam 'jig rten mthun 'jug gis/ /'dris pa rnams la gzhung bzang zhing/ /bkra shis yan lag mi mo mchog /bud med utpal mdog 'dra zhing/ /lus gzar 'dril zhing sen mo zlum/ /mig yangs
123a7(rgyud 'grel): dkar nid yid du 'od/ /skra mnyen smra ba nyung ba'i bdag/ /skyes bu rnams la gus byed cing/ /brtsom pa mthar byin byed la brtson/ /khod yangs ston la mkhas gyur pa/ /bsten na dngos grub 'phel bar 'gyur/ /byin du mdog gnag dpral ba
123b1(rgyud 'grel): ser/ /mtshams mdza' dma' zhing rdzim 'thug /bod thud yan lag rtsub pa dang/ /mig mi sdug cing smra ba mang/ /'dum kha yang zhing chags la dga' / /gang la skyes bu bzad ngan med/ /dri ngad mi bzad par ldan pa'i/ /bud med bsten pa nyams par 'gyur
123b2(rgyud 'grel): bud gang zangs 'od rab mjos shing/ /gang gi mgul pa yan lag ring/ /thung du ring po ma yin zhing/ /smin ma phra zhing smin phrag yangs/ /khong dal rtag par spyod lam gtsigs/ /rna ba bzang dang rab ldan zhing/ /so thags mnyam pa'i bud med ni/ /rtag tu
123b3(rgyud 'grel): yon tan ring mi 'gro/ dmar pa'i zangs kyis mtshon pa yi/ /bzhin bzangs sdom zhing cung zad sdom/ /drang zhing lus khyim legs pa dang/ /shin tu brla dang ro smad rgyas/ /rang don nyams pa rnam par spang/ /bslu ba'i mi nus khong shes che/ /skra dang ba spu
123b4(rgyud 'grel): ring ldan pa'i/ /bu mo longs spyod sa zhig yin/ /mdog dmar spyod lam chos la dga' / /mtho dman tshig dang spyod lam can/ /rtag par smra la dga' byed cing/ /phyin ci log tu ston par byed/ /brnab sems rtag tu sten byed cing/ /gtong dang mi ldan 'jungs pa
123b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ chags dang sdang ba mang ba yis/ /bud med skyon gyis dri ma can/ /dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang/ /sbom zhing phra ba'i skabs dang ldan/ /nu ma brla dang ro smad rgyas/ /ske dang sked pa sor mo ring/ /so dang sen mo mnyam ldan zhing/ /tshig zlum byin pa
123b6(rgyud 'grel): bags kyi phra/ /lte ba'i 'og phyogs drang ldan pa'i/ /ba spu'i phreng ba gyen du langs/ /lte khung zab cing pad dbyibs 'dra/ /skye gnas mtho zhing bu ga rub/ /dal gyis mig ni rdob byed pa'i/ /mi mo dbang phyug dpal gyi gzhi/ /bud gang kun da ltar dkar zhing/ /rus
123b7(rgyud 'grel): pa rags shing lus stobs can/ /rtag pa dmangs du bu po 'chags/ /spyod lam dral zhing mdzes dang ldan/ /'jig rten bya bra 'jug mkhas shing/ /phrad par dka' zhing bral dka' ba'i/ /bu mo gsang thub blo gros can/ /sngags ba rnams kyis smad mi bya/
124a1(rgyud 'grel): bud gang dkar zhing dregs dang ldan/ /de ni ngo bzhin skyon med kyang/ /skyes bu rnams kyi spong par 'gyur/ /phra zhing mig ni bsgyur la dga' / /rked rags rked pa sbom pa dang/ /byang sogs 'chos shing byi dor brtson/ /rgod cing bslu bar sla ba
124a2(rgyud 'grel): yi/ bu mo bsten par ma gsungs so/ /rigs rnams las ni thams cad la/ /bsten dang bsten min shes byas nas/ /yon tan ldan pa'i skye gnas su/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bde ba btsal/ /de rnyed gyur nas rnal 'byor pas/ /bun long g.yeng ba kun spangs
124a3(rgyud 'grel): nas kun stong rab tu zhu mnyam pa/ /man ngag can gyis rtag tu bsam/ /'jig rten kun nas khyab gnas pa'i/ /ji snyed mi mong 'gyur pa yi/ /b+ha ga rtsa yi khyad par gyis/ /bcu phyed du ni rnam par grangs/ /rlugs ma dung dang kha gdong dang/ /za byed gdong dang

124a5(rgyud 'grel): spubs zha/ bo za byed gdong/ /b+ha ga padmo ltar sdud cing/ /pad snal ltar phra padmo can/ /de ltar pad+ma'i khyad par las/ /b+ha ga rab 'bring tha mar 'gyur/ /padmo can mchog rlugs ma dang/ /dung can ma ni bar ma'o/ /za byed gdong dang khra ba'i gdong/ /skyon rnams
124a6(rgyud 'grel): spangs par dka' ba'i phyir/ /b+ha ga rnams las tha mar 'gyur/ /tha ma smad pas mi blang ngo/ /b+ha ga'i nang na gnas pa yi/ /rtsa yang rab 'bring gsum du gyur/ /rab tu shin tu phra ba'i rtse/ /ring po 'bring du gsungs pa yin/ /de ltar rigs dang b+ha ga
124a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rtsa rnams rab 'bring tha ma las/ /rab dang 'bring po'ang bsten bya zhing/ /tha ma rtag tu spang bar bya/ /tha ma rnams kyis lus zungs nyams/ /de nyams bde ba nyams par 'gyur/ /de yis ting 'dzin mchog las nyams/ /de phyir mkhas pas smad pa
124b1(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud chen las/ /rigs kyi dbye ba rgyas pa dang/ /mtshan ma la sogs gsungs pa las/ /'dir ni man ngag bsdus pa yin/ /las kyi phyag rgya brtags pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ /paN+Di ta a mo g+ha badzra las byung ba rdzogs so// //
124b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba mgos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur ba'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ /d+ha rma a b+hi She ka ma rga sa hi/ bod skad du/ dbang chos rten 'brel 'gro ldog /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams la phyag
124b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /bla ma mkha' 'gro rdo rje 'chang dbyer med/ /gar sgom gnad kyi yul der 'dud/ /bla med rgyud rnams bcud bsdus pa'i/ /dbang chos rim pa bshad par bya/ /dbang bzhi'i gdams pa zab mo yis/ /rang gzhan lhan cig skyes pa des/ /gzhan rnams dbang
124b4(rgyud 'grel): du sdung pa yi/ /srog sngags zab mo 'di nyid la/ /dbang bzhi'i gdams pa med pa yis/ /rnam rtog dbang du rnam rtog song/ /rang nyid gzhan gyi dbang du 'gro/ dang srog gcod pa'i ste re yin/ /dbang po gcig dang tshe gcig la/ /gang zag bzhi dang rigs
124b5(rgyud 'grel): can bzhi/ /mchog dbang bzhi yis the tshom med/ /dug gsum lam dang rnam rtog lam/ /mchog thun dngos grub gang bsgrub pa/ /bsnyen sogs bzhi dang bcu gnad gces/ /rang rkyen dag las gzhan rkyen 'byung/ /ltas gcig rtags bzhin shes byas
124b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ bsgrub dang ldog gzhag gdams ngag gces/ /bla ma sangs rgyas dbyer med mchog /gar bsgom rigs lnga'i skor ldog sogs/ /mchog thun gnyis kyis bye brag gis/ /ting 'dzin lnga ldan gdams pa gces/ /gzhan yang ting 'dzin du ma las/ 'jug
124b7(rgyud 'grel): par byed bam shes na/ /mchog dang thun mong de la med/ /de bas gnad kyi gdams pa gces/ /lus ngag yid gsum rten 'brel kyang/ /ye shes gcig gis 'gro ldog res/ /dad gus bdag gzhan 'gro ldog nges/ /cig la gcig rten mtshungs
125a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'grub/ /'phrin las bzhi dang bsdu ba bzhi/ /rigs lnga ye shes lnga la sogs/ /stan thog gcig tu sgom pa gces/ /bzhi pa phyag rgya chen po gces/ /khyad par ting 'dzin lnga ldan gces/ /mi 'gyur bla ma gdams pa gces

125a5(rgyud 'grel): gnad du gces/ /bla med snod rung smod byas nas/ /nyon mongs rang dbang lam dang 'dres/ /srid sel dges rgyad spel zhes bya/ /bzhi ldan gnad dang mthun pas bsgyur/ /mthu dman skyon yon bzang ngan sogs/ /'dun pa'i sems kyi bsgyur bar bya/ /spros

125b5(rgyud 'grel): tsit+ta mahA su kha A na ya/ bod skad du/ byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i man ngag /bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang rgyud mdza' dag las man ngag gang ba'i don/ /byang chub kyi sems 'dal ka ma'i man ngag 'di ltar lags te

126a1(rgyud 'grel): tu byung/ /ril gyis dril nas/ /lhang gis shar tsam na/ /de nas yar 'dom gang tsam gyi chod nas rnam par dag pa chos kyi pho brang/ /dang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas na/ /dpal kun tu bzang po bzhugs te/ rang gis khyab

126a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i sgom pa mthar phyin pa'o/ /de'i dang las yud tsam/ /bar mi 'da' ba ni/ rdzogs pa chen po'i dam tshig mthar phyin pa'o/ /de lta bu yi don la sems rtse gcig tu bsgom mo/ /byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i man ngag rdzogs so// //
126a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gang gyi mkhan po dI paM kA ra sh+rI dz+nyA na nyid dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab/ pho brang byang chub 'od kyis zhus pa'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ mri tu sany+dza no pa de sha/ /bod skad du/ 'chi ba slu

127b1(rgyud 'grel): dang chu srin la'ang/ /'chi ba'i mtshan nyid 'byung ba yin/ /dbyar zla 'bring po 'pho ba'i zhag /nyi ma phyed la rkang pa'i tshad/ /byang du bltas te gnas pa yi/ /grib ma rang gi rang bzhin yin/ dgun zla 'bring po 'pho ba'i zhag /de nyid rkang tshad bdun du
