127b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs bzang ngan/ /rkang mthil dag tu phug snyam dang/ /gang tshe lte ba phug snyam gyur/ /nyin zhag gsum gyi 'og tu ni/ /'chi ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /rkang pa dag ni mthil phug nas/ /gal te mig kyang phug snyam na/ /de tshe zla ba gsum gyis ni/ /
127b7(rgyud 'grel): rjes la gshin rje'i khyim du 'gro/ /gal te rkang mthil gnyis phug nas/ /sna rtse'i bar du phug snyam na/ /de tshe nges par zhag gsum nas/ /gcig tu 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /bshang dang gci ba'i dus dag tu/ /dus mtshungs sprid pa byung gyur na/ /dus ni de
128a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid nas bzung ste/ /de ni lo gcig dag na 'chi/ /ltag khung dag tu phug snyam pa/ /lo lnga na ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mig gis lce rtse ma mthong na/ /zhag gsum na ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sna rtse rgyun du 'bigs snyam na/ /zla ba bzhi nas
128a2(rgyud 'grel): 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mdzod spu'i gnas su phug snyam na/ /des par 'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang tshe g.yas dang g.yon par ni/ /dus mtshungs par ni zug 'gyur ba/ /de tshe zla ba gcig na 'che/ /de bas bsod nams dag ni bsag/ mtshan ni gnyi ga
128a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor pa na/ /bar dang tha mar sprid pa dang/ /mnyam par 'byung 'gyur de yi tshe/ /zla ba lnga na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /lag brkang pa nyid dag gi/ mthe'u chung dag gi tshigs rnams ni/ /bzhi po dus gcig zug snyam pa/ /de ni zla ba gcig na 'chi/ /gang cho snying ka
128a4(rgyud 'grel): lkog ma yi/ /bar du dus mtshungs par zug 'gyur/ /gal te chos la mi brten na/ /zla ba phyed dang gnyis na 'chi/ /gal te mthil gsum yang dang yang/ /dus mtshungs par ni zug 'gyur na/ /gal te brgya byin mtshungs pa yang/ /zhag gsum na ni
128a5(rgyud 'grel): 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang gis mig ni g.yon pa yi/ /gzugs ni me long la ma mthong/ /gal te 'chos par mi byed na/ /zhag bdun na ni nges par 'chi/ /'khrig spyod tshe na dril bu yi/ /sgra ni rna ba dag gis thos/ /gal te tshangs pa dang mnyam pa'ang/ /
128a6(rgyud 'grel): de tshe zla ba gsum gyis 'chi/ /yar ngo yi ni tshes gcig la/ /gal te khu ba nag por mthong/ /de tshe zla ba drug na 'chi/ /dmar pos nad kyis 'debs par ston/ /sna rtse dang ni smin ma'i bar/ /spyi bo'i rtse mor so sor ni/ /zug 'gyur gal te zlog mi byed/ /de
128a7(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rkang pa'i mthe'u nas brtsams nas/ /lte ba yi ni mthar thug par/ /zug cing tsha bar bcas 'gyur te/ /zla ba drug na nges par 'chi/ /rkang pa'i mthe bo nas snying ka/ lkog ma 'am yang na mgo mthar zug /rim
128b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin zla phyed zla ba gsum/ /nyin zhag gcig gis 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sna rtse'i sha ni lhod gyur na/ /zhag bdun na ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mkhur chos sha ni chad gyur na/ /zla ba lnga na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mig dang sna gong dag gi bar/ /mgul pa mthong bar ma
128b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur na/ /zhag lnga nas ni 'chi 'gyur bas/ /chos kyi rgyags ni bskur bar bya/ /mig gnyis mig 'bras dri ma chags/ /gal te 'phral du 'byung 'gyur na/ /slar 'chos par ni mi byed na/ /zla ba drug gi nang du 'chi/ /glo bur du ni sna yo zhing/ /rna pa rang gi gnas
128b3(rgyud 'grel): nas bskyod/ /mig kyang zlum por gyur na ni/ /zhag bdun nas ni 'chi bar ston/ /glo bur du ni snying ga dma'/ /de tshe zla ba phyed na 'chi/ /mgrin pa'i ngos gnyis rtsa dag ni/ /chad pa dag kyang zla phyed na'o/ /gal te lce yi dbus ni/ /ri mo nag po glo bur
128b4(rgyud 'grel): byungs so dag dam du 'thams pa ni/ /de tshe nyin zhag gnyis na 'chi/ /rna ba'i 'khor nang rgyab kyi ni/ /rtsa ni chad par snang gyur na/ /nyin zhag de 'am yang na ni/ /zhag lnga na ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sen mo'i kha dog dmar bo dag /'phral du med bar gyur na
128b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ gal te sngags sogs la ma spyad/ /de tshe zla ba drug na 'chi/ /glo bur du ni sbom 'gyur dang/ /rdeg cing khro dang 'jigs pas 'khrugs/ /gal te chos ni ma bsten gang/ /de ni lo gcig dag na 'chi/ /dbang po rnams ni rang gi yul/ /ji bzhin
128b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin bar mi byed dang/ /tshig ni yang yang 'khrul ba dang/ /blo yang yang dang yang du 'khrul/ /mig las rtag tu 'dzag pa dang/ /gzugs mthong na yang 'khrul ba dang/ /me long ngam ni yang na chu/ /rang gi grib ma ma mthong dang/ /mchen mo'i dus su
128b7(rgyud 'grel): gzha' dang ni/ /nyin par skar ma'i tshogs mthong dang/ /sprin med par ni lho phyogs na/ /gnas pa'i glog 'gyur mthong ba dang/ /nyin bar grib ma'i lam dang ni/ /de bzhin skar ma lhung ba mthong/ /dang pa bya rog rma bya ni/ /gcig ni 'dres par
129a1(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba dang/ /zla ba gnyis dang nyi ma gnyis/ /de bzhin rang gi mgo bor 'bar/ /shing rtse ri bo'i rtse la ni/ /dri za'i grong khyer mthong ba dang/ /yi dags sha za 'jigs rung ba'i/ /gzhan dag kyang ni mthong 'gyur dang/ /shin
129a2(rgyud 'grel): tu 'dar bar 'gyur ba dang/ /yang dang yang du brgyal ba dang/ /skyugs pa bshad dang gci ba ni/ /gser ram dngul gyi mdog tu mthong/ /de yis re re mthong 'gyur na'ang/ /zla ba gcig gis 'chi bar 'gyur/ /lkog ma mchu dang bad kan lce/ /
129a3(rgyud 'grel): chod dang bu ga de bzhin lus/ /mthong na de bzhin zla drug gi /nang du nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gre ba mchu dang bad kan lce/ /rgyun du so sor skams na ni/ /de ni zla drug nang du ni/ /nges par 'chi bar ston pa yin/ /skar ma'i tshogs dang drang srong
129a4(rgyud 'grel): bdun/ /phyogs su mtshan mo ma mthong ngam/ /lus ni glo bur 'bar 'gyur na/ /zhag bdun na ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sgrib med dang ni snar ma dang/ /bstan dang de bzhin grib pa'i lam/ /mtshan mo glo bur du ma mthong/ /zla ba drug la 'chi bar 'gyur/ /
129a5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba ra ri med pa dang/ /nyi ma 'od dang bral ba dang/ /mi ni sna tshogs 'od bcas dang/ /zla ba yang ni 'od zer bcas/ /mtshan mo nyi ma nyin par mtshan/ /de bzhin rang mig 'bar ba dang/ /skar ma ri rab dag gi tshad/ /rgya mtsho chu bo lta bu dang/ /lte
129a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i skyabs su bshad sgo la/ /sbrin pa bzhin mdog pad+ma dang/ /lkog mar 'brum pa dmar po dang/ /lus la kha dog sna tshogs dang/ /snying ka nas smre mchi mar bcas/ /yang na rkan ni 'gul ba dang/ /zla zer me ltar 'tshor ba dang/ /nyi zer kha
129a7(rgyud 'grel): blta bur bsil/ /zla ba nyi ma'i du ga dang/ /sa dang gnam gyi bu ga dang/ /gang zhig bdag nyid kho nas mthod/ /de ni zla phyed nas ni mthong/ /khu ba dang ni bshad gtsi rnams/ /dus ni mtshangs par 'babs 'gyur na/ /lo gcig nas 'chi de la ni/ /
129b1(rgyud 'grel): sman pa'i thabs kyis gso ba bya/ /gang gi lus ni phyed dag ni/ /grang zhing de bzhin phyed dro na/ /zhag bdun nas ni 'chi gyur gyis/ /'jig rten pha rol rnams bsam bya/ /du zhes bya ba grang ba tshor/ /phu ni me dang 'dra 'gyur na/ /gang gi nyams su myong ba de/ /zhag
129b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu nas ni gshin rje mthong/ /srin lag bi ni rtsa ba ru/ /ri mo nag po mthong 'gyur na/ /zhag ni bco brgyad 'og tu ni/ /sngon las nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang gis mgo bor brtsangs pa ni/ /kha dog gsum pa 'dzegs nas su/ /myur du 'gro bar byed pa dang/ /
129b3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba lnga las ngas par 'chi/ /lag pa gnyis kyis mnyes pa yi/ /lus kyi sgra ni mi thos shing/ /yan lag thams cad grang 'gyur ba/ /zhag bcun ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang gi byin pa lag pa ni/ /gcig car bskyod cing 'gro ba dang/ /tshangs pa'i skud pa med
129b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur na/ /de na lo gcig dag nas 'chi/ /'dam mam so rdul phyogs su ni/ /rkang pa'i mdun nam yang rgyab na/ /rkang rjes dum bu ma tshang ba/ /zla ba bzhi nas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /skyes bu gnag dang dmar ser gyi/ /mdog can blo bur dag tu mthong/ /gal te 'khrul
129b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ma yin na/ /lo gsum 'das nas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /snying ga rkang pa bkas ma thag/ skams na zla ba gnyis na 'chi/ /mi sdug par snang dri nga ba/ /byung na nyin zhag gsum na 'chi/ /nyi ma tsha bar chu yis ni/ /kha yi nang ni bkang nas kyang/ /nyin
129b6(rgyud 'grel): re phu ni 'debs pa na/ /rim gyis de dbus gnas pa yi/ /dbang po'i gzhu ni sna tshogs mthong/ /skyes bu rtag tu tshe ring zhing/ /zla drug tshe yod de mi mthong/ /de ltar mtshan ma sna tshogs nyid/ /mdun gyi nam mkha' i dbus ni/ /mu tig phreng ba chad pa 'dra'i
129b7(rgyud 'grel): mu tig rdog mas brgyan pa ni/ /nyi ma gsal ba'i tshe ni mthong/ /mthing ka'i nor bu mdog 'dra la/ /skra shang 'jings pa lta bu ni/ /mthong bar gyur pa'i phyogs nas ni/ /phyogs gzhin du ni 'gro ba'i dang/ /klu ni du mar gcor ba dag /rtag tu mthong bar 'gyur
130a1(rgyud 'grel): ba yin/ /de ma mthong na zla drug gis/ /'chi ba ru ni nges par sngags/ /snga dro 'am yang na phyi dro 'am/ /zla zer dag la yun ring du/ /dpung pa brkyang ba'i grib ma la/ /ltas te rim gyis mkha' la blta/ /der yang grib ma mi
130a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs ni/ /grib ma skya bo mthong 'gyur la/ /zla yi mgo bo ma mthong na/ /lo gcig gi ni nang du 'chi/ /lag pa g.yon pa ma mthong na/ /bu dang chung ma rlag par 'gyur/ /lag g.yas ma mthong ba yis kyang/ /pha dang spun zla sogs chen
130a3(rgyud 'grel): 'chi/ /lag gnyis pus mo'i steng bzhag pa/ /byas nas spyi bor thal sbyar ba/ /de gnyis dbus na chu shing gi/ 'bras bu lta bu'i gring ma mthong/ /gang tshe de las 'dab ma gcig /yongs su kha bye snang gyur pa'i/ /nges par chos ni de nyid kyi/ /
130a4(rgyud 'grel): zla ba drug na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rlung ni nyi ma'i lam 'gro las/ /rna ba mgo dang mig la ni/ /sgra dang du ba de bzhin 'od/ /gsum po 'di dag brtag par bya/ /rna ba shin tu dam por dgab/ /za cing 'ur 'ur sgra grag pa/ /nyin zhag lnga'am
130a5(rgyud 'grel): buAm? ni/ /bco lnga nyin zhag nyi shu 'am/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga nyid kyi ni/ /bar du thos par ma gyur ma/ /mda' dang rgya mtsho yon tan mig /zla los go rims bzhin du 'chi/ /'di rnams kyi yang bar rnams su/ /nyin zhag bcu drug dor bar bya/ /lo nyin gyi
130a6(rgyud 'grel): ni zla? lnga yi/ /go rims bzhin du skyed pas so/ /spyi bo'i steng mas byung ba yi/ /du ba'i phreng ba zhag bdun ni/ /gang gis mthong bar ma gyur te/ /lo gsum nas ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rang mig dag gi phyogs bzhir ni/ /sor mos mnan na
130a7(rgyud 'grel): byi la yi /mig dang 'dra ba'i snang ba ni/ /yud kyi rim pas mthong bar 'gyur/ /ma gtsir bar yang de mthong na/ /zhag brgya nas ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /'di dag spyir ni shes bya ste/ /khyad par 'di yang brjod par bya/ /zla ba'i 'og dang de yi steng
130b1(rgyud 'grel): rna ba sna dang nye bar ni/ /snang ba ma mthong mdor bsdu na/ /drug gsum gnyis gcig zla bas 'chi/ /nyi ma'ang gal te zla ba yi/ /rim 'gyur de tshe snga ma bzhin/ /phyogs mnga' yon tan mig gi ni/ /nyin zhag rnams su 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rang gi rang bzhin
130b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba las/ /zla ba drug na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sna yi rtsa mo ma mthong na/ /zla ba lnga na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rna ba gnyis ni 'on gyur na/ /zla ba bzhi ni 'das nas 'chi/ /dbang po der gnas pa las 'gyel/ /zla ba gsum na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /smin
130b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bar du snang ba mthong/ /zla ba gnyis na gshin rje mthong/ /mchig pa'i 'bras bu zad 'gyur na/ /zla gcig 'das nas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi mig la gzugs brnyan ni/ /ma mthong zla ba phyed na 'chi/ /lce ni bskyod par mi nus na/ /
130b4(rgyud 'grel): zhag bcu nas ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /lto ba ldog gyur zhag lnga nas/ /'chi bdag dang ni phrad par 'gyur/ /rtsibs logs gnyis las grangs snyam/ /zhag gsum nas ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /lus kun rengs par gyur na ni/ /zhag gcig na ni
130b5(rgyud 'grel): 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dpral bar gnas pa'i ri mo gsum/ /med 'gyur zhag ni gsum nas 'chi/ /bde bar gnas bar lce'u chung ni/ /rig pa mi tshor skams pa ni/ /nyin zhag lnga yi bar 'gyur te/ /nyin zhag lnga bcu dag na 'chi/ /ro skyur ba la
130b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dang/ /kha dog las ni sngo la sogs/ /khu ba gcig ni 'gyur ba las/ /zla ba drug na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /cig car gyur ni lnga pa 'am/ /g.yon nas 'khor zhing dri nga bar/ /gang gi gcin ni 'byung 'gyur pa/ /de ni zla ba drug na
130b7(rgyud 'grel): 'chi/ /zla ba yar ngo 'am mar ngo la/ /gal te khu ba nag por gyur/ /'on te slar gsor ma byas na/ /zla ba drug na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /nag po'i cha ni yongs spangs te/ /dkar po'i cha nas blangs nas su/ /sna khung g.yon nas rlung rgyu'i tshe/
130a1(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnas slar gsor 'gyur ba yin/ /rang gi lus ni brtan 'gyur kyang/ /gal te grib ma yo na ni/ /zla ba bzhin 'chi 'gyur zhes/ /lung la mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad/ /grib ma lho phyogs 'gro bar ni/ /gal te bdag nyid
130a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis mthong na/ /bdag nyid de nyid 'chi'o zhes/ /de ltar mi rtag pa nyid mthong/ /don med pa dang bslu ba dang/ /log pa la sogs par bshad pas/ /rmi lam thams cad bden min yang/ /de la ma dad rigs ma yin/ /rmi lam dag tu lhas bstan
130a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ yang na rmi lam bden mthong mis/ /rmi lam yid chas byas nas su/ /'chi ba'i mtshan ma lta bar bya/ /rgya skyags ko bi da ra dang/ /ka ra bi ra me tog rgyas/ /rmi lam mthar ni gang zhig 'dzeg /de ni zla ba drug na 'chi/ /mi ni gang zhig rmi lam mthar/ /lha
130a4(rgyud 'grel): gang gi ni mchod sdong dam/ /bye ma 'am thal phung la 'jag pa/ /de ni snga ma bzhin du 'chi/ /bong bu la ni zhon nas su/ /lho phyogs su ni rab song nas/ /slar yang ldog par ma gyur pa/ /de yi srog kyang de bzhin no/ /gang yang spra'u la zhon nas ni/ /lho phyogs su ni
130a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro byed cing/ /der gnas bzhin du sad na ni/ /de ni snga ma bzhin du 'chi/ /shing rings chod rten srog shing ngam/ /grog mkhar phyag dang khrod phung la/ /mi ni gang zhig 'dzeg 'gyur ba/ /de ni zla drug las mi 'tsho/ /bu mo nag mo rab khros nas/ /gang zhig
130a6(rgyud 'grel): bcings pas 'ching ba ni/ /de ni dus mtshan yin zhes bya/ /zhag bdun nas ni 'chi byed yin/ /bud med gang zhig gos gnag cing/ /mdog gnag mi ni 'dod spyod la/ /ka ra bi ra'i phreng pa rmis/ /de ni gshin rje'i gnas su 'gro/ /rmi lam du ni
130a7(rgyud 'grel): mun pa'am/ /g.yangs 'am de bzhin btson rang 'jug /rmi lam du ni shing las lhung/ /de ni 'chi bdag gam na gnas/ /gnyid log lus dang mgo bo la/ /ljon shing rtsa 'am shing dag ni/ /'bras bu med pa gang gis mthong/ /zla drug las
130b1(rgyud 'grel): ni mi 'tsho'o/ /mi ni gang zhig sbre'u yi/ /bzhon pa la zhon shar phyogs 'gro/ /sad par gyur na de yi ni/ /mtshan mo tha ma yin zhes bya/ /khyi khwa bya rgod lce spyang dang/ /srin po yi dags sha za yis/ /zos dang bong bu phag rnga mo/ /ma haM skyon de khyer pa ni/ /de ni nges
130b2(rgyud 'grel): par lo gcig nas/ /'chi ba ru ni ston pa yin/ /rmi lam mtshan ma mthod na ni/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i blos zhi bya/ /mi ni lcags kyi dbyig pa thogs/ /gnag cing gos ni nag po gyon/ /gnyid log pa yi mdun na mthong/ /zla ba gsum na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /lus ni dri
130b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar gyis byugs shing/ /phreng ba dmar pos rnam par brgyan/ /til mar gyis bskus shin tu skrag /skra bregs gos ni dmar bo gyon/ /bong bu zhon te ma gyogs par ni/ /lho yi phyogs su 'gro 'gyur bar/ /bdag nyid 'di 'drar rmi laM ni/ /mthong na zla pa drug la 'chi
130b4(rgyud 'grel): dri dang phreng ba dmar po 'am/ /yar na gos ni dmar po 'am/ /gang gi rmi lam dag tu rnyed/ /de ni zla ba brgyad na 'chi/ /phyi rol gyi ni 'chi ba yi/ /mtshan ma grangs las 'das pa ni/ /lo brgyar yang ni kha cig gis/ /smra bar yang ni su yis nus/ /'chi bar ston par
130b5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa yi/ /phyi yi rtags ni ji ltar bshad/ /'di dag shes byas sngags sogs kyis/ /slu ba'i 'bad pa myur du bya/ /slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas sbyar ba'i 'chi b klu ba bstan pa las le'u dang pa'o/ /da ni nang gi 'chi ba yi/ /mtshan nyer
130b6(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar brjod par bya/ /de ni rlung byung las shes bya/ /rlung gi ha dang sna spyod yul/ /ji sring nang gi mtshan nyid ni/ /legs par nges par ma byas par/ /phyi yi mtshan nyid tsam gyis ni/ /'chi ba'i nges pa legs mi rnyed/ /'chi ba'i des pa gnyis ga ni/ /nges
130b7(rgyud 'grel): byas yongs su gsal ba yin/ /phyi rol blo ni phyi ci log /nang la sogs pa'o dogs pa skyed/ /dgun zla 'bring sogs 'pho ba yi/ /zla ba nya sogs thams cad la/ /'chi ba'i mtshan nyid spyi yi ni/ /nang par thog mar rtog par bya/ /mi ni rtog byed nyid
131a1(rgyud 'grel): zhag ni/ /gang la nges par rtog par byed/ /nyin zhag de nas brtsams nas ni/ /dus 'das pa na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rang bzhin tha mal dang ldan pa'i/ /srog chags kun la rtag tu ni/ /sna khud g.yas dang g.yon pa la/ /so sor rten
131a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rlung rgyu ba/ /nyi ma zla ba zhes bya ba/ /rlung ni thun byed dag tu rgyu/ /de las zlog pas 'chi ba sogs/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi brtan par bya/ /tshes gcig nas ni brtsams nas ni/ /zla bar gtogs pa dkar por rgyu/ /rlung ni nyi ma gsum yin te/ /de nas zhag
131a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum nyi ma yin/ /slar yang zla bas nyin gsum ste/ /de nas nyi mar zhag gsum mo/ /yang ngo'i zla ba nya yi bar/ /go rims 'di ni nges pa yin/ /de bzhin mar ngo nas brtsams te/ /nyi mar rlung ni rgyu ba yin/ /cig shos kyi ni bco lnga'i bar/ /nyi ma gsum
131a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum snga ma bzhin/ /go rim 'di las bzlog par blta/ /rbla ba phyed dang gnyis par nges/ /zla ba drug nas 'chi 'gyur ba/ /de phyir chos ni dran par bya/ /zla ba gcig ni go bzlog pas/ /gnyen dang bshes ni rgud par 'gyur/ /zla phyed phyin ci log gyur
131a5(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /nad ni mi bzad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nyin gcig nyin gsum bzhi dang lnga/ /zhag drug go ni bzlog pa ru/ /rlung ni gal te rgyu 'gyur na/ /de tshe rtsod dang skye sogs byung/ /rang bzhin yongs su spangs na ni/ /lam gsum rtogs par rlung rgya na/ /slar
131a6(rgyud 'grel): bso ba ni nus ma yin/ /nyi ma phyed ni 'das nas 'chi/ /rlung ni 'pho ba med pa ru/ /lam ni gnyis po dag las kyang/ /zhag bcu'i bar du rgyu gyur na/ /'pho ba'i tsho na de 'chi'o/ /nyin zhag mnyam 'dra skad cig 'thob/ /gang gi mig ni mgul 'gyur ba/ /
131a7(rgyud 'grel): de yi srog ni nyin zhag ni/ /gcig na 'jig par gdon mi za/ /thun phyed kyi ni bar dag tu/ /pan tshun du ni lam mang zhing/ /rlung rgyu de las mchod pa dag/ /thob pa nyid du shes par bya/ /gang gi 'pho ba lnga po ni/ /'das par kha ru rgyu gyur pa/ /rlung
131b1(rgyud 'grel): de las ni nor brlag pa'am/ /mi dga' ba 'am 'jig tshogs 'byung/ /sna yi khung bu g.yon pa'i rlung/ /'pho ba yang ni bcu gsum ni/ /'das par gang gi rgyu gyur pa/ /de la nad sogs skye bar 'gyur/ /sna khung gnyis ga'i yongs spangs te/ /gang tshe khar ni rgyu
131b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur na/ /gal te rdo rje 'dran 'ang 'di/ /nyin zhag de las 'tsho ma yin/ /dgun zla ra ba'i 'pho ba yi/ /dus nas brtsams te rlung dag ni/ /nyi mar zhag lnga rgyu gyur na/ /lo ni bco brgyad nyid nas 'chi/ /ston zla 'bring bo'i 'pho ba yi/ /dus nas brtsams te rlung dag
131b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /zhag lnga'i bar du rgyu gyur na/ /lo ni bco lnga nyid nas 'chi/ /dbyar zla tha chung yang de bzhin/ /lo ni bcu gnyis nyid nas 'chi/ /dbyar zla ra ba'ang de bzhin 'gyur/ /lo dgu nyid nas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dpyid zla 'bring po'i 'pho ba yi/ /dus nas brtsams te
131b4(rgyud 'grel): gal te ni/ /zhag lnga'i bar du rgyu gyur na/ /de tshe lo drug nyid nas 'chi/ /dgun zla 'bring po 'pho ba yi/ /rlung ni zhag lnga rgyu gyur na/ /lo gsum 'das na 'chi 'dzin/ /de ltar dus la mkhas pas bshad/ /thams cad du ni zhag gnyis gsum/ /bzhi yi bar du
131b5(rgyud 'grel): rlung rgyu na/ /go rim dag ni ji bzhin du/ /lo yi chi ras de des bya/ /zla ba ru ni de bzhin du/ /rlung rgya na ni 'chi ma gtogs/ /nad dang mu ge'i dgon pa dang/ /mya ngan brgyal sogs 'tshe ba 'byung/ /spyi yi dus ni legs rtogs pas/ /gsal ba 'di ni bstan
131b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ khyad par dus ni brtag pa'i phyir ro/ /rgyu ba gzhan dag bstan par bya/ /mnyam po bdun du nyi ma song/ /gal te skye ba'i skar zla ba/ /dus ni rgyas pa zhes bya ste/ /'chi ba'i nges pa byed pa yin/ /mi ni khyim gang las skyes pas/ /de dang gzhan la mdun
131b7(rgyud 'grel): gang yin/ /mnyam po bdud zhes bya bar bshad/ /der ni nyi ma mnyam bdun song/ /khyim de nyid du zla ba naM/ /skya ba'i skar mar song 'gyur ba/ /rgyas pa'i dus zhes bya ba ste/ /der ni 'chi bar brtag par bya/ /rlung ni nang du rtogs pa dag /nyi ma'i lam ni
132a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du/ /cig shos 'dir ni dus min par/ /mkhas pas dus ni brtag par bya/ /rlung ni skad cig dus gang la/ /bgrod pa gzhan du 'jug 'gyur na/ /dus 'dir skad cig rdzogs 'gyur na/ /'chi 'gyur 'di la the tshom
132a2(rgyud 'grel): med/ /gal te rlung ni nyi mar rtogs/ /rgyas pa'i dus su nyin phyed rgyu/ /de tshe lo ni bcu bzhi nas/ /'chi ba nyid du shes par bya/ /nyin gcig du ni nyin mnyam dang/ /nyin zhag gnyis dag gsum dang bzhir/ /gal te rgyu ni nyi ma phyogs/ /ri bo lo
132a3(rgyud 'grel): drug rig byed 'chi/ /zhag lnga de bzhin zhag bcu dang/ /nyin zhag bco lnga'i bar du ni/ /gal te rgyu na go rim bzhin/ /lo gsum gnyis dang gcig gis 'chi/ /de bzhin nyi shu nyi shu lnga/ /gal te rlung ni rgyu gyur na/ /go rim bzhin du zla drug dang ?
132a4(rgyud 'grel): zla ba gsum gyis 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gal te nyi shu drug bdun brgyad/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa dgu rgyu/ /zla ba gnyis gcig zla phyed dang/ /zhag bcus rim gyis 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gal te nyi zhag sum cu dang/ /sum cu gcig dang sum cu gnyis
132a5(rgyud 'grel): de tshe go rim ji bzhin du/ /nyin lnga gsum dang gnyis nas 'chi/ /nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum par/ /gal te nyi mar rlung rgyu na/ /nyin zhag de nyid la 'chi bar/ /khyab 'jug yin yang the tshom med/ /nyin zhag lnga nas nyi shu lngar/ /bar bar gyi ni nyin
132a6(rgyud 'grel): zhag la/ /grangs ni bcu drug ma bshad par/ /dor ba de rnams brjod par bya/ /zhag gsum rgyu na lo gsum nas/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir dor bas so/ /nyin bdun rgyu bas lo gsum nas/ /slar bshad nyis 'gyur 'bri bas so/ /gal te zhag brgyad bar
132a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyu na/ /gnyis dang zhag ni bcu gnyis dbri/ /zhag dgu rgyun lo gsum las/ /nyin zhag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dor /rlung ni nyi ma'i spyod yul du /gal te zhag ni bcu gcig rgyu/ /lo gnyis nyin zhag nyi shu bzhis/ /ma tshang ba na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /
132b1(rgyud 'grel): zhag ni bcu gnyis lo gnyis las/ /snga ma nyis 'gyur gyis chung pas/ /zhag ni bcu gsum lo gnyis las/ zla gnyis zhag ni bcu gnyis dbri/ /zhag ni bcu gnyis lo gnyis las/ zla gsum zhag ni drug gis dbri/ /nyin zhag bcu drug rgyu na ni/ /lo
132b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig zhag ni bcu gnyis 'bri/ /rlung ni nyi ma'i sbyong yul du/ /nyin zhag bcu bdun rgyu gyur na/ /log gcig zhag ni nyi shu bzhis/ /ma tshang ba na 'chi ba'i 'gyur/ /zhag bco brgyad kyi ni lo gcig ni/ /zla ba gcig drug dor bas so/ /bcu dgu rgyu na lo gcig las
132b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad phri bas so/ /nyi shu gcig zla drug las ni/ /zhag 'tshang pa yis/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis zla drug las/ /zhag bcu gnyis ni dor bas so/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gsum rgyu/ /bco brgyad rnam par dor bas so/ /zhag ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi rgyu/ /nyi ma zhag
132b4(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa bzhis so/ /nyin zhag sum cu gsum de bzhin/ /'chi ba'i mtshan nyid 'byung ba yin/ /rlung 'byung dbang las shes bya ba/ /de yan chad ni yod ma yin/ /'dir bshad pa/ dang po nyi ma phyed byas nyi ma rangs pa yang ni nyin mtshan dag gi bar du rgyu/ /
132b5(rgyud 'grel): de las zhag gnyis dang ni zhag gsum 'on te zhag bzhi khyab pa'i bar du ni/ /nyi ma la ni g.yon pa min la rlung ni spubs brten te gang zhig rgyu gyur pa/ /de las gnas dang nyi ma phyogs dang bkra shis drug dang bzhi ni 'di shes bya/ /la las nyi shu rtsa lnga nas
132b6(rgyud 'grel): ni nyin zhag lnga lngas 'dzags par 'gyur las ji bzhin 'phel/ /de las re re bskyed pa'i chu ni sum 'gyur byas pa gsum gyis lhag pa kha na'i bar/ /rgyas pa'i dus su de la lo ni gsum mig zla dang drug gsum zung dang zla ba ru/ /lhag ma tshes rang phyogs
132b7(rgyud 'grel): dang zla ba yon tan zung dang zla bza' chog yin/ /'khor la rim gsum bris nas ni/ /re mig sum cu rtsa gsum bcas/ /tshe dang srog gi rlung dag dang/ /nyin zhag mtshan ma rim bzhin bri/ /de ltar bdag gis nang gi 'cha ba'i mtshan ma ni/ /ming gzhan
133a1(rgyud 'grel): 'chi ltas zhes bya 'di ni bshad pa yin/ /de rnams shes par byas la mod la myur du ni/ /bsam gtan sogs kyi 'chi ba slu nyid 'bad de bya/ /slob dpon dag gi dbang phyug grags pas sbyar ba'i 'chi ba slu ba bstan pa las/ le'u
133a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'o// //phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can/ /'chi ltas tshogs ni shes byas la/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid la'ang/ /slu ba'i bsdus pa shes par bya/ /lus dang ngag gi las kyi phyir/ /bsam gten las kyis nang gi yin/ /nor bu sngags sman
133a3(rgyud 'grel): phyi yi ste/ /rnal 'byor nus pas nang yin no/ 'chi bdag bslu ba 'bad pa ni/ /dad pa yis ni byed par nus/ /de pas dang pa brtan par bya/ /gzhan du ngal ba don med 'gyur/ /dad dang bral ma lha yis kyang/ /lus kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang/ /nor gyi
133a4(rgyud 'grel): phung ngo rnams kyis kyang/ /chos ni phra mo thob mi 'gyur/ /dang pa mchog tu phra ba'i chos/ /dka' thub sbyin sreg ye shes la/ /dang pa mtho ris thar pa yin/ /'gro ba 'di kun dad pa yin/ /gal te nor srog thams cad kyang/ /de bzhin dad pa med las
133a5(rgyud 'grel): min/ /de bas 'bras bu cung zad kyang/ /dad pa med na thob mi 'gyur/ /'chi bdag slu bar 'dod pa yi/ /dang por dad pa mchog gzhol bya/ /chos kyi 'chi las skyob byed cing/ /'chi ba slu ba yin par bshad/ /chos min dgal zhing bag med pas/ /skang
133a6(rgyud 'grel): cig kyang ni gnas mi bya/ /tshangs pa yang ni chos min par/ /'chi bdag slu bar dpar ma yin/ /dam pa rnams kyi chos ni bden/ /sbyin dang dkar thub bzod la dga' / /gang la mchog tu brtse yod de/ /chos gzhan mang pos ci zhig bya/ /gang zhig
133a7(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu sems can la/ /snying rjes snying ni 'dzag 'gyur ba/ /ye shes thar pa de yin gyis/ /chos gzhan mang pos ci zhig bya/ /mi tshe chos kyi mchog yin par/ /grub pa'i mdza' ni kun las 'dod/ /rtag tu de nyid la bslabs na/ /'chi bdag gis thag
133b1(rgyud 'grel): bsrings pa yin/ /bya dang nya dang ri dags sbrul/ /rkun mo gsang ba'i phyogs gtogs rnams/ /srog skyabs pa yis 'phral ni/ /tshe thung ba yang tsher ring 'gyur/ /rkun ma nya dang ri dags sgyul/ /bya sogs srog ni 'dod pa rnams/ /'di dag bsad na 'phral du
133b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ tshe ring ba yang tshe thung 'gyur/ /mi dge bcu ni spangs pa dang/ /de bzhin gsum la skyabs 'gro dang/ /bslab pa lnga dang brgyad bsrungs na/ /'chi bdag thag ni bsrings par 'gyur/ /btsan rar bcug na nad chen gdungs/ /de bzhin 'jigs pas nyen pa
133b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /skyabs byas ni na nges pa ru/ /tshe ring 'chi bdag slu byed 'gyur/ /dman dang mgon med do tshar bcas/ /tshul khrims ldan la gus par ni/ /'dod pa'i don ni rab ster bas/ /tshe ni nges par 'phel nges 'gyur/ /pha dang ma dang bla ma rgan/ /shes
133b4(rgyud 'grel): pas rgan sogs la gus shing/ /mchod dang bkur sti byin nas kyang/ /'chi ba dag ni nyer mi 'gyur/ /rang gi 'dod lta de la gus/ /dka' thub can la gus pa yis/ /rtag tu nang par lha dang phyag /byas pas tshe ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten gas dang
133b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig pa las/ /so pag la sogs kyis bcos na/ /tshe thung tshe ni ring 'gyur la/ /dge slong bsod snyoms pa dang mtshungs/ /lha khang sku gzugs mchod rten sogs/ /byed dang kun dga' ra ba 'dzugs/ /mchod rten che brgyad mchod sogs kyis/ rtag tu
133b6(rgyud 'grel): tshe ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /'dun pas slong ba la rnyed pa/ /rdzas kyi dge 'dun mchod ston gsol/ /zhag bdun tshe ring tshe thob 'gyur/ /chos rgyal mya ngan med dang mtshungs/ /bye ma'i mchod rten byed pa dang/ /de bzhin tsha tsha 'debs pa dang/ /mchod rten la
133b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs phyags pas ni/ tshe ni ngas par 'phel bar 'gyur/ /'dus pa chen po'i mdo dang ni/ /a ta na ti ya ka'i mdo/ /phra mor bcas dang sprin chen dang/ /shin tu bkra shis tshig bcad rnams/ /gus bas dge slong 'don 'jug pa'am/ /rang nyid kyis ni
134a1(rgyud 'grel): rab bton na/ /de bzhin tshe ring 'thob 'gyur zhing/ /'chi bdag slu bar 'gyur ba yin/ /theg pa chen po ston byed dang/ /sdong po brgyan sogs mdo sde rnams/ /rtag tu rtse gcig bas bklags na/ /'chi bdag slu
134a2(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur ba yin/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs rnal 'byor gyi/ /rgyud sogs ma lus bklags pa'am/ /bsrung ba lnga yi cho gas kyang/ /'chi bdag blu bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gtsug tor btsugs pa'i mchod rten sogs/ /bskor ba dag ni byas pa
134a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gzungs ni bzlas par byas pas kyang/ /'chi bdag gi ni brtson pa 'joms/ /de yi cho ga sngon 'gro bas/ /bza' sogs ma mo bklags pa dang/ /gzungs sngags stong du zlos pa dang/ /dkon mchog sgrol ma bzlas pa dang/ /gzungs kyi
134a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs las gsungs pa yi/ /gzungs zlos pa la brtson pa yi/ /mkhas pa rnams ni 'chi ba dang/ /nyi ma ring du gnas par byed/ /dkyil 'khor 'dri dang sbyin sreg dang/ /phyag rgya 'ching bar byed pa dang/ /gtor ma dang ni tshogs 'khor lo/ /
134a5(rgyud 'grel): rab sbyin 'chi bdag slu ba yin/ /phyogs bzhi 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la/ /mchod ston mal cha tshogs sbyin dang/ /chos gos tsam zhing 'chang ba la'ang/ /sbyin pa 'chi bdag slu byed 'gyur/ /de la sogs te bya ba rtsom/ /chos dang bsod
134a6(rgyud 'grel): nams mtshan nyid 'gyur/ /bsod nams kyis ni tshe 'phel zhing/ /de bzhin 'chi bdag zlu ba yin/ /de ltar chos ni cung zad zhig /ston gyi de yi rgyas pa ni/ /rang nyid kyis ni rjes dpag pa 'am/ /'chi bdag blu mkhas de las bslab/ /de
134a7(rgyud 'grel): ltar chos la brtson byas nas/ /grub pa'i sngags dang sman sogs ni/ /'phral du yid ches byed pa yin/ /'chi bdag rnam par bsal bar bya/ /nor bu sngags dang sman grub dang/ /bcud len stobs kyis rang nyid ni/ /'chi bdag pha rol gnon
134b1(rgyud 'grel): mthong ste/ /rig 'dzin grub pa ji bzhin no/ /rin chen brtag pa'i bstan bcos gang/ /rtog la mkhas pas rdo rje 'chang/ /tshe yi nor bu 'chang ba'ang rung/ /de bzhin sna tshogs nor bu 'chang/ /in+d+ra nI la rin chen sogs/ /nor bu chen po gzhan
134b2(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang/ /'chang bar byed pa 'chi bdag kun/ /bzlog par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /gang phyir nor bu mthu las ni/ /som nyi byed par rigs min te/ /nor bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /mthu dang ldan par thams cad 'dod/ /dben pa'i gnas su ras ris
134b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /mdun du mchod pa byas nas ni/ /sngags rnams bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang/ /'chi ba slu ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dang por yi ge a brjod la/ /de nas rol ka'i ces gsal ba/ /rig 'dzin sde snod las gsungs te/ /'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes
134b4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ sngags 'dis 'jig rten dbang phyug la/ /dad pas de mdun nges par ni/ /yi ge'i grangs kyis 'bum bzlas na/ /'chi ba blu ba thob par 'gyur/ /dang po rnam par snang mdzad brjod/ /de 'og tA re lan gnyis brjod/ /tut+tA re gnyis tu re gnyis/ / swAhA'i mdza' 'chi ba slu/ /sgrol ma 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsungs/ /sngags ni yi ge'i 'bum phrag du/ /sgrol ma'i spyan sngar bzlas nas ni/ /zho dang sbrang rtsi las sngar btags/ /du rba'i myu gu shar dang ni/ /byang du rtse bstan sbyin bsreg bya/ /sngon gyi las
134b5(rgyud 'grel): mthu las byung ba'i/ /'chi ba nges par bzlog par byed/ /slob dpon la ni yon phul nas/ /oM yig de las ru ru ste/ /de nas sphu ru'i tshig rjes la/ /dzwa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+hA dang/ /lo tsa na zhes bya tshig gsum/ /sarbA rthA sA d+ha ni swAhA/ sngags a sho ka 'thab mas
134b6(rgyud 'grel): gtsang mar tsan dan chu yis ni/ /'bum 'am phye bar bris nas kyang/ /dag cing dang pa'i cho ga yis/ /chu med 'o mas bkru ba 'am/ /du rba la sogs sbyin sreg byas/ /'chi bslu ba ma lus pa/ /nges pa kho nar byed pa yin/ /nad kyi tshogs ni ma lus pa/ /zhi bar
135a1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga bshad/ /'phags pa yi ge brgya zhes bya/ /sngags kyi mthu ni bsam mi khyab/ /mthu ni rnam pa du ma mthong/ /bzang spyod yi dam bcas pa yi/ /cho ga yis ni 'bum bzlas
135a2(rgyud 'grel): na/ thar pa'ang nges par skyed byed na/ /'chi ba slu ba smos ci dgos// //na ma(rgyud 'grel): strai ya d+d+hI kA nAM/ de nas ta thA ga tA nAM/ /sarba tA pra ti ha ta/ /bab ti d+harma ta'i tshig /ba le nAM oM tshig gi mthar/ /de nas a sa ma sa ma/ /sa man+ta to e nan+ta/ /
135a3(rgyud 'grel): ta ba bA ti 'og shes ni/ /ha ra ha ra sma ra sma/ /ra Na bi gtar ga/ de nas bud+d+ha d+harma te/ sa ra gnyis sa ma pa la/ /ha sa gnyis dang tra ya gnyis/ /ga ga na mahA ba ra/ lak+Sha Ne de bzhin dzwa la/ /dzwa la na swa ga rol mthar/ /swAhA'i tshig ni sbyar bya ba/ /
135a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags yig brgyar 'gyur ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /snying po yin par rab tu bshad/ /'phags pa so sor 'brang ma'i sngags/ /'bum phrag gcig ni legs bzlas la/ /dU rba'i sbyin sreg bcu chas ni/ /'chi bdag
135a5(rgyud 'grel): nges par blu ba yin/ /oM smras bi ma le ja ya/ ba re a mri te hUM hUM/ phaT gnyis de nas swAhA yi/ /tshig ni mdza' ru brjod par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad b+ha ra gnyis/ /sam b+ha ra gnyis rjod bya la/ /iN+Ta ya ba la yi sgra/ /bi sho d+ha ni zhes brjod
135a6(rgyud 'grel): do/ /hUM hUM ru ru tsa le dang/ swAhA sngags ni 'chi bdag slu/ /'phags pa so sor 'brang ma yi/ /snying po dngos grub kun stsol yin/ /'jig rten dbang phyug spyan snga ru/ /'chi ba las rgyal zhes bya ba'i/ /gsang sngags yi ge bcu pa ni/ /'bum
135a7(rgyud 'grel): phrag bcu bzlas dre 'og tu/ me tog dkar po mar btegs pa'i/ /sbyin sreg grangs ni 'bum bya'o/ /sngags mthun de 'og nges par ni/ 'chi bdag slu ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /thog mar oM ste de nas oM/ de 'og oM uM zhes bya ba/ /oM mri
135b1(rgyud 'grel): tyu dza de nas/ /oM 'di sngags 'di yi ge bcu/ /bskal pa sogs su 'tsho ba'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gang gsungs pa/ /de yis tshe ni bsrings pa 'grub/ /de bsrings 'chi ba blu ba yin/ /sngags gang zhi ba'i las byed pa/ /de yis tshe 'phel gyur pa na/ /
135b2(rgyud 'grel): de ni 'chi bslu bar 'gyur/ /sngags rnams kyi ni mthu la yang/ /the tshom bya bar rigs ma yin/ /gang phyir sngags kyi mthu dag ni/ /bsam mi khyab par kun nas 'dod/ /'jig rten na ni dngos gzhan gang/ /sngags kyis mi 'grub de yod min/ /yang dag
135b3(rgyud 'grel): dad dang mngon brtson las/ /sngags rnams yid bzhin nor bur mchungs/ /rtogs pa las bshad cho ga 'am/ /ci 'dod pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /bkres shas che ba'i sa phyogs su/ /sle dres rab tu spyad par bya/ /gcig pu 'am yang na gzhan pa yi/ /sman
135b4(rgyud 'grel): dang lhan cig rtag tu spyad/ /de nas lus ni brtan 'gyur la/ gshin rje'i sgo ni mthong mi 'gyur/ /grub pa'i sman ni gzhan dag kyang/ /nges pa bsten par gyur pa yis/ /tshe 'phel nad dang rgas pa ni/ /zad pas 'chi ba ma mthong ngo/ /dngul dang gser sogs
135b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa yin/ /dngul chu tsho ga bzhin zos na/ /bcud kyis len gyis rang bzhin can no/ /'chi ba slu ba 'byung ba yin/ /chos gcig zla ba'i phyogs sogs par/ /rang gi khams ni thob pa na/ /sna btad pa yin cho ga yis/ /'chi ba slu ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
135b6(rgyud 'grel): kha sbyor la sogs rgyud las gsungs/ /mi 'chi lnga dang ldan pa ni/ /man ngag ji bzhin bstan pa yis/ /'chi ba slu ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sdeng dang 'og dang kha sbyar sbyor ba ni/ /gang zhig phan pa'i rnal 'byor rab tu byed/ /de la bshin rje'i rgyal po rtag tu
135b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /khros par gyur kyang ci bar byed mi nus/ /la lar thabs kyis 'chi ba yang/ /slar 'tsho bar yang 'gyur ba mthong/ /lus ldan bu mo mi dang ni/ /phan tshun bsrubs las 'gyur ba yi/ /khrag dang lus zungs sras pa ni/ /khams ni shin tu drad min pas
136a1(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig 'phral du 'chi nyid la/ /thigs pa gnyis ni gtig par bya/ /mar bskus pa yi sbu gu las/ /de ni blud pas gzhug par bya/ /bdag nyid sna khung las byung ba'i/ /sna khung rim gyis bsgre gyur pa/ /slar yang 'tsho bar 'gyur
136a2(rgyud 'grel): mthong ste/ 'dir ni 'gag par bsngags pa yin/ /nus mthu mngon du mthong bas na/ /sbyor ba 'di ni mang por bsngags/ /'bras bu gsum ni spyir bsdus pa'am/ /so so b+h+ra ga rA dza ra bcas/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rtag spyad na/ /pan zhing bdud rtsir 'gyur
136a3(rgyud 'grel): ba yi/ /gnyer ma skra dkar rnams dang bral/ /rdo rje lus ni gzugs bzang ldan/ /bskal pa yi ni grangs rnyed du/ /'chi ba nges par bzlog pa yin/ /dri chu rnam pa mang zhig ni/ /lus las gsungs pa grub pa 'di/ /gza' dang bsku bas 'phral du ni/ /'chi
136a4(rgyud 'grel): ba bzlog par 'gyur ba yin/ /'di dag sbrang rtse mor ldan pas/ /rtag tu goms par byas na ni/ /'chi ba bzlog par byed pa yin/ /sman rnams kyi ni mthu la yang/ /sam nyi bya bar rigs min te/ /gang phyir sman gyi nus pa ni/ /bsam mi khyab par
136a5(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang?/ /de ltar phyi yi bya bas gus byas pas/ /ji bzhin stobs kyis 'dir ni 'chi bdag blu/ /'chi ba stobs ldan 'jigs pa cher dogs la/ /de ltar de yi nang gi bya ba yin/ /slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas sbyang ba las/ /'chi
136a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag slu ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// * //da ni 'chi ba slu ba la/ /mkhas pa nang gi bdag nyid can/ /gang gis brtson pas 'chi ba ni/ /nges par slu ba bshad par bya/ /rgyal po rkun po bdud chen po/ /stag la sogs
136a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'jigs dang bral/ /'du 'dzi dang bral ri bo sogs/ /yid 'dal lar gnas par bya/ /tshad tsam za zhing smra nyung la/ /shin tu chags par dga' ma yin/ /gnyid chung bsam gtan la mang gnas/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa la rab brtson/ /rang
136b1(rgyud 'grel): gi 'dod lha ma tshog sogs dang/ /dam chos bklag pa'i bya ba dang/ /gtor ma sbyin sogs byams pa yin/ /sems la sogs pa dus gsum brtson/ /bsod nams kyis ni 'dod pa 'grub/ /de bas 'du 'dzi spang bar bya/ /dad pas thams cad yang dag
136b2(rgyud 'grel): 'grub/ /de phyir dad pa rnam 'phel bya/ /brtson 'grus kyis ni brtsams pa 'grub/ /de bas brtson 'grus sngon 'gro bya/ /bsam gtan gyis 'dod 'bras brtan pas/ /bsam gtan la sems gcig tu 'bad/ /'du 'dzi spangs pas nyams len 'gyur
136b3(rgyud 'grel): de bas 'du 'dzi rnam spang bya/ /yang dag shes ldan thams cad 'grub/ /de bas shes dang kun ldan bya/ /'chi ba las ni sdug bsngal mthong/ /'tsho ba las ni chos 'gyur mthong/ /so ma nyi ma lus dang bral bas/ /'chi ba slu ba kun tu sbyong/ /de la dang por
136b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan bcas/ /bgegs dgra'i gsang sngags 'bum nyid ni/ /legs bzlas sbyin sreg khri byas pas/ /bgegs ni thams cad bzlog par bya/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta kA ya/ /de nas bAk+tsit+ta yi tshig /badzra nAM na na mo badzra ni/ /kri d+hA ya zhes tshig brjod la/ /
136b5(rgyud 'grel): ma hA daM Sh+TotkTa ka'i rjes/ /b+hi ra ba ya a si brjod/ /mu sa la pa ra shu/ gri hi ta sta ya yin/ /oM a mri ta kuN+Di li/ /kha kha khA hi khA hi'i tshig /tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha tshig de nas/ band+ha gnyis dang ha na gnyis/ /dza ha gnyis dang gardza gnyis/ /de nas bi spho Ta
136b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ /sarba badzra tshig dang ni/ /bi g+hA bi nA ya kA na brjod/ /mahA ga Na pa tI tshig/ /de nas ji bi tAn+ta ka rA ya/ /hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA yi/ /sngags 'di bgegs rnams zlog byed yin/ /yang na 'di yi snying po yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad
136b7(rgyud 'grel): bzlog par bya/ /sngon bzhin bzla dang sbyin sreg gis/ /'di yi mthu yang de 'dra yin/ /oM sngar hu lu hu lu dang/ de 'og tiSh+Thi tiSh+ThI tshig/ /ha na gnyis dang ha gnyis/ /gardza gardza de 'og tu/ /bi spho ta ya lan gnyis brjod/ /sarba bgyI bi na ya k+Sha na//
137a1(rgyud 'grel): oM a mita hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT ma ma rak+ShaM ku ru swAhA/ /de ltar bdud dang bgegs rnams ni/ /ma lus rnam bsal 'khrug med pas/ /ji ltar mngon 'dod rnal 'byor ni/ /gcig cig nyin mtshan bsgom par bya/ /stag po bkod
137a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas bzhugs te/ /zhi bas sangs rgyas mdzad pa mdzad/ /pad+ma zla ba'i gdan steng du/ /rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyar ldan/ /'od zer dkar po'i tshogs 'phro ba/ /rnam snang dkar po bsgoms nan/ /'khor ba
137a3(rgyud 'grel): srid du 'chir 'os min/ /mi bskyod la sogs de bzhin gshegs/ /rang mdog phyag rgya cha lugs ldan/ /nga rgyal brtan pas bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje'i lus su nges par 'gyur/ /nyi zla kha sbyar nang na bzhugs/ /'jig rten dbang phyug mi 'jigs pa/ /zhi zhing zla
137a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang 'dra la/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis yang dag brgyan/ /'od dpag med ni sku mdog dmar/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rab 'chang/ /rdo rje skyil krung bcas pa yi/ /zhabs kyi pad+ma gnyis kyi steng/ /phyag gnyis dag ni ma 'tshol bar/ /ting 'dzin
137a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyar legs gnas pa/ /sems can kun don rdzogs mdzad pa'i/ /sku las thugs rje'i rgyun 'dzag pas/ /bsams pa de yi thugs kar ni/ /'jig rten dbang phyug gzhan de bzhin/ slar yang de yi thugs ka ru/ /de bzhin rtse gcig yid kyis ni/ /
137a6(rgyud 'grel): ji srid grangs ni bye bar 'gyur/ /ji srid bsam gtan 'di dran bya/ /de nas par zhing rab phra'i mdza' i/ /'jig rten dbang phyug la bstad sems/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis bsams na/ /'chi bdag rang nyid 'chi bar 'gyur/ /phung po las
137a7(rgyud 'grel): skyes nad gzhan yang/ /rang nyid 'jig par gyur pa yin/ /pad+ma dkar po'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /zla ba'i gzugs kyi stan steng du/ /rdo rje'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /mchog sbyin pa dang utpal bsnams/ /ston ka'i zla ba'i mdangs 'dra ba'i/ /zla ba la
137b1(rgyud 'grel): ni rgyab brten pa/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /bcu drug lo lon lus dang ldan/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kun de yi sras/ /mchog sbyin sku ni 'chang pa'i yum/ /'phags ma sgrol ma'i snying gar bsgoms/ /de yi 'khor lo'i 'od zer dkar/ /rtsibs
137b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad la ni yi ge ni/ /brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba la/ /lte bar oM dang hUM yi ge/ dbus nas bsgrub bya'i ming dang ldan/ /zla drug brtan cing nges pas ni/ /rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis bsgom/ /yi ge bcu pa'i sngags 'di ni/ /skyo bar ma gyur sems kyis bzla/ /dang
137b3(rgyud 'grel): por oM ni gzhag na su/ /de 'og tA re rab tu sbyar/ /de 'og tut+tA re tu re/ /swAhA'i mdza' can las kun byed/ /tshangs dbang khyab 'jug nyi zla dang/ /drag po phyogs skyong 'dod lhas kyang/ /sbu rtse tsam yang ma nyams par/ /'chi bdag lta bur 'chi las rgyal/ /skra dkar
137b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyer ma skal ngan dang/ /nad dang dbul ba kun zang byed/ /seng+ge la sogs 'jigs chen brgyad/ /sdug bsngal tshogs ni 'jig par byed/ /ma bslangs par ni zas skom sogs/ /kho zas gos la sogs pa rnyed/ /ral gri mig sman rkang phyug pa/ /bum bzang
137b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs dang dngos grub rnams/ /snyan dngags smra mkhas nyid kyi blo/ /shes rab gcig pu dri ma med/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub gzhan dag kyang/ /'khor lo 'di nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /spyan dang sku byed mA ma kI/ /lha mo dkar po chen mo ni/ /rang mdog cha
137b6(rgyud 'grel): lugs phyag rgya yis/ /bsgoms na 'chibs mi tshugs so/ /rang gi 'dod lha'i rnal 'byor nyid/ /nga rgyal brtan pa dang ldan pa/ /yid bzhin nor ltar ma lus pa'i/ /'dod pa'i don ni rab sgrub byed/ /dud rang kun dA zla ba 'dra/ /bsdu ba'i rim gyis yang dag
137b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas na des/ /'chi ba slu bar 'gyur ba yin/ /'khor lo bde mchog rgyud las gsungs/ /he ru ka'i rnam par bsgom/ /byas nas de yongs gyur pa las/ /ka pA la yi rnam par bsgom/ /kang ka la yi gzugs bsams pa
138a1(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ /kha tw'M ga ra ni rnam par bsgom/ /bsad par 'os pa ma yin phyir/ /'chi ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /spyi bo ru ni zla bI gzugs/ /bdud rtsi thigs pa 'dzag pa yis/ /ba spu'i bu ga kun nas ni/ /yan lag thams cad tshim
138a2(rgyud 'grel): par byed/ /'du 'dzi thams cad rnam spang pa/ /rnal 'byor pa yis zla drug bsgom/ /nad ku las ni rnam rgyal nas/ /'chi bdag lta bur 'chi las rgyal/ /mgo bo padmo 'dab ma stong/ /ra bo'i kha ni thur du bltas/ /lA ba'i rims bsams bskal
138a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs par/ /'chi ba 'jigs par byed pa yin/ /de nyid nag po'i gzugs nyid la/ /nag po'i gzugs kyi 'od rnams kyi/ /kun tu khyab par bsams na ni/ /skra dkar la sogs 'jig par byed/ /lce ni rkan la gzhar bya zhing/ /so ni so la ma rig pas
138a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyu yi nus pa bsam mi khyab/ /dad pas byas pa 'di brtsam bya/ /lkog ma'i bu ga'i steng dang sbyar/ /lce chung thur du bltas nas ni/ /lce yi rtse mor ku reg par/ /bdud rtsi'i ro ni myong bar byed/ /des ni 'phral du 'chi ba sel/ /skya dkar la sogs pa yang 'jig /de byas nas ni
138a5(rgyud 'grel): rgud pa dang/ /'jigs pa kun las bsrung 'gyur ba/ /dbugs 'byung rdub pa dran pa yang/ /rnam pa gzhan pa brtsam par bya/ /grangs 'phel de las nges pa ni/ /rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gro/ sems can rnams kyi nyin mtshan du/ /dbugs ni nyi khri chig stong dang/ /
138a6(rgyud 'grel): drug brgya dag gis lhag pa ru/ /grangs ni yongs su bsgrags pa yin/ /gang phyir bdud rtsi sngags yin pas/ /rlung ni 'jug pa sngags yin te/ /bdud rtsi gson pa'i thabs yin te/ /de yis 'chi bas mi tshugs so/ /'jug pa'i rlung ni bgrang bya zhing/ /rims
138a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'bum sogs grangs kyis ni/ /rtse gcig sems kyis cho ga bzhin/ /sgra med pa yi bzlas par bshad/ /sgra med bzlas pa 'bum du ni/ /cho ga bzhin du rdzogs 'gyur na/ /mi ni tshe nyams gyur pa yang/ /lo lnga'i bar du 'tsho bar des/ /nyis 'bum la sogs
138b1(rgyud 'grel): zlos pa nyid/ /tshe 'phel bar ni bsgre bar bya/ /thabs la mkhas par gyur pa dang/ /rlung gi bzlas la brtson par bya/ /nad par langs nas stod phrag gcig /rtag tu legs par bgrangs nas ni/ /nad kun las ni rnam grol zhing/ /nyi zla gnyis kyis bar du 'tsho/ /

138b3(rgyud 'grel): par 'chi ba las rgyal 'gyur/ /rmongs la longs spyod la gcig gzol/ /lugs mi mthun pas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rang gi ngo bo lugs mthun 'gyur/ /de las bzlog pas lugs mi mthun/ /seng+ge rnam rol phyag rgya ni/ /bcings pa yis ni rlung dags nyid/ /
138b4(rgyud 'grel): yang na dgag par sbyor bas rgyal/ /dgag pa 'chob bslu byed yin/ /rkang mthil gyi ni mthar thug par/ /rlung gi rim gyis dgang par bya/ /dgag pa kum pa ka zhes bya/ /de shes rim pa brjod bya ste/ /steng gi dgag pa'i sbyor bas ni/ /dgag par byed ba rgyal bar
138b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /chung dang 'bring sogs dbye ba yis/ /steng dgag rnam pa gsum du 'dod/ /steng dgag zhes ni bya ba 'di/ /'og nas bshad ps don ston byed/ /chung ba tshad ni sum cu drug/ 'bring ni de bzhin nyis 'gyur yin/ /chen po gsum 'gyur yin zhes bya/ /
138b6(rgyud 'grel): dgag pa des ni rgyal bar 'gyur/ /dgag pa yis ni tshad byas la/ /phyi nang rang gi pus lha ngar/ /'dir ni lag pa nyug byas la/ /de nas se gol drug gdab bo/ /'di ni mkhas pas yongs 'chad pa'i/ /du skyi tshad ni yin par bshad/ /ji srid sum
138b7(rgyud 'grel): cu drug tshad 'byung/ /de srid dgag pa'i bya ba yin/ /steng dgag 'di ni dman pa ste/ /de nas bar ma nyis 'gyur nyid/ /steng dgag chen po sus 'gyur te/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni tshad yin no/ /'chi ba slu bar 'dod pa yis/ /'bad pas de nyid las rgyal bya
139a1(rgyud 'grel): steng dgag chen po'i mtshan nyid ni/ /ji srid dgag pa rab 'jigs pa'o/ /rgyun du dgag par gyur pa yang/ /de tshe legs par gnas pa yin/ /nyi ma de las 'chi sogs nyid/ /dgag pa la ni gang gnas pa/ /de che bskal pa stod
139a2(rgyud 'grel): du yang/ /'chi bdag nye bar mi 'gyur ro//nam mkha' ba ni bzhos pa las/ /bdud rtsi bsher ba dag gi tshogs/ /bum pas mtshan pas chu zhes bya'i/ /dkyil 'khor las ni 'od zer 'phro/ /sna rtser byung ba'i rlung gis ni/ /rlang spa yang yang brtag par bya/ /snying
139a3(rgyud 'grel): kar pad+mar thim pa yis/ /sems kyi bud ba'i phrug gu gas so/ /nam mkha' bzho ba'i bsam gtan dag/ 'di ni rtag tu spyad par bya/ /nam mkha' lta bur 'chi bdag gi/ mthong bas mthong ba ma yin no/ /yang na rlung ni yongs spangs la/ /de bzhin nyid la rtog tu spyad/ /
139a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nyid kyi 'chi dang bdud/ /dag rnams gzhan la rgyal byed nyid/ /nyes pa ma lus rab tu zhi/ /yon tan ma lus 'byung bar 'gyur/ /skyos bu de nyi kyis rgyal zhing/ /mngon par 'dod pa rnams kyang 'grub/ /de bzhin nyid ni stong nyid bshad/ /rnam pa

139b1(rgyud 'grel): rtog tsam las byung ba yi/ /'chi bde yang mthong mi 'gyur/ /gzhan yang bdud ni mang po dang/ /'khor ba yang ni mi mthong/ /de yang 'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di/ /dngos po kun la yod min te/ /so so'i skye bo'i rnam 'phrul/ /rnam par rtog pas bcom pa yin

140a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'bibs/ /bsrubs na shing las me ni 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /brkos par gyur na sa las chu 'byung 'gyur/ /mis ni rtsol ba byas na mi 'grub med/ /'bad pas rigs pas brtsams kun 'bras bcas 'gyur/ /'di na 'chi ba slu
140a2(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams/ /shin tu mang po shes nas kyang/ /tams ma blangs na mal du ni/ /bshad bas gos te khyod 'chi 'gyur/ /gang zhig sbyor ba la mkhas shing/ /bstan bcos la byang mkhas pa rnams/ /nyams ma blangs pa'i nyes pa yis/ /so ni ston cing 'chi ba yin/ /

140a6(rgyud 'grel): bcu pa dang ni/ /'tsho ba lnga bcu pa la sogs/ /bstan bcos 'bad de brtags nas ni/ /'chi bdag rnam par bslu ba 'di/ /'gro la rjes su brtse bas bshad/ /nam mkha' yongs dag ston ka'i zla 'dra bar/ /dag cing nam mkha' las kyang mi shod pa'i/ /dge ba 'di
140a7(rgyud 'grel): las mi 'chi gang thob pa/ /des ni 'gro ba 'chi bdag las thar shog /nyon mongs yi ge ba rnams ni/ /brtsi ba yis ni ngal gyur na/ /gzhung 'di'i tshad du gyur pa ni/ /sum brgya drug cu tham pa'o/ /slob dpon dag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad
140b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'chi ba slub bstan pa las/ /le'u bzhi pa'o/ /dag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa 'chi ba slu ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shI dz+nyA na dang/ /lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //
140b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ /swabna u hA nA/ bod skad du/ /rmi lam brtag pa/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rmi lam sna tshogs las byung ba/ /de yi brtag pa bshad par bya/ /dang po'i thun la rmi lam byung/ /lo gcig nang du 'bras bu 'byin/ /thun gnyis
140b3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba brgyad pa la/ /thun gsum zla ba gsum gyi bar/ /thun bzhi zla ba phyed bar du/ /mthong bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /skya rang shar ba'i dus nyid la/ /zhag bcu'i nang du 'bras bu 'byin/ /de rjes rab tu bshad bya ba/ /nyon cig dge dang mi dge'i las/ /bzhon
140b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ba lang dang ni glang chen zhon pa dang/ /khang bzang ri rtse dang ni nags kyi ljon shing dang/ /gru nang 'dug ste pi wang 'dzin par byed pa dang/ /kha zas za zhing du byed rtag par dngos po 'thob/ /mtshon chas rdeg dang srog chags phra mos lus khebs dang/ /
140b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin lus kyi ljan ljin rnam par dag pa dang/ /bshad pa'i rjes su 'jug dang lus la khrag 'dzag dang/ /rmi lam rnams na bgrod min la zhugs shis pa'o/ /rgyal po glang chen rta mchog dang/ /'gron bu glang dang ba rnams dang/ /gang gis gnyid kyi mdza' mar
140b6(rgyud 'grel): mthong/ /de yi nye du mang por 'gyur/ /shing ljon 'o ma 'bras bu can/ /gang gis gcig bus de la 'dzegs/ /de la 'dug nas gnyid sad na/ /myung du nor ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis khang bzangs 'dug nas zos/ /de bzhin rgya mtsho brgal ba'i
140b7(rgyud 'grel): mi/ /dman pa'i rigs su skyes kyang ni/ /de ni rgyal por 'gyur bar 'ong/ /gang zhig rdzing bu'i dkyil du ni/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma chen po'i nang/ /zho dang 'o thug za byed pa/ /sa bdag 'thob par the tshom med/ /mar me rgyal mtshan shing rta gdugs/ /bu mo shing lo
141a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu zan/ /gnyid kyi mdza' mar gar gis mthong/ /bla na med pa'i dpal thob 'gyur/ /mi dag gi ni sha rnams ni/ /bcos sam ma btsos gang yang rung/ /rmi lam du ni gang gis zos/ /nyon gcig de yi yon tan gang/ /
141a2(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa zos na lnga brgya ste/ /lag pa zos na stong phrag gcig /stong phrag brgya 'am rgyal srid ni/ /mgo bo zos na thob par 'gyur/ gang gis rgyu mas grong dang mi/ /yang na grong khyer dkris pa ni/ /grong gcig dkris na rgyal phran thob/ /grong khyer dkris
141a3(rgyud 'grel): na rgyal po'o/ /lham gnyis dang ni gdugs dang ni/ /ral gri rnon po dri med dag /thob nas gang zhig gnyid sad na/ /de ni lam du bgrod par bshad/ /gang zhig gru la zhon nas ni/ /zhig pa yin yang yang dag sgrol/ /de yi lam bgrod shes par
141a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ de yang myur du ldog par nges/ /gang gis rnams rnam par 'chag /rab tu g.yo ba'i thil ma ni/ /de yi nor ni brlag pa 'od/ /yang na lus lan tsha 'byung/ /gang la rnam par gnod byed pa'i/ /rwa can rnams dang mche ba can/ /spre'u 'am yang na
141a5(rgyud 'grel): phag pa byung/ /de la rje bong 'jigs pa 'byung/ /gang la til mar mngon par 'byug/ 'o ma 'am yang na mar gyis bskus/ /de dang 'dra ba gang yang rang/ /de ni nad du rnam par bshad/ /shing rta bong bu rnga mor ldan/ /gang zhig gcig pus de la
141a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzogs/ /de stengs 'dug nas gnyid sad na/ /myur du 'chi ba thob par 'gyur/ /bud med gos dmar 'dzin pa dang/ phreng ba byug pa dmar po can/ /gang la 'khyud byed rmi lam byung/ /de yis mtshan mo phyi ma med/ /bud med gos dkar gon
141a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /rjes su phyug phreng dkar por ldan/ /rmi lam du ni gang la 'khyud/ /de yi dpal ni thams cad 'byung/ /nag po'i gos can bud med ni/ /phreng ba byug pa nag par ldan/ /gang la 'byung byed rmi lam byung/ /de yi dpal ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /
141b1(rgyud 'grel): ser po'i gos can bud med gang/ /ser po'i phreng dang byug pa can/ /rmi lam du ni gong la 'khyud/ /de yis rgyal srid thob par 'gyur/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rmi lam du/ /yang na zla ba gang gis mthong/ /nad can nad las grol pa dang/ /nad med yin na
141b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan 'gyur/ /gang zhig dkar po'i sbrul gyis ni/ /lag pa g.yas pa bzung ba na/ /gang la yang dag bcu yi bar/ /de yis nor ni thor par nges/ /rgod ma khyim bya kra un ci/ /thob nas gang gi gnyid sad na/ /de yis de dus snying sdug 'thob/ /
141b3(rgyud 'grel): chung ma nye dus smra pa can/ /gang gis bzung nas bcings pa dang/ /yang na lag pa zhags pas btab/ /de las bu ni thob par 'gyur/ /yang na gnas pa chen por 'gyur/ /bram ze rta phyugs glang chen lha/ /gzhan dag nag po shin tu ngam/ /thod pa
141b4(rgyud 'grel): ras bal thal ba rus/ /gzhan rnams dkar po mngon par dga' / /rta la mo dang lto 'phye dang/ /chu gnas srog chags bzung pa ni/ /rnam par rgyal ba'am dngos po 'tho ba/ /yang na bu thob rnam par bshad/ /gang zhig khrag gi btung ba 'thungs/ /
141b5(rgyud 'grel): yang na chang ni rab tu 'thungs/ /bam ze yin na rig pa thob/ /de las gzhan ni nor thob 'gyur// //gal te rmi lam 'o ma 'am/ /ba yes 'o ma bzhol nas 'thungs/ /de yis 'o ma'i btung ba thob/ /yang na sbyin sreg byed par 'gyur/ /
141b6(rgyud 'grel): zho mthong bas ni bde skyid 'byung/ /grong mthong nor dang ldan par 'gyur/ /gnas kyi sbyin sreg shes par bya/ /yungs kar gyis ni thob par 'gyur/ /me tog ldan na me tog shes/ /'bras bu ldan na bla med blo/ /me 'bar du ba can mthong na/ /me 'bar ba
141b7(rgyud 'grel): ni 'jigs par bshad/ /stan dang mal stan bzhon pa dang/ /lus po shing rta/ bya mi rnams ni/ /me 'bar 'dug tshe gnyid sad na/ /de yis de yi dpal rnams 'phel/ /rtags la mngon par mchod mthong na/ /de yis bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur
142a1(rgyud 'grel): bye brag tu ni sku mthong na/ /de yi lugs las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /lha rnams bram ze can rnams dang/ /pha dang rtags can bud med rnams/ /rmi lam du ni mchog gang smra/ /de ni de ltar rnam par bshad/ /gang la lha nyid gar byed dang/
142a2(rgyud 'grel): smra 'am rab tu rdeg pa dang/ /gzhog stegs rgyug par byed pa rnams/ /de rnams yul bgrod rnam par bshad/ /tsan dan dmar po'i shing dag la/ /mar gyis byugs la sbyin sreg bya/ /ga ya tri ni stong phrag bzlas/ /de yis zhi ba thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni dag dbang dgongs pa ste/ /gang gis nang par klog pa de'i/ /rmi lam ngan pa zlog par 'gyur/ /rmi lam ngan pa bzlog pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta bi b+hu ti tsan+d+ra sa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //
142a3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dra ba'i sgrub thabs bzhugs// // * / /rgya gar skad du/ /pad+ma dzA lodb+ha ba sA b+ha ni/ bod skad du/ /pad+ma dra ba 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pa phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul rnams/ /sku gsum

142a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag med pa dam pa'i dngos/ /rmad byung mthar gnas pa yang de/ /du ma'i dkyil 'khor ba gang nyid/ /thugs rje chen po rnam par 'jog /phun sum tshogs pa kun gyi rgyu/ /pad+ma dra ba dpal la brten/ /ji ltar bla mas nyer bstan pa/ /de yi sgrub thabs
142a6(rgyud 'grel): rim par brjod/ /ye shes shes rab thabs rang bzhin/ /sgrub thabs sems la kun phan pa/ /tshig don phal cher rnam gsal ba/ /bdag dang blo mnyam rnams la phan/ /dang po re zhig yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas sems can
142b1(rgyud 'grel): gdon pa la kun tu dmigs te smon lam sngon du bya'o/ /'jig rten 'di thams cad nyid bdag gis 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bton nas sangs rgyas nyid la nges par sbyar ba dang/ /sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i rgyur sngags kyi theg pa chen po theg pa thams cad kyi mchog

147a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin pad+ma gtum po'i dbang phyug ma/ /pad+ma gsad ma pad+ma chen po dang/ /pad+ma zla ba phyi mar bshad pa'o/ /pad+ma snang ma pad+ma gau ri ma/ /pad+ma mdzod ma dang ni bcu gnyis po zhes so/ /de nas gsum pa 'dab ma bcu drug pa de la lha mo rnams rim pa'i

150b5(rgyud 'grel): pas sdar bzhin du gsang sngags ma 'khrugs par bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas bsgom pa dang bzlas pa dag gis dub par gyur na phyi rol gyi mchod pa 'am cho gas yung tsam gyis stong pa nyid du bsgom par byas nas rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyis
150b6(rgyud 'grel): langs te phyi rol mchod pa'i dus su rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dmigs te bris sku la sogs pa'i mdun na bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du dkyil 'khor byas nas bdag nyid la mchod te/ dkyil 'khor ba rang gi snying gnas gzugs brnyan lta bu'i dkyil
150b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi 'khor lo spros nas gsang pa dang phyi'i lha sprul pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod nas rang gi snying ga'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la mchod par bya'o/ /de nas zas kyi dus su yung tsam gyis rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas zas la
151a1(rgyud 'grel): oM yig la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum gyis rim gyis bdud rtsir byas nas mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis tshim par bya'o/ /thun mtshams kyi dus su yud tsam gyis rang gi lha'i 'khor lo bsgom byas nas sdar brjod pa'i chogs
151a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa byas nas bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas zla ba'i snying gar bsams nas rnal 'byor pa bde bar gnyid log par bya'o/ /slar yang tho rangs rab tu sad par gyur pa na lha mo'i glu rnams kyis bskul bzhin par bdag nyid bsams par bya'o/ /langs nas sngar
151a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'i cho gas bsgom pa byas nas bzlas pa bya'o/ /de bzhin du ji srid pa de srid du rgyud las gsungs pa'i mtshan ma thob pa de srid du nyi ma so sor ro/ /de nas de bzhin du ji ltar nus pa dang ji ltar tshogs pa bzhin du mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas mthar gshegs su
151a4(rgyud 'grel): gsol bar bya'o/ /ba de ba'i sgrub thabs dam pa'i gzhung rig byas gang 'dir/ /bsod nams las byung sgrub pa thob pa las/ /pad+ma dra dpal sgrub pa kho na nyes spangs des/ /skye bo'i tshogs rnams byang chub mchog bde thob gyur cig ces pa pad+ma dra ba dpal 'byung
151a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgrub thabs rgyal ba dpal ye shes kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so// //kha che'i paN Di ta su ma na sh+rI dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba dag slod rin chen grub kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ /pad+ma A
151a6(rgyud 'grel): ba lo gi te shwa bya pad+ma dzA la kra me Na b+ha ga ba te maN+Dal pU dzA bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ /pad+ma spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad+ma dra ba'i rim pas bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i cho ga/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pad+ma dra ba
151a7(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdza' med 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho yi/ /nang du rgyu ba'i 'jig rten rnams/ /mnga' bdag thugs rjes non pas 'don/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal gyur cig/ /kun mkhyen gyis kyang legs shes min/ /zab cing rgya tshe'i chu gter ni/ /pad+ma'i phyag
151b1(rgyud 'grel): gis thugs rjes mkhyen/ /brling ba'i mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal/ /ban du ka dang se 'bru mtshal bzangs pad+ma rA ga dang/ /rgya skyegs khu ba zhu ba dmar po'i gdan dang pad+ma gser/ /snang las rnam par rgyal nas thugs rje'i dmar po mchog gi sku/ /'jig rten
151b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug bla ma 'di ni mchog gsal rnam snang byed/ /de ni sems can thams cad yon tan phun tshogs kun 'dzin pa/ /'jig rten dbang gi dbu la rtag tu yang dag gnas bcas pa/ /'dod chags la sogs nyes bzhi ldan bde bar gshegs pa'i gtso/ /yon
151b3(rgyud 'grel): tan mang po yang dag gnas pa'i 'od dpag med la 'dud/ /pad+ma dA ga rnam par bdar dang gser dang snang byed 'od/ /tshogs rnams rab 'dzag byu ru'i sdod po tshangs dang mtshal bzangs mdzes/ /mkha' mnyam snang ba mdza' yas yon tan rgya che 'od dpag med/ /bcom?
151b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'jig rten mgon po'i cod pan rgyan gyur la phyag 'tshal/ /gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang mi shes pa'i sbyod pa ni bdag gi pags pa'i mig gi sku bzhi po'i rang gi ngo bo dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i cho ga
151b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya'o/ /der dag nyid bzhad gang du byed pa gal te yang/ /de ltan yang de'i drin 'di yis/ /tshogs rnams bdag la chen bor 'char/ /rang gi rgyu mchin de rnams ni/ /nor lha'i phrin las bzang po rnams/ /de phyir gzhan la phan don du/ /ji bzhin byas pa ma
151b6(rgyud 'grel): yin yang/ /yongs su ngal gang legs pa yi/ /shin tu chung gyur kyang mdzes byer/ /mchod pa'i cho ga dam pa'i lam/ /legs pa de 'di mnyes gyur cig /cung zad ci yang shes byed pa/ /las thams cad pa bdag gi brjod/ /dang po re shig tshangs pa'i yud
151b7(rgyud 'grel): tsam la rdo rje slob dpon stan las langs nas gos yongs su bgos te lha'i ngag gi tha snyad bya zhing 'jig rten pa'i phal pa'i skad kyis 'dris pa yongs su spangs pa 'am mi smra ba byas pa phyi rol gyi sar gtsad spra'i ched du yang dag par brten par bya'o/ /de la nyi ma

152a3(rgyud 'grel): sarba bu d+d+ha bo d+hi sa twe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): da sha dig lo ka d+hA tu bya ba s+thi ta b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sa sra ba ka pra te ka bu d+d+ha b+hya(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas shar dang lto dang nub dang byang du bskor bas phyag bya'o/ /de nas 'jam pa'i stan la yang dag par nye bar 'dug nas/ /bla ma bdag nyid gang du bris pa'i dkyil
152a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi shar gyi char kha nub gtu phyogs pa'am gal te ma yin te bris pa'i dkyil 'khor med na de'i tshe ston pa po bla bzang pos gal te sa la kha shar du phyogs par gyur nas ye shes kyi lha la mchod par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa'i phyir/ /de la oM badzra

152b1(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen pa'i 'byung gnas 'dzin/ /sems can 'don par byed la mkhas/ /sems can dpugs 'byin mdzad pa'i phyag/ dman dang zhan la rjes brtse ba/ /sems can smin par mdzad ba la/ /rtag tu sems can nges gnas pa/ /sems dpa' chen po bstod pa'i
152b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag /sems dpa' snying po mchod pa la/ /rgyu med sems can mnyes gshin pa/ /sman gyi rgyal po dang mtshungs pa/ /nyi ma zla ba me yi spyan/ /shin tu rnam par dag yon bdag/ /shin tu rnam dag go 'phang gnas/ /shin tu rnam dag rab sbyin pa/ /dam chos mdzod

152b4(rgyud 'grel): 'chal/ /khyab bdag chen po khyod zhabs la/ /sal ltung nas bdag phyag 'tshal/ /sa steng 'jig rten dag byas pa/ /nyes pa zad par mdzad pa la/ /ji ltar mkha' 'di pha rol mdza' med cing/ /nyi ma'i rab gdung mtshungs med ji bzhin nyid/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas

152b7(rgyud 'grel): nams 'di yis nyes pa ma lus pa/ /slar ni mi skye myur du grol gyur cig/ stug bsngal rnams par spangs shing mun pa'i tshogs bsal ba/ /chags pa nye ba'i chags bral 'khod pa'i rgyu tshogs kyis/ /'khor brgyu ba por rgyur yul sprul mche ba yi/ /phrag tu
153a1(rgyud 'grel): nyer son nyen pa bdag la'ang rab srungs shig/ dam pa'i lam ston mchog tu che ba'i don bcas 'dzin/ /mchog gi dbang phyug deng ni myur du lam ston cig /las kyi chu rlabs g.yo ba'i drag po'i yul 'dzin pa/ /'jigs pa'i

153a4(rgyud 'grel): dga' bdag ni nges par bdag la dogs pa med/ /rgya che yon tan rtag tu phyug pa nyes pa rab rgyas grol/ /rab mchog pad+ma'i phyag khyod ji bzhin kho nar bdag gyur cig ces bstod pa bya'o/ /de nas byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms

154b7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi snying po'i sngags kyis mchod par bya zhing bzlas pa dang bstod par byas ba mthar gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /zhes pa dkyil 'khor dang bral ba rang gi don gyi cho gar mdor bsdus ba las rgyas pas gzhan gyi don du dkyil 'khor la brjod par bya'o zhes
155a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang por sbyor ba sgrub pa po rang gi don chos kyi sku'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi cho ga rgyas pas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga brjod par bya'o/ /de la dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi gnas zhing gi bdag po la a kA ro mu khaM sarba
155a2(rgyud 'grel): d+ha rmA tAM A bya nu tpa nA twA ta ces pas gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /de la dkyil 'khor du nye bar rung ba'i sa la ba las byung ba bcu phyed kyis nye bar byug par bya'o/ /de la sngags ni oM sa man+ta d+ha ra shu d+d+he d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ om ni rmam la shud+d+ha hUM/ zhes so/ /de nas sa gzhi de kho na'i
155a3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bzlog pa'i don du zhi ba can gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas nas g.yas su spos phor g.yon du dril bu bzung nas lha spyan drang ba 'di bklag par bya'o/ /de ni rdor sems rang ngo bo/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni 'gri bar byed/ /lha
155a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams bdag la grub pa'i phyir/ /myur du bsnyen par mdzad du gsol ba/ /zhes gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje sems dpa' i rang gi gzugs su bsams nas g.yon pa dril bu thogs g.yas pa kha TNaM ga steng du rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje 'chang bar
155a5(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas bdag de dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas gzhan slob ma rnams shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i lus su yongs su gzhag nas de rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i steng gi bla ma sngags
155a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis mchod par bya'o/ /de nas de rnams rdo rje dril bu gsil zhing shar du mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang rjes su rkang pa la sogs pa rkang stabs bzhi yis gar byas nas rang rang gi gnas su nye bar 'dug ste de rnams rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rang rang gi kha dog
155a7(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgyas mtshan par gzhag nas bla ma rang nyid shar du mngon par phyogs pa ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin kho nar 'dug par bya'o/ /de nas slob ma de rnams rdo rje sems dpa' i rang gi ngo bo bla ma la rdo rje me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa bcu gsum bya'o/ /
