257a7(rgyud 'grel): lcam dral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dur khrod la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su/ byang chub kyis sems sngon du btang la/ bam bsgrub pa gtor ma dbul te/ gtor ma la gsum/ bdag khyad par du bya ba dang/ gtor ma khyad par du
257b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang/ mgron khyad par du bya ba'o/ /dang po ni rang skad cig la bcom ldan 'das mi g.yo bar bsgoms la/ /sku gsung thugs kyi yi ges byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /gnyis pa ni ban+d+ra 'am thod pa'i nang du mi'i sha chen nam sha khrag gis brgyan
257b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mgon pa'i gtor ma bzang po bsham/ de med na snod gzhan du mar gyis brgyan pa bsham mo/ /gtor ma bshams zin pa dang oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ho haM zhes pa lan gsum brjod pas gtor ma mi dmigs
257b3(rgyud 'grel): par stong par bsgom/ stong pa'i ngang las yaM sngon po zhig yongs su gyur pa las/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog sngo skyar 'dug pa'i dbyibs gzhu bzhin nar mor 'dug pa/ gzhu mchog gnyis na mar dar gyi ba dan gyis mtshan pa zhig bsgoms/ de'i
257b4(rgyud 'grel): steng du raM las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'bar ba tsha ba bzhig bsgom/ /de'i steng du a las yongs su gyur ba las thod pa shin tu yangs shing che ba gcig bas mo/ /de'i steng du h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dkar po de las 'od zer 'phros gtor ma la mang la 'phros song tu
257b5(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma'i mi gcad pa dang/ stod kyi dri ma dag par bsam mos/ /der h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yang bdud rtsir zhu bar bsam/ de nas gtor ma bas khru gang gis mtho ba'i steng du/ raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du hUM(rgyud 'grel): mthing nag de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje nag po rtse
257b6(rgyud 'grel): dgu pa khong seng can gcig bsam/ de'i steng du raM yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ /de'i steng du hUM mthing na gcig bzhengs nas bzhugs par bsam/ /hUM las 'od zer 'phros nas rdo rje khong seng nas song/ rdo rje'i rwa 'og ma nas gnyis su gyes
257b7(rgyud 'grel): nas song bas/ gzhu mchog gnyis kyis ba dan la brgyab pas/ ba dan gyis rlung g.yab rlung gis me 'bar mes thod pa khol/ 'od yar 'phros song bas/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ka nas/ ye
258a1(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'i char 'bab par bsams la/ ngag tu/ oM a kA ro mu kham sarba d+ha rmA NAM A dya nutwa n+na twa ta oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags lan lnga 'am bdun brjod/ /A(rgyud 'grel): hUM dang de bzhin brjod/ rdo
258a2(rgyud 'grel): rje'i steng gi nyi ma dang/ 'og gi nyi ma gnyis hUM dang gsum 'khyags pa'i zar bu zhu bcug tu bdud rtsir zhu bar bsams la/ de nas rang gi lag pas rdo rje blangs nas lan gsum dkrugs pas bdud rtsi dkar chil gyur par bsam mo/ /de
258a3(rgyud 'grel): nas rang gi lag pa'i rdo rje mi dmigs par bsgom/ /don gtor ma khyad par du bya'o/ /mgron khyad par du bya ba ni gtor ma'i mdun gyi nam mkha' la raM yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng na hUM mthing na gcig bsam/ /de las 'od
258a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phros sems can thams cad la phog /sdig sgrib dag/ thams cad dang la mgon po'i skur gyur/ /de slar 'dus pas dpal mgon po sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas g.yon mi shes pa gcod pa'i ral
258a5(rgyud 'grel): dri dang thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams pa/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/ mchi ba gtsigs pa mi mgo rlon pa'i do shal dang stag gi sham thams cad bsam/ de'i thugs kar raM yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
258a6(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng na hUM mthing nag las g.yas su phaT dmar na gcig chad song ba las nyi ma'i gdan la dpal legs ldan nag po sku mdog dmar nag zha gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas g.yon na tsan dan gyi be con dang/ thod pa
258a7(rgyud 'grel): khrag gis gang ba bsnams pa/ /zhabs g.yon pa cung zad brkyang pa/ /g.yas pa cung zad bskum pa'i 'gying bag can/ rus pa'i ze phrog can 'jol ber sum rtsegs gsol ba gser gyi ska rags can bcings pa zhig tu
258b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom mo/ de nas rang gis thugs ka nas 'od 'phros pas/ ri rab kyi byang phyogs kyi baM rim nas mgon po dpon g.yog spyan drangs la/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa bstim mo/ /dpal legs ldan la yang de bzhin du bstim mo/ sku gsung thugs
258b2(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab po/ /yang mgon po'i g.yon phyogs su yaM sngo skya yongs su gyur pa las/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor de'i steng b+hyo rmug gnag de las 'od 'phros sems can la phog sdig sgrib dag thams cad dpal lha mo'i skur slar 'dus pas
258b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal lha mo sku mdog skyug nag bong bu ga dmar la bcibs pa/ /zhal cig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas g.yon na ral gri dang thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams pa mche ba gtsigs pa/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brjes pa/ rus pa'i
258b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyan cha can/ gong smed gong thag sbrul la byas pa/ snga sha phyi shal mi ro btags pa/ nad kyi rgyal pa dang mtshon gyi dru bu thogs ba zhig bsgom mo/ /de'i thugs ka nas raM yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du b+hyo smug gnag
258b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas g.yon phyogs su b+hyo nag po gcig chad song bas/ dpal re ma ti sku mdog nag mo/ /re ba'i gos gyon pa'i dre'u nag mo la bcibs pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma g.yas g.yon na ral gri dang thod pa thogs pa/ /mche ba gtsigs
258b6(rgyud 'grel): skra gzings pa/ gong rmad gong thag sbrul la byas pa/ /snga sha phyi sha la mi ro btags pa/ /nad kyi rkyang bu dang mtshon gyi dru bu thogs pa zhig tu bsgom mo/ /de nas rang gi thugs ka nas 'od 'phros song bas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi rnam par
258b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i khang gzangs kyi byang shar mtshams kyi mtsho mu le lding nas ye shes kyi lha mo 'khor bcas spyan drangs la/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa bstim mo/ /lha mo drel zhon ma la yang de bzhin du bsti mo/ /de na sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlob po/
259a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas bzlas pa byed na/ rang gi snying ga nas raM yongs su gyur pa las/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na hUM mthing nag bzhengs nas bzhugs pa la/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA kA la badzra daM Sh+Tha na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ces bya ba'i sngags kyis
259a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas skor du bskor nas yod par bsams la/ de rang gi kha nas mgon po'i zhal du song/ lte ba nas thon rang gi lte bar yang rang gi kha nas thon mgon po'i zhal du de bzhin du khor yug du 'khor bar bsam zhing bzlas par bya'o/ /dpal
259a3(rgyud 'grel): lha mo'i bzlas pa byed na khor yug gi bzlas pa mi bya bar dpal lha mo la dmigs la/ /oM ru ru ro ru ru tsa pa la a shud me ma hUM b+ho dzdza dzdza zhes bya ba'i bzlas pa bya'o/ /bzlas pa mi byed par gtor ma gtong na/ bskyed pa bzhi po la lce mi dmigs
259a4(rgyud 'grel): lce'i stong du hUM re yod par bsams la/ hUM bzhi po de yongs su gyur pa la/s lce stod rdo rje lce smad dub gur yod par bsams la/ mgon po la stob na hUM zhes brjod pas/ gtor ma gtar btsugs nas gsol bar bsams la/ hUM oM tsaN+Da ma hA kA la
259a5(rgyud 'grel): kha kha ri laM ta khA hi zhes bya ba la lan gsum gyis bstab bo/ /oM tsaN+Da de ba ma hA kA la ba laM khA hi kha hi zhes bya ba lan gsum gyis lha mo dpon g.yog la bstab bo/ de nas 'dod pa'i don la gsol bar gdab bo/ /oM khyed kyis sems
259a6(rgyud 'grel): can don kun mdzad/ rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ slar yang sems can don la gshegs/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs bskyed pa bzhi po mi dmigs
259a7(rgyud 'grel): par bsgom/ gtor mas gtsang sar bskyal lo/ /dI baM ka ra sh+rI dz+nya nas mdzad pa/ /lo tsa ba 'brom ston gyis bsgyur ba'o// //oM sh+rI ma hA kA la tri yaM dza/ /oM tra ga rag sha ma'i thun b+hyo ma hA ya ga sha tri Na nag mo thun b+hyo/ /snying
259b1(rgyud 'grel): kar rak+Sha thun b+hyo// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI de bi kA li sA d+ha no pi ka/ bod skad du/ dpal ldan lha mo nag mo sgrub pa'i thabs kyi chog /dpal lha mo nag mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal lha mo nag mo bsgrub par 'dod pa'i
259b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pas/ yo byad phun sum chogs pa dang ldan par bshams nas/ /de nas gnas dur khrod dam shing gcig gi drung dam gcod rong ngam/ /khang stong dam dben pa'i sa phyogs su phyin la/ de nas dang por phyogs skyong bcu la sogs pa
259b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten pa thams cad la gtor ma sbyin zhing gser skyems rgyas par btang/ de nas e maNdal kun tu khru re ba la dpangs su yang khru gang gi tshad du bya/ de la stegs pu rim pa gsum du bya'o/ /bar ma la zla gam gsum gsum du bya/ tham la
259b4(rgyud 'grel): gru gsum dang/ dang po la gru gsum du bya/ rabs chad kyi thod pa re re 'am/ /yang na gang yang rung ba'i thod pa re re bzhag ste/ de yang thod pa'i steng mngon par byas nas/ /thod pa'i nang du ya nag po re re ro sol gyis bri/ thong pa'i phyi ma dmar po re re
259b5(rgyud 'grel): mi khrag gis bris/ /zla gam gsum yang dmar por byug/ gru gsum nag por mtshon btang ste/ tshon btang ma legs na skyon 'di lta bu yod do/ /tshon sboms na slob dpon dang/ slob ma nad mang du song/ /tshon phras na slob dpon slob bu la nor yal
259b6(rgyud 'grel): bar yod do/ /yo bar gyur na yul du 'khrug pa yongs/ /bar chad par gyur na slob dpon slob bu myur du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de bas re khA smyug ma 'bring po tsam du byas la/ /g.yas nas bskor gyin bri ste/ tshon dgye ba yang gru gsum nyis
259b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur du dgye ste/ nang gru gsum nag por bya/ /phyir gru gsum de dmar bor byug /nang dang phyi'i gru gsum re re la rdo rje phyed ma re res mtshan pa bri/ thal chen dang khrag skam bsres pas/ y/e'i dbus su sngags sa bon gyi hUM bri/ /nang gi zung
260a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum la laM/ /mo thams cad kyi srog gi snying po b+hyo re re bri par bya ba yin no/ /de nas d+ha d+hu ra'i khu ba dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dang ra khyi'i khrag dang/ bya nag mo'i khrag dang/ de rnams cha bsnyams la zhib tu btags pa tshon rtsi
260a2(rgyud 'grel): dang sbyang bas/ dur khrod kyi ras la lha mo nag mo'i sku bris la/ e'i maN+Dal kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol te/ de nas spos la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad lnga tshang bar bshams te mchod pa dbul/ de yang bdag dam tshig gi lha mo bsgom
260a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ dang po rang gi snying gar pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi 'am yang na 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar dang bcas pa zhig bsam/ pad+ma de'i ge sar gyi dbus su yi ge aM klad kor dang bcas pa bsams la/ de'i steng du yi ge hUM rang gi gzi brji kyis
260a4(rgyud 'grel): rang nyid me ltar 'bar ba zhig bsgom mo/ /me des bdag nyid rnam pa rtog pa can gyi lus bsregs nas thal bar gyur par bsam mo/ /yang thal ba de'i dbus su zhi ba'i dod kyis bsam par bya ba/ /sngon gyi pad+ma'i snying po la gnas pa/ srog gi
260a5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyi yi go oM/ /de'i steng du baM bsam mo/ /de nas yi ge baM yongs su gyur pa las/ bum pa dkar po'i kha nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab pa zhig bsam/ de nas srog tu bshad pa'i yi ge aM de las bdud rtsi chu rgyun 'bab cing spangs pas/
260a6(rgyud 'grel): yi ge kun gyi mchog srog tu bshad pa'i yi ge a ces pa'i chu des ltag par yang brtan zhing rtas par byas nas/ gzi brjid dang ldan par gyur nas/ zla ba dang/ kha ba dang/ kun da dang/ sprin dkar po dang/ dung lta bur bsam par bya'o/ /
260a7(rgyud 'grel): de nas dpal lha mo nag mo'i mtshan sngags/ oM ma hA kA li de pi kA pha li/ tran+ta kA lA ra ti tsaN+Da ru phi ni hUM phaT/ ces brjod pa'i sgo nas sngags kyi sa bon yi ge a de las lhar bsgrub te/ dpal lha mo nag po'i skur bsgyur zhing bsgom par
260b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ sku mdog nag mo char sprin nam/ bung pa ltar gnag pa/ shin tu rid pa/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ zhabs gnyis pa/ g.yas kyi dang po na ral gri/ /'og ma ban d+ha dmar gyis bskyil ba kha TwAM ga dkrol ba te/ g.yon na shag ti/ 'og matri shu
260b2(rgyud 'grel): la'i dar dpyangs 'phyar ba thogs pa/ mi ro rangs po khar bcug nas mche ba gcigs pa/ /spyan dmar po gsum bzlog nas lta ba/ dbu'i ral pa gyen du brjes shing g.yon du 'khyil ba/ dbu skra'i ral pa la thod pa'i phreng bas brgyun pa/ snyan chag g.yas pa
260b3(rgyud 'grel): sbrul gyi mgul nas dril bu gsil pa/ /snyan cha g.yon pa seng+ge ral pa dmar ba/ rna rtag gnyis na me tog dmar nag gi cod pan 'bur ba/ lta ma yin la sogs pa'i thod pa'i do shal byas pa/ glang po che'i ko rlon stod g.yogs su byas pa/ bang nga gi
260b4(rgyud 'grel): ka don chen pas dras pa la re lde seng pos sham bu byas pa sku smad dkris pa/ khrag dang zhag gi thig les tshon bur bris pa/ kla'i rgyal po gshibs pas ska rags su byas pa/ /zhabs gnyis lcags sgrog gis brgyan nas/ bong bu ga pa'i steng na btsan
260b5(rgyud 'grel): spyil du bzhugs pa dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus na skad 'bru gi sgra ltar sgrogs shing/ ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za thams cad dbang du sdud pa zhig tu bsgom mo/ /de ltar gsal ba dang/ de'i snying ga'i dbus su thugs mar mi 'dras la rang gi sor bzhi'i chod la
260b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyib sgo ba'i gzugs 'dra ba zhig gsal bar bsgom/ /sgong de'i nang gi dngus su hAM nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa gcig bsgom mo/ /de'i yang hUM gri thig le ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du bsam/ hUM gi zla chos zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsam/ /de'i 'og
260b7(rgyud 'grel): tu hUM de las 'od zer byung ba/ bzlas pa'i yig 'bru rnams phring bar gyur nas/ hUM de nyid la lta zhing gsal ba dang/ 'dris shing goms pa'i sbyor bas rtse gcig kho nar bsgom mo/ /de ltar bdag dam tshig gi lha mor gsal ba dang/ grub pa'i gnas nas rang
261a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyi lha mo sngar gyi de dang 'dra bzhig la/ 'khor ma mo gcer bur la pa can thod pas se ral kar brgyan pa/ lag ba g.yas pas mi'i snying thogs pa lag pa g.yon pas ba nd+ha? rak+tas pa 'dzin pa/ snying gi dkyil
261a2(rgyud 'grel): na srog gi snying po b+hyo re re yod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang bcas pa byon par bsam mo/ /de nas nam mkha' la sbyan drangs nas/ mdun du e'i dbus su sdags kyi sa bon dang b+hyo la so sor thim pas sku phyag rgya bzhengs par bya'o/ /de la dgug pa dang
261a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhug pa dad bcings pa sngags 'dis bya'o/ /dri sh+ya dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM paM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM sa ma ya stwaM zhes brjod nas/ /de nas gzugs la mngon du sku ston pa gcig bsgom mo/ /de ltar mi ston na/ oM hUM b+hyo e a ra la li h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod cing gzir
261a4(rgyud 'grel): mngon du ma byung na bdag gi sems la ci 'dod pa de ni khyod kyis bsgrub par gyis shig nyes bsgo'o/ /de yang las byed pa'i tshe rig sngags kyi dam tshig sbyin te/ dam tshig kyang gur gum chu la sngags kyis btab la sbyin no/ /dam tshig gi sngags
261a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di'o/ /oM ha na ha na badzra sa ma ya a d+hi kra ma nan hUM phaT/ dam tshig gi chu sbyin nas bsgo ba/ lha mo khyod dam tshig 'di las 'das nas/ bsgo ba bzhin du ma byas pa rab cu gzir ba chen po byed pa dang/ dam tshig gi chu 'di yang ha la ha la
261a6(rgyud 'grel): chen por 'gyur te/ mthong bas khrag skyug pa dang/ rdo rje chen pos dral te dus ma yin par 'chi par 'gyur ba dang/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gsod pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/ /khro bo za bed chen par 'gyur te/ rdo rje me 'bar bas dmu tshig nas
261a7(rgyud 'grel): thal bar byas te/ so so rang gi rnam pa gsal bzhin du dmyal ba 'bod sgrags su skyes par 'gyur ro/ /zhes dam tshig bor ro/ /de nas lha mo la mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma dbul lo/ /oM hUM sh+rI ya de bi kA li kA li ma hA kA li hUM b+hyo/ /om badzra puT bu
261b1(rgyud 'grel): dza spha ra Na sa ma yi hUM phaT ces brjod de/ me tog dbul lo/ /oM badzra d+hu pa pu dza spha ra na sa ma ye hUM ces brjod de/ bdug spos shangs la dbul lo/ /oM badzra dI yaM pu je spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes brjed de/ mar me spyan la dbul lo/ /oM badzre gan d+he pU dza spha ra Na sa
261b2(rgyud 'grel): ma ye hUM zhes brjod/ dri thugs kar dbul lo/ /oM badzra nai wi te pu dza spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes brjod te/ lha bshos phyag tu dbul lo/ /de nas ra rog po'i sha khrag dang/ bya mo nag mo'i sha khrag dang/ gzhan gyi yang sha khrag sna tshogs gang 'byor pa dang
261b3(rgyud 'grel): chang la sogs pa bza' sna tshogs dang ldan pa'o gtor ma dbul bar bya ste/ ma hA maM sa kha'i hi/ ma hA go ro tsN+Ta khA hi/ ma hA citat khA hi/ mahA ba su ta khA hi/ i daM ba ling gri h+NA pa ya hUM phaT swA hA/ /zhes brjod de gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/ /de ltar mchod
261b4(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs par phul nas bstod pa bya'o/ /gling bu bud pa 'am/ mi'i rkang bud pa 'am/ cang te'u 'am/ mi thod kyi rnga brdung zhing dbyangs snyan bos bstod pa bya ste/ oM dpal ldan nag mo mi pham srid gsum bdag/ rang don grub cing rnam thar sgor
261b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhol kyang/ /snying rje'i dbang gi gla zhan don rjes thob cing/ /sher rab sna tshogs dag gsi 'gro don byed/ lha mo sku mdog nag po char sprin mdog/ mtshan mo nag mo shin tu gsum pa'i gzugs/ /shin tu ring cing keng rus lus can ma/ /
261b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis brjid pa'i sku/ /ral pa gyen 'greng lan bu g.yon du 'khyil/ /skra rked spul dang thod pa'i phreng thod can/ /rna ltag me tog dar nag cod pan can/ /khrag gis chang gis ra ro spyan rtsa dmar/ mi ro rangs pa khar
261b7(rgyud 'grel): bcug mche ba bzhi/ /rnam par gtsigs nas khrag la shin tu dgyes/ /snyan g.yas sbrul gyi ma gul nas dril gsil zhing/ /gdug pa btul nas tshangs pa'i sgra sgrogs ma/ /snyan cha g.yon ma seng+ge rol pa dmar/ /dpal bo khams gsum
262a1(rgyud 'grel): seng+ge'i dgra sgrogs shing/ /phyag bzhi g.yas gyis dang bo ral gri 'dzin/ /'og ma paN+Ta rak+ta dmar skyil 'dzin/ /g.yon gyi dang po shig mtshon cha 'dzin/ /'og ma tri shul mgul na dar dpyangs 'dzin/ /shak+ti ral gri mtshon
262a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis bsad pa'i tshe/ /lha ma yin gyis mgo sogs do shal byas/ /glang po che yi ko rlon stod g.yogs byas/ /smad ni ba lang ko rlon dras pa la/ phyed ni re lnga ser po'i sham bus dkris/ /klu yi dbang po gzhibs pa'i rkad chings can/ /zhabs
262a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis lcags sgrog dag gis mdzes par brgyan/ /khrag zhag mang po'i tshom thus thig ler bris/ /bong bu'i rmig pa glog gi shugs can ma/ khams gsum skad cig tsam gyis bskor bar byed/ skad ni dung dang 'byug gi sgra ltar sgrogs
262a4(rgyud 'grel): ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za dbang du sdung/ /lho phyogs gshin rje'i pho brang gnas su byon/ /dam pa'i sa nas gzugs sku gnyis gzigs ma/ /ting 'dzin dbang thob gzugs khams gnas su byon/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs phyag byas ma/ /
262a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la dbang sgyar 'dod khams ya mthar byon/ /dbang phyug chen po'i sku la dgyes 'khril ma/ /sum cu rtsa gsum tshal bzhir byon pa'i tshe/ lha rnams dbugs phyag byas ma/ lha ma yin rnams phung par byas ba'i tshe/
262a6(rgyud 'grel): lha min dbang po kun gyis phyag byas ma/ /sku mchog ri rab tshe dang 'gran pa'i tshe/ /lte ba'i thang ka'i phyogs nas nyi zla 'char/ /rgyal chen bzhi la sogs pas phyag byas ma/ /rgya mtsho'i gting nas me sar mtsho skems nus/ /sa 'og
262a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang la kun gyis phyag byas ma/ /lha mo khyad kyis cho 'phrul 'di stan pas/ /bdud dang gshin rje'i rgyal po 'dar zhing 'dud/ /ma mo srin mo'i tshogs rnams rdam zhing rgod/ /cit+ta'i rin chen gur phub gzhal yas nas/ /nyi ma'i dkyis
262b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sogs pa'i 'od zer 'bar/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dug gis bcud bsdus nas/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim mdzad ma/ /dug gis rlangs pas nag po'i phyogs rnams kyi/ /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nang rnams slong mdzad ma/ /de phyir na dkyi
262b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag mo dam la 'du/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bdud rtsi'i bcud bsdus nas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag thim mdzad ma/ /bdud rtsi'i rlabs pas dkar po'i phyogs rnams kyi/ /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad kyi rtsa gcod ma/ /bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal mo dam
262b3(rgyud 'grel): la 'du/ /gang zhig khyod la dad ni ma byas byams/ /de phyir nad bdag ma gcig sman gyi gtso/ /bdud rtsi'i lha mo khyod la rtag tu bstod/ /sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sbyan snga ru/ /bdag gi ding nas 'khor ba ji srid bar/ /dkar po'i phyogs kyi nang
262b4(rgyud 'grel): dang sdug bsngal sogs/ /zhi bar bya phyir tshe dang bsod nams spel/ /nag po'i phyogs ni bkug cing dbang du sdus/ /smyo 'bog bsad la sogs pa'i las 'di rnams/ /bstan pa bsrung phyir las 'di bskrub par gyis/ /'di las 'gal na rgyal ba'i
262b5(rgyud 'grel): sku bslus pas/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i rdo rjes mgo 'gas so/ /de skad rgyal ba'i sbyan sngar dam bcas bas/ /dom bcas bzhin du phrin las myur du mdzod/ /rnal 'byor bdag dang bdag gi 'khor bcas la/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyan gyi
262b6(rgyud 'grel): char phab/ /nad sogs sdug bsngal tshogs rnams zhi bar ma rgyad?/ /tshe dang dbang thang longs sbyod rgyas par mdzod/ /zang zing me tog 'kru yi phung po dang rin chen rkang 'gro phyugs rnams 'phel bar mdzod/ /bla ma smod cing dkon mchog dbu
262b7(rgyud 'grel): 'phang smod/ /bdag gi dge pa'i bar char byed pa rnams/ /che ge ma zhes bya ba'i las ngan 'di/ /khyad kyi khong nas dug gi rlung bus la/ /'du ba rnam bzhi'i nang rnams khong nas slob/ /bdag gzhi sa la lhung la rde bsu chug/ /don snod lnga po
263a1(rgyud 'grel): khong khrag skyug du chug/ las ngan 'khor bcas bang chen rdung du chug/ smre sngags cho de gnam du 'brod du chug/ 'tsha bdag bsad smo 'bog bas bsad par mdzod/ /gcan zan mkha' sdi? la sogs ltas ngan
263a2(rgyud 'grel): phob/ bstan pa bsrung ba'i las 'di myur du mdzod/ /oM ru ru ro ru ze ti staM b+ha to si ka ma la ngag shi sa hUM b+hyo/ che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT ces bzlas shing dmar rlob cing gtor ma sbreng zhing brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ /yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/
263a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang lha mo'i gzungs la sogs pa la bstod pa mdza' dag bya'o/ /de nas lha mo'i sbyor ba la gnas nas/ /don thams cad grub par pyed pa'i snying po'i sngags 'di bzlas par byas te/ myur par ma yin bul ba min/ /mi gsal ma yin
263a4(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar min/ /gug ba skyed nyams pa ma yin pa/ /g.yeng ba'i rtog pa spangs pas bzlas/ /oM hUM sh+rI ya de bi kA li ma hA kA li hUM b+hyo/ /a ri la h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes yig 'bru gsal bas lha mo bzlas par byas te/ sdags kyi bzlas pa thams
263a5(rgyud 'grel): cad kyang lha'i mo'i tshig yin par che ba'i nga rgyal phya zhing/ rang gi sprul ba'i lha mo thams cad kye zhal nas kyang sdags kyi sgra 'byung bar bsam zhing bzlas pa la sogs pa bya ste/ de lta bu thams cad kyis bzlas par 'gyur/ /de ni ldon du
263a6(rgyud 'grel): bya bsngags te/ 'bum phrag bdun bzlas pa 'am/ yang na gsum bzlas pas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de yang sngags khri phrag bzlas nas gtor ma re re btang ste/ khu tshur bcings te sngags mdzub sgrengs la/ kha
263a7(rgyud 'grel): 'grem g.yas g.yon du mche ba ltar? byas la/ /oM bya bA bt+tA li bt+tA li cho gcig lan bdun nam gsum bzlas na s'di skad du/ /dur khrod ma me dngos grub zhal/ /gtum mo gtsigs byed yi dags kha/ /dam tshig srung ma khrag
263b1(rgyud 'grel): dga' mo/ /ki li sgra sgrogs sbyor 'dzin la/ /dur khrod ro yi mchod dus na/ /tshogs dang po ta bcas pa ru/ /gcigs byed gtum dud sol ba mo/ /gsol cig bzhes cig dam tshig lha/ /gnas nas gnas su mdzad du gsol/ /bdag gi bsam pa
263b2(rgyud 'grel): ci 'dod pa/ /de ni khyod kyis 'grub par gyis/ /bdag gi las 'di ci byed kyang/ /de la kun gyis grogs gyis shig/ gra? grtNa/ sarba duSh+dt/ pra du ? b+ha k+Sha b+ha kra/ phruM phruM phreM phaT swA hA zhes brjod de/ se gol lan gsum brdabs la btar byar bya'o
263b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzab ma rdzogs kyi bar du de ltar shes par bya'o/ /ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar de srid gyi bar du bzlas la/ skyo bar gyur na yang bstod pa byas la mchod yon phul te mtshed la phyag byas la/ /lha mo slar gshegs su gsal lo/ /dpal lha mo la sdon du
263b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa phul zhing bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas la/ lha mos lung bstan cing mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byer las kyang dang po nyid du snying po'i sngags 'bum bzlas te/ de nas bzod cig las la sbyar ro/ /de la mi smyo zhing bsad pa'i las bya ste/ grog
263b5(rgyud 'grel): mkhang gyis dang/ chu 'gram gnyis kyis dang/ dur khrod gyis dang/ dur khrod kyi thal ba drin po dang/ dur khrod kyi sol pa dang/ rdzas de dag gi gcig tu bsres te/ zhib tu btags la/ lung pong gi gcin gyis sbrus te/ bsgru bya'i gzugs brnyan
263b6(rgyud 'grel): byas la sdum bu dang sdum bu med na yang/ lung tang tshe'i 'bras bu dang/ dug dang/ ske tshe dab lan tshwa dang/ ra khrag sbyar la mi de la rus/ /rigs bla gang yin pa'i gzugs/ gro khal bris la/ bla de'i lus la de'i ming rus dang/ sod cig pa'i bskul tshig
263b7(rgyud 'grel): dang lan ba dis te/ 'di skad du/ hUM cha ge mo mA ra ya un man+ta ku ru hUM phaT ces bri/ bla rdo dang sgrags la gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar gzhug/ /gzhan yang gong gi rdzas dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ mu zi nag po bsres te zhib tu btag la/ lung bod
264a1(rgyud 'grel): gi gcin dang sbyar te/ gzugs brnyan khyab bar bsku'o/ /de nas gcan zan gyi thong par bcug la maN+Dal gyi dbus su gzhag/ de nas gang la bya ba de bkug cing gzugs brnyan la bstims te/ mi de yin pa kho nar bsam
264a2(rgyud 'grel): la bya'o/ /gsal shing la bskyon la bsad pa'i tshul du/ 'dir lcags las gsal shing gcig pa brdungs la bya'o/ /byas pa bzhi lha mo yin te/ gzugs brnyan gyi kha ru rkub nas gyen du btsugs khar phyung la gzugs so/ /de nas sdags 'bum phra gsum
264a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas nas dgra bo brlag par 'gyur ro/ /de dbus bsam par bya ba ni/ bsgrub bya de'i snying ga'i dbus su yi ge kaM las gyur pa'i sdig pa kha dog nag po mi sdug pa cig/ snying gi khar ma'i dbus su zhugs nas/ snying khrag 'thung zhing sha za bar bsam mo/ /gzhan
264a4(rgyud 'grel): yang dpal lha mo nag mo bsgom pa'i thugs ka'i mar me la/ nang gi hUM gi 'od zer las dza dmar po sgril mar phyogs bcur 'dus pa las/ de yongs su gyur pa las/ lcags kyi spyad mo ral pa can gcig tu bsgom mo/ /des bsgrub bya'i snying rtsa'i
264a5(rgyud 'grel): dbus nas khrag rdub par bsam zhing sngags bzlas te/ oM hUM sh+ri de bi kI li mhA kA li hUM b+ho/ ma ma sha tuM a mu kaM mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT ces brgya rtsar bzlas nas/ rdzas ni ka na ka'i rtsa ba dang/ zir nag po dang/ dbang po'i lag pa dang/ gnod
264a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin gyi lag pa dang/ be'u rgyug pa dang/ skye ba dmar po dang dur khrod kyi so la ba dang/ lan tsha'o phyid ma rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma sbyar ba byas la/ sdags bzlas nas gzugs brnyan la dbab/ phur pa lta de bsregs la snying gar gang ba/ de ltar
264a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan rnon pos gzugs duM bur gtubs la/ phye mar byas la/ da d+hu ra'i 'bras bu yod na rab/ med na yang lung tang tshe'i 'bras bu brgya rtsa brgyad blangs la/ rtsa ba mo'i nang du btsags nas gzugs brnyan gyi phye me dang bsres nas dpal lha mo'i sbyor
264b1(rgyud 'grel): bar skra bshig gcer bur phyur nas/ /blho phyogs su blta te tsher ma la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas sdags la/ /sroM hUM sh+ri de si kA ki li hUM b+hyo/ ma ma sha traM a mu kaM mA ra ya/ un man+ta ku ru hU phaT zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing/ rdzas dang
264b2(rgyud 'grel): bstun cing bsreg par bya'o/ /de nas byas nas smyo nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /haM gis thal ba de nyid blangs te/ de nyid sbyi bor btang ni lo nyi shu rtsa gcig du myos par 'gyur ro/ /zhes kyang bshad do/ /gzhan yang bdag gi rmis ltas su/ /bu mo nag mo khros pa yis/ /
264b3(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig 'chings pas bcings gyur na/ /mtshan ma nag mor de shes bya/ /bsgrub bya nyi ma bdun na ni/ 'chi ste gshin rje'i yul du 'gro/ gal te re zhig cung zad 'gor na yang/ /nyin zhag bdun du bsam gtan 'di bya'o/ /bsgrub bya lus po skams pa ri
264b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ skra 'jings pa/ sdub pa/ khu ba dang/ rdul dang khrag 'dzag pa/ dmar ba'i cha byang can zhag bdun bsam mo/ /yang na mngon sum du bsam mo/ /bdag gnas pa'i hUM las 'od zer nyi ma dang ma rtag lta du 'byung ba las/ bskal pa'i me bzhin 'bar zhing/
264b5(rgyud 'grel): 'ur 'ur dang/ tog tog dang/ tsham chem tsan du drag pa'i yi ge hUM du gyur nas?/ hUM de las rdo rje khab tu gyur bar bsam mo/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i/ bshad de bshad khung gi sgor ba zhugs te/ snying phul nas kha'i nang nas sam/ spyi gtsugs nas kyi tshangs bug nas phyur nas
264b6(rgyud 'grel): cher 'bab par bsams te/ snying po'i sngags gye 'jug la/ che ge mo ta na shen/ re ?/ hUM hUM phaT phaT ces pa'i sdags kyis khas bub du lhung bar bya'o/ /de lta bus bsam gtan kyi lha yang 'chin gnas pa'i mi lta ci smos/ /lha mo mu stegs kyis ba lugs
264b7(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon lo ka sh+rI yis bsgyur ba rdzos so// //oM swa ste/ re ma te'i dmag zor gyi man ngag 'di la/ man ngag cig la 'bungs gnyis te/ dang po A ce dyang mar po la ? 'byung gna sbzang pos gsed srang lnga phul nas zhus/ dge ba shes
265a1(rgyud 'grel): lce la zhang shes rab bla ma dang/ snubs rgyal le gnyis kyi rta gcig spyi mar phul nas zhus snubs la kyi ma mo khrag mig ces par grags so/ /gnyis pa ni lo tsa ba shes rab bla mas gu ru A ca rya dmar po nyid rgya gar du gshed
265a2(rgyud 'grel): ba la bal po tshun chang skyel thung mdzad nas zhus nas byang byang ste/ zhal gyi man ngag ma lus pa yid ches par gnang ste/ khung gnyis so/ /dmag zor zhes pa'i des tshig gtam der rtsang chod do/ /gzung ni sdom brgyad pa 'di nyid yin te/ khungs mthun
265a3(rgyud 'grel): no? man ngag 'di yi byo thabs la/ /mchod pa bsham sa rten bca' ba dang/ ma mo bskyed cing ye shes dgug/ /mchod cing bzlas pa bya ba dang/ /bstod cing las la bsdu ba'o/ /de la mchod pa bshams pa ni/ /dur khrod la sogs dben pa'i sar/ /
265a4(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal khru gsum chag chag bya/ /mdun du gru gsum ling gang zhug maN+Dal steng dug sogs pa'i rngos/ /phud dang gtor ma rkTha bsham/ /kham shing byang dmar nad rkyal dang/ sho rngo chon gya dru bu sogs/ /sha sna rnyed tshad mi dpang sha gsung
265a5(rgyud 'grel): chen ma mo mnyes par bya/ /de nas rten kyi phya thabs ni/ /dkyil 'khor dbang ldan me chams su ni/ /'bru nag 'jim nag bsres pa la/ /dre rta la zhon nag mo ni/ /mthing nag rgyan gyis brgyan pa mo/ /rma bya'i gdugs kyis phug pa ste/ bdud phrug
265a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshon thogs mang pos bskor/ /'jigs su rung bas bskor bar byaM/ /da ni ma mo bskyed par bya/ /rang gi cho ga rdzogs byas la/ /byang shar mu le dings su bsam/ /rlung nag tshub ma'i nang shed du/ /k+Sha zhes brjod bas skad cig gis/ /dmag zor
265a7(rgyud 'grel): nag mo re ma te/ /dred rta la zhon thod pa can/ /phyag g.yos be con 'dzin pa la/ /phyag g.yon thod pa khrag gang bsnams/ /dmon mo'i mchon cha lnga dang bcas/ /sga yi snga sha nang rkyal la/ /ske yi phyi bu dru bu ste shing rkeng la gzer ba dang/
265b1(rgyud 'grel): byang dmar sho rde snga shal/ /dang nag gos kyi chas kyi brgyan/ /rma bya'i gdugs 'og chud par bsam/ /bdud phrug tshos ni dus mnyam du/ /g.yon pa thod khrag yungs kar can/ /g.yas pa mchon cha sna tshogs can/ /de ltar dam tshig bskyed byas la/ /rang
265b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gnas pa gzhug par bya/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes ni sdags la gdags/ /byang shar nas byon rang rang thim/ /bzhugs su gsol ba'i tshig 'di brjed/ /hUM nag mo gdug cen drags pa can/ /kun tu khyab pa'i gzugs ston ma/ /nag mo go cam dre'u rta chibs/ /
265b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dir sbyon dre'u rta'i gdan la bzhugs/ /rag mo dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM zhes brjod do/ /de nas de la mchod par bya/ /za byed nag mo mche ba can/ /rgod byed ha ha nag mo khyed/ /gsod la dga' bar byed pa mo/ /bdag ni brda yi phyag byed do/ /rag mo a ti
265b4(rgyud 'grel): pU dza ho/ /phra me sbom pa las byung pa'i/ /bdud rtsi bram pa'i dza gang 'di/ /dmag zor nag me la 'phul lags/ /bstan pa bsrung phyir bzhes su gsol/ /yi ge sum cu gcig pa la/ /pany+tsa a mri ta khA hi gdags so/ /sha khrag la sogs bdud rtsi lnga dang
265b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyar/ /'bru sna lnga la sbyar ba'i gtor ba 'di/ /damg zor nag mo khyod la dbul lags kyis bstan pa bsrung phyir bzhes su gsol/ /sdags kyi 'dug la bi laM ta kha raM khA hi zhes gdags so/ /chu ma 'dres dangs ma'i khrag/ /dangs ma yi ni khrag chen
265b6(rgyud 'grel): dpo/ dmag zor nag mo la dbul lags/ /bstan pa bsrung phyir bzhugs gsol/ /sdags kyi mjug lam hA rk+ta kha ri khA hi zhes so/ /lha mo'i 'khu ldog mi yong bar bya ba'i phyir/ /byang chub kyi sems dkar dmar lca la bzhag gcing mchod do/ /de ni dam
265b7(rgyud 'grel): bsre ba'o/ /de nas smon lam gdab pa ni/ /bdag cag dus 'dir cho ring zhing/ bu dang tsha bo rgyas pa dang/ longs spyod thams cad rgyas pa dang/ /log par lta ba'i dgra dang bgegs/ /thams cad rtag tu brlag par byed/ /da ni bzlas pa brtsam
266a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /rten gyi lta mi'o thugs kar ru/ /rgyus pa'i srad bu de la gdags rnal 'byor snying ga'i sa bon las ka 'od zer dkar po 'phros pa yis/ /lha mo'i thugs kar ma la thim/ /'od zer sdags kyis mchod par bsam/ /'od zer dkar po
266a2(rgyud 'grel): sdags kyi gzugs/ /bdag la slar thim dngos grub byin/ /de ltar lang dang yang du bsam/ /de yi thun smad dag la ni/ /bdag dang ma mo bdud phrug bcas/ /thams cad dus mnyam sdags zlos pa'i/ /'od zer dug mda''dra ba yis/ /'brub khung yangs
266a3(rgyud 'grel): thun khrag thun bya/ /bzas pa'i lus rkyang brlag par bsam/ /mgon po de la gzungs thag bstad/ /bstod pa cung zad cung zad bya/ /rem ti ni spyi dang mthun/ /de nas las la bsdu ba ni/ /bdud phrug tshogs dang khrag rnams ni/ /sle'u khud du khyer

266a5(rgyud 'grel): dug lnga bgad ba mang po dang/ /yungs thun thogs pa mang po dang/ /mtshon cha thogs pa mang po yis/ /dgra lus yul 'khor bcom pa dang/ /thams cad gsod cing za bar bsam/ /g.yang gzhi drag tu brdab par bya/ /log la lha mo la yang
266a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod/ /bdud bung mang po 'phangs ba'i tshe/ /bdud phrug gzugs rnams snang na/ /las rnams 'grub par gdon mi za/ /bdud rnams 'dug na cung zad dka' / cung zad bstod pa byed pa ni/ /hUM b+hyo dpal gyi gzugs can 'dod khams
266a7(rgyud 'grel): gtso mo khyod/ /rta mchog dre'u rta zhon nas dpag tshang lnga brgyar brgyug/ be con thod pa dam pa rang rtags 'dzin/ /re ldes stod dkyes sprul gyi sham bu can/ /lte bar nyi shar gtsug na zla rgyas ma/ /khrag nad bdag mo ? phyg dang
266b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ma/ /lha mo re ma ti la bstod pa 'bul/ /rag mo b+hyo/ /rag mo b+hyo b+hyo/ /rag mo thun b+hyo/ /ba la rag chen ma/ rag mo a bya ta bya thun b+hyod/ /ru lu ru lu hUM b+hyoM hUM/ che ge mo mAr ya/ bod rbad gsad gsum de la tshang/ /bzlas pal ni 'grus la bya ma mo'i bstod
266b2(rgyud 'grel): bskul spyi dang mthun/ /gser mkhar dam dus bzhi'i rgyal ma'i bskul la sogs ba bya/ /dpal lha mo dam zor gyi man ngag rdzos so// //a tsa rya dmar bo la shes rab bla mas zhus pa'i lugs yin// //
266b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI ma hA kA la sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/ /rdo rje nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdar gsungs ba'i chogs/ stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i dang las/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyim la hUM yig nag po de nyid las
266b4(rgyud 'grel): yongs su rdzogs pa'i rje btsun ni dpal nag po chen po zhal gcig/ phyag gnyis pa/ mdog nag po/ spyan gsum pa/ 'bar ba chen po/ phyag g.yas pa gri gug g.yon gyis thod pa 'dzin pa/ mi mgo'i rgyan can/ skra kham pa gyen du 'greng ba/ /smar kham pa
266b5(rgyud 'grel): can/ mche ba btsigs pas 'jigs par byed pa/ yan lag thams cad la sgrul gyis brgyan pa bod thung ba/ zhal nas khrag 'dzag par bdag nyid skad cig tu rdozgs par byas nas sdags bzlas par bya'o/ /de la sdags ni 'di lta ste/ /oM ma hA kA
266b6(rgyud 'grel): la hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ dug dang khrag sgog pa yungs kar rnams kyi spos phul nas/ sha dang sran chan myos byed dang/ /me tog bdug spos byug pa dang/ /sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lngas/ /nag po chen po'i gtor ma bya/ /de yi sdags ni 'di lta ste/ oM
266b7(rgyud 'grel): ma hA kA la ya shas ne pa ka rA yA srya mu kra shma shA na bA si mA skri tA ya e Sho a paShtsi ma kA lo yaM/ ya de TaM pri ta dz+nyA sma pi da ha i maM ratna ti yA pa ka ri Na mA mug na mA Shta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma rba ma rA grih+Na grih+Na/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha
267a1(rgyud 'grel): pa tsa pa tsa/ di na me ke na/ mra rA ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha/ sarba b+hu ta pre ta pi shA tshen/ ba li gri h+Na/ mA ma sid+d+hi ku ru shAn+ti ku ru rk+Sha ku ru/ zhes bya ba gtor ma'i sdags so/ /de la nye bar spyod pa 'di yin te/ ku sha
267a2(rgyud 'grel): las sgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan la/ tsha ba gsum dang dug dang ske tshe rnams ra tsi ka cho ga bzhe ni du bskul nas rtsang gis khrag tha ma par btsugs te gang gi ming gis me la bdugs na de ni skad cig de nyid la mi snang ba dang nyems par
267a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /de bzhin gang zhig slob dpon la sdang dang/ rtag tu dkon mchog gsum la smong/ sems can du ma 'joms byed pa/ /nag po chen pos gsol bar mdzad/ /de bzhin mgo la 'dug nas su/ /ti la 'bru tsam du gtub par byed/ /ces
267a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la sogs pa dpag tu med ba rtog par bya'o/ /dpal nag po chen po'i bsgrub thabs rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ mhA kA la sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/ nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
267a5(rgyud 'grel): ni mthi shi la nag po bya ste gri gug dang thod la rnam pa skra gyen du langs pa thod pa'i cod pan can/ /sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ spyan dmar ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /sag gi pags ba'i sham thabs can mi mgo'i phred pa'i do shal dang
267a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ yi dags kyi gdan la bzhengs par gnas/ mun pa mi bzad pa'i rang bzhin du bsgoms la nag po'i chos nas sgrub pa brtsams te/ /de'i zhal lhor bstan la gzhag/ kha shar du bstan la/ /sdags stong phrag bcu bzlas par
267a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /dam tshig gi rdzogs kyis gtor ma phul la/ /gu gul gyis bdug spos dbyul bar bya'o/ /te tog sna tshogs pa gtor nas/ oM A sA mu sa sha li tra shu la/ e hye hi/ ma hA kA la snyba sha truM/ narg+ha da ya na rg+ha da ya/ rdzab ra Na/
267b1(rgyud 'grel): gri h+NA pa ya gri h+NA pa ya hUM phaT/ /bza' ba spangs la bzlas pa bya'o/ /changs par byas la mngon du phyogs pas sdags a bzlas par bya'o/ /sdar bzhin gtor ma dbul lo/ /oM mhA kA la ha na ha na rda swAhA/ zhes bya ba 'bum phrag gcig bzlas par
267b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /oM ma hI kA la haM na ha na badzra Na ma ma ka ryaM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ zhes 'bum phrag gnyis zlas par bya'o/ /oM ma hA kra la ha na ha na/ badzra Na e dang pre Sha yA mi ka ra She thA swA hI/ zhes 'dum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o/ /oM ma hA kA la hi na ha na
267b3(rgyud 'grel): rk+Sha rk+Sha b+ha kri h+Na ka ryaM ku ru dza dza zhes bya ba gtor ma'i sdags so/ /rdorje rnal 'byor ma dan sgrub pa byas la nag po chen po sgrub par bya'o/ /nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI ma hA kA la sya aShta
267b4(rgyud 'grel): me n+ta sto nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po'i stod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal/ /oM grub par gyur cig/ hUM hUM phaT ces drag po'i sgra yi srid pa gsum gyi khongs ni ma lus 'gengs nus pa'i ha ha Ta Ta
267b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pa gang zhig dus kun du ni shin tu 'jigs mdzad cing/ /kaM ka kaM zhes pod ba'i phreng bas dbu la spras shing nag po'i mchu dang mtshungs pa'i sku/ /bruM bruM bruM zhes khros pa'i mchog gi khro gnye 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa kha gdangs
267b6(rgyud 'grel): sha za zhing/ /dbu skra dang ni smar chas ser nye bar spyod pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis bsrung bar mdzod/ /raM raM raM zhes sbyan dmar 'khyug cing sgyur mdzad khruM khruM khruM zhes rab sgrogs sbyan gyis gzhis/ /smin ma ser zhing mche gtsigs ro yi gdan
267b7(rgyud 'grel): la dgyil pa'i zing skyod khyod kyis zhing skyong mdzod/ ha ha hAM dang kI li kA la zhe sgrags phyag g.yon kha TwAM gar bcas thod pa bsda mas/ ru ru ru zhes khrag gi rgyun 'bab phyag gis bsnams shing gsol ba 'thung ba la dgyes shid
268a1(rgyud 'grel): khaM khaM khaM zhes gtum po'i phyag g.yas gri gug ral gri bgegs rnams la ni rol mdzad pas/ /DaM DaM DaM zhes Da ma ru can 'di yis 'dul mdzad 'khor bcas zhing skyong khyod kyis bsrungs/ /rab tu rngam
268a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing mgo bo rnams kyi phreng bas gshin rje dam mchungs 'jigs pa'i sku brgyan cing/ k+ShaM k+ShaM k+ShaM zhes gzugs can ca co sgrogs par byed pa'i gdug pa rnams bzung ste/ gcig pus sna tshogs mnang nas ka ha ka ha brjod mdzad
268a3(rgyud 'grel): char sprin snon po'i mdog/ sku la mi yi sha dang rgyu mas 'brel bas kun nas brgyan cing zhal du gsol/ /drag shul phyag gis 'dod pa'i gzugs dang mi gdug gzugs can gyi ni 'byung po ro langs tshogs/ /ma lus bzung nas
268a4(rgyud 'grel): myur du bsad pa rnams kyi mgo bo'i khrag rgyan 'bab pa rab tu gsol/ /h+rI k+ShaM sh+rI zhes sdags kyi gsung can pa za pa tsa'i sdags kyes bgegs rnams rab tu bsreg/ rol pas rol pa sel cing mi yis gang ba'i mtsho la zhing skyong byod
268a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsrung ba mdzod/ /pheM pheM phaT ces sgrogs pa so sor bskyed pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus su bzhugs nas su/ /rigs kyi lus can skod par mdzad cing bsgrub pa rnams kyi zhing rnams des par zhing skyong mdzod/ /phyugs rnams kyi ni
268a6(rgyud 'grel): nyin re bzhin du bgegs dang sdigs 'dzems dri med bsnyems pa chu nye bzhin/ /tsaM tsaM tsaM zhes gtum pa'i shugs kyis rab dbye rmad byung 'od kyi 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/ /kraM kraM kraM zhes gshegs pas dgra bo nyon mongs pa
268a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams nges par nyon mongs 'joms mdzad cing/ /saM saM saM zhes tshogs pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig thos 'din zhing skyong gang yin khyod kyis skyongs/ /baM baM baM zhes gshen rje ltar 'gro dri ma med pa'i sna tshos chu bzhin gzhigs
268b1(rgyud 'grel): mthad cing/ /yaM yaM yaM zhes rlung gi shugs kyis myung du rgyu zhing nyon mongs 'jig rten gnod byed mkhyen/ /kli kli kla zhes gdug pa'i gzugs kyis sid gsum nyin mtshan dus kun nyon mongs gyur pa gang/ /paM paM paM zhes thugs rje'i zhags las
268b2(rgyud 'grel): byol song rnams 'dzin phyag gis gdul bya rnams skyong la/ /sdags bdag sdag kyi lus can thugs kyi sdags pa rnams la 'bras la 'bras bu blo gros msungs med ster/ zhing rnams skyong bar mdzad pa khyod kyi 'gro ba'i lus rnams ma lus bskyad du
268b3(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /sgrub pa po 'am slob dpon 'ga' zheg thos 'jin gang zhig blo ldan nus pa dang thun gsum du ni sdags rnams brgyad po klog byed de ni bsod nams ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ tshe dang dpal dang grags dang 'byor ba 'jin dang gzi rgyas pa
268b4(rgyud 'grel): dang mtshungs med dang/ sa steng dang ni mtho ris su 'ang de yi bgegs kyi tshogs rnams rtag tu nyams par 'gyur/ /dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba slob dpon 'phag pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
268b5(rgyud 'grel): *// /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI ma hA kA la sto tra/ bod skad du/ /dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa/ dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM srin po'i gzugs kyis gdug pa can/ tshar gcong byang chub sems dpa' ste/ /grong khyed sum rtseg 'jig
268b6(rgyud 'grel): phyed pa'i/ /gtam po khyod la bdag bsto jo/ /mdog mag gzugs thung gzi brjid can/ /gdug pa tshang gcod gri gug ga yas/ /g.yon pa gdug pa'i khrag bkang snod/ /thod 'phreng can la bdag bstod do/ /khros pas zhabs brdabs sa gzhi g.yo/
268b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i gang mos ra rib bsgyel/ /dam tshig nyams pa'i snying 'byin pa/ /dam tshig can la bdag bstod do/ /hUM zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ /gri gug thod pa lag na 'dzin/ ral pa kham nag gyan du khyal/ /spyan gsum me yi mdog 'dra ba
269a1(rgyud 'grel): mche ba zla ba tshes pa 'dra/ /thod pa'i skreng bas do shal byas/ /gsum khyim chel 'phyad ba po/ /mi thung khros pa'i gzugs 'dra ba/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi/ /bstan pa bsrung bzhal bzhes pa/ /nag po khyod ni yin pa ste/ /
269a2(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa tshar gcod 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /dbu sgra kham nag gyen brdzes pa/ /steng gi lha tshogs 'jigs par byed/ /sbyan dgrad mche gtsigs ljags 'dri la bas/ /bar gyi gdon tshogs bsdigs par byed/ /g.yas gri gug bsnams
269a3(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ dgra bgegs 'dul zhing bdud mgo gcod/ /g.yon pa thod pa bsnams pa ni/ /gnod sems can gyi khrag rkang gsol/ /khros pa'i zhabs gnyis brdabs pa yis/ /gned sems can gyi lus la nyed/ /khyod kyi thub pa'i bstan pa srungs/ /rnal
269a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa yi bar chad srungs/ /chos dang dpal 'byor rgyas par mdzod/ /lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'grogs/ /dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa slob dpon mchog sred kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rA ma hA kA la stod traM
269a5(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po la stod pa/ dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan dpal chen grags pa yis/ /sku gsung thugs las sprul pa yi/ /nyid kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ sprul pas 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /hUM gyi de
269a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid las bzhengs pa'i/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis ba ste/ /sku mdog nag po 'bar ba che/ /bstan pa bsrung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thed pa rnam gsum 'bar ba yi/ /gzhal yas gur gyi nang na bzhugs/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyad bdud
269a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams mnan/ /'gyid bag brjod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ma chegs thabs kyi pad+ma mdzes/ /shes rab ye shes nyi ma'i dkyil/ /hUM las skyes pa'i ngo ba ni/ /bstan pa bsrung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /g.yas kyi gri gug gdengs pa yis/ /dgra bgegs
269b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dul zhing bdud mgo gcod/ /nyon mongs dug gsum rtsad nas 'joms/ /dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdud kyi thod pa bdud rtsis bkang/ /nyid kyi zhal du gsol ba mdzad/ /sgrub pa po la dngos grub stsol/ /byin brlabs 'bebs la phyag 'tshal bstod/
269b2(rgyud 'grel): zhal nas khrag gi rgyun 'dzag pa/ /bstan pa la gnod dal yams 'bebs/ /dam tshig bsrung la dngos grub stsol/ /thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas do shal byas/ /dug lda rtsad nas gcod pa ste/ /
269b3(rgyud 'grel): dug gsum 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mche ba gtsigs pas bstan pa la/ /gnod pa'i klad pa 'joms par mdzad/ /til tsam dag tu brlag par mdzad/ /mi mthun 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gdug pa ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /rkang med 'gro bas
269b4(rgyud 'grel): sku la brgyan/ /zhe sdang rtsad nas bcod bste/ /klu chen 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /stag ni dpa' brjid rdam pa'i chas/ /sham thabs rked la bcing pa yi/ /grags pas lha chen zil gis gnon/ /dpal chen 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bskal pa me dpong 'bar
269b5(rgyud 'grel): ba yid srad pa'i rtse mor rab tu 'bar/ /bstan pa la gnod sgrol mdzad pa/ /'bar ba'i rgyal po khyod la bstod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /tha ma'i bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /thod pa lnga yi dbu la brgyan/ /'jigs 'god gshegs la phyag 'tshal
269b6(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /ral pa khaM na gra gyen du 'khyil/ /bstan pa phun sum tshos pa yi/ /nam kha'i mdza' dang mnyam pa'i rtags/ /rtags lnga rldan la phyag 'sal bstod/ /sbyan gsum dug gsum rtsad nas 'joms/ /'dul ba rnam ba rnam pa bzhi gzigs nas/ gang la
269b7(rgyud 'grel): cis 'dul ji bzhin du/ /de 'dul khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod pa slob dpon chen po a bd+hu ti pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI b+hanTa ra ka mahA kA la sto tra/ bod skad du/ rje btsun
270a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa/ /dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyi sems can ma lus myur du tshar bcad bsad nas khrag rgyun gsol mdzad nag po chen po ni/ /rab 'jigs mdog
270a2(rgyud 'grel): gnag gzugs thung gsus pa 'phyang zhing dbu skra dmar ser 'jigs pa'i me dpung nang bzhugs khros pa'i gang mo ni/ /ha hUM pheM gi sgra yis lha dang lha mo skrag nas 'bros shing 'gyel ba'i mgo bcad zhabs kyis mnan pa drag po'i tshul/ /
270a3(rgyud 'grel): bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyi sems can ma lus myur du tshar bcad bsad nas khrag rgyun gsol mdzad nag po chen po ni/ /ska rags dril bu g.yer kha sil sil Da ma ru ni Di Di hUM ha sgra sgrogs thog gi nang gi thog gi ni/ /sgra rnams sgrogs
270a4(rgyud 'grel): shing mnyam dang mi mnyam gang byer pa yi lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas dur khrod gnas su rol/ /bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyi sems can ma lus myur du tshar bcad bsad nas/ khrag rgyun gsol mdzad nag po chen po ni/ /thung la sbom
270a5(rgyud 'grel): zhing spyan gsum me tog bany+d+ha? ra ltar dmar bas bgegs rnams skrag cid dngangs mdzad ljags ni glog ltar 'khyug /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pas ma rung gdug pa can gyi sha dang rus pa kruM kruM 'cha' zhing lha ba zhag 'jib pa/ /bdud dang
270a6(rgyud 'grel): bdud kyi phyogs kyi sems can ma lus myur du tshar bcad bsad nas khrag rgyun gsol mdzad nag po chen po ni/ /phyag rgya lnga dang klu brgyad kyi brgyan stag lpags ska rags dang ni sku smad dkris shing mi bskyod pa ni spyi bor bzhugs/ /de
270a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams sku la spro zhing mi yi rgyu mas sbrel ba'i mgo bo'i phreng ba rab 'phyang do shal byas/ /bdud dang kyi phyogs kyi sems can ma lus myur du tshar gcad bsad nas khrag rgyun gsol mdzad nag po
270b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po ni/ /drag po dang ni chu bdag bzlog par dka' ba'i tshogs rnams so zhal bu gsol mdzad phyag g.yon rtse gsum 'dzin cing thod khrag 'thung/ /gshin rje'i lce 'dra'i gri gug dang ni ral gri phyag g.yas bsnams shing gdug ba can rnams brlag
270b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad sdig pa ring du spong/ /bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyi sems can ma lus myur du tshar bcad bsad nas khrag rgyun gsol mdzad nag po chen po ni/ /rig byed ces pa'i lha mo brgyad dang rol pa'i rje btsun rdo rje nag po chen po'i sangs rgyas grags
270b3(rgyud 'grel): das bskul ba ni/ /gang gi nyin mtshan rtag tu 'di bton bsgrub pa'i don rnams grub dang sems can ma lus khyad par sa la gnas par mdzod/ /dpal rdo rje nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bung thung gsus 'phyang mdog gnag ral pa kham
270b4(rgyud 'grel): nag gyen du brdzes/ /'bar ba'i tshogs kyis lha min dag bgegs ma lus sreg par byed/ /drag po'i zhal gyis bdud rtsi gsol mdzad mgon po gcod mdzad pa/ /bzhad pa'i tshul gyis khro zhing gdug pa'i dgra rnams skrag mdzad pa/ /rkeng pa byin
270b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dril bu g.yer ka'i tshogs kyis sgra sgrogs shing/ /Di Di dang ni hUM ha DaM ma ru yi sgra sgrogs pa/ /zhal nas tor ke na to ra ra ki na ki sgra ni/ sgrog shing zhabs kyis mnyam dang mi mnyam tshul du gar mdzad cing/ /ma mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor
270b6(rgyud 'grel): nas dur khrong gnas na rol/ /ha ka hUM/ /pheM ka'i sgras ni lha dang lha min bsreg /ma lus dgra bgegs tshogs kyi srog la myur du sbong byed cing/ /nag po'i phyogs kyi dgra bgegs khrag gi rgyun ni zhal du gsol/ /nag po chen pos sgrub pa po yi
270b7(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa myur du sgrubs/ /spyan gsum me tog pand+hu kra? ltar dmar zhing smin ma 'khyog /ljags ni glog ltar 'khyug pas bgegs kyi tshogs ni 'jigs shing skrag /zhal nas mche ba rnam par gcogs pas dgra bgegs ma lus pa'i/ /sha rus
271a1(rgyud 'grel): rkang dmar kruM kruM gsol zhing lha ba zhag ni 'jib/ /stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs kyis ni sku smad yongs su dkris/ /phyag rgya lnga dang klu brgyad kyis brgyan nyid kyi spyi bo nas/ /mi bskyod la sogs de bzhin gshegs
271a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam par 'phro bar byed/ /rgyu ma mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng bas sku la do shal byas/ /nag po drag po chu bdag la sogs zhal du gsol bar mdzad/ /rtse gsum dang ni gdug pa'i khrag bkad thod pa g.yon na bsnams/ /gnod sbyin lce 'dra'i gri
271a3(rgyud 'grel): gug ral gri g.yas kyi phyag na 'dzin/ /gdug pa'i dgra rnams ring du spong zhing brlag par mdzad pa khyod/ /lha mo brgyad kyis bskor zhing 'dir ni gar gyi tshul gyis bzhugs/ /nyin dang mtshan du bsgrub pa'i don rnams ma lus mdzad
271a4(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ sangs rgyas grags pa yis ni 'jig rten mgon po la zhus pa ma lus sems can 'di dag rdo rje sa la rab dgod mdzad/ /rje btsun dpal nag po chen po bya rog ming can dang/ gdong can la bstod pa mkhas pa chen po rtsa mi
271a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas grags kyis bstod pa rdzogs so// //'di dag bra kri ta'i skad du yod pa las se lo tsa bas bos skad du bsgyur pa'o/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI ma hA kA la di bi sto tra aSh+Ta nA ma:/ bos skad du/ dpal lha mo nag mo
271a6(rgyud 'grel): chen mo la bstod pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /til mar gyis bskus lan bu gcig pha ro nye'i rne chas sgeg cing cha lugs ma lus 'chang/ /rgyan du rkang sgrogs lcags las byas pa gcig gis rang
271a7(rgyud 'grel): gi rkang pa mdzes par byas pa de/ /gcer bu bong bu zhon zhing 'gro ba 'di na rgyu ba de ni lha mo khyod nyid kyis/ /bdag nyid mdzes par shes kyis gzhan ltas khyod kyi spyod pa'i mtsho chen don dag su yis shes/ /'khor ba 'jig pa'i
271b1(rgyud 'grel): tshe na mi lus dag las khrag dang zhag 'dzag dud pa 'thul ba na/ /lha mo mche ba mi bzad khyod kyis zhal du 'gro kun skad cig tsam gyis zhugs par 'gyur/ /nag mo mi thod thogs pa khyod ni rnal 'byor grub pa'i rnal 'byor can te dur khrod
271b2(rgyud 'grel): dgyes/ /khyod ni g.yo byed mnan cing nad chen 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa gsal zhing zhi la mi bzang dril yang sgrogs/ /dpa' bo dag ni mgo bo'i cod pan gyis ni legs spras g.yul du mtshon gyis bcad pa yi/ /'phreng ba thogs shing gar
271b3(rgyud 'grel): byed lag pa mnyen brkyang rkub tshos che la klu dbang bshibs pa yi/ /ska raD 'ching zhing lag na mdung dang ral gri thogs la khrag gi chang gis myos par 'gyur/ /mi rtsa dmar po gyur cing mtshan mo dur khrod 'gro ba 'byung po phal chen rnams kyi
271b4(rgyud 'grel): mthong/ /ko rlon chen po dral te brgyangs pa'i gos kyis mnabs shing phyed g.yogs phyed ni re ldes dkris/ /mi yi rgyu ma gsar pa'i sbubs kyis zhal gyi zla ba brgyan cing dril bu 'gran par 'khrol/ /lus ni snum kyis gsar du byugs shing khrag
271b5(rgyud 'grel): dang zhag la sogs pa'i thig les tshom bur bris/ /mi yi sha la so yis chem chem gcod byed thod pa can ni bdag la bskyong gyur cig /drag po drag mo mi bzad mi sha kha na thogs pa sngan chad ma byung khyod mthong nas/ /ma mo rnams kyang
271b6(rgyud 'grel): skrag cing rtabs la rngam pa mthon cing mig rtsa rig rig khyod la 'dud/ /nag mo bzang mo lus mdog gnag cing bzod par dka' ba khyod la brgya byin la sogs kyang/ /nyin gcig bzhin du bstod pa byed de bshin rje nyid kyang rtag tu 'dur
271b7(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'dud par byed/ /mi rnams dang ni 'gro ba ma lus pa dgra 'jug btul ba ni rna ba ya gcig la/ /brang gis 'gro ba mgo bo'i gdong ka stong dang ldan pa rgyab nas ban dus byas nas gnas/ /ya gcig la ni seng+ge mtshungs med
272a1(rgyud 'grel): thogs shing rgya mtshos bskor ba'i sa gzhi ma lus gnon/ /steng na rgyu ba'i nyi ma 'od zer stong ldan khyod kyi lte ba'i thad ka'i phyogs su gzhag /rgya mtsho'i klong nas me 'bar khyod/ /chu rnams skems par nus pa ste/ /bud med
272a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad zhi bya'i phyir/ /lha chen sku yi phyed du gzhugs/ /rdzong dang dka' zlog nag mo che/ /lha dang lha min phyag byas pa/ /mi nad gang yin khyod ming shes/ /de ni 'jigs pa med par mdzod/ /gshin rje'i lcam mo bdud kyi yum 'dod
272a3(rgyud 'grel): kha myas dbang phyug ma nad ngo cog gi bdag mo dpal nag mo chen mo la stod pa brgyad pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba ma bram ze mcho sred kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so// //*/ /dpal nag po chen po'i bstod ba bzhugs so/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/
272a4(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI ma hA kA la pa da aSh+Ta ka sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i bstod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM grub par gyur cig /'byung po ro lang tshogs rnams ha ha hUM dang ki li ki
272a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes myur bar ni/ /sku la rgya ma'i phring bas kun nas klubs shing zhal du mi yi sha ni gsol mdzad cing/ /'dod pa'i gzugs dang mi sdug gzugs can kha TrnyaM gar bcas phyag bcas phyag g.yon mi yi thod pa bsnams/ /smin ma ser
272a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing mche mtsigs ro yi gdan la skyes pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis zhing skyong mdzod/ /pheM pheM pheM zhes sgrogs par byang cing so sor skyes pa me dpung chen po'i dbus ni ni/ mgo yi rnams kyis mgo'i phreng byas rab gsal 'jigs pa'i sku brgyan
272a7(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje dang mtshungs shing/ /drag shul phyag gis bsad pa rnams kyi mi mgo'i ma lus 'dzin cing khrag skyugs 'bab pa gsol/ /rol pas rol ba sel cing mi yis gang gis la zhing skyong khyed kyis srung bar mdzod/ /k+ShaM k+ShaM k+ShaM zhes
272b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod ba'i sku can ca co sgrogs par byed pa'i gdug pa rnams bzung te/ /gcig bu snod mnan cing mnan nas ha ka ha brjod cing char sprin sngon po'i mdog /h+riM k+ShiM shsiM gi sngags kyi rgya can pa tsa pa tsa rigs kyi sngags kyis kun bsregs/ bgegs
272b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams rab tu bskrad par mdzod cig sgrub pho rnams kyi zhing gnas nges par zhing skyong mdzod/ /gang zhig dus kun du ni he ha Da Da zhes bzhad shin tu 'jigs mdzad cing/ /phyag rnams kyis ni sdig dang bgegs 'jig nyi ma ri re dri med mnyes
272b3(rgyud 'grel): pa chu 'dzin mdog /hUM hUM phaT ces drag po'i sgra yis srid pa gnyis po'i khong ni ma lus 'gengs nus shing/ /dbu skra dang ni rma ra tsher ser nye bar spyod pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis bsrung bar mdzod/ /khaM khaM khaM zhes phyag g.yas gri gug ral
272b4(rgyud 'grel): gris bgegs rnams rol khrag 'thung pa la dgyes/ /raM raM raM zhes spyan nam du ru ru zhes phyag ni khrag gis rgyan cing stuM pa'i shugs/ /kruM kruM kruM zhes khros pa'i spyan ni byas gzigs par mdzod cig bgegs rnams khyod kyi sgyur
272b5(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad/ /dTaM dTaM dTaM zhes 'di yis 'dul mdzad rnga ma tu dang bcas pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis srungs/ kriM kriM kruM zhes mnan pas dgra'o nyon mongs pa rnams nges/ /par nyon mongs phur mdzod cig /kaM kaM kaM zhes thod phreng sla la
272b6(rgyud 'grel): gris bgegs rnams rol khrag 'thung pa la dgyes/ /raM raM raM zhes spyan nam du ru ru zhes phyag ni khrag gis rgyan cing stuM pa'i shugs/ /kruM kruM kruM zhes khros pa'i spyan ni byas gzigs par mdzod cig bgegs rnams khyod kyi sgyur
272b7(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad/ /dTaM dTaM dTaM zhes 'di yis 'dul mdzad rnga ma tu dang bcas pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis srungs/ kriM kriM kru zhes nan pas dgra'o nyon mongs pa rnams nges/ /par nyon mongs phur mdzod cig /kaM kaM kaM zhes thod phreng sga la
272b8(rgyud 'grel): spras shing nag pa'i mchu dang 'dra ba'i sku/ /tsaM tshiM tseM zhes stuM bi shugs kyis rab g.yo rmad byung ba'i 'jigs rten snang mdzad cing/ /saM saM saM zhes 'chog pa'i bdag gi dgra thos 'dzin zhing skyong gang yin khyod kyis skyongs/ /yaM yaM yaM zhes snod
272b9(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje ltar 'gro dri ma med pa'i chu bzhin gzigs mdzad cing/ /baM baM baM zhes rlung gi shugs kyis myur du rgyu zhing nyon mongs 'jig rten skyod pa ma nyes/ /baM baM baM zhes 'jigs pa'i khro gnyer mchog gi 'jigs mdzad nus pa'i khwa sha
273a1(rgyud 'grel): za zhing/ /k+ShaM k+ShaM k+ShaM zhes phan par mdzad cing gnod pa skad gis sel zhing skyod khyod kyis skyongs/ /kloM kliM kluM zhes gdug pa'i gzugs kyi srid gsum nyin mtshan dus kun nyon mongs par mdzad pa gang/ /paM paM paM zhes
273a2(rgyud 'grel): thye'i zhags pas byol song rnams 'dzin phyag gis gdul ba rnams skyong ba/ /sngags bdag sngags kyi sku can blo yis sngags pa rnams la blo gros 'bras bu mtshungs med ster/ zhing rnams skyong bar mdzad pa khyod kyis 'gro ba'i lus rnams
273a3(rgyud 'grel): ma lus yun ring bskyang du gsol/ /bsgrub pa po'i slob dpon blo ldan bdag gis thos 'dzin gzhi gus dang ldan pas/ thun gsum du ni sngags rnams brgyad po klog byed de ni bsod nams ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ sa stengs dang ni mtho ris su ni
273a4(rgyud 'grel): de yi rtag tu gegs rnams nyams 'gyur zhing/ /tshe dang dpal dang la dang grags dang 'byor 'dzin stobs dang/ mthu dang gzi brjid rgyas par mtshungs med 'gyur/ /dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa sngags rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon
273a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI ma hA kA la syA Sh+Ta man+t+ra sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa rkang pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ /dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM

273a7(rgyud 'grel): nag po'i mchu dang mtshungs pa'i sku/ /b+hUM b+hUM b+hUM zhes khros pa'i mchog gi khro gnyer 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa'i gdings sha zi zhing/ /dbu skra dang ni rmar cher ser nye bar spyod pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis srung bar mdzod/ /raM raM raM zhes spyan dmar
273b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khrug cing sgyur mdzad kruM kruM kruM zhes rab sgrogs spyan gyis gzigs/ /smin ma ser zhing mchi gtsigs ro yi gdan la dgyes pa'i zhing skyong khyod kyis zhing skyong mdzod/ /ha ha hUM dang ki li ki li zhes sgrogs phyag g.yon kha TrAM gar bcas thod pa bsdams/ /
273b2(rgyud 'grel): ru ru ru zhes khrag rgyun 'bab pa phyag gis bsnams shing gsol do 'thung ba lnga dgyes shing/ khaM khaM khaM zhes gtum pa'i phyag g.yas gri gug ral gri bgegs rnams la ni rol mdzad pa/ /DaM DaM DaM zhes Da ma ru can 'di yis 'dul mdzad 'khor bcas
273b3(rgyud 'grel): zhing skyod khyod kyis srungs/ /rab tu rngam zhing mgo po rnams kyi phreng bas gshin rje dang mtshungs 'jigs pa'i sku brgyan cing/ /k+ShIM k+ShIM k+ShIM zhes bzod pa'i gzugs can ca co sgrogs par byed pa'i gdug pa rnams gzung ste/ /gcig pus snoT bsnan cing
273b4(rgyud 'grel): bsna nas ka ha ka ha brjod mdzad char sprin sngon po'i mdog /sku la mi yi sha dang rgyu ma sbrel ba'i phreng bas kun nas brgyan cing zhal du gsol/ /drag shul phyag gis 'dod pa'i gzugs dpar mi stug gzugs can gyi ni 'byung po ro langs chags/ /ma
273b5(rgyud 'grel): lus gzung nas myur du bsang ba rnams kyi mgo po khrag rgyun 'bab pa rab tu gsol/ /h+raM kAM sh+raM gi sngags kyi gsungs can pa tsa'i sngags kyis bgegs rnams rab tu bsreg /rel pas ngol pa sel zhing mi yis gang ba'i sa la zhing skyod khyod kyis
273b6(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar mdzod/ /phaM phaM phaT ces sgrogs pas so sor bskyod pa'i me dbung chen po'i dbus sub zhugs nas su/ /rigs kyi lus can skyod par mdzod cing sgrub po rnams kyis zhing rnams nges par zhing skyong mdzod/ /phyugs rnams kyis ni nyin re bzhin du
273b7(rgyud 'grel): bgegs dang sdig 'joms dri med mnyes pa chu nyi bzhin/ /tseM tseM tsaM zhes gtum po'i shugs kyis rag g.yos smad byung 'od kyis 'jig rten snang mdzed pa/ /kraM kraM kraM zhes gshegs pas dgra bo nyon mongs pa rnams nges par nyon mongs 'joms
274a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad cing/ /saM saM saM zhes chogs pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig thos 'dzin zhing skyong gang yin khyod kyis skyongs/ /baM baM baM zhes gshin rje ltar khro dri ma med pa'i sna tshogs chu bzhin gzigs mdzad cing/ /yaM yaM yaM zhes rlung
274a2(rgyud 'grel): gi shugs kyis myur du rgyu zhing nyon mongs 'jig rten gnod byed mkhyen/ /klaM klaM klaM zhes gdug pa'i gzugs kyis srid gsum nyin mtshan dus kun nyon mong gyur ba gang/ /k+ShaM k+ShaM k+ShaM zhes phan par mdzad cing gnod pa skad cig gis sel
274a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing skyong khyod kyis skyongs/ /paM paM paM zhe thug rje'i zhags pas byol song rnams 'dzin phyag gis gdul bya rnams skyong/ /sngags bdag sngags kyi lus can thugs kyis sngags pa rnams la blo gros 'bras bu mchungs med lter/ /zhing
274a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams skyong bar mdzad par khyod kyis 'gro ba'i khus rnams ma lus yun ring bskyad du gsol/ /sgrub pa po'i slob dpon gang zhig dam tshig thos 'dzin gang zhig blo ldan gyur pa dag /thun gsum du ni sngags rnams brgyad po klog byed de ni
274a5(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams ldan bar 'gyur ba dang/ che dang dpal dang grags dang mthu stobs bsngor? ba 'dzin dang gzi brjid rgyas pa mtshungs med ster/ sa steng dang ni mtho ris su yang de yi bgegs kyi tshogs rnams rtag tu nyams par 'gyur/ /dpal
274a6(rgyud 'grel): nag po chen po la bstod pa rkang pa brgyad ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po 'phags pa slu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ko sa la'i rnal 'byor pa sh+ri be ro tse na badzra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bande
274a7(rgyud 'grel): der ri chos grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la thab pa'o/ /*/ /rdo rje nag po chen po'i bstod pa bzhu? dpo?// */ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra ma hA kA la a Sh+Ta ka sto tra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje nag po chen po'i bstod dang/
274b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa/ oM nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tA hA hUM mdzad ki li ki li sgrogs pa'i dgra yis 'byung bo'i tshogs pa rnam par 'thag /hUM hUM sgrogs pa'i zhal rnams kyis ni mi yi sha za rgyu ma'i phreng ba 'khrug pa'i sku/ /phyag na kha TwaM ga dang mdung thang mi
274b2(rgyud 'grel): yi log pa'i mtshan pa 'dzin cing mdzes pa'i gzugs/ /mi sdug gzugs can spyan dang dbu skra dmar ser dur khrod la dgyes zhing skyong kun nas bsrungs/ /zhal dang zhal nas phaM phaM pha te ces sgrogs pas so sor bskyed pa'i me dpung chen po yi/ /
274b3(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba rab tu 'bar ba'i dbus na bzhugs shing sku la brgyan pas yan lag te bar mdzad/ /gsong byed drag po'i phyag gis mi yi khrag 'dzag /rgyun du btung zhing sprul gyis phreng bas brgyan/ /dmyal bar bsreg pa sel zhing sa steng zhing rnams skyong
274b4(rgyud 'grel): ba khong ni rol zhing rol bar mdzod/ /dri med rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes kyang srid pa gsum po kheng par 'gengs nus 'od 'dod kyis/ /hUM hUM phaT ces ma rungs dag yis nyin bzhin 'jig rten phyug rnams kyi ni bgegs 'joms shing hA hA aTta
274b5(rgyud 'grel): rgod pa yi ni dus rnams kun tu shin tu rab tu 'jigs par byed/ /mgo skye ral ba smar shin tu dmar ser nye bar 'phro ba'i zhing skyong bsrung mdzod/ /sgeg cing rol pa'i 'jo sgeg dang ldan gsus pa 'phyang ba phyag na ral gri khaM khaM khaM/ /ba lta
274b6(rgyud 'grel): 'thubs pa'i spyan dang phyag ni khrag ltar dmar ba raM raM raM dang ru ru ru/ /ngo mtshar snang mdzad gtum po'i shugs can khro bo'i ltabs khro gnyer mdzod cig krUM krUM krUM/ /'khor bcas skyong ba'i zhing skyong ma lus bdud dang ro langs 'dul bar mdzad
274b7(rgyud 'grel): pa DaM DaM DaM/ /des par gnod pa'i bdud dang nyon mongs bag chags gcod byed gri gug 'dzin pa h+riM h+riM h+riM/ /nag po'i mchu dang 'dra ba'i sku ni rtso dad nyes 'phrig gi thod pa'i bred can kaM kaM kaM/ rmad byung 'od kyis 'jig rten g.yo zhing snang bar mdzad
275a1(rgyud 'grel): pa gtum po'i shugs can tsaM tsaM tsaM/ /lha mchog dam tshig ldan pa khyod kyi tshogs kyis mchog dang zhing rnams skyongs shig saM saM saM/ /'gro ba sna tshogs dri med chu bzhin gzigs nas nges pad gshin rje 'gog byed yaM
275a2(rgyud 'grel): yaM yaM/ rlung gi shugs bzhin myur du rgyu bas nyon mongs 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa baM baM baM/ smin ma gya gyu'i khro gnyer bsnyer bas 'jigs par mdzad kyang 'jigs las thar byed b+h+ruM b+h+ruM b+h+ruM/ /sgrub po rnams la phan dang bde mdzad gnod
275a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgo rnams bsrung bi zhing skyong k+ShaM k+ShaM k+ShaM/ /bzod pa'i lus can k+ShaM k+ShaM k+ShaM zhes gdug pa rnams kyis bzod par dka' ba'i ca co sgrog /ka ha ka ha'i gsung gi rgyun dang char sprin sngon po'i lus can gcig pus thams cad gnon/ /h+rIM klIM ra griM gis
275a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang pa tsa pa tsa'i sngags rnams kyis ni lus can thal bar byed/ /sgrub po rnams la kun tu gnod pa'i bgegs rnams nye bar zhi bar mdzod cig zhing skyong che/ /klaM klaM klaM zhes rtag tu nyon mongs gyur pa'i lus can sring gsum 'gro ba'i
275a5(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs rnams/ /rnam par gsal nas phyag gi zhags pas skyong zhing srung ba la phan phyugs bdag paM paM paM/ /sngags kyi bdag nyid sngags kyi sku can sngags myos sngags kyis zhi ba'i bde steng 'bras bu'i phyag /mdza' dag rgyal ba'i sku

275a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang/ /tshe dang dpal dang grags dang 'byong ldan mnyam mod stobs kyis rnam par gnon pa'i gzi gzid brgyas/ /thams cad shes shing de yi nyin mchen rtag tu bgegs kyi tshogs ni myos shing nyams par 'gyur/ /rdo rje nag po
275b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i bstong pa brgyang pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o// //dung mol ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI ya de biM ma hA kA li swA d+ha ni pi ka/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo tshan mo'i
275b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs/ dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal lha mo sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ yo byang phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par bshams la/ de nas dur khrod dam shing gcig gi drung dam/ /gcod rong dam khang stong
275b3(rgyud 'grel): dam dben pa'i gnas su phyin la/ /de nas dang po phyogs skyong bcu la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i lha 'dre thams cad la gtor ma byin zhing/ gser skyems rgyas par gtong ngo/ /de nas e'i maN+Dal kun tu khru re la/ 'phangs su khru gang gi tshang du bya'o/ /
275b4(rgyud 'grel): de la stegs bu sum rim du bya/ /bar ma zla gam gsum du bya tha ma gru gsum du bya/ tha ma'i gru gsum re re la rabs chad kyi thod pa 'am/ yang na gang yang rung ba'i thod pa re re gzhug ste/ de yang thod pa steng mngon par byas la/ thod pa'i
275b5(rgyud 'grel): nang du yi ge ya nag po re re rdo sol gyis bri'o/ /thod pa'i phyi la yi ge ma dmar po re re khrag gis bri'o/ /zla gam gsum yang dmar por byug /gru gsum dmar por tshon btang ste/ ma legs na yang 'di lta bu'i skyon yod de tshen sboms na
275b6(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon slob bu la nad mang du yong/ tshon 'phras na slob dpon slob bu nor yal ba 'ong ngo/ /ya yong gyur na yul du 'brug pa 'od so/ /bar chad par gyur na slob dpon slob bu myur du 'chi bar 'gyur/ de bas re kha smyeg ma 'bring po
275b7(rgyud 'grel): tsam pa byas la/ /g.yas nas bskor zhing bris te/ tshon dgye ba yang gru gsum nyis 'gyur gyi bar du dgye ste/ nang gi gru gsum nag por bya/ /phyi'i gru gsum dmar por bya/ nang gi? gru gsum gyi rtse mo re re la/ rdo rje phyed pa re res
276a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan par bri/ thal chen dang khrag skams pa bsres pas e'i dbus su sngags kyi sa bon hUM bri/ /nang gi zur gsum la ma mo thams cad kyi srog gi snying po phul ba b+hyo re re bri bar bya'o/ /de nas da du ra'i khu ba dang ra rog
276a2(rgyud 'grel): po'i khrag dang/ bya mo nag mo'i khrag dang/ de dag cha bsnyams nas bsres la zhib tu btags la tshon rtsi dang sbyar nas/ /dur khrod kyi ras la dpal lha mo'i sku bris la/ e'i maN+Dal gyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol te/ /der yang spos la sogs
276a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mchod pa'i yo byad lnga tshang bar bsags la mchod pa 'bul te/ de yang bdag dam tshig gi lha mor bsgoms te/ dang por rnal 'byor pa'i snying ga'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa'aM/ /yang na 'dab ma brgyad pa snying po dang bcas pa zhig
276a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ pad+ma de'i snying po'i dbus su yi ge aM klad kor dang bcas pa la 'od 'bar ba zhig bsam/ /de'i steng du yi ge raM raM gyi gzi brjid kyis raM nyid me ltar 'bar ba zhig bsam/ /me des bdag gi rnam par rtog pa can gyi lus bsregs na thal
276a5(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur par bsam mo/ /de nas yang thal ba de'i dbus su zhi ba'i yid kyi bsam par bya ba/ /sngon gyi pad+ma'i snying po la gnas pa srog gi rang bzhin yi ge aM/ de'i steng du yi ge baM bsam mo/ /de nas baM de yongs su gyur pa las/ bum pa dkar po
276a6(rgyud 'grel): kha nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab pa cig bsam/ /de nas sngon gyi srog du bshad pa'i yi ge aM de la/ /bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun bab cing sbrengs pas yi ge kun gyi mchog tu bshad pa'i aM zhes pa chu des lhag par yang brtan zhing brtas
276a7(rgyud 'grel): par byas nas gzi brjid dang ldan par gyur nas/ /zla ba dang kha ba dang 'o ma dang/ kun da dang sprin dkar po dang dung lta bur bsams te/ de nas dpal lha mo'i mtshan gyi sngags/ oM mahA kA li de bi ka ra la/ bi kritna/ kA la rA tri/ tsaN+Da
276b1(rgyud 'grel): rU? pi Ni hUm phaT/ ces brjod pa'i sgo nas/ /sngags kyi sa bon aM de las sa bon lhar bsgrubs te/ /dpal lha mo chen mo'i skur bsgyur zhing bsgom par bya ba ni dud pa'i sol ba sku mdog nag mo/ nag po'i sprin dang bung ba lta bur gnag pa/ shin tu
276b2(rgyud 'grel): sbeg pa/ keng rus kyi lus can/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi/ zhabs gnyis pa/ g.yas kyi dang po na ral gri/ 'og ma na band+ha dmar gyis bskyil ba/ skra 'khrol ba/ g.yon gyi dang po'i phyag na shaka ti/ 'og ma na tri shU las mgul ba na dar
276b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs phyar ba thogs pa/ mi ro rengs pa khar bcug nas mche ba bzhi gtsigs pa/ spyan gsum dmar po bzlog nas blta ba/ dbu skra ral pa gyen du brdzes shing lan bu g.yon du 'khyil ba/ dbu skra la sbrul dang thod phreng gis brgyan pa/ rma bya'i rgyal mtshan btsugs nas 'char ba snyan cha g.yas na sprul gyi mgul na dril bu gsil ba/ snyan cha g.yon pa na seng+ge'i ral dmar 'phyo ba/ rna ltag gnyis na me tog dang dar dmar po'i cod pan 'phur ga /lha ma yin la sogs pa'i
276b4(rgyud 'grel): thod pas do shal du byas la/ glang po che'i ko rlon gyis stod g.yogs byas pa/ ba lang gi ko rlon chan pas dras pa la/ re lde ser po sham bur btags pas sku smad dkris pa/ khrag dang zhag gi thig les dum bur bris pa/ klu'i rgyal po
276b5(rgyud 'grel): gshigs pas ska rags byas pa/ zhabs gnyis lcags sgrog gis brgyan pa/ bong bu ga pa'i steng na btsan skyil du bzhugs pa/ dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus na skad dung dang 'brug gi sgra lta bu sgrogs shing/ /ma mo dang mkha' 'gro
276b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sha za thams cad dbang du sdud pa zhig tu bsgom mo/ /de ltar gsal ba de'i thugs ka'i dbus su/ thugs ma 'am me stag 'dra ba la/ rang gi sor bzhi'i tshod tsam du/ dbyibs sgo nga'i gzugs dang 'dra ba zhig gsal bar bsgo mo
